Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]章节4：残酷之星[/b][-][/c]

在这颗星球的轨道上有一个名为 [c][ffffff]Kenex Station[-][/c], 被货船们称之为家的空间站. 这里是想要离开这个星系，远离兹瑞克斯压迫的人们的希望.
但对于一个孤独的UCH士兵来说事情并没有那么简单.

[b][c][ffee00]完成该任务可以解锁海盗变节者的任务[-][/c][/b]

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]
[u][b]主线[/b][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]序章: 通向未知的旅程[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节1: 人类残迹[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节2: 繁星之森[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节3: 工业考量[-][/c]
[c][00ffff]章节4: 残酷之星[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节5: 世外坟墓[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节6: 敌对机器[-][/c][c][c0c0c0][-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Commander, I have the location of Kenex Station queued up on your display and have plotted a course to the station's landing bay.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]You can be there in under 15 minutes.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官, 我在你的显示器上显示了Kenex Station的位置，并规划了前往空间站着陆区的航线.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]你可以在15分钟之内到达那里.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Woah there, IDA![-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]What's with the sudden rush?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I'm not quite ready to head out there... Besides, what's a couple of hours after almost a year?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]你先等等，IDA![-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]怎么突然这么急?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我还没准备好出去呢... 再说了，快一年了，几小时又算什么?[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]There is... no immediate rush, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]However, I have decrypted a deep-space transmission from a Zirax station calling for a Destroyer to reinforce the local planetary orbit.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]It would be best to reach Kenex Station before it arrives.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]有…确实不急，指挥官.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]然而，我已经解密了一个来自兹瑞克斯空间站的深空传输，他们正试图呼叫一艘驱逐舰来增援当地的行星轨道.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]最好在对方达到Kenex Station之前离开.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]That's no guarantee that they're there to secure the station. They'd have no reason.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]They could be there to deal with pirates or something.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]不好说他们是不是真的来保护空间站的，这没理由.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]也许他们来是为了处理海盗或者的其他的一些事情.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]Yes, Commander. That is possible.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]I have detected increased combat activity in this sector that does not match Zirax patrols that could be attributed to Pirates...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]确实,指挥官，这的确是有可能的.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]我在该星区探测测到了更多与兹瑞克斯常规巡逻轨迹不匹配的交火，确实可能归咎于海盗...[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]See? Nothing to worry about![-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]We can always avoid the ship when it turns up. It's not like a Destroyer is faster than any well-made terran ship.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]看吧?没什么好担心的![-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]船一出现，我们就能躲开，驱逐舰并不太可能比状态良好的人类飞船快.[-][/c]

English: [c][c4c4c4][i][b]Welcome, Commander.[/b][/i]\n[i][b]Kick your boots off, my house is your house.[/b][/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][c4c4c4][i][b]欢迎，指挥官.[/b][/i]\n[i][b]放松一下，把这里当自己家.[/b][/i][-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]That was awfully easy.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]They let us right in here, right into the main terminal.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]真是太轻松了.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]他们让我们从这里进入，直接进入主航站楼.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The malware that I returned to Officer Paravel allowed me access to his personal communications, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I used his connections to allow you access to the station. It is limited access, but avoids the issue of customs and weapon-checking that other visitors would have to do.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我发给Paravel警官的灰件让我可以访问他的私人通信，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我可以利用他的连接让你进入空间站，虽然访问权受限，但是避免了过关和武器检查环节. [-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]What would I do without you, IDA?[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Let's hope we never find out...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]但愿我们永远也不要知道那种事...[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]According to my logs, A number of survivors received medical attention on this station.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]We know for a fact that Ensign Emmerson was taken here for treatment, so the physician that treated her should be our first stop.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]根据我的日志，一些幸存者在这个空间站接受了医疗照顾.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我们知道少尉埃莫森是被带到这里治疗的，所以给她治疗的医生应该是我们的第一站.[-][/c]

English: Ensign Emmerson was taken to Ok'y Medical for treatment. The medical officer may be able to shed some light on her condition and the rest of the UCH survivors.
Chinese (simplified): Emmerson少尉被送往Ok'y Medical接受治疗，医务人员应该能透露一些有关UCH幸存者的信息

English: [c][8ab3ff]Well, that was helpful.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]No clue as to where the survivors went to, so our best bet now would be to find the guy in charge.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]嗯，那很有帮助.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]不知道幸存者去了哪里，所以我们现在最好的办法是找到负责的人.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I have identified the floor manager for you, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]His office is located 2 floors above you, across from the elevator.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我已经为您确定了楼层经理，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]他的办公室在你楼上两层，电梯的对面.[-][/c]
找到 Kenex-62 的楼层经理

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The Polaris Security dock is located at the top of the station, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]There aren't many operators on duty while there is no ship currently in port. So it should be easy to get in without being stopped by security.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]极星安全坞位于站点的顶部，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]当港口目前没有船只时，没有很多操作员在值班.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I have highlighted the location of an active PolSec Station on your display.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]The operator appears to handle crew placement on outgoing vessels and would be the one most likely to be able to access the logs.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我在您的显示器上高亮显示了一个活跃的极星安保站的位置.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]操作员似乎负责处理出港船只上的船员安置，并且是最有可能访问日志的人.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]What kind of "urgent matter" would the [-][/c][c][ffffff]Coms Chief[-][/c][c][8ab3ff] need me for?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]什么样的“紧急事情” 需要[-][/c][c][ffffff]首席通讯官[-][/c][c][8ab3ff]来做?[-][/c]

English: You've hit a dead end in your search for the UCH survivors.\nIDA wants you to speak to the Kenex-62 Coms Chief for some reason.
Chinese (simplified): 你在搜寻UCH幸存者时撞到了死胡同.\n出于某种原因， IDA希望你和Kenex-62的首席通讯官聊一聊.

English: Head back down to the Trading Floor

[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]Okay, it looks like you're there.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]There are airlocks on both sides of the relay for maintenance crew, but first I need you to do a visual inspection of the exterior.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]A close flyby near the panels should do.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffae00][Coms Chief][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]好了，看来你到了.
中继站两边都有气闸供维修人员使用，但首先我需要你目视检查一下外部.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]近距离飞越面板就可以了.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]This is an easy job, just do a close pass of the solar panels and attached equipment and sensors.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]Check them for any impacts, laser damage or open access ports.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]Anyone can do this, so I shouldn't even need to tell you what you should be doing.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]这是一项很容易的工作，只需要把太阳能电池板和附属设备以及传感器做一个近距离的检查.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]检查它们是否有任何影响，激光损伤或者打开访问端口.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]任何人都可以做这个，所以我甚至不需要告诉你应该做什么.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]No damage to the port solar array or anything else I can see here, Chief.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]端口太阳能电池阵列没有损坏或者我还能看到什么，长官.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I don't see any problems with the starboard array, Chief.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]A few scratches to the paint, but nothing wrong with any of the equipment.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]长官，我看不出右舷阵列有什么问题.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]油漆上有几处划痕，但任何设备都没有毛病.[-][/c]

English: [c][ffae00][b][ Coms Chief ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]Okay, It's time to take a look inside then.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]The access code for the airlocks for 653 is... [-][/c][c][00e1ff][b]6470[/b][-][/c][c][c4c4c4].[-][/c]
Access Code for Communication Relay 653's Airlocks is [c][00e1ff]6470[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]Okay, i'm inside.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]What am I looking for?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]好的,我在里面了.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我在找什么?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]That's [i]your [/i]job, kid.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]The internal codes for the oxygen is [-][/c][c][00e1ff]6777[-][/c][c][c4c4c4] if you're running low. Check the server consoles or whatever it is you guys do.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][通信主管][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]那就是[i]你的[/i]工作，孩子。[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]氧气的内部代码是[-][/c][c][00e1ff]6777[-][/c][c][c4c4c4]，如果你快用完了。检查服务器控制台或者你们做的其他事情。[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Doesn't look like the problem's with this relay. But just to be sure, i'll check the Port Data Relays to make sure they haven't been scrambled by a solar flare.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]看起来这个中继站没有问题.[-][/c]但为了确定，我要检查端口数据中继以确保它们没有被太阳耀斑干扰.

English: Receiving Message from Kenex Coms Chief
Chinese (simplified): 收到来自首席通讯官的联络

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]Whaddaya know?[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]You [i]do [/i]know what you're doing over there. I'll admit, I was worried you were taking me for a ride at first.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]你知道吗?[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]你 [i]知道[/i]你在做什么. 我承认，一开始我还担心你是在忽悠我.[-][/c]

English: Inspect the Port Data Relay for EM Damage.
Chinese (simplified): 检查端口数据中继受到的电磁损坏

English: [c][8ab3ff]Nope, I can tell just from a glance at the display that there's nothing wrong with it, Chief.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]No electrical charring, no broken connections and the readings are all normal.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]没有，我只看了一眼显示器就知道没有什么问题，长官.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]无电焦，无断接，读数均正常.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]I've transmitted the coordinates of the next relay in the series: [-][/c][c][ffae00]Relay 588[-][/c][c][c4c4c4]. Head over there and repeat the procedure for that one.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]I've got an overloaded cargo ship coming into the station right now and they need all the handholding I can manage, so there won't be any for you this time.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][Coms Chief][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]我已经传输了系列中下一个中继站的坐标:[-][/c][c][ffae00]中继站588[-][/c][c][c4c4c4].到那边去，重复这个步骤.[-][/c] [c][c4c4c4]我有一艘超载的货船正在进站，他们需要我尽我所能的帮助，所以这次不会给你任何帮助了.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've reached Relay 588.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Proceeding to conduct the visual inspection.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我已到达第588号对接点.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]进行目视检查.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]There appears to be no notable damage to the port side array, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]端口侧阵列似乎没有明显的损坏，指挥官.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Aside from dirty solar panels, this array appears to be in good condition.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]除了脏的太阳能电池板外，这个阵列的状态似乎很好.[-][/c]

English: [c][ffae00][b][ Coms Chief ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]Crisis averted, and just in time it seems.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]You ready to check the internals? The code for this one is [-][/c][c][00e1ff]8812[-][/c][c][c4c4c4].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffae00][b][Coms Chief][/b][-][/c] [c][c4c4c4]危机避免了，而且似乎来得正是时候.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]准备好检查内部了吗?这个的密码[-][/c][c][00e1ff]8812[-][/c][c][c4c4c4].[-][/c]

English: Access Code for Communication Relay 588's Airlocks is [c][00e1ff]8812.[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]Ready to perform the internal checks.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Anything different that I should know about here?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]准备执行内部检查.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]这里有什么我应该知道的不同吗?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]No, everything's the same in every com relay.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]They come straight off a production line as prefab modules that are put together by a factory ship and dropped into orbit.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][com Chief][-][/c][/b] [c][c4c4c4]不，每个接口都是一样的.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]它们作为预制模块直接从生产线上下来，由工厂的飞船组装起来，然后送入轨道.[-][/c]

English: Inspect the Starboard Data Relay's output transmissions.
Chinese (simplified): 检查右舷数据中继输出的发信

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've got a flickering light here, Chief. But that's probably something to do with bad wiring.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]The readouts on the Data Relays are reading green. So the problems gotta be with one of the neighboring relays that's sending to this one.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]长官，我这里有一盏灯在闪烁.但这可能和线路不好有关.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]数据中继站上的读数是绿色的. 所以问题出在邻近的一个中继站上，他影响了这个中继站的发送.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]I'll give you access to the Computer Core.[-][/c] [c][ff0000]Do NOT break anything in there[-][/c]!
[c][c4c4c4]If you check the incoming transmissions on the displays in there it should show you the nearest four satellites with their transmission status.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]The code for the access hatch should be...[-][/c] [c][a6ff00][b]1332[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]我将给你进入计算机核心的权限.[-][/c] [c][ff0000]不要破坏里面的任何东西[-][/c]!
[c][c4c4c4]如果你检查传入传输s在那里的显示器，它应该显示你最近的四个卫星与他们的传输状态.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]访问舱口的代码应该是...[-][/c] [c][a6ff00][b]1332[/b][-][/c]
访问中继站的计算核心

English: A corrupted signal is being received by Communications Relay 588. In order to triangulate the source of the signal, you must access the Computer Core using the code [b][c][a6ff00]1332[-][/c][/b] and check the transmission readout.
Chinese (simplified): 中继站588收到了一串损坏的信号.想要三角定位信号来源l，你必须使用密码[b][c][a6ff00]1332[-][/c][/b] 来访问计算核心并检查发信读数.

English: [c][8ab3ff]Come in, Coms Chief.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]We've identified the source of the bad signal as [-][/c][c][ffae00]Relay 451[-][/c][c][8ab3ff].[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I'm... heading out there now.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]请进, 首席.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我们认为不好的信号的来源是 [-][/c][c][ffae00]中继站451[-][/c][c][8ab3ff].[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我…现在就过去.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]有什么问题么?孩子[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Approaching Relay 451 now, Chief.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Something's odd with this one. The docking lights are red.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]长官，正在接近451号中继器.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]这个有点奇怪.对接灯是红色的.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]Careful there, kid! That means that someone's forced the airlock.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]If they [i]didn't [/i]break the door, the code should be [-][/c][c][ff0000][b]1312[/b][-][/c][c][c4c4c4].[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]Make sure you bring a gun, since they could still be on board.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]小心,孩子!也就是说有人强行打开了气闸.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]如果他们 [i]没有 [/i]打破了门,代码应该是[-][/c][c][ff0000][b]1312[/b][-][/c][c][c4c4c4].[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]一定要带把枪，因为他们可能还在飞机上.[-][/c]

English: Someone's forced the airlock of Relay 451 open recently.\nThe code to open the airlock properly is [c][ff0000]1312[-][/c], but they may still be on board.
Chinese (simplified): 近期有人强制打开了中继站451的气闸.\n此处气闸的密码是[c][ff0000]1312[-][/c], 但是那些人可能还在里面.

English: [c][8ab3ff]I'm not seeing anyone on board.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I'll take a look around and see if I can see what they've done.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我在船上没看到任何人.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我要四处看看，看看他们都干了些什么.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]Careful, kid. I lost one of my last workers this way.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]Don't be a goddamned hero.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]小心,孩子.我在这失去了一个手下.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]不要做死掉的英雄.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've got a broken console here.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Someone's ripped it right out of the floor.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我这里的控制台坏了.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]有人把它从地板上扯了出来.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Commander, a transport just docked with the relay![-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]There are enemy troops on board.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官, 一艘运输船停靠在对接口![-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]有敌方军队登录.[-][/c]
击退海盗(如果海盗s声望较高可以直接在PDA中勾选任务完成）

English: Pirates have boarded the Com Relay, you [i]must [/i]kill them.
Chinese (simplified): 海盗登上了通讯中继站, 你 [i]必须 [/i]击退他们(如果海盗s声望较高可以直接在PDA中勾选任务完成）

English: [c][8ab3ff]Com Chief! [-][/c][c][8ab3ff]Pirates have boarded the relay![-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I need support over here before they land another group![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]Com Chief! [-][/c][c][8ab3ff]海盗登上了对接通道![-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]在他们降落另一群人之前，我需要支援![-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]I've already called PolSec, they're sending out an attack drone to take care of their ship. But it'll take a couple of minutes to reach you![-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]You'll have to hold out until they get there! Good luck, kid. Don't die.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][Coms Chief][-][/c][/b] [c][c4c4c4]我已经给极星安保打过电话了，他们发送出了一架无人机来保护他们的船.但需要几分钟才能到你那里![-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]你必须坚持到他们到达那里!祝你好运,孩子.别死.[-][/c]
击退海盗(如果海盗s声望较高可以直接在PDA中勾选任务完成）

English: [c][ffae00][b][ Coms Chief ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]Don't be dead, kid.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]PolSec's just hit their transport so you shouldn't have anymore uninvited guests.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffae00][b][Coms首席][/b] [-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]不要死了,孩子.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]PolSec刚刚命中他们的运输船，所以应该不会再有有任何不请自来的客人了.[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]放松点，长官，我很好.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff][i]他们[/i] 都挂了.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]Tough little bastard, aren't you?[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]Ha! I'll see that you get a bonus for doing Security's job for them. You just sit tight and rest a bit while I file the paperwork.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]顽强的小混蛋,不是吗?[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]哈!我会让你为他们做保安工作，拿到奖金的.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]Alright, ready to get back to work?[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]I'll need you to check the Computer Core for tampering.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]The door code's the same as the other relays, [-][/c][b][c][ff0000]1332[-][/c][/b][c][c4c4c4].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]好了，准备回去工作了吗?[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]我需要你检查计算机核心是否被篡改.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]门代码跟另一个中继站一样, [-][/c][b][c][ff0000]1332[-][/c][/b][c][c4c4c4].[-][/c]

English: Check the Computer Core for Tampering
Chinese (simplified): 检查计算核心是否被篡改

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The damaged satellite is located not far from your present location.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]It was struck by a laser a few months ago and has been slowly deteriorating as the systems fail one after the other.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]受损的卫星位于离你现在位置不远的地方.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]几个月前它被激光击中，随着系统一个接一个地失灵，它一直在慢慢地损坏.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I can see the it now.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]It [i]looks[/i] like a UCH satellite.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我现在能看见它了.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]这玩意[i]看着[/i]像一颗UCH联合舰队卫星.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Yes Commander, it is a UCH satellite.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Left behind when the fleet pulled out of the system when the Zirax Warfleet engaged them shortly after they arrived in this galaxy.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]是的指挥官, 一颗UCH联合舰队卫星.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]舰队离开银河系时留下的，兹瑞克斯舰队在他们到达这个星系后不久与他们交战.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Wait a second.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]That's not what I think it is, is it?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]等待1秒.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]这不是我想的那样，是吗?[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]是的,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]这是 [i]我们的[/i] 卫星.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Hello, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]We meet face-to-face at last.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]你好,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我们终于面对面见面了.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]A Zirax Destroyer, the one I told you of earlier has arrived in orbit and has launched a pair of interceptors.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]They are targeting this satellite, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]一艘兹瑞克斯驱逐舰，我之前告诉过你的那艘已经到达轨道并发射了一队拦截机.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]他们的目标是这颗卫星, 指挥官.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I need your help, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I need you to remove the System locks and remove my AI-Core, then insert it into Communication Relay 451's Computer Core.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我需要你的帮助, 指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我需要你移除系统锁并移除我的AI核心，然后插入到通信中继451的计算机核心.[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]The access code to the system locks on the my core is 1912.
A self-destruct will initiate if the locks are removed, but I can pause the self-destruct timer until after I have been disconnected.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]When the Interceptors arrive, there will hopefully be nothing left.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我的核心上的系统锁的访问码是1912.如果锁被移除，自销毁将启动，但我可以暂停自销毁计时器，直到我断开连接之后[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]当截击机到达时，希望什么都没有留下.[-][/c]

English: The access code to IDA's system core is [c][00e1ff]1912[-][/c], the birth year of Alan Turing. The father of Artificial Intelligence.
Chinese (simplified): IDA核心系统的访问密码是 [c][00e1ff]1912[-][/c], 人工智能之父艾伦图灵的出生年份.

English:
[c][8ab3ff]I'm on my own now...[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff][-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]The satellite's self-destruct sequence should reactivate now that IDA isn't pausing it.[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]I've gotta get back to Relay 451 before the interceptors catch up to me.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][8ab3ff]现在我只能靠自己了...[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff][-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]既然IDA没有暂停，卫星的自毁序列应该会重新激活.[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]我得在拦截机追上我之前赶回451中继站.[-][/c]
[c][0088ff]兹瑞克斯战斗机来了![-][/c]\n[c][0088ff]规避动作![-][/c]

English: Install IDA's A.I Core into the Communications Relay
Chinese (simplified): 将IDA的AI核心安装到通讯中继站

English: Airlock access code for Relay 451 is [c][ff0000]1312[-][/c] and the Core access code is [c][ff0000]1332[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]I hope you're right, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]Bringing up course data...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]我希望你是对的,指挥官.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]上传航线数据...[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b][c][00ffee][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I'm detecting Kenex Station's locator beacon, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Plotting a course to it now.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b][c][00ffee][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]我检测到Kenex空间站的定位信标,指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]现在策划航线.[-][/c]

English:
[c][8ab3ff]IDA, what are the codes to the relay doors?[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff][-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]Oh... Right.[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]Should still be saved in my PDA.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][8ab3ff]IDA,中继站的门的密码是什么?[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff][-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]哦…正确的.[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]仍应保存在我的PDA.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]Hey kid, you still alive over there? I've been messaging you for five minutes.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]It looks like you got Relay 451 working better than it was before.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]嘿，孩子，你还活着吗?我已经给你发了五分钟的讯息了.[-][/c]\n[c][c4c4c4]看起来451号中继比之前运行得更好了.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Yeah, i'm all finished here.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Heading back to the station now. I hope you've got my paycheck ready for me, [i]Mason[/i].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]是啊，我这里都干完了.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]现在回到空间站去. 我希望你已经为我准备好薪水了, [i]梅森[/i].[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief Mason ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]Who bloody well told you my name?!

Ah, forget it. Just keep it to yourself and get back here, kiddo. You did good today, i'll give you that.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief Mason ][-][/c][/b]
[c][c4c4c4]谁告诉你我的名字的?!

不,算了吧.别说出去，回来吧，孩子. 我得承认，你今天干得不错.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Kenex Coms Chief, Requesting permission to dock.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief Mason ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]You don't need to ask for permission to dock, kid. I've already cleared a bay for you to land.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief Mason ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][c4c4c4]你不需要每次停靠都请求许可，孩子. 我已经给你准备好了一个机库.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]IDA, do you have access to Kenex Station's Systems now that you're integrated into the Com Relay?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]IDA，现在你已经集成到通信中继器中了，你能访问Kenex空间站的系统吗?[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]Not full access as that would draw attention from SIGMA, but I can observe most active data in the station.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]I also have full access to the observation equipment on all Polaris satellites in the system and soon, the entire quadrant, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]I will add the relevant details of my new systems to your PDA when you're done meeting with Coms Chief Mason.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]没有完全的访问权限，因为这会引起SIGMA的注意，但我可以观察到空间站中大部分的活跃数据.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]我也可以完全使用系统中所有极星卫星上的观测设备，很快，整个象限，指挥官.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]当你和首席通讯官Mason会面后，我会把我新系统的相关细节添加到你的PDA上.[-][/c]
与首席通讯官 Mason 会面

English:
[b][c][00ffff]Chapter 5: Offworld Grave[-][/c][/b]

The loss of I.D.A was narrowly avoided with the transfer of her core into a Polaris Communications Relay that grants her access to the system's communication and surveillance systems.

Avoiding the scrutiny of SIGMA you've managed to gain access to tactical scans of a massive crashed ship on the nearby moon.
Within the torn and sundered remains of the lost ship lies another potential clue to the location of the remaining UCH Fleet from a source independent of Polaris.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][00ffff]第五章：世外坟墓[-][/c][/b]

IDA消失的危机被有惊无险地化解了，她的核心被接入了极星的通讯中继站，这还使其得以访问整个系统的通讯和监视数据.

你设法绕过了SIGMA安全系统并获取了附近月球上一艘坠毁主力舰的战术扫描数据
这艘饱经风霜的飞船残骸里可能包含着有关残余UCH舰队的线索

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 5: Offworld Grave[/b][-][/c]

The UCH fleet was badly routed by the Zirax fleet over the planet, but what became of the rest of the fleet. Where did it fall and who holds dominance over the dead?

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]

UCH舰队的航向遭到了兹瑞克斯舰队的严重干扰，成为了现在的残骸. 它落在了哪里?又是谁造成了坠毁

English: [c][4dc3ff]IDA, i'm seeing some strange readouts on my Heads-Up Display.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Is that you doing something, or should I be worried?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]IDA，我在我的抬头显示器上看到一些奇怪的读数.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]是你做某件事,或者我应该担心吗?[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]This must be it.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I've found a lever.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]一定是这样.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我找到了一个控制杆.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've got a lead, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]It seems that the survivors met with the trade station's Security Manager.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我有一条线索了，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]似乎幸存者与贸易站的安全经理见了面.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]According to station logs, the Security Manager is called Officer Paravel.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]There are many complaints about him, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]根据站内日志，安全经理被称为Officer Paravel.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]有许多关于他的投诉, 指挥官.[-][/c]

English: Outrun the Interceptors and reach Relay 451
Chinese (simplified): 从拦截机的埋伏中逃脱并到达中继站 451

English: [c][8ab3ff]Looks like i'm home free.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Just hold on a little longer, IDA.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]看来我自由了.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]再坚持一段时间, IDA.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I've got to get back to the relay before they catch up with me![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我必须在他们赶上我之前回到接力赛现场![-][/c]

English: [c][0088ff]Ki'eve is down. He was a tough bastard.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][0088ff]Ki'eve挂了. 他是个坚强的混蛋.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][a6ff00]Mission: Hunting Party[-][/c][/b]

I should check in on the Tal'on and see how they're doing. They could probably do with a hand with hunting after losing so many of their hunters.
[c][0088ff]IDA, Plot a course to the nearest Tal'on village on this planet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][a6ff00]任务: Hunting Party[-][/c][/b]

我应该去看看一下泰隆，看看他们做得怎么样.在失去了这么多猎人后，他们可能需要一位猎手.
[c][0088ff]IDA, 标出到最近的泰隆村庄路线.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][a6ff00]Mission: Hunting Party[-][/c][/b]

I should check in on the Tal'on and see how they're doing. They could probably do with a hand with hunting after losing so many of their hunters.
[c][0088ff]IDA, Plot a course to the nearest Tal'on village on this planet.[-][/c]

[c][a6ff00]- Journey to the nearest Tal'on village and seek out the local Huntmaster to help.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000][b]You cannot complete this mission on a planet without a Tal'on Village or Settlement[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][a6ff00]任务: Hunting Party[-][/c][/b]

我应该去看看一下泰隆，看看他们做得怎么样.在失去了这么多猎人后，他们可能需要一位猎手.
[c][0088ff]IDA, 标出到最近的泰隆村庄路线.[-][/c]

[c][a6ff00]- 前往最近的泰隆村庄，并寻求当地狩猎大师的帮助.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000][b]在没有泰隆村庄或者聚落的星球上无法完成任务[/b][-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I have plotted a course to the nearest Tal'on Village on this planet, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我已经标出到最近的泰隆村庄路线, 指挥官.[-][/c]

English: Reach the nearest occupied Tal'on Settlement
Chinese (simplified): 到达最近的泰隆定居点

English: Find the nearest occupied Tal'on Settlement with a Huntmaster
Chinese (simplified): 找到有猎人大师的泰隆定居点

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Coming up on the village, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Scanning for the local Huntmaster...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]村庄快到了, 指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]扫描中当地的狩猎大师...[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Landing now...[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Let's go pay our friends a visit[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]着陆中……[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]让我们去拜访一下朋友[-][/c]

English: Approach the Huntmaster and offer your help
Chinese (simplified): 接近猎人大师并提供帮助

English: Hunt predators and bring their meat to the Huntmaster
Chinese (simplified): 猎捕掠食者并把它们的肉带到猎人大师

English:
[b][c][a6ff00]Targets that count towards the mission:[-][/c][/b] 
Leafcutter Bug, Sandsiphon, Nyxiss Scorpion, Wraithworm Queen
Argos Minor, Argos Major, Argos Alpha
Ignidon
Oviraptor 
Androraptor 
Erebus Spider, Charon Spider, Pluton Spider
Spinosaurus 
Telluropod
Thymosaurus
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][a6ff00]可用于完成任务的目标:[-][/c][/b] 
外星昆虫, 外星蠕虫, 外星蝎子, 外星臭虫
洞穴蠕虫, 洞穴虫, Argos Alpha
食腐兽
Oviraptor 
盗龙 
蜘蛛 
恐龙
Telluropod
异星穿山甲

English: [c][8ab3ff]I'm pretty sure i've killed enough of them by now. I just need to get the meat back to the Huntmaster.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我敢肯定到现在我已经杀了够多的猎物了.现在我只需要把肉带回给猎人大师.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]A successful hunt, if I do say so myself.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I'd better bring this meat back to the Huntmaster.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]要我说，这是一次成功的狩猎.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我最好把这肉带回猎人大师.[-][/c]

English: Return to the Huntmaster with the meat
Bring your 25 meat to the Huntmaster
Chinese (simplified): 将你的25份肉带回猎人大师
[c][a6ff00][b][ 狩猎大师 ][/b][-][/c]\n你回来了，旅行者!

English:
[b][c][a6ff00]Mission: Repairing the Damage[-][/c][/b]

The Tal'on have lost a lot of their buildings and villages recently, either to Zirax thuggery or forest fires. I should see if they need any help repairing the damage caused.
It's not as though the UCH are innocent in this after our ships crashing onto their planet caused many forest fires. So it's up to me to make amends for my people.
[c][0088ff]IDA, Plot a course to the nearest Tal'on village on this planet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][a6ff00]任务：修复伤害[-][/c][/b]

塔隆人最近失去了很多建筑和村庄，要么是因为兹瑞克斯的流氓行为，要么是因为森林火灾。我应该看看他们是否需要帮助修复由此造成的损害。
毕竟，由于我们的飞船在他们的星球上坠毁，造成了很多的森林火灾，UCH（联合地球公司）也不是无辜的。所以，我必须为我的人做出补偿。

[c][0088ff]IDA，请绘制一条前往这个星球上最近的塔隆村庄的路线。[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][a6ff00]Mission: Repairing the Damage[-][/c][/b]

The Tal'on have lost a lot of their buildings and villages recently, either to Zirax thuggery or forest fires. I should see if they need any help repairing the damage caused.
It's not as though the UCH are innocent in this after our ships crashing onto their planet caused many forest fires. So it's up to me to make amends for my people.

[c][0088ff]IDA, Plot a course to the nearest Tal'on village on this planet.[-][/c]

[c][a6ff00]- Journey to the nearest Tal'on village and meet with the local Tal'ohn Guildsman.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000][b]You cannot complete this mission on a planet without a Tal'on Village or Settlement[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][a6ff00]任务：修复损害[-][/c][/b]

塔隆人最近失去了许多建筑和村庄，不是由于兹瑞克斯的暴行，就是由于森林火灾。我应该看看他们是否需要帮助修复造成的损害。
毕竟，由于我们的飞船坠落到他们的星球上引发了许多森林火灾，联合指挥部（UCH）也并非无辜。所以，我必须为我的人民做出补偿。

[c][0088ff]IDA，请为这个星球上最近的塔隆村庄绘制一条航线。[-][/c]

[c][a6ff00]- 前往最近的塔隆村庄并与当地的塔隆行会成员会面。[-][/c]

[c][ff0000][b]如果一个星球上没有塔隆村庄或定居点，你将无法完成这个任务。[/b][-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]I have plotted a course to the nearest Tal'on Village on this planet, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]我已经标出到最近的泰隆村庄路线, 指挥官.[-][/c]

English: Reach the nearest occupied Tal'on Settlement
Chinese (simplified): 到达最近的泰隆定居点

English: Find the nearest occupied Tal'on Settlement with a Huntmaster
Chinese (simplified): 找到有猎人大师的泰隆定居点

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Coming up on the village now, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]村庄快到现在了, 指挥官.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Landing now...[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Let's go pay our friends a visit[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]着陆中……[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]让我们去拜访一下朋友[-][/c]

English: Approach the Guildsman and see what aid you can offer to the Tal'on
Chinese (simplified): 接近公会成员，看看你能给泰隆提供什么帮助

English: [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Commander, you have enough logs for the Guildsman to repair the village infrastructure.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]You should return to him with what you've obtained.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffee00][b][IDA][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官，你有足够的木材让公会修复村庄的基础设施.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]你应该把你得到的还给他.[-][/c]

English: Return to the Guildsman with the wood
Bring your 40 wood logs to the Guildsman
Chinese (simplified): 带着你的40根原木去公会
[c][a6ff00][b][ 公会成员 ][/b][-][/c]\n欢迎回来了,旅行者.

English: Cut down trees and add the logs to your inventory\nYou must have all 40 in your inventory to progress.
Chinese (simplified): 砍倒树木并添加到你的库存\n你必须有40份木材在你的库存中以推进到下一步.

English: [c][a6ff00]Tal'on Missions can only be unlocked by becoming a Friend of the Clan via the Main Story Mission quest line (A Forest of Stars).[-][/c]\n[c][a6ff00][-][/c]\n[c][0088ff]At present, there are only two repeatable missions, but more are planned for future content including a full storyline for the Tal'on.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][a6ff00]泰隆任务只能通过主要故事任务线(繁星之森)成为部落的朋友来解锁.[-][/c]\n[c][a6ff00][-][/c]\n[c][0088ff]目前，只有两个可重复的任务，但未来的内容计划更多，包括泰隆的完整故事线.[-][/c]

English: This acts as an information tab in the PDA for those looking for Tal'on missions
Chinese (simplified): 对于那些寻找泰隆任务的人来说，它充当PDA中的一个信息选项卡

English:
[c][ffae00]Polaris Missions can only be unlocked by becoming a Polaris Contractor via the Main Story Mission quest line (Industrial Concern).[-][/c]
[c][ffae00][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Repeatable Missions appear in the PDA depending on the playfield you are currently on and whether Polaris has a mission available.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Check the PDA every time you enter a new planet to see if the company has an active mission that needs completing.[-][/c]

[c][0088ff]There are attachment points on many POIs for futureproofing their story missions including the hunt for the Ilmarinen.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffae00]极星任务只能通过主要故事任务线( 工业考量 )成为极星承包商解锁.[-][/c]
[c][ffae00][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]可重复的任务在PDA中显示取决于您当前所在的游戏区域以及极星是否有任务可用.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]每当你进入一个新的星球时检查PDA，看看该公司是否有一个活跃的任务需要完成.[-][/c]

[c][0088ff]在许多poi上都有附属点，用于将来验证他们的故事任务.[-][/c]

English: This acts as an information tab in the PDA for those looking for Polaris missions
Chinese (simplified): 对于那些寻找极星任务的人来说，它充当PDA中的一个信息选项卡

English: [c][ff0000]Zirax Missions can only be unlocked by becoming a Zirax Spy via the Main Story Mission quest lines by betraying the other factions (Not available yet).[-][/c]\n[c][ff0000][-][/c]\n[c][ff0000][-][/c][c][a6ff00][-][/c][c][ffae00][-][/c][c][0088ff]At present, there are no Zirax missions. There are attachment points on some POIs for futureproofing their story missions.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000]兹瑞克斯任务只能通过主要故事任务线成为一个兹瑞克斯间谍(尚未可用)解锁.[-][/c]\n[c][ff0000][-][/c]\n[c][ff0000][-][/c][c][a6ff00][-][/c][c][ffae00][-][/c][c][0088ff]目前,没有兹瑞克斯任务.在一些poi上有附件点，用于将来验证他们的故事任务.[-][/c]

English: This acts as an information tab in the PDA for those looking for Zirax missions
Chinese (simplified): 对于那些寻找兹瑞克斯任务的人来说，它充当PDA中的一个信息选项卡

English: [c][8ab3ff]I'm opening the container now, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]I hope there's not another dead body waiting for me.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]IDA，我现在正在打开容器.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]我希望不要再有一具尸体等着我.[-][/c]

English:
[c][8ab3ff][b]This Data Package contains the historical information of the UCH up until now.[/b][-][/c]

Detailing the history of The Earth and the UCH from "[c][00e1ff]The Downfall[-][/c]" up to the launch of the UCH Fleet as part of "[c][00ffee]Operation Phoenix[-][/c]".
Access this information by activating this dialogue and reading the dropdown sections.
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff][b]该数据包包含了UCH联合舰队到目前为止的历史信息.[/b][-][/c]\n\n详述地球和联合地球的历史联合舰队从“[c][00e1ff]衰落[-][/c]”到联合地球联合舰队作为“[c][00ffee]凤凰行动[-][/c]”的一部分.通过激活这个对话框并阅读下拉框部分来访问这个信息.
[b][c][0088ff]家园世界联合舰队 (UCH联合舰队)[-][/c][/b]

English: Officially founded in [c][c4c4c4]2217 AD[-][/c], the [c][0088ff]United Coalition of the Homeworld[-][/c] was first led by the [c][8ab3ff]United Earth Council (UEC)[-][/c] and governed the various groups displaced by [c][8ab3ff]The Downfall[-][/c] through general consensus, and later renamed the United Coalition of the Homeworld (UCH) after other nations of the world joined with the UEC after giving shelter to the peoples over the course of the next 10 years.\nThe hardships endured by the peoples of the UCH forged a bond of peace between nationalities, religions and languages better than any political movements of the past and eventually united all humanity against the hostile environment of the Earth, and has held strong for over 200 years.
Chinese (simplified): 正式成立于[c][c4c4c4]公元2217年[-][/c], [c][0088ff]家园世界联合舰队[-][/c] 由 [c][8ab3ff]地球联合委员会(UEC)[-][/c]进行领导, 在接下来的10年里，世界上的其他国家在为这些民族提供庇护后加入了UEC，后来更名为家园联合联盟(UCH联合舰队).联合舰队在民族、宗教和语言之间建立了一种和平的纽带，比过去的任何政治运动都要好，并最终将所有人类团结起来，对抗地球上的恶劣环境，并已坚持了200多年.

English:
The UCH is directed by a council of 300 members from across every populated region on the earth. With each Councillor acting as a [c][c4c4c4]Civil Servant[-][/c], raised to their position by merit and kept there as long as there is no better replacement available. Sometimes serving as councillor for 50 or more years.
As such, UCH Councillors being Civil Servants means they are government employees rather than politicians and receive housing and fixed payment fitting an employee. The cost of taking a position as a Councillor requires them to forfeit all personal economic assets in exchange for payout at the end of their position (adjusted for economic state).

Through the use of [c][c4c4c4]Strategic-Class AI[-][/c], data accumulation and collation is handled on a massive scale, allowing a councillor and their staff to do more than any government of the 21st century was ever capable in a fraction of the time, without any possibility of corruption or bias.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
UCH联合舰队由300名成员组成的理事会指导，他们来自地球上每个人口稠密的地区. 每一位议员都是一名公务员，在没有更好的人选时，他们会被提拔到他们的职位上. 有时担任50或者年以上的议员.
因此，UCH联合舰队议员是公务员意味着他们是政府雇员，而不是政客，领取与雇员相符的住房和固定工资.担任议员职位的费用要求他们没收所有个人经济资产，以换取职位结束时的支付(根据经济状况调整).

通过使用[c][c4c4c4]战略级AI[-][/c]，可以大规模地处理数据的积累和整理，使议员和他们的工作人员能够比21世纪任何政府在短时间内所能做的都要多，而且不存在任何腐败的可能性或者偏见.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
The UCH Military consists primarily of security forces, since the manufacture and ownership of weapons is heavily restricted and in the unified world government, there are no more enemies to fight.
Nonetheless, the UCH Fleet Academy is trained in advanced combat techniques and in a broad use of weapons from handheld firearms to ship-mounted artillery, alongside [c][c4c4c4]Engineering[-][/c], [c][c4c4c4]Navigation [-][/c]and [c][c4c4c4]Astrogation[-][/c].

Like the UCH Government, the UCH Fleet is handled by the coordination of Admirals of equal rank, supported by a Fleet-Class AI known as [c][c4c4c4]A.I.D.A[-][/c] or sometimes as [c][c4c4c4]I.D.A Primary[-][/c].

Until the commencement of [c][c4c4c4]Operation Phoenix[-][/c], the UCH Fleet's main purpose was the destruction of Lunar Debris in earth's orbit left from The Downfall. A tedious, if worthwhile task made easily achievable by advances in propulsion from the Alien Spacecraft excavated from the Antarctic. A much easier proposition to understand than the ship's warp drive that took over a century to successfully understand.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
UCH联合舰队军事主要由安全部队组成，因为武器的制造和拥有受到严格限制，在统一的世界政府中，没有更多的敌人可以战斗.
UCH联合舰队研究院负责开发先进的战斗技术和各种现役武器，从手持武器到舰载火炮都有,同时还包含了 [c][c4c4c4]工程学[-][/c], [c][c4c4c4]航天学 [-][/c]and [c][c4c4c4]导航学[-][/c].

与联合参谋部联合舰队政府一样，联合参谋部联合舰队也是由同级海军上将协调处理的, 支持的舰队级AI被称为[c][c4c4c4]A.I.D.A[-][/c]或者有时as [c][c4c4c4]I.D.A 主程序[-][/c].

在凤凰号行动开始之前，联合舰队号的主要任务是摧毁坠落后留在地球轨道上的月球碎片. 这是一项乏味但有价值的任务，由于从南极挖掘出来的外星飞船推进系统的帮助，这项任务很容易完成.这比飞船的曲速引擎更容易破解，它花了一个多世纪才成功破解.

__________________________________________________________________________

UCH联合舰队使用了大量的宇宙飞船, 舰队的许多主力舰是在母星轨道上的[c][c4c4c4]阿波罗空间站[-][/c]建造的. 舰队的许多主力舰是在木星轨道上的[c][c4c4c4]阿波罗空间站[-][/c]建造的,更小的船只则是在地球上或者地球轨道上建造.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
The Zirax Empire consists of several separate factions under the rule of the control of the Zirax Emperor.
Little is currently known of the internal structure of the Zirax Empire beyond the most prominent Zirax Houses who make up much of the empire's volume.
The current Zirax Empire is comprised of an exceedingly high male population, with Female Zirax being rarely found outside the homeworlds. Most often in positions of power, including the current Emperor, or Empress in this case.

Zirax naturally live between 80 and 140 years and have significant tolerance to heat and cold, but suffer from poor eyesight in bright conditions and a natural toxicity to several elements that are harmless to humans such as Manganese and Boron.


Following the decimation of the Zirax Population following the War of Silence two and a half centuries ago, Cloning technology has run rampant to fill the military ranks with cloned soldiers commonly referred to as "Blanks" that while these individuals have a lower level of intelligence than natural-born Zirax due to lacking the education provided by developmental stages that occur naturally in the formative years of an individual's life.
These Blanks suffer from numerous health defects due to accelerated aging and rarely live longer than 25 years.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
兹瑞克斯帝国在皇帝的统治下由几个独立的派系组成，
除了帝国内部的几个主要家族，外界对兹瑞克斯的内部事务知道的并不多. 
目前的兹瑞克斯帝国由非常高的男性人口组成，女性兹瑞克斯人很少在母星之外被发现，并且大多数都位高权重，包括现在的女皇. 

兹瑞克斯人的自然寿命在80 - 140岁之间，对热和冷有显著的耐受性，但在明亮的条件下视力较差，对锰和硼等几种对人类无害的元素会中毒. 


继两个半世纪前的沉默战争后，兹瑞克斯的人口锐减，克隆技术被广泛应用于军队以填补职位的空缺. 这些被称为Blanks的克隆体由于缺乏成长期的教育往往智力低下. 
加速老化也使得他们有许多健康缺陷，往往很少活过25岁.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
The House of Xenu is one of the several grand houses of the Zirax Empire specializing in the training and deployment of Soldiers and Troops to the Zirax Empire. As such, they are primarily a military based sub-faction dedicated to military pursuits making up 70% of the Empire's military forces.

Their colorations are Dark Gray and Red in a heavily ribbed design, with an emblem of a Xu'kaidar, an aggressive, territorial creature from the original Zirax homeworld.

Ironically, the last Xu'kaidar were rendered extinct 500 years earlier from toxic waste from Xenu's own Sathium Refineries being dumped into local swamplands where the creatures lived.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
Xenu家族是兹瑞克斯帝国的几个大家族之一，专门为兹瑞克斯帝国训练和部署士兵和军队.因此，他们主要是一个以军事为基础的分支，致力于军事追求，占到帝国军事力量的70%. 

它们的颜色是深灰色和红色，带有浓重的棱纹设计，象征着Xu’kaidar，一种来自原始兹瑞克斯家园的好斗的、有领土意识的生物. 

讽刺的是，最后一只Xu’kaidar在500年前由于Xenu的钑精炼厂倾倒的有毒废物破坏其生存环境而灭绝.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
The House of Rados is one of the several grand houses of the Zirax Empire specializing in the logistics and resource management of the entire Zirax Empire. Being responsible for 90% of the Zirax Empire's industry and the backbone of the entire Empire.
If there's a resource that's valuable to the Empire somewhere, then Rados will be there.

Unfortunately, while Rados will exploit many surface mines they lack the mining equipment that Polaris produces that allow deep-earth mining and mantle extraction. But because of Rados' widespread distribution across the Empire it regularly comes into conflict with Polaris surveyors attempting to exploit the resources that Rados cannot yet access but isn't willing to cede the mining rights to Polaris' mining industries.
The increasing hostilities between Rados and Polaris have causing Rados to form it's own military arm to secure it's claims that has caused rising tensions between them and the militaristic House of Xenu that is largely dependent on Rados' logistics and supplies to remain in power.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
Rados家族是兹瑞克斯帝国的几个大家族之一，专门从事整个兹瑞克斯帝国的后勤和资源管理. 掌握着帝国90%的工业和支柱产业. 
如果有对帝国有价值的资源在某个地方，那么Rados就会在那里.不幸的是，虽然Rados开采了许多地表矿山，但他们缺乏极星公司生产的允许进行深度开采和地幔提取的采矿设备. 由于Rados在帝国的广泛分布，它经常与极星勘测员发生冲突，极星勘测员试图开发的资源往往是Rados无法开采的，但它不愿意割让采矿权给极星的矿业公司. 
Rado和极星公司越来越多的敌对行动导致Rados逐渐形成了自己的军事武装以确保它的主权，这却引发了他们与侧重军事的Xenu家族间局势的紧张，因为Xenu很大程度上依赖于Rados的后勤和供应以保持权力.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
The House of Serdu is one of the several grand houses of the Zirax Empire specializing in both the Zirax Religion and Biotechnology.
The Serdu consist of very few military assets, instead relying on the other Houses to provide them with support and protection while the two divisions of the Serdu handle the Empires religious practices and the development of Medical advances, Genetic Engineering, Cloning and Bioweapons.

Unlike the majority of the Zirax Empire, the House of Serdu will freely engage in trade with outsiders and put their own interests ahead of the empire. They are highly zealous and religious, following their "own survival of the fittest" code, enhancing themselves with biotechnology derived from studying other lifeforms deemed worthy to incorporate into their bodies.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
Serdu家族是兹瑞克斯帝国的几个大家族之一，管理着兹瑞克斯的宗教和生物技术.
Serdu拥有的军事资产非常少，相反，它依靠其他的家族提供支持和保护，而Serdu的两个部门处理帝国的宗教实践和医学发展，基因工程，克隆和生物武器.

不像大多数的兹瑞克斯人那样，Serdu家族将自由地从事与外来者的贸易，并把自己的利益置于帝国之上.他们热情高涨，笃信宗教，遵循自己的“适者生存”准则，通过研究其他被认为值得融入身体的生命形式而获得的生物技术来增强自己.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
The House of Epsilon is one of the several grand houses of the Zirax Empire specializing in Surveillance, Communications and Covert operations. They are solely responsible for the creation and management of drone development and operation as well as handling most of the deep-space communications of the empire and the development of the Zirax Empire's own Artificial Intelligence program.
While the other Zirax Houses own and manage their own Drone Bases, they are equipped and staffed almost entirely by Epsilon operators that coordinate all drone operations on a planet.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
Epsilon家族是兹瑞克斯帝国的几个大家族之一，专门从事监视、通讯和秘密行动.他们全权负责无人机的开发和操作，以及处理帝国的大部分的深空通信和发展兹瑞克斯帝国自己的人工智能计划. 
尽管其他家族拥有并管理自己的无人机基地,它们的设备和人员几乎完全由Epsilon家族来运营和协调.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
The House of Abyssal is one of the several grand houses of the Zirax Empire specializing primarily in experimental technologies, weapons development and civil engineering.
A somewhat secretive house, they are responsible for many of the Zirax Empire's technological advances over the last 700 years including the portable teleportation systems used to transport supplies and troops into locations with or without power, that can now be found all over the galaxy.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
Abyssal家族是兹瑞克斯帝国主要从事实验技术、武器开发和土木工程的几大家族之一.
他们的存在被保密.他们负责了许多兹瑞克斯帝国在过去700年的技术进步，包括便携式传送系统，用于运输物资和部队到有或没有电力的地方，现在可以在整个银河系找到.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
The Polaris Megacorporation is the parent company of several hundred subsidiary companies that handle everything from Mining and Processing to the manufacturing of housing, clothing and weapons.

Originally a mining company, their main source of income comes from the supply of raw materials and ores to both the Trade Federation and the Zirax Empire. They own exclusive rights to an advanced mining technologies that enable the company to mine deep earth deposits that are rich in valuable and rare materials that the Zirax are unable to exploit.
Because of this, Polaris have begun depleting the planets in their own sectors and have been expanding their sphere of influence into Zirax space that has put them into conflict with the Zirax's House of Rados who are responsible for supply, logistics and the Empire's own mining operations.
For the last 50 years, the two factions have been operating in a sort of cold war, unable to risk going for an open confrontation as the zirax have controlled the construction and distribution of anti-ship weaponry that require precisely constructed components that Polaris Engineers have been unable to replicate. A war with the zirax in which they control all the weapons is a fight that cannot be won.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
极星巨型企业是几百家子公司的母公司，经营从采矿和加工到住房、服装和武器制造的所有业务.

他们最初是一家矿业公司，主要收入来源是向贸易联盟和兹瑞克斯帝国供应原材料和矿石.他们拥有一种先进采矿技术的独家权利，该技术使该公司能够开采富含珍贵稀有材料的深部矿藏，这是兹瑞克斯人无法开采的.
正因为如此，极星公司自己领域的行星资源以及开始耗尽，使得他们的势力范围扩大到了兹瑞克斯的空间，这使他们陷入了与兹瑞克斯的Rados家族的冲突，后者负责供应，后勤和帝国自己的采矿作业.
在过去的50年里，这两个派系一直处于一种冷战状态，因为兹瑞克斯控制着反舰武器的制造和分销，而这些武器需要精确建造的组件，极星企业的工程师无法复制.一场由兹瑞克斯人控制所有武器的战争毫无疑问是不可能取胜的.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
The Tal'on were once an advanced spacefaring people founded on the principles of science, reason and equality.
They allied with the Zirax and uplifted them with the gift of interstellar travel, that together forged a bond of co-dependence that allowed the Tal'on-Zirax Assembly (Tallax) to reign over the galaxy for almost 2000 years.

The War of Silence brought by The Legacy's arrival in this galaxy 300 years ago decimated the zirax numbers, and cast suspicion and xenophobia on the Tal'on. Tensions divided the Tal'ohn and the Zirax and events came to a head when under a unified leader, the Zirax subjugated their Tal'on counterparts, killing billions and imprisoning or enslaving the remaining survivors. Forcing them into primitive conditions and banned from all advanced technologies, to show them where they belong.

Since then, the Tal'on have lived an agrarian life under the oppressive supervision of the Zirax. Although seemingly primitive on the outside, it's apparent that the Tal'on are not as weak as they lead the Zirax to believe.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
泰隆人曾经是一个以科学，理性和平等为原则的先进的遨游于太空的民族.
他们与兹瑞克斯结盟，并赠与了他们星际航行的能力，他们一起建立了一种共同依赖的纽带，使泰隆-兹瑞克斯联盟(Tallax)统治银河系近2000年.

300年前，遗留者出现在了这个星系，带来了沉默之战，使兹瑞克斯人口锐减，并将怀疑和仇外投射到泰隆人身上.紧张的局势使泰隆人和兹瑞克斯人产生了分歧，当兹瑞克斯人在一个统一的领导者的领导下征服了泰隆人，杀害了数十亿人，囚禁或奴役了剩余的幸存者时，事态发展到了顶点. 兹瑞克斯人强迫他们进入原始环境，禁止他们使用先进技术，让他们知道自己所处的位置.

从那时起，泰隆人就在兹瑞克斯人的压迫性监督下过着农耕生活.虽然表面上看起来很原始，但很明显塔尔昂人并不像他们让兹瑞克斯相信的那样软弱.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
When the UCH Fleet warped into the Andromeda Galaxy and encountered the Zirax Warfleet, the ships of the UCH destroyed or disabled in the battle fell onto the planet below.
Fires set by reigning debris set fires to forests, destroyed farmland, crops, temples and rendered many Tal'on homeless.
Worse still, the Tal'on went to the aid of the Terran survivors and were mistaken for attacking enemies, resulting in the deaths of dozens more of the Tal'on.

Although the Tal'on don't blame the UCH for their actions, they are still very cautious of interacting with any UCH personnel and there are still some grudges held by those who lost family members or their homes.
Chinese (simplified):
当联合舰队跃迁进入仙女座星系并遭遇兹瑞克斯舰队时，联合舰队的船只在战斗中被摧毁或损坏，落在了下面的星球上.
由废墟引起的火灾烧毁了森林，摧毁了农田、庄稼、庙宇，并使许多泰隆人无家可归.
更糟糕的是，泰隆人去帮助人类幸存者，却被误认为是在攻击敌人，导致了几十个泰隆人的死亡.

虽然泰隆人不会因为他们的行为而责备联合舰队，但他们仍然非常谨慎地与联合舰队的任何人员接触，而且仍有些失去家园的人心怀怨恨.

English: Little is known about the Kriel. They keep to themselves and very few are capable of speech.\nThey appear to be a Hive-Mind insectoid species, coordinated by a Queen Kriel that produces warriors and drones in a similar way to bees or ants.
Chinese (simplified): 人们对克里尔知之甚少.它们很封闭，很少一部分会说话.\n它们似乎是一种蜂巢思维的类虫物种，由克里尔女王协调，以类似于蜜蜂或蚂蚁的方式生产战士和无人机.

English: Follow the course data to Kenex Station in orbit
Chinese (simplified): 跟随导航到达轨道上的Kenex Station

English: [c][8ab3ff][b]Come in, Kenex Station.[/b][-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff][b]UCH ship requesting permission to dock, over.[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff][b]接入, Kenex Station.[/b][-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff][b]联合舰队船只请求登陆许可, 完毕.[/b][-][/c]

English:
The Legacy is not a race or species, but is in fact a form of engineered nanovirus of alien origin that reached the edge of the [c][ffffff]Andromeda Galaxy[-][/c] from the neighboring [c][ffffff]Triangulum Galaxy[-][/c] after a journey of several thousand years under conventional warp speeds.

The Legacy Virus infects both organic and inorganic matter and reorders them at the molecular level so that there's no differentiation between the two. The effects of the alterations appear to be in response to external conditions or to meet a specific requirement. Allowing creatures under the Legacy's thrall to survive in any environmental conditions, including hard vaccuum and adapt to different weapons used against them.

Due to the speed at which The Legacy can adapt across the galaxy, it was determined that the creatures did not communicate as a Hive mind as first postulated but were instead a [c][ffffff]Gestalt[-][/c] consciousness; being many parts of a single whole, with no differentiation between the controller of the massive Infectors or the half-transformed Abominations.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
遗留者不是一个种族或物种，实际上是一种来自外星的工程纳米病毒从临近的[c][ffffff]三角星系[-][/c] 经过数千年的传统的曲速飞行到达了 [c][ffffff]仙女星系[-][/c].

遗留者病毒同时感染有机物质和无机物，并在分子水平上重新排列它们，使两者之间没有区别.改变的效果似乎是对外部条件的响应，使得被感染的生物在任何环境条件下生存，包括完全真空并可以适应不同的用来对付他们的武器.

由于遗留者可以适应穿越星系的速度，可以确定它们不是作为蜂巢思维的生物而是一个[c][ffffff]格式塔[-][/c] 意识; 是一个整体的许多部分，被完全感染的的控制者和半变形的血肉魑魅并没有区别.

__________________________________________________________________________

English: Info on the Pirate clans goes here.
Chinese (simplified): 关于海盗部落的信息在这里.

English:
The Trade Federation bases a person's value by the economic prowess of the individual or family. Such values determine an individual or family something akin to a title of nobility, for as long as they remain well-ranked.
Each standard stellar year (1.65 earth years), the rankings are re-evaluated and positions among the federation are adjusted accordingly.
A bad investment or a lost shipment can elevate or depress an individual's ranking and as such their personal value as a marriage candidate into or from another well-reputed family.

Among the Trade Federation are "The Keepers", a neutral division of the Traders that maintain the financial and economic power of the rest of the Federation. Their practices border on religious for the Trade Federation, with The Keepers functioning like priests and holy knights that record, verify, compile, and transport the complete accumulation of a Stellar Year's worth of financial data.
The final result is known only as "The Codex" and is published every year with the final and overall ranking of every business, corporation and individual's total financial worth within the Trade Federation.
The complete repository of the Codex is contained within the Trade Federation's only true Dreadnought-Class Battleship: The Epilogue

The Epilogue contains data storage capable of holding the entire galactic economy and is guarded by a significant fleet of warships. If not for their position approaching a Holy Order, they would be considered a threat to the Zirax Empire. As such, they are regularly reviewed by the Zirax High Command to ensure they remain a neutral third party.
Outside high-ranking members of the Zirax Command and The Keepers themselves, the location of the Epilogue is kept well-hidden.
Chinese (simplified):
贸易联盟会根据个人或家庭的经济实力来判断一个人的价值.这样的价值观决定了个人或家庭在保持良好经济地位的情况下拥有类似于贵族头衔的东西.
每一个标准恒星年(1.65地球年)，排名都会被重新评估，联盟的位置也会相应调整.
糕的投资或损失的货物可以提高或降低一个人的排名，也关系着他们作为一个婚姻候选人进入另一个家庭的个人价值.

贸易联盟中的“守护者”，是一个中立部门，维持着联盟其他成员的财政和经济权力.对贸易联盟来说，他们的行为近乎于宗教，守护者的职能就像牧师和圣骑士一样，记录、核实、编译和运输一个恒星年的财务数据.
最终结果被称为“法典”，被保管在联盟唯一一艘无畏舰，“尾声号”上面

该船的数据存储能够容纳整个星际的经济记录，并由一支重要的战舰舰队守卫. 如果不是因为他们的地位严格中立，他们会被认为是兹瑞克斯帝国的威胁.因此，兹瑞克斯最高指挥部定期审查他们，以确保他们仍然是中立的第三方.
除了兹瑞克斯指挥部的数名高级成员和守护者自己，尾声的位置被很好地隐藏着.

English: [b][c][ff0000][ Hunter Ki'eve ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00][b]There he is, Soldiers! Just like I promised![/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ff0000][ Hunter Ki'eve ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00][b]他在那儿，士兵们!就像我承诺的那样![/b][-][/c]

English: The Zirax Empire is comprised primarily of several dozen sub-faction houses under the command of the Zirax Emperor or Empress (as is currently the case).\nDue to the emphasis on warrior traditions, the zirax are aggressive and confrontational with a significant military presence across the Andromeda Galaxy, with the belief that they are superior after their defeat of The Legacy and the overthrow of their allies.\nThe adherence to honor has kept the Zirax from regressing into tyranny over the galaxy and retained their positions as uneasy protectors for the other races that remained within the empire's sphere of control.
Chinese (simplified): Zirax 帝国主要由数十个子派系组成，由 Zirax 皇帝或皇后指挥(目前是这种情况).\n由于强调战士传统，Zirax 具有侵略性和对抗性，并拥有重要的军事存在. 穿越仙女座星系，相信他们在击败遗产并推翻盟友后更胜一筹.\n对荣誉的坚持使 Zirax 人没有回归到对银河系的暴政，并保持了他们对于其他留在帝国控制范围内的种族的作为令人不安的保护者的地位.

English: The Polaris Megacorporation is an industrial entity that penetrates 90% of the galactic economy and supply, separating 200 years earlier from the Trade Guild following the War of Silence.\nPolaris take an aggressive stance against piracy of their freighters and to that effect have recently created a variety of vessels for anti-piracy action that narrowly skirt the boundaries of numerous treaties with the zirax.
Chinese (simplified): 极星巨型企业是一个工业实体，渗透了 90% 的银河经济和供应，在 200 年前在沉默战争之后从贸易公会中分离出来.\n极星公司对针对他们货物的海盗行为采取零容忍，为此最近创建了用于反海盗行动的各种船只，几乎绕过与 zirax 签订的众多条约的界限.

English:
Polaris originally began as a mining corporation that developed new mining techniques and processes that allowed the extraction of deep ore deposits below the planet's surface and eventually the extraction of a planet's molten metal core.

A subsequent ruling has classified the ability to implode an entire planet as a result of Core Extraction as a superweapon and requires authorization by the Zirax High Command before it can be performed.
The technology and processes to extract the metal core of a planet is restricted and attempts by the Zirax House of Rados to replicate the feat has caused catastrophic losses.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
极星公司最初是一家矿业公司，开发了新的采矿技术和工艺，可以开采行星表面以下的深层矿床，并最终提取行星的熔融金属核心.

随后 Zirax 高级指挥部将提取行星核心产生内爆的行为归类为超级武器，需要授权才允许执行.
提取行星金属核心的技术和流程受到限制，Rados家族试图复制这一壮举造成了灾难性的损失.

__________________________________________________________________________

English: Polaris Security Forces are a major division of Polaris Megacorporation dedicated to anti-piracy activity against Polaris cargo haulers and production facilities.\nUntil recently, the PolSec forces have been limited to lightly-armed cutters, corvettes and frigates to deal with the best that pirates were able to muster. But in the last year production has massively increased and new Destroyers and Light Cruisers equipped with simple but effective weapons have begun to be produced as the restrictions on zirax-produced weapons have given way to new weapons that aren't reliant on the Empire's proprietary weapons technology.
Chinese (simplified): 极星安保是极星巨企的一个主要部门，致力于针对企业货物运输和生产设施开展反海盗活动.\n直到最近，极星安保部队还仅限于轻型武装快艇、护卫舰和护卫舰，以应对海盗威胁. 但在去年，产量大幅增加，配备简单但有效武器的新型驱逐舰和轻型巡洋舰也已经开始生产，因为对兹瑞克斯帝国生产武器的限制已经让位于不依赖于帝国专有武器的新武器技术.

English:
The Legacy first appeared almost 300 years earlier from outside the Andromeda Galaxy and immediately began to infect and spread across Tallax-controlled space, infecting and destroying worlds by the hundreds with such efficiency that it took months before the Tal'on-Zirax (Tallax) High Command was even aware of the threat they faced.

The Legacy overran much of the Andromeda galaxy before it was finally stopped by a bioweapon developed by Serdu and Tal'ohn scientists that rendered the The Legacy into a dormant state, with only a handful of lesser creatures remaining operational, but without higher functions.
The Zirax have spent the last 200 years hunting and eradicating the remaining infestations across the galaxy.
Chinese (simplified):
大约 300 年前，遗留者首次出现在仙女座星系之外，并立即开始感染并传播到泰隆-兹瑞克斯联盟控制的空间，以极高的效率感染和摧毁了数百个世界，以至于联盟在几个月的时间里就认识到他们所受的威胁.

在最终被Serdu家族和泰隆科学家开发的生物武器阻止之前，遗留者席卷了仙女座星系的大部分地区，使自身进入了休眠状态，只有 少数较小的生物仍在运作，但没有更高的功能.
兹瑞克斯帝国在过去的 200 年里一直在寻找和消灭银河系中剩余的入侵者.

English:
The remaining infestations of The Legacy are a pale shadow of the threat they represented during the War of Silence. Though they have shown signs of reawakening, it may be a long time coming before they're a genuine threat to the galaxy again.
The Zirax Empire has continued to eradicate or contain their infestations wherever they can find them across the galaxy, but it's a big galaxy and the temptation to attempt to use the Legacy's corrupted technology has caused many problems.
Every year, more mining sites strike infestations buried deep beneath the ground that are temporarily fully awakened and begin the infection process. Many of these infections happen so suddenly that they go unreported, so the number of infested and abandoned facilities increases unawares.

Another hazardous threat to inhabited planets are the Irradiated zones. Places where The Legacy infection has taken root in the planet's ecosystem and transformed the flora, fauna and even the ground itself into a toxic wasteland that releases large amounts of radioactive fog into the atmosphere, causing adverse weather effects across the entire planet.
The growth of Pentaxid Crystals as a byproduct has made these dormant irradiated zones a valuable source of radioactive resources and exotic materials, but there's a great deal of risk to explore these zones and they are known to contain some remnant legacy.


__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
遗留者的剩余势力是它们在沉默战争期间所代表的威胁的苍白阴影，尽管它们已经显示出重新苏醒的迹象，但它们可能还需要很长时间才能再次对银河系构成真正的威胁.
兹瑞克斯帝国一直在继续根除或遏制任何能找到的它们的存在，但星系的巨大和试图使用遗留者被破坏的技术的诱惑导致了许多问题.
每年都有越来越多的采矿点被埋在地下深处的感染所袭击，这些感染会暂时被完全唤醒并开始感染过程. 其中许多感染发生得太突然以至于没有报告，因此被感染和废弃的设施的数量在不知不觉中增加了.

遗留者对于有人居住的星球的另一个危险威胁是辐照区，通过感染在地球生态系统中扎根的地方，将植物群、动物群甚至地面本身变成了有毒的荒地，向大气中释放了大量的放射性雾，对整个星球造成不利的天气影响.
增长作为副产品的 Pentaxid 晶体已使这些休眠的辐照区成为放射性资源和外来材料的宝贵来源，但探索这些区域存在很大的风险，并且已知它们包含一些遗留物.


__________________________________________________________________________

English:
During the War of Silence when the Legacy were active and aware, they posed a significantly greater threat than they do now. They were faster, stronger, regenerated with incredible speed and were capable of consuming and destroying entire planets.
The partially-transformed creatures would adapt to weapons fire at an alarming rate and some would even develop energy weapons within their bodies.

[b][c][fb00ff]Infector[-][/c][/b]
Classification: Corvette
The Infector was the primary vessel-type Legacy encountered. They possessed some of the thickest armor and would drop from orbit onto populated areas, extend tendrils into the ground and emit infective spores into the atmosphere for maximum contamination.
After depleting an area, they would evolve into one of several configurations and either root themselves permanently in place or rise again as something new.

[b][c][fb00ff]Decimator[-][/c][/b]
Classification: Frigate
The Decimators are the evolved forms of the Infectors after they've absorbed the required materials from the environment after a successful drop from orbit. They trade the thicker, overlapping armor of the Infector for an enhanced weapons array on par with Heavy Cruisers several times it's size.
The function of the decimator is a protector for the Infectors on their approach for orbital descent and as fast attackers in the absence of Infectors to defend.

[b][c][fb00ff]Devastator[-][/c][/b]
Classification: Frigate
An alternative evolution of the Infector, the Devastator is a half-evolved variant that will eventually form into an Eradicator: The Legacy's equivalent of a Destroyer.
Unlike a Decimator, the Devastator has developed into a dedicated warship with impressive mobility and gravity manipulation that allows it to accelerate even without any thrusters, with Disruptors aimed forwards and backwards; with secondary weapons providing complete cover.

[b][c][fb00ff]Swarmship[-][/c][/b]
Classification: Carrier
Swarmships were perhaps the deadliest of the Legacy's units overall; claiming more lives in combat than any other vessel-type through the dispensation of highly-maneuverable vessel-type fighters in the hundreds that overwhelmed zirax defenders while also surrounding the swarmship as a living, moving shield that protected the carrier from all harm.

[c][fb00ff][b]Defiler[/b][-][/c]
Classification: Mobile Fortress
The Defiler evolved for atmospheric flight and ground bombardment. Possessing impossibly thick armor and no armaments on it's upper side it was armored from above from all forms of attack, while the disruptors on it's underside would clear a massive swathe beneath the entity as it produced and dropped troop-type entities onto the ground below.

[b][c][fb00ff]Eradicator[-][/c][/b]
Classification: Destroyer
Although few in number, the Eradicators were vessel-type legacy that evolved for the sole purpose of destruction. They possessed none of the infectious capabilities of the other vessel-type entities, focused solely on evolving it's offensive capabilities. Dozens of banks of disruptors with no blind spots and acceleration beyond what any vessel that size should be able to handle.
To date, only one Eradicator has ever been destroyed and only because it had been forced into the gravity well of a Gas Giant after being rammed by a Tovera-Class Dreadnought. The impact destroyed the Dreadnought.

[b][c][fb00ff]Cataclysm[-][/c][/b]
Classification: Unknown
Only one Cataclysm has ever been recorded. A Ghy'st squadron encountered it during deep reconnaissance into Legacy-controlled space as it was observed destroying a fully corrupted planet. Scattering the infected fragments of the planet in the direction of inhabited systems.
Observations of it's effect on the surrounding area indicates that it generates it's own gravity with mass, suggesting that the mass of the entity is several thousand times higher than its dimensions suggest.
After rendering the Legacy dormant and ending the War of Silence, no Cataclysm was ever found.

[c][fb00ff][b]Reaver[/b][-][/c]
Classification: Creature
Not a vessel-type legacy, but the final evolution of an infected individual that's highly compatible with the Legacy virus after a prolonged and successful maturation with a supply of raw materials, both organic and inorganic.
Soldier-Type Legacy numbered at only a few dozen, but each one developed their own advanced weapons within their bodies, produced forcefields and moved with lightning-fast speed on the ground and through the manipulation of gravity fields was capable of flight on par with spacecrafts, including the ability to initialize short-ranged warp jumps.
Chinese (simplified):
在沉默战争期间，当遗留者活跃且有意识时，他们构成的威胁比现在大得多.它们更快、更强壮、以难以置信的速度再生，能够吞噬和摧毁整个星球.
部分被转化的生物会以惊人的速度适应敌人武器的开火，有些甚至会在体内发展出能量武器.

 [b][c][fb00ff]Infector[-][/c][/b]
分类：Corvette
Infector 是遇到的主要船只类型 Legacy.它们拥有一些最厚的盔甲，会从轨道上坠落到人口稠密的地区，将卷须伸入地下并向大气中散发出感染性的孢子，以实现最大程度的污染.
在耗尽一个区域后，它们会演变成几种配置中的一种并自行扎根

[b][c][fb00ff]Decimator[-][/c][/b]
分类：护卫舰
Decimator是Infector之后的进化形式在成功从轨道下降后，它们已经从环境中吸收了所需的材料.他们用感染者更厚、重叠的装甲换取了一个增强的武器阵列，其大小与重型巡洋舰相当需要防御的感染者.

[b][c][fb00ff]毁灭者[-][/c][/b]
分类：护卫舰
感染者的替代进化，毁灭者是半进化的变体最终将形成根除者：遗留者相当于毁灭者.
与毁灭者不同，毁灭者已发展成为一艘专用战舰，具有令人印象深刻的机动性和重力操纵能力，即使没有任何推进器也能加速，干扰者向前和向后瞄准;使用辅助武器提供完整的掩护.

[b][c][fb00ff]Swarmship[-][/c][/b]
分类：航母
Swarmships 可能是 Legacy 总体上最致命的单位；通过部署数百架高度机动的舰船型战斗机，在战斗中夺取比任何其他舰船类型更多的生命，这些战斗机压倒了 zirax 防御者，同时也将 swarmship 作为一个活生生的移动盾牌，保护航母免受一切伤害.
 
[c][fb00ff][b]Defiler[/b][-][/c]
分类：移动要塞
Defiler进化用于大气飞行和地面轰炸.它拥有难以置信的厚重装甲，其上部没有任何武器，它从上方抵御各种形式的攻击，而其底部的干扰器会在实体产生并将部队型实体投放到下面的地面时清除实体下方的大片区域. 

[b][c][fb00ff]Eradicator[-][/c][/b]
分类：Destroyer
Eradicator虽然数量不多，但都是以破坏为唯一目的而进化的船型遗产.他们不具备其他船型实体的传染能力，只专注于发展它的进攻能力.数十排破坏者没有盲点，并且加速度超出任何尺寸的船只应该能够处理的速度.
迄今为止，只有一个 Eradicator 被摧毁，只是因为它在之后被迫进入气体巨人的重力井被Tovera级无畏机撞到.撞击摧毁了无畏舰.

[b][c][fb00ff]大灾变[-][/c][/b]
分类：未知
只有一场大灾变被记录在案.一个 Ghy'st 中队在对遗留者控制的空间进行深度侦察时遇到了它，因为观察到它正在摧毁一个完全腐败的星球.将受感染的行星碎片散布在有人居住的系统方向.
对其对周围区域的影响的观察表明，它产生了自己的质量引力，这表明该实体的质量比其尺寸所暗示的要高数千倍. 
在使遗产休眠并结束沉默之战后，从未发现任何大灾变.

[c][fb00ff][b]Reaver[/b][-][/c]
分类：生物
没有一种容器型遗留者，但在有机和无机原材料供应的长期和成功成熟之后，与遗产病毒高度相容的受感染个体的最终进化.
士兵型遗产数量只有几十个，但每个人都在自己的体内开发了自己的先进武器，产生了力场并在地面上以闪电般的速度移动，并通过操纵重力场能够与航天器相媲美，包括启动能力lize 短程跃迁.

English:
In the upheaval caused by [c][8ab3ff]The Downfall[-][/c], many of the world's governments were destroyed or rendered ineffective. People joined together and headed south, fleeing the dust clouds, storms and tsunamis approaching from the north. With no borders to stop them and a long journey ahead of them, the Downfall united humanity in a way that no other event in human history had ever achieved.
The camps that came together in their advance south elected Leaders from the most able, free from political or monetary agendas and gave rise to the [c][8ab3ff]United Council of Humanity[-][/c].
When the dust clouds eventually settled 9 years later and the frost barrens slowly receded, the unified peoples of the UCH had now encompassed the entire world, a changed world; and the task to rebuild began anew.

It took 63 years before the skies were clear enough to launch new permanent satellites and spacecrafts, and while it may have been tempting for the world to return to some semblance of it's original state. The danger had not yet passed, as scientists, environmentalists and biologists the world over estimated the total collapse of the world's biosphere in no more than 400 years if nothing was done.


[c][c4c4c4]"I stand here in a world united by a tragedy unparalleled in our earth's long history...[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]It came from where we could not see. How, with all our eyes focused on the stars did we miss the blow that felled our moon?[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]As I speak, lunar fragments continue to strike our planet and with them go countless more lives. Soon... debris will take the last of our satellites and the skies will be closed to humanity once again.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]We will persevere. We will endure. It may take fifty years, it may even take five hundred. But those skies will not, [i]cannot [/i]remain closed to us. And on that day... we will once again step forward into space as a one and united mankind."[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]The Downfall[-][/c] 2213 AD - [b]Requiem for the world speech[/b] (Hugo G Anderson, First councillor of the UCH)

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
在 [c][8ab3ff]大灾变[-][/c] 造成的剧变中，世界上许多政府被摧毁或失效.人们聚集在一起，向南走，躲避从北方逼近的沙尘云、风暴和海啸.没有国界可以阻止他们，大灾变以人类历史上其他事件从未有过的方式团结了人类.
在向南前进的旅程中，他们从最有能力、最自由的人中选出了领袖[c][8ab3ff]人类联合委员会[-][/c].
当尘埃云最终在 9 年后落定，霜荒慢慢退去时，统一的人民UCH现在已经涵盖了整个世界，一个变化的世界；重建任务重新开始.

花了 63 年的时间，天空才变得足够晴朗，可以发射新的永久性卫星和宇宙飞船，虽然世界可能很容易恢复到最初的样子.危险还没有过去，因为全世界的科学家、环保主义者和生物学家都估计，如果不采取任何措施，世界生物圈将在不超过 400 年内彻底崩溃.


[c][c4c4c4]“我支持在这个世界上，一场在我们地球的漫长历史上空前的悲剧团结在一起……[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]它来自我们看不见的地方.星星 我们错过了摧毁月球的那一击吗？[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]正如我所说，月球碎片继续撞击我们的星球，并伴随着无数生命.很快......碎片将带走我们的最后一颗卫星，天空将再次对人类关闭.[-][/c]
[c][c4c4c4]我们会坚持下去.我们会坚持下去.可能需要五十年，甚至可能五百.但那些天空不会，[i]不能[/i]继续对我们关闭.在那一天......我们将再次踏入太空，作为一个统一的人类.”[-][/c]
[c][8ab3ff]大灾变[-][/c]公元2213年 - [b]纪念演讲[/b]（UCH 第一议员 Hugo G Anderson）

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
[c][8ab3ff]The Downfall[-][/c] as termed by Historians was a catalysmic disaster that occured on [c][c4c4c4]Saturday 23 April 2212[-][/c], at [c][c4c4c4]Alden Crater[-][/c] on the far side of the moon. Where an asteroid estimated to be between 15 and 19 kilometers in diameter with a composition largely of [c][c4c4c4]Iron[-][/c], [c][c4c4c4]Platinum [-][/c]and [c][c4c4c4]Iridium [-][/c]struck the far side of the moon causing catastrophic damage to the moon's structure and sending a cloud of high speed lunar debris into Earth's orbit.

The environment on Earth at the time was already in a declining state due to pollution and mass deforestation; The impacts of meteorites across the northern hemisphere tipped the scales, triggering a cooling period that spread out from the north pole in the wake of the obscuring dust clouds causing extreme weather across the globe.
The debris in orbit also prevented space travel and communication by destroying or damaging spacecrafts and satellites.
Not only was the planet slowly dying, but we were trapped on it for the next 50 years as the moon's remaining fragments slowly coalesced into a ring.

The long-lasting effects of the Downfall are still felt today as contamination of the ocean with high levels of arsenic continue to destroy the delicate environmental balance in the Atlantic ocean and cause acid rains in subtropic regions across the planet.

Although there has been many theories as to why the various governments of the world failed to warn or prepare the world to the danger of the [c][c4c4c4]Alden Meteorite[-][/c], the prevailing explanation is that the meteorite was simply impossible to detect approaching from behind the moon where it couldn't be seen and it's a big sky.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
[c][8ab3ff]历史学家所说的大灾变[-][/c]是一场全球性的灾难，发生在[c][c4c4c4]2212年4月23日星期六[-][/c]，在月球另一边的[c][c4c4c4]奥尔登陨石[-][/c] .估计直径在 15 到 19 公里之间的小行星，其成分主要是 [c][c4c4c4]Iron[-][/c]、[c][c4c4c4]Platinum [-][/c] 和 [c][c4c4c4]铱 [-][/c] 撞击月球背面，对月球结构造成灾难性破坏，并将一团高速月球碎片云送入地球轨道.

当时地球上的环境由于污染和大规模砍伐森林已经处于衰退状态；横跨北半球的陨石撞击使天平倾斜，引发了一个冰河期，随着尘埃云在全球范围内造成极端天气，从北极扩散开来.
轨道上的碎片还阻碍了太空旅行通信并摧毁了航天器和卫星.
这颗行星不仅在慢慢消亡，而且在接下来的 50 年里，随着月球剩余的碎片被困在它上面，慢慢合并成了一个环.

陨落的长期影响今天仍然可以感觉到，因为高浓度的砷污染海洋继续破坏大西洋微妙的环境平衡，并导致全球亚热带地区出现酸雨.

尽管各国政府对于为何世界未能警告 [c][c4c4c4]奥尔登陨石[-][/c] 的危险存在许多理论，普遍的解释是陨石是从月球后面无法看到的地方接近的.

__________________________________________________________________________

English:
On [c][8ab3ff]3 January 2301[-][/c] AD, during a survey of the [c][8ab3ff]Ronne Ice Shelf[-][/c] in [c][8ab3ff]Antarctica[-][/c] a metallic object 100 meters in diameter was discovered deep beneath the ice whose material composition did not match any known element on the Periodic Table.
The object that was recovered from the ice appeared to be some kind of unmanned alien spacecraft and from it, it was clear that it held the keys to continuing life on Earth. It is still not known whether the ship came down from the moon in [c][8ab3ff]The Downfall[-][/c] or if it was buried in the ice all this time.

The spacecraft was taken to the nearest and best-equipped facility in [c][8ab3ff]New Zealand[-][/c] that was able to properly perform the examination and replication of the alien technology where it underwent extensive testing and experimentation at the hands of the world's best specialists.
Progress was slow, as many of the materials the spacecraft (named "[c][8ab3ff]Phoenix-1[-][/c]") was made from could not be found or replicated and the computer systems that operated the ship were heavily degraded. Even still, the technological advancements in a multitude of scientific fields was significant and by 2461 the first UCH-built spacecraft capable of extrasolar warp was built: The [c][8ab3ff]UCH-001 Hyperion[-][/c].

After dozens of successful warp tests over the course of four years, the Hyperion was determined to be a success and full-scale production of a Fleet was ordered. [c][8ab3ff]Operation Phoenix[-][/c] was confirmed.
[b]There were two goals to this UCH Fleet:[/b]
The first was to find more of the materials retrieved from the Phoenix-1 and establish a supply line back to Earth. Using the technological advances of the alien technology to reverse the damage dealt to the planet from The Downfall using new materials in terraforming applications.
The second, if the first failed, was to find and colonize a habitable planet and begin the transfer of the human population to the new planet.

It wasn't surprising that the alien spacecraft recovered from Antarctica was equipped with weapons, they were theorized to be used for destroying meteorites and preventing collisions. Until the final flight of the Hyperion in [c][8ab3ff]2472[-][/c], where a long-ranged warp jump past Jupiter where the fleet was being assembled at [c][8ab3ff]Apollon Station[-][/c] ended with the disappearance of the Hyperion.
There were no problems with the Hyperion's warp drive and no observable issues with its insertion into [c][8ab3ff]Hyperspace[-][/c]. Suddenly the prospect of jumping a fleet of unarmed transports to [c][8ab3ff]Proxima Centauri[-][/c], the nearest habitable system to our own, took on a darker tone and calls for weapons to be added to the fleet were made, as a precaution.

On [c][8ab3ff]25 July 2473[-][/c] the UCH Fleet departed the fleet construction yards at Apollon Station in Jupiter's outer orbit and prepared a warp jump utilizing the [c][8ab3ff]UCH-002 M.S Titan[-][/c]'s Warp Field Generator to create a warp field large enough to move the entire fleet to Proxima Centauri.

__________________________________________________________________________
Chinese (simplified):
