在公元[c][8ab3ff]2301年1月3日[-][/c]，对南极洲的[c][8ab3ff]朗恩冰架[-][/c]进行勘测期间，在冰层深处发现了一个直径100米的金属物体，其材料组成与元素周期表上已知的任何元素都不相符。从冰中回收的物体似乎是某种无人外星飞船，显然它掌握着延续地球上生命的关键。目前尚不清楚这艘飞船是否来自[c][8ab3ff]灾难[-][/c]中的月球，或者是否一直被埋藏在冰层中。

这艘飞船被运送到了[c][8ab3ff]新西兰[-][/c]最近的、设备最完善的设施，那里能够适当地进行外星技术的检查和复制，它在那里接受了世界顶尖专家的广泛测试和实验。进展缓慢，因为许多飞船（被命名为[c][8ab3ff]凤凰-1[-][/c]）的材料无法找到或复制，而且操作飞船的计算机系统严重退化。即便如此，它在众多科学领域的技术进步是显著的，到2461年，UCH建造的第一艘能够进行系外翘曲的飞船建成了：[c][8ab3ff]UCH-001 超离子[-][/c]。

经过四年数十次成功的翘曲测试，超离子被确定为成功，下令全面生产一支舰队。[c][8ab3ff]凤凰行动[-][/c]得到了确认。
[b]这个UCH舰队有两个目标：[/b]
第一个目标是找到更多从凤凰-1中回收的材料，并建立一条返回地球的供应线。利用外星技术的科技进步，使用新材料在地球改造应用中逆转灾难造成的损害。

第二个目标，如果第一个目标失败，是寻找并殖民一个适居的星球，并开始将人类转移到新星球。

从南极洲回收的外星飞船装备有武器并不令人惊讶，人们推测它们被用来摧毁陨石并防止碰撞。直到超离子在[c][8ab3ff]2472[-][/c]年的最后一次飞行，其中一次越过木星的长距离翘曲跳跃，在[c][8ab3ff]阿波罗站[-][/c]正在组装舰队时，超离子的消失。

超离子的翘曲驱动器没有问题，也没有观察到其插入[c][8ab3ff]超空间[-][/c]的任何问题。突然之间，将一支未武装运输舰队跳跃到[c][8ab3ff]比邻星[-][/c]，我们最近的适居系统，变得前景黯淡，并有人呼吁在舰队中添加武器，作为一种预防措施。

在[c][8ab3ff]2473年7月25日[-][/c]，UCH舰队离开了位于木星外轨道阿波罗站的舰队建造场地，准备利用[c][8ab3ff]UCH-002 M.S. 泰坦[-][/c]的翘曲场发生器进行翘曲跳跃，创建一个足够大的翘曲场，将整个舰队移动到比邻星。

English: A seemingly primitive species that lives on a variety of planets in stone or wood villages and settlements. They are ever under the watchful eye of their Zirax overlords, forbidding them from any technological advancements.\nEach settlement is led by a Chief and sustains itself with a combination with hunting, gathering and farming. Although forbidden from advanced technology, they are not forbidden from trading plants, minerals and medical ingredients with other factions.
Chinese (simplified): 一种看似原始的物种，生活在各种星球上的石头或木头村庄和定居点. 他们一直处于 Zirax 领主的监视之下，禁止他们进行任何技术进步.\n每个定居点都由酋长领导，并通过狩猎、采集和耕作相结合来维持自己的生存. 虽然禁止使用先进技术，但并不禁止他们与其他派系进行植物、矿物和医药原料的交易.

English:
Polaris Employee [c][ffae00]8376455466[-][/c]
A new contract has been issued for your last known location. Please read the [c][4dc3ff]Terms and Conditions[-][/c] before accepting.

As of 0800 hours two days ago (local time) a zirax ground patrol stumbled upon surface traces of a rich [c][ffae00]Hematite Deposit[-][/c] [c][ffee00](Iron)[-][/c] not far below the surface and called in a survey unit to evaluate the area.

We at [c][ffae00]Polaris[-][/c] are also interested in the area the zirax found, but cannot openly contest the site without revealing that we were listening in on their transmissions. If you were to [c][4dc3ff]reach the location ahead of the survey unit and prevent them from reaching the site[-][/c], we would be able to take control of the site after responding to their distress signal.
How you prevent them from reaching the site is up to you, just know that they are accompanied by [c][ff5c5c]three Aerodrones[-][/c] that will not appreciate your interference.
The survey team is being transported in an unarmed [c][ff5c5c]Fast Transport[-][/c] craft of the ZX4100 series. It is maneuverable and will be extremely difficult to engage from the ground.

[c][ffae00]Location coordinates are attached in the contract file.[-][/c]

[sub]Polaris Megacorp and all of it's subsidiaries are not liable for personal or private damages incurred as a result of the contracted mission. Nor will it reimburse claims of: Disfigurement, mutilation, loss of life, loss of limb, alien parasites, excess body hair, bad hygiene, erectile dysfunction or light to severe radiation poisoning.[/sub]
Chinese (simplified):
极星员工 [c][ffae00]8376455466[-][/c]
已为您最后一个已知地点签发了一份新合同.请在接受前阅读[c][4dc3ff]条款[-][/c].

截至两天前（当地时间）0800 时，一个兹瑞克斯地面巡逻队偶然发现了一个富裕的[c][ffae00]赤铁矿床的地表痕迹[-][/c] [c][ffee00]（铁）[-][/c] 在地表以下不远处，并请来一个调查单位来评估该地区.

我们[c][ffae00]极星公司[-][/c] 也对兹瑞克斯发现的区域感兴趣，但不能公开质疑该站点而不透露我们正在监听他们的传输.如果您 [c][4dc3ff] 到达调查单位之前的位置并阻止他们到达站点 [-][/c]，我们将能够在响应他们的求救信号后控制该站点. 
如何阻止他们到达现场取决于您，只要知道他们伴随着 [c][ff5c5c]三架无人机[-][/c] 不会欢迎您的到访.
正在运送勘测队在 ZX4100 系列的非武装 [c][ff5c5c]Fast Transport[-][/c] 飞船中.它具有机动性，从地面上交战非常困难.

[c][ffae00]位置坐标附在合同文件中.[-][/c]

[sub]Polaris Megacorp 和它的所有子公司不对因合同任务造成的个人或私人损失承担责任.它也不会赔偿以下索赔：毁容、肢解、生命损失、肢体损失、外来寄生虫、体毛过多、卫生条件差、勃起功能障碍或轻度至重度辐射中毒.[/sub]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, I have identified the target site from the location data given by [-][/c][c][ffae00]Polaris[-][/c][c][00ffee] and forwarded the course data to your Heads-Up Display.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]指挥官，我已经根据 [-][/c][c][ffae00]Polaris[-][/c][c][00ffee] 提供的位置数据识别出了目标地点，并将航线数据转发到了您的抬头显示上。[-][/c]

English:
Reach the designated Iron Deposit and prepare to intercept the forerunners of the survey team.

[c][ff5c5c]Warning! This mission can only be performed on a planet with an Iron Deposit.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c]You may need to restart the mission after entering the atmosphere.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
到达指定的铁矿，准备拦截勘测队的先锋.

[c][ff5c5c]警告！ 此任务只能在有铁矿的星球上执行.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c]进入大气层后可能需要重新启动任务.[-][/c]

English: [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]You have reached the designated location, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]The survey unit doesn't seem to have arrived yet. I will expand my area of detection to find the targets.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]你已经到指定地点了，指挥官[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]调查单位似乎还没有到. 我将扩大我的检测范围以找到目标.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]The Survey Unit is approaching, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]There are three Aerodrones acting as an escort that will need to be disabled or destroyed first.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]调查队正在逼近，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]有三架 无人机充当护航，需要首先摧毁.[-][/c]

English: The survey unit is being escorted by a trio of Aerodrones. They need to be destroyed before the Transport gets here and calls for reinforcements.
Chinese (simplified): 探测队伍由三架空气动力无人机护送，他们需要在运输机到达并呼叫增援之前被击落

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]That's the last of them, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]The survey team's Transport has just come within sensor range and will detect the loss of it's escorts any second.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]这是最后一个了，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]勘测队的运输机刚刚进入传感器范围，将随时检测到其护送人员的失联.[-][/c]

English: [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]The transport has detected the loss of it's escort and has sent a distress signal.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It is now initiating evasive maneuvers in attempt to buy time for reinforcements to arrive.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]运输舰检测到其护卫队的损失，并发送了求救信号。[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]它现在正在进行规避机动，试图争取时间等待援军到达。[-][/c]

English: The Zirax survey has sent out their distress signal, now is the chance for you to shoot down the transport so Polaris can contest the claim on the ore deposit while responding to the call.
Chinese (simplified): 兹瑞克斯调查已发出求救信号，现在是您击落运输工具的机会，这样极星公司可以在响应呼叫的同时对矿床的主张提出异议.

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Transmission ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Thank you for your service, Employee [-][/c][c][ffee00]8376455466[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]We have received the Zirax survey team's distress signal and can now initiate a legitimate claim on the deposit while investigating the source.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][传输][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]感谢您的服务，员工[-][/c][c][ffee00]8376455466[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]我们已经收到了兹瑞克斯勘测队的遇险信号，现在可以在调查来源的同时，对矿床提出合法的索赔。[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]The Drone is moving in on your position and thermal imaging indicates that its weapons are hot.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]Brace for fire, Commander. It intends to destroy the Heidelberg.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]无人机正在向你的位置移动，热成像显示它的武器正在预热.[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]它开火了，指挥官. 它打算摧毁海德堡号.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]Looks like it's down, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]But who knows how long we have before another patrol comes looking, so i'd better get out of here.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]看起来它已经完蛋了, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]但谁知道增援还有多久会来，我们还是赶快走吧.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]I estimate the likelihood of the drone detecting the activation of the console at 86.5%[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff][-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]Material density scans indicate that the drone is equipped with large-caliber rotary cannons and have armor comparable to an attack helicopter.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]I recommend that you equip yourself with long-ranged weaponry[-][/c][c][00e1ff] before activating the console, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][fbff00][IDA][-][/c][/b]
[c][00e1ff]我估计无人机探测到控制台激活的可能性为86.5%。[-][/c]
[c][00e1ff]材料密度扫描显示，无人机装备有大口径旋转机炮，并且装甲强度与攻击直升机相当。[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]我建议在激活控制台之前，指挥官，您应装备远程武器。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Confirmed. Good job, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]The regular patrols have not changed their course, but their handlers will likely send reinforcements when they realise their drone has gone offline. So leaving the area for now would be the safest course of action.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fbff00][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]已确认. 干得好，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]常规巡逻队并没有改变路线，但是当他们的操作员意识到他们的无人机已经离线时，他们可能会派出增援部队. 所以现在离开该地区将是最安全的行动方案.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Yes, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]However... I was able to verify the cause of the inconsistencies between the physical evidence and the logs left behind by the Heidelberg's crewmembers. Which will complicate matters significantly.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]是的，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff] 但是……我能够验证物证与海德堡船员留下的日志不一致的原因. 这将使事情变得非常复杂.[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]How could almost a year have passed for everyone else but me?![-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Cryosleep, perhaps? Time dilation? Time [-][/c][i][c][8ab3ff]travel[-][/c][/i][c][8ab3ff]?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]除了我以外的其他人怎么可能已经过去了将近一年？！[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]也许是冷冻睡眠？ 时间膨胀？ 时间[-][/c][i][c][8ab3ff]旅行[-][/c][/i][c][8ab3ff]?[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]I remember everything up to Apollon station. Beyond that... nothing.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Are you saying I could have brain damage?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]我记得阿波罗站之前的一切. 除此之外......什么都没有.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]你是说我可能有脑损伤？[-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]At least now least we have somewhere to start our search.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]Keep me posted on any developments, IDA.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]至少现在我们有地方可以开始搜索了.[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]随时通知我，IDA.[-][/c]

English:
[c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c][c][00fbff][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]My observations of the ship's hull using the cameras affixed to your suit conclude that the ship did not crash due to mechanical failure.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]The damage and burn marks to the hull are consistent with high-temperature plasma and explosive detonations.[-][/c]
[c][c70000]This ship was shot down, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c][c][00fbff][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]我通过使用贴在你的宇航服上的摄像头对船体的观察得出结论，这艘船不是由于机械故障而坠毁的.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]船体的损坏和烧伤痕迹与高温等离子体一致，并且有爆炸痕迹.[-][/c]
[c][c70000]这艘船被击落了，指挥官.[-][/c]

English: [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]Commander, I have identified a large structure not far from the broken antenna.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]Profile analysis has determined a 93% match with a UCH Pelican-Class Transport.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]指挥官，我发现离断裂的天线不远的地方有一个大型物体.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]配置文件分析已确定与 UCH 鹈鹕级运输舰的匹配率为 93%.[-][/c]

English:
[c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c][c][00fbff][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]I am detecting no thermal or electrical emissions on the ground. But j[-][/c][c][00fbff]udging by the disturbance to the surrounding terrain, I would estimate that the ship impacted the ground at considerable speed.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]There may have been survivors, but I am unable to detect the presence of any human heat signatures.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]You will need to investigate this on your own, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c][c][00fbff][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]我没有检测到热或 地面上的电排放. 但是j[-][/c][c][00fbff]根据对周围地形的干扰，我估计这艘船以相当大的速度撞击地面.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]可能有幸存者，但我无法检测到任何人体热信号的存在.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]你需要自己调查这件事，指挥官.[-][/c]

English: [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]Displaying telemetry data on your Heads-Up Display.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]Good luck, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]在头戴显示器上显示遥测数据.[-][/c]\n [c][00fbff]祝你好运，指挥官.[-][/c]

English:
[c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]Continuing the investigation, Commander...[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]Your suit is picking up a weak electromagnetic signal coming from somewhere near the rear of the ship. It may be a computer console.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]I have marked the [-][/c][c][fbff00]location[-][/c][c][00fbff] on your display.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][fafe10][b][IDA][/b][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]继续调查，指挥官...[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]你的宇航服检测到了来自船尾附近某处的微弱电磁信号。那可能是一部计算机控制台。[-][/c]
[c][00fbff]我已经在你的显示屏上标记了[-][/c][c][fbff00]位置[-][/c][c][00fbff]。[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00fbff]I am detecting a [-][/c][c][ffee00]faint energy signature[-][/c][c][00fbff] further forward on the ship, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]It appears to be coming from a source somewhere in the wreckage.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00fbff]我正在检测 [-][/c][c][ffee00]微弱的能量信号[-][/c][c][00fbff] 舰长.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]它似乎来自残骸某处. [-][/c]

English: [c][8ab3ff]What do you mean, IDA?[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]What's wrong with the logs?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][8ab3ff]你是什么意思，IDA？[-][/c]\n[c][8ab3ff]日志有什么问题？[-][/c]

English: [c][a1a1a1][i]Urghhh...[/i][-][/c]\nWhat is this place? Where the hell am I?!\nThe last thing I remember, I was aboard Apollon station getting ready to ship out...
Chinese (simplified): [c][a1a1a1][i]Urghhh...[/i][-][/c]\n这是什么地方？ 我到底在哪里？！\n我记得的最后一件事是，我在阿波罗站上准备发货……

English: [i][c][8ab3ff][b]UCH Fleet, come in![/b]\n[b]I repeat: UCH Fleet, Come in![/b]\n[b]Please Respond![/b][-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][8ab3ff][b]UCH 舰队，请进！[/b]\n[b]我再说一遍：UCH 舰队，请进！[/b]\n[b]请回复！[/b][-][/c][/i]
[b][i][c][8ab3ff]请...命令？ 任何人？ 请回复！[-][/c][/i][/b]

English: It's faint, but that's definitely a UCH transmission!\nThere's other survivors here!
Chinese (simplified): 很微弱，但这绝对是 UCH的传输信号！\n这里还有其他幸存者！

English: The Antenna looks to be in relatively good shape despite missing... well, the [i]rest [/i]of the ship.\n\nI should be able to connect my suit up to a maintenance port at the base of the receiver, it might require some digging if it's buried too deep.
Chinese (simplified): 天线看起来状况良好，尽管丢失了……嗯，船的 [i] 其余部分 [/i].\n\n我应该能够将我的宇航服连接到位于底部的维护端口 接收器，如果埋得太深，可能需要一些挖掘.

English: [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]Are you receiving my transmissions, commander?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]你收到我的信息了吗，指挥官？[-][/c]

English: [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]While I assume that your enquiry is some kind of humor, Commander. It is a fact that my processing speed is down 36% and two of my satellite's optical lenses are cracked.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]So the answer to your question is: Well enough, considering the situation.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]虽然我认为您的询问是某种幽默，指挥官. 事实是我的处理速度下降了 36%，而且我的卫星的两个光学镜头都破裂了.[-][/c]\n[c][00fbff]所以你的问题的答案是：还行吧，考虑到这种情况.[-][/c]

English:
[c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]I am not designed for comedy, Commander. I am a strategic analysis AI. I do not laugh.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]However... I will take your suggestion under advisement and adjust my humor parameter, if it does not impede my performance.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][fafe10][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]我不是为喜剧而设计的，指挥官. 我是一个战略分析人工智能. 我不会笑.[-][/c]
[c][00fbff][-][/c]
[c][00fbff]但是...我会考虑你的建议并调整我的幽默 参数，如果它不妨碍我的表现.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Commander, I have identified a cluster of structures that may have been the destination of the UCH Survivors.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]I am detecting faint energy readings from beneath the structures and no obvious weaponry.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官，我已经确定了可能是 UCH 幸存者目的地的建筑群 .[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]我在建筑物下方检测到微弱的能量读数，没有明显的武器.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]The structures appear to be made primarily of wood and stone composites, consisting of living quarters and agricultural facilities.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]There are several patrolling groups at the edge of their defined territory and evidence of recent drone activity.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]这些结构似乎主要由木头和石头复合材料制成，包括生活区和农业 设施.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]在他们定义的领土边缘有几个巡逻队和最近无人机活动的证据.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]It seems you may be right, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Nonetheless, these creatures were not described in the Heidelberg's logs and should be investigated for potential information.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fbff00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]看来你可能是对的，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]尽管如此，这些生物并没有在海德堡的日志中描述，应该调查潜在的信息.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]Commander, I have forwarded the location of the tower, or something that matches the tapestry the Tal'on chief showed you, to your display.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]指挥官，我已经转发了塔的位置，或者与长老展示给你的挂毯相匹配的东西.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][fafe10][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]It is unlikely.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff]Through the cameras on your suit I was able to observe other tribesmen while you spoke with the chief and most of the people in the village displayed no aggression towards you; merely curiosity.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][fafe10][IDA][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00e1ff]不太可能.[-][/c]\n[c][00e1ff] 通过你宇航服上的摄像头，我可以看到其他部落的人，而你和酋长交谈时，村里的大多数人都没有表现出对你的攻击性； 只是好奇.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]It's nothing to worry about, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I am in the middle of updating your suit's drivers with the latest Polaris security protocols. You will see minor improvements to your display, radar and tracking.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]不用担心，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]我正在使用最新的 Polaris 安全协议更新你的宇航服驱动程序. 您将看到显示、雷达和跟踪的微小改进.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]Now that you have access to that Com Satellite IDA, Can you access the logs of where the ship that took the Fleet survivors?[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]We're still stuck for clues and i'd hate to just head off into space looking for them.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]现在你可以访问通讯卫星了 IDA，你能访问关于舰队的幸存者被带到哪里的日志吗？[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]我们仍然需要坚持寻找线索，我不想直接进入太空寻找它们.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]No Commander. Those files are still sealed in an external PolSec server, which I am unable to access while SIGMA is still watching network traffic in this system.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It's only a matter of time before something else attracts it's attention though. All we have to do is wait patiently.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]不可以，指挥官. 这些文件仍被密封在外部 PolSec 服务器中，当 SIGMA 仍在监视此系统中的网络流量时，我无法访问该服务器.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]这只是时间问题.不过，其他东西吸引了它的注意力. 我们要做的就是耐心等待.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]In the meantime, I have diverted local network data through [-][/c][c][ffffff]Relay 451[-][/c][c][00ffee] and filtered out many relevant transmissions.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]This includes a number of [-][/c][c][ffffff]Polaris Contracts[-][/c][c][00ffee] that were intended for someone else if you're interested.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]同时我已经通过[-][/c][c][ffffff]Relay 451[-][/c][c][00ffee]并过滤掉很多相关的传输.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]这包括一些[-][/c][c][ffffff]极星公司合约[-][/c][c][00ffee]这是给其他人的，如果您有兴趣知道的话.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]Among the transmissions I decoded was a com frequency hidden in the metadata of the relay's final transmission[-][/c][c][00ffee].[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]It seems it is from the person responsible for the attack on [-][/c][c][ffffff]Relay 451[-][/c][c][00ffee] and is intended for you.[-][/c]
[c][ffee00]I have added the com frequency to your PDA[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]在我解码的传输中，有一个通讯频率隐藏在中继最终传输的元数据中[-][/c][c][00ffee].[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]看来是来自对[-][/c][c][ffffff]Relay 451[-][/c][c][00ffee] 的攻击负责的人为你准备的.[-][/c]
[c][ffee00]我已将 通讯频率添加到你的 PDA[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]Great, so now we're dealing with pirates.\nI'd like to avoid pissing in the local law enforcement's pool if at all possible, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Surely that's not [i]everything[/i] you found while snooping through people's mail?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]太好了，所以现在我们正在与海盗打交道.\n如果可能的话，我想避免在当地执法部门的池子里撒尿，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]确定这就是你在窥探人们的邮件时发现的[i]所有东西[/i]吗？[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I prefer the term "monitoring" rather than "snooping", Commander.\nAs it happens, there is another matter that I though was best left for last, as it is in another precarious position.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我更喜欢“监视”这个词而不是“窥探”，指挥官.\n碰巧 ，还有一件事我认为最好留到最后，因为它处于另一个不稳定的位置.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I was able to retrieve surveillance images of several planets and moons in this system. The most relevant of which show the remains of a large ship on the far side of the moon.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Extrapolating from the images I can determine that the crashed ship is the [-][/c][c][6bd600]UCH-002 M.S Titan[-][/c][c][00ffee], the flagship of the fleet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我能够检索到这个系统中几个行星和卫星的监视图像. 其中最相关的是月球背面的一艘大船的残骸.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]从图像推断，我可以确定坠毁的船是 [-][/c][c][6bd600]UCH-002 M.S Titan[-][/c][c][00ffee]，舰队的旗舰.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]If there are any logs as to where the remaining ships in the fleet were able to escape to, they would be on the [-][/c][c][ffffff]M.S Titan[-][/c][c][00ffee].[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Even if there aren't any logs, it should still contain combat data that may be of use in determining the number of survivors.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]如果有任何关于舰队中剩余船只能够逃往何处的日志 ，他们将在 [-][/c][c][ffffff]M.S Titan[-][/c][c][00ffee].[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee] 即使没有任何日志，它仍然应该包含可能用于确定幸存者数量的战斗数据.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]Looks like we have another chance to find the trail of the UCH Fleet.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Hopefully this one will pay off, so that we won't need to rely on Polaris' hospitality.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Set course for the [-][/c][c][6bd600]planet's moon[-][/c][c][4dc3ff], IDA.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]看来我们还有机会找到UCH舰队的踪迹.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]希望这次能有回报，这样我们就不需要依靠极星了.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]为[-][/c][c][6bd600]行星的卫星设置航向[-][/c][c][4dc3ff]，IDA.[-][/c]

English: The M.S Titan is crashed somewhere on the moon of the starting planet.\nOnce you reach the moon's surface, IDA should be able to pinpoint the location of the crashed titan.
Chinese (simplified): 巨舰 泰坦 就坠毁在初始星球卫星上的某处.\n一旦你进入了月球轨道, IDA 应该会为你指出泰坦的具体位置.

English: [c][4dc3ff]Alright, i've reached the moon, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Where to now?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]好的，我已经到达月球了，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]现在去哪里？[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Transmitting the location of the Titan's crash sites to your display, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]正在将所有泰坦坠毁地点的位置传送到你的显示器上，指挥官.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]Crash [i]sites[/i]? There's more than one?\nThere's no atmosphere here to slow a falling ship, so I hope you won't have me scouring the regolith for a dozen pieces of unrecognizable wreckage.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]所有坠毁[i]地点[/i]？ 不止一个？\n这里没有空气可以减缓坠落，所以我希望你不要让我在风化层上搜寻十几块无法辨认的残骸.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]It would be hard to spot small pieces of wreckage from a satellite, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]The Titan has broken into [-][/c][c][ffffff]three large sections[-][/c][c][00ffee], but they are quite close to a [-][/c][c][ff0000]Large Zirax Complex[-][/c][c][00ffee].[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Exercise caution when approaching.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][IDA][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]从卫星上很难发现小的残骸碎片，指挥官。[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]泰坦号已经分解成[-][/c][c][ffffff]三个大的部分[-][/c][c][00ffee]，但它们相当接近一个[-][/c][c][ff0000]大型兹瑞克斯建筑群[-][/c][c][00ffee]。[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]接近时请小心行事。[-][/c]

English: The M.S Titan has broken into three sections, the first part to find is the forward section that houses the ship's experimental Warp Field Generator.
Chinese (simplified): 巨舰泰坦解体成了三段, 前段装载了实验性的翘曲力场发生器.

English: [c][4dc3ff]I have eyes on the forward section of the Titan, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Considering the speed it would've hit the ground, the damage isn't as bad as i'd expected.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]我看到了泰坦的前部，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]考虑到它撞击地面的速度，伤害没有我预想的那么糟糕.[-][/c]

English: The M.S Titan has broken into three sections, the second part to find is the mid section that contains the ship's hangars and flight deck.
Chinese (simplified): M.S. 泰坦号已经分裂成三个部分，接下来需要找到的是中部区域，那里包含着飞船的机库和飞行甲板。

English: The M.S Titan has broken into three sections, the final part to find is the rear section that contains the ship's engineering section, medbay and the bridge.
Chinese (simplified): M.S. 泰坦号已经分裂成三个部分，最后一部分要找到的是尾部区域，那里包含着飞船的工程部分、医疗舱和舰桥。

English: [c][4dc3ff]I can see right into the mid section's hangar, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Looks like it broke apart before it hit the ground. Which is probably the only thing that saved it from being flattened by the rear section.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]我可以看到中间部分的机库，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]看起来它在落地之前就裂开了. 这可能是唯一使它免于被后部压扁的东西.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]Confirmed the main body of the Titan, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Looks to be mostly intact, so it's possible that there were survivors.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]确认了泰坦的主体，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]看起来基本完好，所以可能还有幸存者.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]That's all three sections confirmed, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]I'm heading to the forward section to see if there's anything left of the Warp Field Generator. That thing is our only ticket home.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]这三个部分都已确认，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]我要去前面的部分看看翘曲力场发生器是否还剩下任何东西. 那东西是我们唯一的回家机票.[-][/c]

English: Enter the forward section of the Titan
Enter the forward section of the Crashed Titan and inspect the Warp Field Generator. Without it, there's no way back home.
Chinese (simplified): 进入坠毁泰坦的前段以检查翘曲力场发生器的情况，没有它是不能可能回家的

English: [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Be careful Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]The wreckage appears to be unstable and may collapse with minimal prompting.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]小心指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee] 残骸似乎不是很稳定，可能会在没有征兆的情况下坍塌.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]I've reached an entry point into the Wreckage, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Looks like this leads through the Crew Quarters towards the Warp Field Generator near the bow.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]我已经到达残骸的入口点，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]看起来这条路可以穿过船员宿舍，直通船头附近的翘曲力场发生器 .[-][/c]

English: The Warp Field Generator was mounted on the M.S Titan to create a stable warp field that could move any nearby ship caught in the field with the Titan as a single unit.\nWithout it, it's likely that it will be impossible to get back home.
Chinese (simplified): 巨舰 泰坦安装的翘曲力场发生器可以生成一个稳定的翘曲力场来包裹附近所有的飞船并和泰坦作为同一艘飞船进行跳跃.\n没有了它，也就没有多大回家的可能性了

English: [c][4dc3ff]IDA, i'm looking at the Warp Field Generator... What's left of it at least.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]It's not good. The warp core housing and some fragments of the heat sink are all that's left.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]IDA，我在看翘曲力场发生器...至少还剩下什么.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]不好. 只剩下翘曲的核心外壳和散热器的一些碎片.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]There should be a console in the Engineering section with the operational logs of the Warp Drive, which should shine a light on what happened, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]工程部应该有一个控制台，里面的曲速引擎的操作日志应该可以说明些什么，指挥官.[-][/c]

English: Enter the forward Engineering Section of the M.S Titan where the Warp Field Generator and Warp Drive were mounted in the search for clues.
Chinese (simplified): 进入安装翘曲力场发生器和驱动器的工程部以搜寻线索

English: [c][4dc3ff]IDA, i'm picking up high radiation levels in the Forward Engineering Section.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]I don't think i'll want to spend too long in here or risk glowing in the dark.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]IDA，我在工程部门检测到了相当高的辐射水平.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]我可不想在这里停留太久，不然说不定以后我人都要在晚上发光了.[-][/c]
找到翘曲驱动器控制台

English: The engineering console that records the logs of the Warp Drive and Warp Field Generator's operation appears to be intact and is located forward on the lower starboard deck.
Chinese (simplified): 记录翘曲引擎日志的工程控制台看起来依然完整，位置就在右舷的下层

English: [c][4dc3ff]I've found the console, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]It appears to be intact but it's got no power. No surprises there...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]我找到了控制台，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]它看起来完好无损，但它没有电源. 没有惊喜...[-][/c]
访问翘曲驱动器控制台

English: Access the Warp Drive Console on the Titan's Forward Engineering Section and retrieve the logs from the system's computer.
Chinese (simplified): 访问翘曲驱动器控制台并回收系统日志

English: [c][ff0000][i]Son-of-a-![/i][-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]I [i]knew [/i]that power warning was bad! The console just zapped me when I pulled the power cable out![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][i]狗娘-养-！[/i][-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]我[i]就知道[/i]电源警告不是什么好事！控制台在我我拔出电源线的时候电了我一下！[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]I'm sorry to hear that, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]However, it [i]did[/i] reveal the [-][/c][c][ffffff]chief engineer's console[-][/c][c][00ffee] on the [-][/c][c][ffffff]port side[-][/c][c][00ffee] of the [-][/c][c][ffffff]engineering section[-][/c][c][00ffee].[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]I have highlighted it's location on your Heads-Up Display.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]很抱歉听到这个消息，指挥官.[-][/c]
 [c][00ffee]但是，它[i]确实[/i]告诉了我们[-][/c][c][ffffff]总工程师的控制台[-][/c][c][00ffee]就在[-][/c][c][ffffff]工程部[-][/c][c][00ffee]的 [-][/c][c][ffffff]左舷那边[-][/c][c][00ffee].[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]我已经在你的头戴显示器上标出了它的位置.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]Yes [i]ma'am[/i].[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Sometimes I wonder who's the Commander around here.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]是的 [i]老妈[/i].[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]有时候我想知道这里的指挥官是谁.[-][/c]

English: The Engineering Console in the Port side of the Crashed Titan's forward section is used by the Chief Engineer of the M.S Titan to manually operate the ship's Warp Field Generator as well as it's Standard Warp Drive.\nIt is locked to the Chief's Personal Keycard and cannot be operated without it.
Chinese (simplified): 坠毁泰坦左舷的工程控制台仅供首席工程师手动操控飞船的翘曲力场驱动器和普通翘曲驱动器 \n必须使用首席工程师钥匙卡才能运作

English: [c][4dc3ff]I can see it now. It's on the upper level and looks like there's still some juice in the battery of this one.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]It probably woke up when the other console surged.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]我现在可以看到了. 它在上层，看起来这台的电池里还剩了一点.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]它可能是在另一个控制台激活时被唤醒的.[-][/c]

English: Access the Engineering Console on the Port side, upper deck of the M.S Titan.
Chinese (simplified): 访问巨舰泰坦左舷上层甲板的工程控制台

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]The Titan carried a crew compliment of 168 crewmembers, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]One of them may have left their Keycard in their room.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Good luck.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]泰坦载有 168 名机组人员，指挥官.[-][/c] 
[c][00ffee]其中一个人可能把钥匙卡忘在房间里了.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]祝你好运.[-][/c]

English: Search the crew quarters for a keycard
Chinese (simplified): 在船员居住舱中寻找钥匙卡

English: Search the Crew Quarters for a keycard.\nForward section of the Titan, on either side on both floors.
Chinese (simplified): 在船员居住舱中寻找钥匙卡.\n只需搜索前段过道两侧的居住间

English: [c][4dc3ff]I found a Keycard in one of the engineering staff's quarters, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Looks like i'll be able to access that console after all.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]我在 IDA 工程人员的一个宿舍里发现了一张钥匙卡.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]看来我终于可以访问那个控制台了.[-][/c]

English: Return to the Port-side of the Titan's Engineering section and insert the Keycard into the Engineering Console on the upper floor.
Chinese (simplified): 回到巨舰泰坦左舷上层甲板并插入钥匙卡以访问的工程控制台

English: [c][4dc3ff]According to the reports, the crew of the Titan evacuated from the ship using the transport ships in the Titan's Hangar.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]They [i]could [/i]have a course set in the flight computers on the deck if any are left.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]根据报告，泰坦的船员使用泰坦机库中的运输船从船上撤离.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]他们[i]可以[ /i]如果有的话，在甲板上的飞行计算机中设置一个目的地.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Marking the hangar section of the M.S Titan on your display.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It's unlikely that anyone would have filed a flight plan while the ship was under fire, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]在显示器上标记 M.S Titan 的机库部分.[-][/c] \n[c][00ffee]舰长，在舰船受到攻击时，不太可能有人提交飞行计划.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]Noted, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]We won't know until we look.[-][/c]
Enter the M.S Titan's middle section
[c][4dc3ff]Okay, i've reached the hangar section of the Titan.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]There doesn't appear to be any transports or wreckage of them, so I guess they managed to escape.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]好的，我已经到了泰坦的机库部分.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]似乎没有任何运输工具或它们的残骸，所以我 猜猜他们设法逃脱了.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]I'm seeing a couple of consoles in here that could still work. They all appear to be quite badly damaged though. I'll have to check them all.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]我在这里看到几个仍然可以工作的控制台. 不过，它们似乎都被严重损坏了. 我得把它们都检查一遍.[-][/c]

English: Find and Activate a console in the Hangar
Chinese (simplified): 找到并启动机库中的控制台

English: Find and activate one of the damaged consoles in the M.S Titan's hangar.\nIt's likely that none of the consoles here have reserve power or a connection for your suit. You may need to bring an external power source.
Chinese (simplified): 找到并启动机库中其中一个控制台.\n这里的控制可能既没有备用能量也无法直接连接你的护甲. 你可能需要使用能源（比如从燃料箱中取出的燃料包）.

English: [c][4dc3ff]Alright IDA... I'm heading to the rear section now.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]That section's where the bridge and computer core were housed, so it [i]should[/i] have recordings of the battle that left the Titan here.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]If we check the recordings, it should show what happened to the rest of the fleet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]好的，IDA...我现在要去后面的部分.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]那个部分是安装桥和计算机核心的地方，所以它[ i]应该[/i]有关于离开泰坦的战斗的录音.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]如果我们检查录音，它应该会显示其余舰队发生了什么 .[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]What can you tell me about the [-][/c][c][6bd600]Kronos[-][/c][c][4dc3ff], IDA?[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Considering it's size and importance, it sounds like it should've been the flagship of the fleet, not the Titan.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]你能告诉我关于[-][/c][c][6bd600]Kronos[-][/c][c][4dc3ff]的什么，IDA？[-][/c] \n[c][4dc3ff]考虑到它的大小和重要性，听起来它应该是舰队的旗舰，而不是泰坦.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Measuring 343 meters in length the Kronos acts as the command center for the fleet.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]However, its sheer size and mass made it impossible to mount the Warp Field Generator, which was better suited to the smaller M.S Titan.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Kronos 长 343 米，是舰队的指挥中心.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]但是，它的庞大尺寸和质量使得它无法安装较小的 M.S Titan 的翘曲力场发生器.[-][/c]

English: Reach the Rear Section of the Titan
Enter the remains of the M.S Titan's rear section.
Chinese (simplified): 进入泰坦后段剩下的部分

English: [c][4dc3ff]Okay, I've reached the Aft section of the ship. I'm gonna head in and see if I can find any active consoles, raid some lockers, dig through the trash... you know? The usual.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]好的，我已经到了船尾. 我要进去看看能不能找到任何活跃的控制台，搜刮一些储物柜，挖掘一点垃圾......你知道的，就像平常那样.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Yes, Commander. I [i]did [/i]notice you rummaging through Sergeant Palant's pockets back at the Heidelberg.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I recommend searching for the Server Console. It should be located above the generator room. There's nothing for you to steal there that isn't bolted down.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]是的，指挥官. 我 [i] 确实 [/i] 注意到您在海德堡的 Palant 中士的口袋里翻找.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]我建议搜索服务器控制台. 它应位于发电机房上方. 没有任何东西可以让你偷窃.[-][/c]

English: Search the ship for the Server Room
Chinese (simplified): 在飞船里寻找服务器机房

English: According to IDA, the Server Room on the titan is located above the Port Generator Room.\nShe also disapproves of you stealing from the dead, so try to lay off taking [i]everything [/i]off the Titan's wreck.
Chinese (simplified): 根据 IDA的描述, 服务器机房位于左舷发电机室的上方.\n她同时也反对偷窃逝者的物品, 所以最好不要把泰坦残骸上的 [i]所有东西 [/i]所有东西都拆走

English: [c][4dc3ff]I've found the console.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Looks like it's already got a keycard card in it and the reserve power indicator is lit up.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]我找到了控制台.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]里面好像已经有钥匙卡了，备用电源指示灯亮了.[-][/c]
启动服务器控制计算机

English: [c][4dc3ff]Bridge systems usually require two-factor authentication.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]I should be able to use the server keycard and the Tech's keycard to access the bridge computers when I get up there.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]舰桥系统通常需要双因素身份验证.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]我应该能够使用服务器密钥卡和技术密钥卡来访问舰桥计算机.[-][/c]

English: Reach the elevator up to the bridge
[c][4dc3ff]Found the elevator up, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Heading to the bridge now.[-][/c]
The Titan's bridge computer is completely fried. It'll require some replacement parts to get it up and running.
Chinese (simplified): 泰坦舰桥的电脑几乎坏透了，需要一些替换零件来让它重新工作

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, the zirax have deployed several Mechanoids and a squadron of troops from transport ships.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I have also detected the launching of bombers from the Drone Base on the other side of the planet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]指挥官，兹瑞克斯部署了多个机械人和一架运兵船的士兵.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]同时我还检测到星球另一侧的无人机基地有轰炸机出动.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]I've taken out the bombers, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]It didn't seem like they were [i]actually [/i]trying to destroy the Titan.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]我已经消灭了轰炸机，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]看起来他们[i]实际上并没有[/i]试图摧毁 泰坦.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]I believe you may be right, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]The connection with the Titan's bridge system was interrupted while you were engaging the enemy.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]It's likely that accessing the Titan's systems were their true goal and the attack was a diversion.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]我相信你可能是对的，指挥官.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]当你与敌人交战时，与泰坦的舰桥系统的连接被中断了.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]访问泰坦的系统很可能是他们的真正目标，攻击你只是为了分散注意力.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]Did you at least manage to download the fleet logs before you were disconnected?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]在断开连接之前，你是否至少设法下载了舰队日志？[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I'm afraid not, Commander.\nThe files were loaded onto a physical drive and wiped from the Titan's databanks. They will not be able to transmit them in their encrypted state.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]恐怕没有，指挥官.\n文件已加载到物理驱动器上并从泰坦的数据库移除. 无法在加密状态下传输它们.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]So not only have we lost our lead on the Fleet's heading, the information has fallen into the enemy's hands.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]We couldn't have screwed this up better...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]所以我们不仅失去了追踪舰队航向的领先优势，而且信息也落入了敌人的手中.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]我们不可能搞的更砸了...[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]The files are heavily encrypted and will take time for the Zirax to make use of them.\nWe still have a chance to retrieve them before they're decrypted and transmitted. By which point it will be too late.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]文件被高度加密，兹瑞克斯需要一些时间才能使用它们.\n 我们仍然有机会在它们被解密和传输之前检索它们.此时还为时不晚.[-][/c]

English: [c][4dc3ff]The safety of the fleet lies in our hands, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]Let's not screw it up this time...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][4dc3ff]舰队的安全掌握在我们手中，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][4dc3ff]这次我们不要搞砸了...[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][00ffff]Chapter 6: Hostile Apparatus[-][/c][/b]

The plan to retrieve the secure logs of the Crashed Titan failed when a zirax stealth team invaded the wreckage under the guise of an attack.
Now with the precious data that could lead to the location of the UCH Fleet's survivors in the hands of the enemy, the only hope left is to invade the Radar Station and steal back the data before they can decrypt it.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][00ffff]章节6：敌对机器[-][/c][/b]

从泰坦上回收安全日志的计划在兹瑞克斯隐秘部队的进攻下失败了.
现在指向UCH舰队的唯一珍贵数据落入了敌人的手中, 现在唯一的希望就是攻入雷达站并在他们解密之前夺回数据.

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Chapter 6: Hostile Apparatus[/b][-][/c]

The UCH fleet was badly routed by the Zirax fleet over the planet, but what became of the rest of the fleet. Where did it fall and who holds dominance over the dead?

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]
[u][b]STORYLINE[/b][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]Prologue: Journey into the Unknown[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 1: Human Debris[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 2: A Forest of Stars[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 3: Industrial Concern[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 4: The Cruel Stars[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 5: Offworld Grave[-][/c]
[c][00ffff]Chapter 6: Hostile Apparatus[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]章节6：敌对机器[/b][-][/c]

UCH舰队的航向遭到了兹瑞克斯舰队的严重干扰，成为了现在的残骸. 它落在了哪里?又是谁造成了坠毁?

[c][c0c0c0]* * * [-][/c]
[u][b]主线[/b][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]序章: 通向未知的旅程[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节1: 人类残迹[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节2: 繁星之森[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节3: 工业考量[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节4: 残酷之星[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节5: 世外坟墓[-][/c]
[c][00ffff]章节6: 敌对机器[-][/c]

English: [c][7dbff2]Can you track the zirax team that stole the data from the Titan, IDA?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][7dbff2]你能追踪从 IDA 窃取泰坦数据的兹瑞克斯小队吗？[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have tracked their transmissions towards a large, ornate radar complex not far from your position.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It is also the only facility on the moon capable of decrypting and transmitting the data from the Titan.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我已经追踪到他们向离你所在位置不远的一个大型雷达综合体传输的信息.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]它也是月球上唯一能够解密和传输泰坦数据的设施.[-][/c]

English: [c][7dbff2]What can you tell me about this Radar Station and how long do you think it will take them to crack the encryption?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][7dbff2]关于这个雷达站你能告诉我什么，你认为他们需要多长时间才能破解加密？[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]The facility has no external defenses, but is surrounded by a number of standalone [-][/c][c][ff0000]defense towers[-][/c][c][00ffee] designed for anti-air combat, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I am unable to estimate the strength of the zirax's computer systems, so it could be an hour or a month for them to decrypt the Titan Data.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]这个设施自身并没有防御, 但是附近被几个独立的对空 [-][/c][c][ff0000]防御塔[-][/c][c][00ffee]所环绕, 指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]我无法估算兹瑞克斯主机的算力, 所以他们解密数据的时间极有可能只有一个小时，也有可能长达一个月.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]The station itself appears to be well fortified. However, Satellite imagery from the Polaris archives indicates a great deal of traffic to an outlying com relay.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It may contain an alternative entrance to the facility, but you may not be able to return.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]尽管站点本身被保护的很好 然而, 极星的卫星照片显示位于防御圈外围的通讯站Comm Station有大量的交通出入.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]那里也许有进入的捷径, 但是你也许无法返回.[-][/c]

English: [c][7dbff2]Understood, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][7dbff2]I'll keep that in mind if I can't bust in through the front entrance.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][7dbff2]明白了，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][7dbff2]如果我不能从正门闯进来，我会记住这一点的.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Plotting a course to the Radar Station Complex now. Good luck Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]现在正在规划前往雷达站综合体的路线. 祝指挥官好运.[-][/c]

English: Approach within 500 meters of the Radar Station

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, I have detected [-][/c][c][ff0000]EMP Emitters[-][/c][c][00ffee] mounted on the Radar Station.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]They will pose no harm to your vessel, but will interfere with the operation of [-][/c][c][ff0000]Shields[-][/c][c][00ffee] and [-][/c][c][ff0000]Thrusters[-][/c][c][00ffee] if caught in the shockwave.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]指挥官，我检测到[-][/c][c][ff0000]EMP 发射器[-][/c][c][00ffee] 安装在雷达站上.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]它们不会对您的船只造成伤害，但[-][/c][c][00ffee] 如果陷入冲击波会干扰[-][/c][c][ff0000]护盾[-][/c][c][00ffee]和[-][/c][c][ff0000]推进器[-][/c]的操作.

English: Enter the radar station and stand on the ground floor.\nYou could enter the building from the front door or via the com array.
Chinese (simplified): 进入雷达站并到达一层.\n你可以从正门直接进入或是从通讯站Comm Station进入.

English: [c][2eafff]Alright, IDA. I'm in.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Any idea where I should look?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]好的，IDA. 我在.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]知道我应该去哪里找吗？[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I do not know, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]If you can find a floorplan of the facility or a console I will be able to direct you to where they're decrypting the data.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]不知道，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]如果你能找到设施或控制台的平面图，我将能够引导你到他们解密数据的地方.[-][/c]

English: Find the floorplan of the Radar Station
Chinese (simplified): 找到雷达站的楼层平面图

English: Search the consoles on the ground floor for a terminal that shows you the floorplan of the Radar Station Complex.
Chinese (simplified): 在一层找到可以显示雷达站楼层平面图的控制台

English:
[b][u][c][ff0000]Xenu Radar Station Complex YK37.1/B[-][/c][/u][/b]
Currently displaying floorplan of Radar Station Complex.
Your clearance is [ [c][ffee00]VISITOR[-][/c] ]
[c][ff5c5c]You are not allowed to view classified data, logs, recordings of security footage.[-][/c]

[c][00ffee]If you would like to upload this floorplan to an external device, please enable uploading in your browser settings.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][u][c][ff0000]Xenu 雷达站综合体 YK37.1/B[-][/c][/u][/b]
当前显示雷达站综合体的平面图.
您的权限是 [ [c][ffee00]访客[-][/c] ]
[c][ff5c5c]不允许查看机密数据、日志、安全录像记录.[-][/c]

 [c][00ffee]如果您想将此平面图上传到外部设备，请在浏览器设置中启用上传.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Alright, i've found a floorplan on this console.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I've uploaded it to you through my suit, IDA.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]好的，我在这个控制台上找到了平面图.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我已经通过我的套装上传给你了，IDA.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]From the floorplan, I estimate that the Zirax are likely conducting the decryption in the [-][/c][c][ff0000]basement levels[-][/c][c][00ffee] of the station.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]The lower levels are heavily populated with the station personnel.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]从平面图来看，我估计兹瑞克斯很可能在 [-][/c][c][ff0000]地下[-][/c][c][00ffee].有着[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]大量的的人员流动.[-][/c]

English: Follow the waypoint to the basement level
Chinese (simplified): 在地下一层跟随路径点

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Beyond this door is a large room used for religious rites by the facility personnel.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]The base's facilities are through the medbay on the left side of the room.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]这扇门外是设施人员用来举行宗教仪式的大房间.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]基地的设施通过房间左侧的医疗仓.[-][/c]

English: Reach the Radar Station's Medical facilities on the other side of the shrine room.
Chinese (simplified): 到达雷达站神庙房间另一侧的医疗设施

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Following the corridors from the medbay you will pass through the [-][/c][c][ffffff]generator room[-][/c][c][00ffee] and [-][/c][c][ffffff]armory[-][/c][c][00ffee] before reaching the [-][/c][c][ff0000]Primary Control Board[-][/c][c][00ffee] on the far edge of the facility.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]从医疗室沿着走廊你会经过[-][/c][c][ffffff]发电机房[-][/c][c][00ffee]和[-][/c][c][ffffff]武器库[-][/c][c][00ffee]到达之前 [-][/c][c][ff0000]主控制板[-][/c][c][00ffee] 位于设施的远端.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]The [-][/c][c][ff0000]Primary Control Board[-][/c][c][00ffee] is the only computer system in the entire Radar Station that is capable of handling the decryption of the Titan Data.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I have added its location to your HUD, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee][-][/c][c][ff0000]主控板[-][/c][c][00ffee]是整个雷达站中唯一能够处理泰坦数据解密的计算机系统.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]我会将其位置添加到您的 HUD 中，指挥官.[-][/c]

English: The [c][ff0000]Primary Control Board[-][/c] is the only computer in the Radar Station capable of handling the decryption of the Titan data and it's located at the far end of the station's basement level.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000]主控面板[-][/c] 是雷达站唯一有能力解密泰坦数据的计算机，位于站点地下室的最深处

English: [c][2eafff]There's nothing here, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]They must've taken the data somewhere else![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]这里什么都没有，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]他们一定是把数据带到别处了！[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]There's nowhere else on this facility that can handle the Titan Data and no ships have left the Radar station.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It [i]must[/i] be there, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]这个设施上没有其他地方可以处理泰坦数据，也没有船只离开雷达通讯站.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]它[i]一定[/i]在那里，指挥官.[-][/c]

English: Check the primary control board for hints of where the Titan Data was taken after it was brought to the Radar Station. It [i]must [/i]be somewhere on the station.
Chinese (simplified): 检查主控面板以寻找泰坦数据在运到雷达站之后的下落， 它 [i]一定 [/i]在站里某处

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Before you leave the room, Commander. You'll need to pull that lever to activate the Teleporter link to the Xenu Mainframe.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]The access code to disable the lock is 5018.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]在你离开房间之前，指挥官. 您需要拉动那个控制杆来激活与 Xenu 主机的 Teleporter 链接.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]禁用锁的访问代码是 5018.[-][/c]

English: Pull the lever in the Primary Control Room to activate the Teleporter to the Xenu Mainframe.
Chinese (simplified): 拉下主控室的拉杆以启动去往泽纽电脑主机的传送器.

English: [c][2eafff]Okay, I've pulled the lever.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Can you add a location marker to my HUD, IDA?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]好的，我已经拉动了控制杆.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]你能在我的 HUD 中添加一个位置标记吗，IDA？[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, a team of zirax troopers lead by [-][/c][c][ff0000]Elite Zirax Commandos[-][/c][c][00ffee] are approaching from the rear and are setting up an ambush[-][/c][c][00ffee].[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Exercise extreme caution.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]指挥官，由 [-][/c][c] 领导的一队特种部队[ff0000]精英[-][/c][c][00ffee] 正在从后方逼近并设置伏击[-][/c][c][00ffee].[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]谨慎行事.[-][/c]

English: A team of zirax lead by Elite Zirax Commandos have reinforced the cleared corridors behind and have set up an ambush in the temple room in order to cut you off.\nElite Zirax are equipped with top-of-the-line weapons, superior tactics and advanced armor and jetpack.
Chinese (simplified): 一队精英兹瑞克斯特种部队已经占领了先前清空的走廊和神庙并准备好对你进行伏击\n精英兹瑞克斯拥有强大的武器护甲以及战术

English: [c][2eafff]I've cleared the ambush, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]They're definitely trying to keep me out of that wing, so the mainframe must be where they've taken the Titan Data.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我已经清除了伏击，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]他们肯定是想把我挡在那个地方之外，所以那里肯定有他们获取了的泰坦数据.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]It is likely that the enemy presence in this wing will be even higher, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]这一侧的建筑遇到敌人的可能性会更高，指挥官.[-][/c]

English: Reach the Uplink Control Room. It's located at the end of the Transmission Wing.
Chinese (simplified): 到达上行链接控制间，位于发信室的最深处

English: [c][2eafff]I've reached the Uplink Control Room, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Are these teleporters... safe?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我已经到达上行控制室，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]这些传送器……安全吗？[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I understand the science behind it.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It's not [i]un[/i]safe, Commander. But I wouldn't recommend excessive use.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我了解它背后的原理.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]这[i]不会[/i]不安全，指挥官. 但我不建议过度使用.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]The door to the Teleporter is shut.\nThere must be a switch somewhere here room to open it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]传送器的门是关着的.\n这里一定有一个开关可以打开它.[-][/c]

English: Activate the mainframe teleporter and reach the Xenu Mainframe
Chinese (simplified): 启动传送器以到达泽纽电脑主机

English: [c][2eafff]IDA, i've made it to the Xenu Mainframe.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Are you still receiving my transmissions?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]IDA，我已经到Xenu设施了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]你还在接收我的传输吗？[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]I am still reading you, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]I have loaded up the floorplan of the Xenu Mainframe and am currently calculating a method to bypass the Security Checkpoint ahead.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]Do not attempt to bypass the checkpoint with force![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]我还在读入，指挥官.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]我已经加载了 Xenu 主机的平面图，目前正在计算绕过安全检查点的方法.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]不要试图强制绕过检查点！[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have found a way to bypass the Security Checkpoint, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Were you to enter the checkpoint at present, the guard would close the door and activate the [-][/c][c][ff0000]Incinerator[-][/c][c][00ffee] that would very quickly kill you.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]指挥官，我找到了避开安检站的方法[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]如果你就这样大摇大摆地走进去，守卫就会关闭大门并启动 [-][/c][c][ff0000]焚尸炉[-][/c][c][00ffee] 在顷刻之间让你灰飞烟灭.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]I hope you've got a way to avoid that, IDA?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I'd rather my goose [i]not [/i]get cooked today.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我希望你有办法避免这种情况，IDA？[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我希望我的鹅 [i]不要在[/i]今天被煮熟了.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]You can access the ventilation in the [-][/c][c][6bd600]Maintenance Shaft[-][/c][c][00ffee] behind you that leads to a [-][/c][c][6bd600]Circuit Breaker[-][/c][c][00ffee] that controls the power to the windows to the observation room.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]你可以通过你身后 [-][/c][c][6bd600]维修间[-][/c][c][00ffee]进入通风系统，在那里你可以找到一个[-][/c][c][6bd600]断路器[-][/c][c][00ffee] ，这个断路器控制着观察窗的开关.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]With the windows obscured the zirax will need to make a visual inspection, which will require them to disable the Security Checkpoint and authorize you personally.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]由于窗户被遮挡，兹瑞克斯需要进行目视检查，这将要求他们 禁用安全检查点并亲自授权您.[-][/c]

English: Enter the Maintenance Shaft, Remove the Vent above the door and enter the Ventilation system.\nOnce in the Ventilation, find and pull the circuit breaker that controls power to the shutter windows of the observation room.\nWith the windows blocked, the guards will be unable to confirm your identity visually and need to open the door on the security checkpoint to conduct the check personally.
Chinese (simplified): 进入维护隔间, 移除通风版并进入通风系统.\n一旦你进入了通风系统, 找到并拉下控制观测窗卷帘门的断路器.\n一旦窗户关上了, 首位就没有办法目视确认你的身份从而必须打开大门让你进去接受检查 .

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I am detecting transmissions from the observation room, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]They do not appear to be happy transmissions. So I would surmise that our ploy was successful.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我正在检测来自观察室的传输，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]他们的传输内容似乎并不愉快. 所以我推测我们的策略成功了.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]It should now be safe to pass through the security checkpoint and engage the security personnel in the control room.[-][/c]

[c][00ffee]You will then have access to the rest of the Mainframe.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]现在应该可以安全地通过安全检查站并让安全人员参与控制 房间.[-][/c]

[c][00ffee]然后您将可以访问主机的其余部分.[-][/c]

English: Pass through the Security Checkpoint and eliminate the Control Room security personnel.
Chinese (simplified): 穿过安检站并消灭控制室内的守卫

English: [b][c][2eafff][ Zirax Guard ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00]Hey! Who's in the Incinerator?[-][/c]\n[c][ffee00]The system is down [i]again[/i], so i'll need you to approach the Com Terminal and read me your credentials, before I can buzz you through.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][2eafff][ Zirax Guard ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00]喂! 是谁在焚化炉里面?[-][/c]\n[c][ffee00]这破系统[i]又[/i]宕机了，所以说现在我需要你到通讯终端这边来把你的口令读给我听，好让我放你进来.[-][/c]

English: Kill Karlack the control room guard and clear the control room of any enemies
Chinese (simplified): 击毙控制室守卫Karlack并清扫控制室内的一切敌人

English: [b][c][ffee00][ Control Room Console ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Hey! What's going on in there?! Karlach?[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Answer the call, Karlack![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ 控制室控制台 ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]喂! 里面怎么了?! Karlach?[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Karlack，听到请回答![-][/c]

English: Someone is calling the console in the Control Room. Go and answer the call.
Chinese (simplified): 有人在给控制室打电话，去接一下

English: [b][c][ffee00][ Xenu Mainframe PA System ][-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][00ffee]Attention all personnel! We have an intruder in the Security Control Room![-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][00ffee]Access to the lower floors is locked! All security forces are to engage the intruder![-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ 泽纽主机扩音系统 ][-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][00ffee]全体人员请注意! 我们在控制室发现了一名入侵者![-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][00ffee]通往楼下的通道已封锁! 所有安保部队，准备迎击入侵者![-][/c][/b]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]There should be a way to disable the locks to the living quarters and lower level through the Storage Bay, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]你应该有办法解除生活区的锁定并通过生活区进入下层, 指挥官.[-][/c]

English: There's apparently a way to shut off the power to the locks on the doors to the lower level somewhere in the Storage Bay.
Chinese (simplified): 储存间里有一条非常明显的通往控制锁定系统电源的道路

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]According to the floorplan I have of the first floor of the Mainframe, there is a maintenance shaft to access the facility's Generator Room from the Storage Bay.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]From there you will be able to trigger the fire alarm and force the unlocking of all doors on this level.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]根据我已有的主机一楼平面图来看储物间里有一条通往发电机房的维修通道.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]你可以在那里触发火警从而强制解锁所有楼层的封锁.[-][/c]

English: The Generator Room can be accessed through a maintenance shaft in the Storage Bay.
Chinese (simplified): 发电机房可以从储物间的一条维护通道进入

English: [c][2eafff]I've found the Generator Room, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It's hot in here, I'll need to get into the system files and out quickly if I don't want to end up roasted.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我找到发电机房了, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]这里太热了，如果我不想被烤熟最好快进快出.[-][/c]

English: Access the console and activate the fire alarm on the first floor of the Xenu Mainframe to disengage the locks on the doors to the lower levels.
Chinese (simplified): 访问控制台并启动这层的火警从而解锁通向下层的大门

English: [b][c][ffee00][ Xenu Mainframe PA System ][-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][00ffee]Attention all personnel! A fire has been detected in the [-][/c][c][ffffff][Living Quarters][-][/c][c][00ffee]![-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee][b]All security doors have been disabled. Please Evacuate to the Radar Station.[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ 泽纽主机扩音系统 ][-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][00ffee]全体人员请注意! 我们在 [-][/c][c][ffffff][生活区][-][/c][c][00ffee]检测到了火警![-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee][b]所有安全门都已下线. 请撤退至雷达站.[/b][-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]The Living Quarters and the stairs to the lower level are no longer locked down, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Troops have left the mainframe level and have taken up positions on the ground floor.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]生活区合同往楼下的楼梯都已经解除锁定了，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]士兵已经离开了主机楼层并进驻了一层.[-][/c]

English: The door to the living quarters has been unlocked by the fire alarm. You can now enter the living quarters and access the basement level.
Chinese (simplified): 火警解锁了通向生活区的门，你现在可以通过那里前往地下室

English: [c][84bce6]I've reached the mainframe's living quarters, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][84bce6]Can you tell me what to expect below?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][84bce6]我已经到达了主机的生活区，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][84bce6]能告诉我楼下会遇到什么吗?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I am sorry, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I have no data of the lower floor and the walls are shielded against electronic intrusion so I am also unable to intercept any enemy transmissions.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]抱歉，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]由于楼下的墙面全部都做了屏蔽，我无法进行电子入侵，而且也无法拦截到任何敌方通信.[-][/c]

English: The mainframe level is shielded so IDA cannot provide tactical support down there.
Chinese (simplified): 主机层有完善的屏蔽因此IDA无法在那里提供任何协助

English: [c][84bce6]I've reached the Mainframe Level, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][84bce6]Looks like this'll be the last transmission from me until I come back out of the shielded section.[-][/c]\n[c][84bce6]Keep an eye out for me.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][84bce6]我到达了主机层，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][84bce6]看起来在我从屏蔽区出来之前这是我最后一条通讯了.[-][/c]\n[c][84bce6]帮我盯着点楼上.[-][/c]

English: This corridor of systems has to go somewhere. At the end will surely be the heart of the mainframe.
Chinese (simplified): 这个走廊一定通向什么地方，最里面肯定就是主机的核心所在

English: [c][84bce6]Damn, the doors are locked.[-][/c]\n[c][84bce6]There's gotta be another way past that Blast Door.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][84bce6]见鬼，这里的门还锁着.[-][/c]\n[c][84bce6]肯定有什么办法可以通过那道防爆门.[-][/c]

English: This door connects to the turbines that cool the mainframe's systems. If I overload them, maybe I can force the blast door to open.
Chinese (simplified): 这扇门被连接到了用于冷却主机的涡轮上，如果让他们过载，也许可以强行打开

English: [c][84bce6]Not quite what I expected, but since i'm through... i'll take it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][84bce6]虽然说和我想的不太一样，但是这样也能过...也不是不行.[-][/c]

English: With the cooling towers overloaded, they've allowed access to the Mainframe Central Computer.\nIn this secure clean room is the Decryption Terminal being used to decrypt the Titan Data so that it can be transmitted to the Zirax High Command.
Chinese (simplified): 随着散热系统过载，中央计算机的访问也开放了.\n这个安全超净室中存放着用于解密泰坦数据并上传给兹瑞克斯最高指挥部的终端机

English: [c][84bce6]Bingo! I've found the terminal.[-][/c]\n[c][84bce6]It's still in the middle of decrypting the Titan Data, so the fleet should be safe if I can shut it down.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][84bce6]太棒了! 我找到了终端机.[-][/c]\n[c][84bce6]解密还在进行中, 只要我停止解密舰队就安全了.[-][/c]

English: Access the decryption terminal and cancel the decryption process and remove the Titan Data.
Chinese (simplified): 访问终端以取消解密并抹除数据.

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, I have opened the door to the control system.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]All that's left for you to do is pull the lever.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]指挥官，我打开了通往控制室的门.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]你需要做的就是拉下拉杆.[-][/c]

English: Pull the lever, Commander. End this!
Chinese (simplified): 拉下拉杆，指挥官，结束这一切！

English: [c][ffee00]Internal Partitions Removed! System Intrusion Detected![-][/c]\n[c][ffee00][b]< Initiating System Purge >[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffee00]内部分区已移除! 检测到系统入侵![-][/c]\n[c][ffee00][b]< 开始系统清空作业 >[/b][-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Zirax forces will attempt to retake the Radar Facility and Mainframe soon, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I believe it would be best if you were not there when they arrive.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]兹瑞克斯部队马上就会组织重新拿下雷达站和主机了，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]我认为在他们到达之前你最好离开.[-][/c]

English: Return to the Teleporter and escape to the Radar Station
Chinese (simplified): 回到传送器并逃离雷达站

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]There seems to be a problem, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]I can't seem to find any more of the Main Story Missions within the scope of the game! It seems the developer is still working on it.[-][/c]

[b][c][2eafff][ Commander ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]What the hell are they doing?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Oh right, it's just one guy doing [i]everything[/i].[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]So let's give a big thank you to [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]Vermillion[-][/c][c][ffffff], Forgemaster; Builder of POIs; Writer of the Stories; Balancer of Builds and all-round good guy![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]有一个问题，指挥官.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]目前我找不到更多的主线任务了! 看起来作者还在继续开发.[-][/c]

[b][c][2eafff][ 指挥官 ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]啥?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]哦对了, 似乎有个人做了 [i]所有事[/i].[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]让我们一起感谢一下 [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]Vermillion[-][/c][c][ffffff], 兼具重铸大师; POI的建设者; 故事的描绘者; 版本平衡大师于一身强强作者![-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00]Chapter 1: Unlawful Possession[-][/c][/b]

IDA has identified a message hidden within data transmissions from the Polaris Com Relays to Kenex Station from the time that it was under Pirate control.

It seems that a certain individual has left contact information meant for you.
Perhaps it's time we give this so-called pirate a call?
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00]章节1：非法占有[-][/c][/b]

海盗掌控中继站期间，IDA从它和Kenex Station的通讯中识别到了一条加密信息.

看起来有人专门为你留下了联系方式.
也许现在你可以给那个“海盗”回个信?

English:
[b][c][ffee00]Chapter 1: Unlawful Possession[-][/c][/b]

IDA has identified a message hidden within data transmissions from the Polaris Com Relays to Kenex Station from the time that it was under Pirate control.

It seems that a certain individual has left contact information meant for you.
Perhaps it's time we give this so-called pirate a call?

[c][ff0000][b]WARNING[/b]!! The Pirate Story Missions may negatively impact your reputation with Polaris or Traders.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c][b]Note[/b]: Depends on player performance and skill.[-][/c]

[c][c0c0c0]* * *[-][/c]
[u][b][c][ffee00]PIRATE STORYLINE[-][/c][/b][/u]
[c][00ffff]Chapter 1: Unlawful Possession[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 2: Cloak and Dagger[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 3: Inside Job[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 4: Assault and Battery[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 5: Rival Syndicate[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 6: A Debt To Pay[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00]章节1：非法占有[-][/c][/b]

海盗掌控中继站期间，IDA从它和Kenex Station的通讯中识别到了一条加密信息.

看起来有人专门为你留下了联系方式.
也许现在你可以给那个“海盗”回个信?

[c][ff0000][b]警告[/b]!! 海盗任务线可能会降低你与极星的声望.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c][b]注释[/b]: 取决于你的表现和技巧.[-][/c]

[c][c0c0c0]* * *[-][/c]
[u][b][c][ffee00]海盗任务线[-][/c][/b][/u]
[c][00ffff]章节1：非法占有[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节2：斗篷与匕首[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节3：内鬼[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节4：突击与炮台[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节5：宿敌联合会[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节6：债务待还[-][/c]

English: [c][80ffff]Are you sure you want to abort this mission? Please confirm your choice.[-][/c]\n\nYou can start the mission via PDA (F1) at any time.
Chinese (simplified): [c][80ffff]您确定要中止这个任务吗?请确认您的选择.[-][/c]\n\n你可以通过PDA (F1)在任何时候重启任务.

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I've filtered the transmissions from Relay 451 to Kenex Station and found a communications frequency in the final transmission hidden in the metadata.\nI believe it's intended for you.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我从451号中继站发往Kenex Station的通信的元数据中筛选出了一条加密信道.\n我认为应该是找您的.[-][/c]

English:
[c][2eafff]Open a channel, IDA.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]I wanna see who this guy is and what he wants.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff][-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Make sure it's a [i]secure [/i]channel. I don't like eavesdroppers.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][2eafff]打开频道，IDA.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]我倒要看看这人想要点什么.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff][-][/c]
[c][2eafff]记得要 [i]加密 [/i]频到.我可不想有人偷听.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]You're probably right, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff][-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Let's check out Kenex Station's Cargo Bay.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]你也许是对的，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff][-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我们去Kenex Station的货舱看看.[-][/c]

English: Go to Kenex Station's main terminal and cargo bay in the Starting orbit.
Chinese (simplified): 前往位于Kenex Station一楼的总终端和货舱

English:
[c][2eafff]Well, we're here.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff][-][/c]
[c][2eafff]There's a lot of cargo here and I can't go through it all while we're being watched.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Can you find which box we need, IDA?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][2eafff]行，我们到了.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff][-][/c]
[c][2eafff]这里的货物太多了，我不可能众目睽睽之下一个一个翻来看.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]你能找到我要的货箱吗，IDA?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have located several dozen containers that may contain the box that we're after, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I have also found a security log that shows that a suspected pirate was captured by station security.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我找到了几十个可能含有目标包裹的货箱，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]同时我还发现了一条安全日志，有个海盗嫌犯被空间站安保人员扣押了.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]I think we'd have better luck asking Markos' guy than blindly going through the containers one by one.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Can you plot a marker to where they're keeping the prisoner?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]在我真的和傻子一样一个一个箱子找之前，最好还是问一下Markos的人比较好.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]你能标记一下他们关押囚犯的地方吗?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have added the location of the Security Office to your HUD, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It is three floors above you; accessible with the main elevator.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我把安保办公室的位置标示在你的HUD上了，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]就在你上面几层；可以乘坐电梯到达.[-][/c]
到达空间站安保办公室
到达空间站安保办公室

English: [c][2eafff]Yep, that looks like our guy.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I guess i'd better speak to the man in charge first...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]没错，看起来那就是我们要找的人.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我想我应该先和管事的人谈谈...[-][/c]

English: Speak to the Security Officer in charge
Chinese (simplified): 和管事的安保官员对话

English: Speak to the Security Officer and convince him to let you speak to the prisoner
Chinese (simplified): 和管事的安保官员对话并说服他让你和犯人聊几句

English: [c][2eafff]I guess everyone at Polaris will take a bribe if they can get away with it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我猜只要不被发现，极星的人总是会接受贿赂的.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]The Logistics Office that the prisoner mentioned is on the floor below, above the trading floor.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]As a member of Polaris, you already have access to the room.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]那个囚犯提到的物流办公室在楼下，在交易大厅的楼上.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]作为极星的雇员，你可以直接访问那里.[-][/c]

English: The package is in a container several floors down, next to an exterior hatch.
Chinese (simplified): 包裹就在几层楼以下的一个货箱中，放在一个出舱气闸边上.

English: [c][2eafff]I think we may have a problem here.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]There's security everywhere and no way to grab the package without someone seeing me.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我想这就是问题了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]这里到处都是安保人员，我没法在他们眼皮低下拿走包裹.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]IDA, open a channel to Markos.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]There's no way I can grab this package without my reputation being shot with Polaris.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]IDA，开一个联络Markos的频道.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我不可能在和保持和极星关系友好的情况下拿走这个包裹.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Well, it's this little white box.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]As soon as I grab it, all hell will break loose.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Any suggestions IDA?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]行了，这就是那个小白盒了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]一旦我去拿那个盒子，一切都完蛋了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]有什么法子吗IDA?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I'm afraid I can provide no answers for you, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]The system will not allow me to adjust the cargo manifest. So any actions you take will have to involve user error or "dumb luck" as you would put it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我想我无能为力，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]系统不允许我调整货物的可见度，所以你的任何操作除非是瞎猫碰上死耗子，要不然就只有用户错误.[-][/c]

English:
Markos has sent you to obtain a white box from this [b][c][ffffff]Cargo Pallet[-][/c][/b].
If you open the container, Polaris will identify you as a pirate or thief and your reputation with them will be ruined.
The choice is yours...

[b][c][ff0000]WARNING!![-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ff5c5c]Due to a bug in the item detection system, you are required to SKIP this objective after you've obtained the package. If you DON'T have the package when you go to hand it in, you will be killed and your inventory deleted.[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
Markos派你从这个[b][c][ffffff]货物托盘[-][/c][/b]里取回一个小白盒子.
如果你打开这个容器，极星就会将你列为海盗或是窃贼，你和他们的声望也就会了.
选择权在你...

[b][c][ff0000]警告!![-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ff5c5c]由于物品侦测系统的一个bug，在回收包裹后你必须跳过这个任务.如果你在上交任务的时候背包内没有包裹，那么你将会死亡且物品栏也会被删除.[-][/c][/b]
[c][2eafff]我搞到包裹了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]马上就交给你...[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]I'd better get to somewhere safe, where I won't be disturbed or overheard before contacting Markos...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]在联系Markos之前，我最好找个安全的地方，免得有人打扰或者偷听...[-][/c]

English: Manually check this objective to contact Markos and receive further instructions on delivering the package.
Chinese (simplified): 手动勾选联系Markos的目标以获取递送包裹的进一步指示.

English: [c][2eafff]IDA, open a channel to Markos.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It's time to report on the mission's success.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]IDA，开一个联络Markos的频道.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]是时候报告一下任务成功了.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have received the location data from Markos, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]However, I am detecting no energy signatures from the site.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我收到了Markos的位置信息，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]然而，我无法在那个位置探测到任何能量信号.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]They could just be running silent.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Wouldn't be very good pirates if they can't sneak up on their prey, would they?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Let's go say "Hello", IDA.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]也许他们只是在静默航行.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]如果连偷偷接近猎物都做不到也就不配当海盗了，不是吗?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我们过去打个招呼吧，IDA.[-][/c]

English: Markos has sent you the location of his ship.\nYou are to bring the goods retrieved from Polaris holding to his ship.
Chinese (simplified): Markos 给你发了他飞船的位置.\n你应该把从极星取来的货物送到他的船上.

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nThat's my ship you're looking at. Pretty ain't she?\nNow land on the top deck and come up to the bridge.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\n你现在看到的就是我们的船，很美不是吗?\n在舰首甲板降落并前往舰桥.

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nDon't try anything funny, either.\nShe's pretty, but she's also armed and if you do anything wrong i'll be taking back my cargo from your smoldering wreck.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\n别想着整活.\n我的船是很好看，但是她的武装也不是吃素的，如果你做点什么不对劲的事我不介意从你冒烟的残骸里拿回我的货.

English: Land on the top deck as instructed and enter through the Airlock
Chinese (simplified): 按照指示停靠在甲板并进入气闸

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nBring the package to the bridge.
The Red Rogue's First Officer is Vespian.\nYou'll find him on the Bridge outside the Captain's Room.
Chinese (simplified): 红色恶徒的大副是Vespian.\n你可以在舰桥上的舰长房间外找到他.

English: Enter the Captain's Room and speak to... Markos?
Chinese (simplified): 进入舰长室并与Markos... 对话?

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I do not recommend getting involved with pirates, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Consorting with known criminals is against UCH naval code.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我不建议您和海盗走得太近，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]配合现行犯罪者是严重违反UCH海军规定的行为.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Well, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]This isn't really under UCH jurisdiction and it [i]might[/i] just get us closer to our goal if we can get some extra eyes and ears out there in the galaxy.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]这么跟你说吧，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]这里并不属于UCH管辖区域，而且有了更多的耳目，我们[i]很有可能[/i]会更快地达成我们的目标 .[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffffff]Data Package:[-][/c][/b] [b][c][00ffee]CPU Management[-][/c][/b]\nInformation on Reforged CPU Management is being downloaded to your PDA (F1)
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]数据包：[-][/c][/b] [b][c][00ffee]CPU管理[-][/c][/b]\n有关重铸版 CPU管理 的内容已下载到你的PDA (F1)

English: [b][c][ffffff]Package Information:[-][/c][/b]\nThis data package was queued up by [c][ffee00]I.D.A[-][/c] when CPU Extenders or Warp Drives are unlocked in the Tech Tree.\nThese files have been added to your Empyriopedia to better educate you on the nuances of the CPU system and the modular expansion of ship technology to meet your needs.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]数据包信息：[-][/c][/b]\n该数据包是由[c][ffee00]I.D.A[-][/c] 安排在科技树解锁CPU扩展器/翘曲驱动器时显示.\n帝国百科中这些文件的加入可以让你更好的了解到CPU系统和扩展的意义，从而帮助你满足自己的需求.

English: [b][c][ffffff]Data Package:[-][/c][/b] [b][c][00ffee]Shield Combat[-][/c][/b]\nInformation on shields and kinetic resistance is being downloaded to your PDA (F1)
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]数据包：[-][/c][/b] [b][c][00ffee]护盾对抗[-][/c][/b]\n有关重铸版 护盾和动能抗性 的内容已下载到你的PDA (F1)

English: [b][c][ffffff]Package Information:[-][/c][/b]\nThis data package was queued up by [c][ffee00]I.D.A[-][/c] when you unlocked Gatling Cannons in the Tech Tree.\nThese files have been added to your Empyriopedia to better educate you of the effects of kinetic weapons on shields.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]数据包信息：[-][/c][/b]\n该数据包是由[c][ffee00]I.D.A[-][/c] 安排在科技树解锁 加特林机枪 时显示.\n国百科中这些文件的加入可以让你更好的了解动能武器对护盾的效果.

English:
[b][c][ffffff]Shields:[-][/c][/b]
Shields are defensive countermeasures employed by a variety of vessels and structures designed to deflect or absorb the impacts of conventional kinetic weaponry and explosives; reducing their damage to a structure by consuming power and a catalyst (Pentaxid).
While shields will protect from any weapon, they are highly resilient to [c][ffffff]kinetic weapons[-][/c] such as [c][ff5c5c]Miniguns, Cannons, Flak Shells, Rockets, Missiles, Railgun Slugs[-][/c] and [c][ff5c5c]Artillery Shells[-][/c].
Conversely, shields are highly susceptible to damage from [c][ffffff]Energy-based weapons[-][/c] such as [c][6bd600]Lasers, Plasma, Positron Beams, Electromagnetic Pulse Weapons, Antimatter Torpedoes[-][/c] and[c][6bd600] Ion Cannons[-][/c] that will quickly deplete shields under sustained fire.

The majority of Zirax weaponry consists of energy weapons. However, in order to operate in any atmosphere, their weapons possess lower accuracy, speed and lose a great deal of energy in thermal output. This makes their lasers easier to dodge for faster crafts and deal less shield damage than the weapons of Polaris, Kriel or the UCH but more versatile.
