English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]If you fire any heavy weapons at [i]ANY[/i] of the vehicles, you could hit a fuel tank or ammo crate and the entire convoy goes up in a massive explosion.[-][/c]\n[c][ff0000][b]If that happens... it's [u]game over[/u]. That's the end. No more missions.[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]如果你用重武器对[i]任何[/i]一辆车开火，那么无论是命中油箱或是弹药箱都会把这里炸上天.[-][/c]\n[c][ff0000][b]如果发生了那种事... 基本上就是 [u]完蛋了[/u]. 一切结束，不会再有什么任务了.[/b][-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Okay, so no Ships, no big guns and definitely [i]don't[/i] hit the big boxes of explosives: Gotcha![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I'm starting on my approach now. Going dark.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]没问题，所以说不能用飞船，也不能用重武器，当然也[i]绝对不要[/i]打中那几个装满爆炸物的箱子；瞧好了您内![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我要开始潜入了，下线.[-][/c]

English:
The Zirax Convoy has been disabled by land mines placed by Khalad beforehand after scouting the planned route from shipping manifests.
Now, the convoy lies idle while the tracks are being repaired.

The Lead Vehicle is equipped with an [c][ff0000]Imperial Heavy Laser Turret[-][/c]. It is very hard to dodge and will put a hole clean through your ship with each shot.

[c][ff5c5c]The Convoy is carrying fuel and explosives. ANY explosions on [i]any[/i] of the vehicles could trigger the explosives or fuel being carried which will vaporize the entire convoy![-][/c]
[b][c][ff0000]DO NOT SHOOT THE CONVOY!![-][/c][/b]
[c][ffee00]If the convoy is destroyed, you don't get the cargo. The mission fails and you doom the Tal'on on this planet to complete genocide.[-][/c]
[c][6bd600]- If you're playing on a server, the Convoy will regenerate every 60 minutes.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00][b]SKIP[/b]: You can manually skip the attack on the convoy if you've already destroyed the convoy outside the mission.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]However you cannot progress through the mission without handing the Demolition charges to Khalad at the Tank.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
兹瑞克斯车队已经被掌握了他们行踪的Khalad预先布置下的地雷瘫痪了.
现在，它们只能在原地等待修理.

头车上装备了一门 [c][ff0000]帝国重型激光炮[-][/c]. 非常难以躲避而且每一发都可以在你的飞船上开一个洞.

[c][ff5c5c]车队上满载着燃料和炸药. [i]任何[/i] 车辆部件的毁坏都会导致连锁爆炸，直接将整个车队汽化![-][/c]
[b][c][ff0000]不要直接攻击车队!![-][/c][/b]
[c][ffee00]如果车队炸了, 你就拿不到任务物品. 任务因此失败，你也就把泰隆人推向了种族灭绝的结局.[-][/c]
[c][6bd600]- 如果你在服务器上游玩, 车队会每60分钟刷新一次.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00][b]跳过[/b]： 如果你在任务之外就摧毁了车队，可以手动跳过这个任务.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]但是由于你无法将爆破炸药在储水罐交给Khalad，后续任务将无法进行.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]I've reached the center of the formation.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I don't see you, so i'll clear the remaining guards while you regroup.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我已经到达了车队的正中.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]还没看见你，在等你的这段时间我会把守卫的部队清理掉.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I got delayed by a few patrols.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Clear the area and i'll be there in a minute.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]我被巡逻队拖延了.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]把那里清理干净，我马上就到.[-][/c]

English:
Give Khalad a minute to reach the convoy.
He'll be there in a second, but you'll need to make sure the area's secure before he makes his appearance.

[c][ffee00]If Khalad arrives and there are troops, he will move to engage them.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]He CAN be killed, so try to cover him.[-][/c] [c][6bd600]If he dies, he will respawn after a minute.[-][/c]
[c][6bd600][-][/c]
[c][ffff00][b]SKIP[/b][-][/c][c][ffff00]: You can manually skip the attack on the convoy if you've already destroyed the convoy outside the mission.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]However you cannot progress through the mission without handing the Demolition charges to Khalad at the Tank.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
等待Khalad到达车队.
他马上就要到了，但在他出现之前你需要确保这里安全.

[c][ffee00]如果Khalad来的时候附近还有士兵，他会尝试进行攻击.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]他是有可能会被杀掉的，所以进你所能掩护他.[-][/c] [c][6bd600]如果他死了，会在一分钟后福或.[-][/c]
[c][6bd600][-][/c]
[c][ffff00][b]跳过[/b][-][/c][c][ffff00]：如果你在任务之外就摧毁了车队，可以手动跳过这个任务.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]但是由于你无法将爆破炸药在储水罐交给Khalad，后续任务将无法进行.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I'm here, but I can't see you.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]I'm on the inner side of the Communications vehicle.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]我到了，但是没看见你.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]我在通讯车的内侧.[-][/c]

English:
Khalad is currently hiding by the Communications Vehicle on the left side of the convoy.
[c][ff0000]Clear the area before you try to talk to him or you risk being shot.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][-][/c]
[b][c][ffff00]SKIP[-][/c][/b][c][ffff00]: You can manually skip the attack on the convoy if you've already destroyed the convoy outside the mission.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]However you cannot progress through the mission without handing the Demolition charges to Khalad at the Tank.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
Khalad正躲在通讯车位于车队中央的那边.
[c][ff0000]在对话前请确保附近没有敌人.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][-][/c]
[b][c][ffff00]跳过[-][/c][/b][c][ffff00]： 如果你在任务之外就摧毁了车队，可以手动跳过这个任务.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]但是由于你无法将爆破炸药在储水罐交给Khalad，后续任务将无法进行.[-][/c]

English: The Lead Vehicle has a box of explosives on the back.\nKhalad wants at least 6 Demo Charges; you can keep the rest of what's in the box for yourself.
Chinese (simplified): 头车的后方有一个装满炸药的箱子.\nKhalad至少需要6个爆破炸药；箱子里的其他东西可以自己留着.

English: [c][2eafff]Hey, there's a [-][/c][c][ff0000]Zirax Rocket Launcher[-][/c][c][2eafff] in here.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]If that drone comes back, it could be useful...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]嘿，这里面有个 [-][/c][c][ff0000]兹瑞克斯火箭发射器[-][/c][c][2eafff] .[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]如果那个无人机回来了，这东西会很有用...[-][/c]
将6个爆破炸药带给 Khalad

English: [b][c][ff0000]WARNING:[-][/c][/b][c][ffff00] If Khalad has not spawned (Because you blew up the convoy early) then you will need to bring the charges to Khalad at The Tank.[-][/c]\n[c][ffff00]All other subsequent tasks up to reaching the drone base can be skipped manually.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ff0000]警告：[-][/c][/b][c][ffff00]如果Khalad没有生成(毕竟你把车队整个炸了) 那么你就需要把炸药拿到储水罐的Khalad那里.[-][/c]\n[c][ffff00]在到达无人机基地之前的任务都可以手动跳过.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00]Watch out! It's a Drone Gunship![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00]小心! 是无人机炮艇![-][/c]

English:
Drone Gunships are typically used on planets with mountainous terrain and thin atmosphere. They use an array of jet thrusters to maintain altitude while remaining relatively quiet.
Their slow speed is attributed to their heavy armor and large weapons.

[c][ffee00]Keep behind cover and use the Zirax Rocket Launcher you found in the cargo to take it down.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]If you've lost your launcher, there is one in each vehicle.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
无人机炮艇常用于多山或者大气稀薄的星球.它们利用一组喷气推进阵列来保持高度，同时还很安静.
较低的速度换来了厚实的装甲和更大型的武器.

[c][ffee00]躲在掩体后并用兹瑞克斯火箭发射器将其击落.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]如果你不小心丢掉了，每辆车里都有一把.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Let's get out of here, Khalad. Before they send another one![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我们离开这里吧，Khalad. 要不然估计还会有第二架![-][/c]

English:
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]Not yet! I've set the spare charges on the transports.[-][/c]
[c][ffee00]Prime the detonators on [i]these [/i]two and make a run for it[-][/c][c][ffffff]. [-][/c]
[c][ffffff]The explosion should distract anything they send after us for a while.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]还没完! 我把多余的炸药装在车队上了.[-][/c]
[c][ffee00]启动 [i]这两个 [/i]起爆器然后快逃[-][/c][c][ffffff]. [-][/c]
[c][ffffff]爆炸应该能分散追兵的注意力.[-][/c]

English: Pull the lever on both demo charges and then run.
Chinese (simplified): 拉下两个控制炸药的拉杆然后逃离.

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Okay, that should keep them preoccupied for a while.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]We'll make our way to the [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]Drone Base[-][/c][c][ffffff] while they're investigating.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]可以了，这些应该足够拖住他们了.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]在他们调查的这段时间内，我们就可以去[-][/c][c][ff5c5c]无人机基地[-][/c][c][ffffff]了.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I'll move on ahead and use the demo charges to blow open the wall.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]You follow up behind me and clear out the guards and disable the shields.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]我会提前用炸药在墙上开个洞.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]你只需要跟上来清理掉士兵然后关掉护盾即可.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]Those make-shift turrets on the Drone Base can't point down, so [-][/c][c][ffee00]STAY LOW[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Stick to the lowlands and valleys, avoid the heavy patrols and i'll see you around the back side of the Drone Base.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Khalad out.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]无人机基底上那些临时搭建的破塔没有俯角，所以[-][/c][c][ffee00]把身子压低[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]沿着洼地和山谷行进，避开重装巡逻队，我们在无人机基地后方回合.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Khalad通话完毕.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Do you think it's possible to reach the Drone Base on foot, IDA?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I've seen those turrets in action, so I know what they can do to a ship.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]你觉得步行前往无人机基地可行吗，IDA?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]，我见过那些炮塔，也知道它们打船的能耐.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]From the schematics I have determined that the Imperial Laser Turrets[-][/c][c][00ffee] lack a firing depression that would allow them to engage small targets close to the ground.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Khalad's judgment on the matter is correct.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]根据图纸来看我认为帝国激光炮[-][/c][c][00ffee] 缺乏用于攻击小型地面目标的俯角.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Khalad在这件事上的判断是正确的.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]You should be able to get beneath the Base's firing arc on foot or a motorcycle.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I calculate a 46.1% chance of detection and a 33.3% chance of failure.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]你应该可以通过步行或是摩托车进入基地的火力盲区.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]根据我的计算你有 46.1%的可能被发现以及33.3%的可能会失败.[-][/c]

English: Approach the Drone Base to the safe distance of 750 meters and await Khalad's transmission.
Chinese (simplified): 接近至无人机基地的750m安全距离以内并等待Khalad的通信

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I moved on ahead and blew open the wall of the drone base.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]I'm currently pinned down behind some cargo containers while half the base investigate.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]我已经在无人机基地的墙上开了个大洞.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]但是在调查途中我被火力压制在了一堆货箱后面.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]I'll follow you through and deal with the troopers. You stay hidden until I get there.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]See if you can find a terminal and find out what they're up to if possible.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我马上就进来解决那些部队，你再撑一会.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]看看你能不能找到个终端好知道它们到底想干什么.[-][/c]

English: Keep below the range of the Drone Base's weapons.
Chinese (simplified): 避开无人机基地的火力

English: [c][2eafff]I see the breach in the outer wall.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I'll be there in a minute, just hold tight.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我看到墙上的缺口了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]马上就到，一定要撑住啊.[-][/c]

English:
The Demolition Charges used by Khalad are designed to apply tremendous force without the use of conventional incendiary explosives. Making them ideal for use in space and for explosive mining on reactive materials such as Pentaxid which could trigger a fission explosion if detonated.
As such, they are capable of breaking down buildings without impacting a shield.

[b][c][ff0000]Enter the hole in the Drone Base's outer wall[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
Khalad所使用的爆破炸药和一般的铝热炸药不同，主要用来造成高冲击力的爆炸. 这使得它们非常适合在太空中对一些活性矿物进行爆破式开采，比如说非常容易引发链式反应的翘曲水晶.
也正是因为如此，它们才得以无视护盾炸开了墙面.

[b][c][ff0000]从围墙上的洞口进入入无人机基地[-][/c][/b]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I'm safe where I am.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]But you won't be able to take out those sentry guns while the shields are still up.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]我这里还比较安全.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]但是只要护盾还在线，你就没办法干掉那些哨卫机枪.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00][b]Turn left[/b][-][/c][c][ffffff] inside the wall and you'll come to a [-][/c][b][c][ffee00]Capacitor Bank[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff].[-][/c]\n[b][c][ffee00]Pull the lever[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] on them to cut the power to the shields, then it'll all be downhill from there.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00][b]从围墙进入之后左转[/b][-][/c][c][ffffff] 你会看到一个[-][/c][b][c][ffee00]电容器[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff].[-][/c]\n[b][c][ffee00]拉下那上面的拉杆[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff]可以切断护盾的电源，之后的事就好说了.[-][/c]

English: The shields are being fed by a capacitor bank left of the breach.\nPull the lever on the capacitor bank to shut down power to the shield generator and turn it off. Then you'll be free to destroy the sentry guns and spawner pads.
Chinese (simplified): 护盾是由缺口左侧的电容器供能的.\n拉下那上面的拉杆就可以切断护盾的电源供给.之后你就可以随意摧毁生成板垫和哨卫枪了.

English: [c][2eafff]Shields are down![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Time to move in and take the base. I'll head for the control room.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]护盾被关闭了![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]是时候拿下这座基地了，我马上就去控制室.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I'll take care of these turrets and meet you up there.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff][i]Try [/i]to leave some of these bastards for me.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]我把下面的炮塔处理掉就上楼和你会合.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff][i]最好 [/i]给我留几个人头.[-][/c]

English: The Drone Base has 3 upper levels and only 1 underground level.\nUnlike a complete Xenu Drone Base that has 3 underground levels, this drone base is still under construction with many temporary measures included in it that are why it's been so easily to get this far.\n[c][ff0000]The Control Room is located at the top of the tower.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 这个无人机基地地面上有三层，地下只有一层.\nU和标准的有三层地下室的泽纽基地不一样，这个无人机基地很明显还在建设，里面有很多临时的设施，这也是为什么我们可以如此轻易地打进来.\n[c][ff0000]控制室在指挥塔的顶层.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]I've reached the Control Room. Engaging hostiles.[-][/c]
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Take care of the stragglers and activate the elevator. I'll catch up with you in a second.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]解决完残兵败将之后就启动电梯. 我很快就会跟上.[-][/c]

English: The Elevator is controlled by two levers on opposite sides of the Control Room.\nBoth must be pulled in order to progress.
Chinese (simplified): 电梯由控制室两侧的拉杆控制.\n想要继续就得把两个都拉下来.

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Come over here and take a look at this console.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]你过来看下这个控制台.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Damn you're sneaky...[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I didn't even hear you come up here.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]吓我一跳...[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我都没注意到你上来了.[-][/c]

English: Khalad is in front of the main terminal in front of the Elevator.\n\n[c][ff0000]If Khalad has not appeared, you may need to leave the room.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): Khalad正在电梯正对的终端处.\n\n[c][ff0000]如果Khalad没有出现，你可能需要离开这个房间然后重进.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Before you go, my friend...[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Would you mind stepping up to that window? I have a surprise that you might like.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]在你离开之前，我的朋友...[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]你能去窗户边上看一眼吗? 我给你准备了一个惊喜.[-][/c]

English: Khalad has a surprise for you.
[c][2eafff]How'd you manage [i]that[/i]?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Did you divert all the power to the turrets or something?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]你到底是怎么 [i]that[/i]?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]你是把电力全都导向炮塔了吗?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]While I was waiting for you, I placed a couple of spare Demolition Charges on each of the base's turrets.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]It didn't seem right to just [i]leave [/i]them like that.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]在我等你的这段时间，我顺便给每个炮塔上面装了几个用剩下的炸药.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]如果就这么[i]扔在那不用[/i]未免有些浪费.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]It was a nice surprise.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Very thoughtful of you, Khalad.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]真是个不错的惊喜.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]考虑的挺周到啊，Khalad.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I don't think the zirax will appreciate it though.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Oh well, i'll let you get on with it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]不过兹瑞克斯可能就不会那么感谢你了.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]嘛，这就是你要考虑的了.[-][/c]

English: The Drone Base uses a Retractible Elevator instead of a Gravplated Elevator.\nYou must stand on the Elevator and activate it for it to move.
Chinese (simplified): 无人机基地现在还在用推拉式电梯代替力场电梯.\n你必须站在上面手动激活它(译者注：1.7之后实际上已经换成力场电梯了).

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]You won't believe what i've found.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Pull that door release and come into the [-][/c][c][ffee00]Holding Cells[-][/c][c][ffffff]. [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]Watch your back though, there's still a guard left.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]你绝对不相信我找到了什么.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]拉下那个拉杆把[-][/c][c][ffee00]牢房[-][/c][c][ffffff]的门打开. [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]不过小心背后，里面还有守卫.[-][/c]

English: There is a door release lever next to the door.
Speak to Khalad once the room is secure
[c][ffffff][b]Choose what do to with the prisoners[/b][-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd]Your choices will be finalized when you leave the room.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][b]决定囚犯的处置方式[/b][-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd]离开房间后以确定你的选择.[-][/c]

English: Pull the lever to Torv's cell to free him
Chinese (simplified): 拉下Torv牢房的拉杆以释放他

English: Pull the lever to Geam's Cell to free him.
Chinese (simplified): 拉下Geam牢房的拉杆以释放他

English: Open the door, walk in there and shoot him in the head.
Chinese (simplified): 打开牢门，进去给他头上来一枪.

English: Once you leave the room, your choices are finalized and all subsequent actions will be considered permanent.\nBut still... don't go back and shoot the people after you've saved them. Especially Torv, he's great. He'll only respawn at his clone chamber and he'll be back later in all sorts of stupid jams that needs you to rescue him from in future.
Chinese (simplified): 一旦你离开了这个房间，选择环节就结束了，你的选择也就保存喜来乐.\n不过就算这样... 也不要回去把你救下的人再杀了. 特别是Torv，他真的是个好人. 他会在自己的克隆舱重生，在以后的各种奇奇怪怪的任务中再次出现，你还得再去救他.

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]For what it's worth, I believe you did the right thing.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]无论如何，我都相信你做出了正确的选择.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Let's just finish the mission.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]The system core should be up ahead and once it's destroyed we can leave this place.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]让我们解决这个任务吧.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]系统核心就在前方，摧毁它之后我们就可以离开了.[-][/c]

English: The System Core is the heart of the Drone Base. Once it is disabled, it will no longer be able to launch drones or troop transports.
Chinese (simplified): 系统核心是无人机基地的心脏. 一旦它被摧毁，这里就再也无法派出无人机和运输机了.

English: [c][2eafff]I've located the System Core.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It's only guarded by autonomous defenses. We must've depopulated the entire base.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我已经定位了系统核心.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]里面只有一些自动防御. 我们肯定是把整个基地都血洗了.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]The core is shielded.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]There should be a [-][/c][c][ffee00]core access terminal[-][/c][c][ffffff] in the room that will give you access to the core's systems and let you initiate a [-][/c][c][ff0000]Core Purge[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]核心依然被保护着.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]这个房间里应该会有一个[-][/c][c][ffee00]核心访问终端[-][/c][c][ffffff] ，你可以用它来启动[-][/c][c][ff0000]核心清除进程[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]

English: Inside the System Core Room is a console used to control the core in the event that the Drone Base goes into lockdown and the core is cut off from external inputs to prevent attempts at hacking or modifying data.\nThis console is the only way to access the System Core in this state and is used to either remove the lockdown or to initiate a Core Purge in the event of a takeover by a hostile entity like The Legacy.
Chinese (simplified): 在核心控制室内有一个用于紧要关头对核心进行封锁的端子，切断一切外部连接从而防止骇入或是数据改写 .\n在封锁状态下，这个端子是唯一访问核心的手段，主要用于防止遗留者这样的敌对势力占领整个基地.

English: [c][ffee00][b]< Core Purge Initiated >[/b][-][/c]\n[b][c][ffee00]System Core will Self-Destruct in 10 seconds[-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00][b]Vacate System Core[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffee00][b]< 核心清除进程已启动 >[/b][-][/c]\n[b][c][ffee00]系统核心将在10秒后自毁[-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00][b]清空系统核心室[/b][-][/c]

English: Leave the system core room. The Self-destruct system will activate after leaving the room.\nIf it does not, you will have to auto-complete the task.
Chinese (simplified): 离开核心控制室. 自毁程序会在你离开房间后启动.\n，如果没有启动，你可以手动完成该任务.

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]We are victorious![-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Finally, my people will be free![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]我们胜利了![-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]终于，我的人民自由了![-][/c]

English: [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I will... take care of things here and meet you back at the tank, my friend.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]There is much to do now and many preparations to begin.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]我会把剩下的事处理好，到时候和你在储水罐见面，我的朋友.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]现在要做和要准备的事太多了.[-][/c]

English: Return to the Ruined Water Tank and meet with Khalad.\n\nYou can dismantle the Drone Base. However, if you are playing on a server it is recommended to leave some blocks so that it can regenerate for other players.
Chinese (simplified): 在破旧储水罐与Khalad会面.\n\n你可以拆掉无人机基地.不过如果你在服务器上游玩，我建议留下一部分方块以方便刷新后其他玩家使用.

English: Khalad is on the lowest level of the tank.
[c][2eafff]You know what, IDA?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I think Khalad's going to be alright for now and the future of the Tal'on on this planet is in good hands.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]你知道吗，IDA?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我觉得Khalad暂时不会有什么问题了这颗星球上泰隆人的未来也掌握在了正确的人收中.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I agree, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]That is provided his uncle can find him a suitable companion to keep his attention on village life.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我也这么认为，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]前提是他叔叔能给他找到个合适的伴侣，让他能专注于经营村子.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Give the poor guy a break![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]He's only just become chief. He needs a little time before he gets a shock like that.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]让这个可怜的家伙喘口气吧![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]他刚成为酋长，肯定要花上一段时间来适应如此大的变化.[-][/c]

English:
This marks the final Chapter of the [c][6bd600][b]Tal'on Story Missions[/b][-][/c] (for now)
The next chain of Tal'on Missions will resume with the addition of the Ocean Planet: Ampathos in around v1.7

This story chain was written by [c][ff5c5c]Vermillion[-][/c], CEO of Forge Aerospace, Creator of Reforged Galaxy.
Chinese (simplified):
这标志着 [c][6bd600][b]泰隆剧情任务[/b][-][/c]的结束(目前为止)
下一条泰隆故事线回归时会包括海洋星球: 预计在v1.7之后放出

本剧情任务由[c][ff5c5c]Vermillion[-][/c]为您呈现, 锻造宇航CEO, 重铸星系的创建者.

English:
[c][ffee00][b]Chapter 2: Cloak and Dagger[/b][-][/c]

You've gotten yourself involved with a lone-wolf band of pirates headed by one Markos Vatar. A paranoid and rude sort of guy with a vendetta against Polaris.
There's a big heist in the works and if you can earn their trust, you can get a spot on the team for the big score.

[c][c0c0c0]* * *[-][/c]
[u][c][ffee00][b]PIRATE STORYLINE[/b][-][/c][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 1: Unlawful Possession[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Chapter 2: Cloak and Dagger[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 3: Inside Job[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 4: Assault and Battery[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 5: Rival Syndicate[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 6: A Debt To Pay[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffee00][b]章节2：斗篷与匕首[/b][-][/c]

你和一群以Markos Vatar为首的独狼海盗扯上了关系. 这人既偏执又粗鲁，似乎还和极星有着血海深仇.
你可以在即将到来的劫案中获取他们的信任，从而为了大局在这群海盗中获得一席之地.

[c][c0c0c0]* * *[-][/c]
[u][c][ffee00][b]海盗故事线[/b][-][/c][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]章节1：非法占有[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]章节2：斗篷与匕首[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节3：内鬼[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节4：突击与炮台[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节5：宿敌联合会[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节6：债务待还[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffee00][b]Chapter 2: Cloak and Dagger[/b][-][/c]

You've gotten yourself involved with a lone-wolf band of pirates headed by one Markos Vatar. A paranoid and rude sort of guy with a vendetta against Polaris.
There's a big heist in the works and if you can earn their trust, you can get a spot on the team for the big score.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffee00][b]章节2：斗篷与匕首[/b][-][/c]

你和一群以Markos Vatar为首的独狼海盗扯上了关系. 这人既偏执又粗鲁，似乎还和极星有着血海深仇.
你可以在即将到来的劫案中获取他们的信任，从而为了大局在这群海盗中获得一席之地.

[c][c0c0c0]* * *[-][/c]
[u][c][ffee00][b]海盗故事线[/b][-][/c][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]章节1：非法占有[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]章节2：斗篷与匕首[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节3：内鬼[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节4：突击与炮台[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节5：宿敌联合会[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]章节6：债务待还[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]IDA, can you open a channel to Markos.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I think it's about time we talked about that "other job"[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]IDA，能给我开一个联络Markos的频道吗.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我想是时候谈谈 "另一份工作了"[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, You are already a ranking member of the UCH. You do not need further employment.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I recommend against any additional dealings with criminals.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]指挥官，你已经是有UCH军阶的人了，不需要再就业了.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]我建议不要再参与任何与犯罪相关的事宜.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Noted, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]But these criminals could open the door for us into Pirate information networks and supply lines for the fleet.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]We don't have a lot of leads [i]or [/i]friends out here, so every bit helps.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我知道，IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]但是这些犯罪者可以为我们打开海盗的信息网和供应链.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我们在这里没有多少线索[i]或是[/i]朋友，所以要团结一切可以利用的力量.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I do not agree your choices, Commander. But I do understand them.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Opening a com channel to [-][/c][c][ff0000]The Red Rogue[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我无法赞成你的选择，指挥官，但是我可以理解.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]开启频道至 [-][/c][c][ff0000]红色恶徒[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nWhy are you contacting me [i]now[/i]? I'm a busy many, you know?\nI don't have time to mess with small fry like you.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\n你怎么[i]这个时候[/i]联系我? ，看不出来我很忙吗?\n我没空和你这样的小人物啰嗦.

English: [c][2eafff]That's kinda rude, Markos.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]You said something about a big job, and since you're so busy I figured you could use some help with it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]这未免有点绝情，Markos.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]你之前说过要干票大的，既然你说自己很忙，那我肯定能帮上点忙.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nI did say that, didn't I?\nWhat I [i]didn't [/i]say was that [i]you [/i]could be a part of it though, did I? [i]But [/i]since you're volunteering to go run errands for me, you [i]could [/i]be useful after all.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\n我说了，是吧?\n但是我可同样[i]没说 [/i]， [i]你 [/i]可以参与进来，不是吗? [i]不过呢[/i]既然你诚心诚意的发问了，那也许你还是[i]有 [/i]点用的.

English:
[b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]
Alright... We'll see how you do on this "errand" i've got for you.
Come to the [c][ff0000]Red Rogue[-][/c] and speak to my helmsman, [c][ffee00]Garrison[-][/c] for the details.
Red Rogue Out.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]
好吧... 我们来看看给你的"跑腿任务".
到 [c][ff0000]红色恶徒[-][/c]来和我的舵手谈谈具体计划，他叫[c][ffee00]Garrison[-][/c].
红色恶徒通话完毕.

English:
The Red Rogue is a Charon-Class Freighter stolen from a Polaris impound yard after it's former owners were sentenced to a Debtor's Prison.
Markos refitted the hull and converted it into a smuggling ship with a hired crew and has spent the last few years hitting Polaris shipments with it.

[b][c][ff0000]The Red Rogue is currently located in the Starting Orbit.[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffee00]It is not detectible to radar and scans, you will need to rely on the mission waypoint to find it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
红色恶徒是一艘从极星扣押场偷来的喀戎级护卫舰，它的前任主人被关押在债务监狱中.
Markos将船体改装成了一艘走私船 ，这几年带着他雇来的船员多次袭击了极星船只.

[b][c][ff0000]红色恶徒现在正停在初始星球的轨道之上.[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffee00]雷达无法扫描到它，你必须靠任务标记找到它.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ff0000][ Red Rogue ][-][/c][/b]\n[i][c][bdbdbd]You're cleared to land on the top deck, newbie. Don't break anything.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ff0000][ 红色恶徒 ][-][/c][/b]\n[i][c][bdbdbd]你可以停靠了，新人. 别给我创坏了.[-][/c][/i]

English: [c][00ffee][b][ Helmsman ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Hey there, Newbie! I'm Garrison.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Come on up here to the [-][/c][c][ffee00]bridge [-][/c][c][ffffff]for the deets on your job.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffee][b][ Helmsman ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]你好，新人! 我就是Garrison.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]到 [-][/c][c][ffee00]舰桥 [-][/c][c][ffffff]上来，我给你说说你这次工作的事.[-][/c]

English:
Garrison is the Helmsman of the Red Rogue. Uncharacteristically, he's a friendly and upbeat guy and an excellent pilot.
Unfortunately, he suffers from a warped sense of humor and has a bad habit of playing practical jokes on the crew of the Red Rogue that tend to go overboard.
One of these days, he's going to push Vespian too far and then [i]he's[/i] going to end up overboard.

[c][ff0000]Garrison can be found on the Bridge of the Red Rogue[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
Garrison是Red Rogue的舵手.与他的身份截然不同的是，他是一个友好且乐观的人，而且驾驶技艺十分高超.
U不幸的是, 他的幽默感十分扭曲而且有个坏习惯，经常和船员开一些过火的玩笑.
有一天他把Vespian逼急了，结果[i]差点[/i]就被丢出去.

[c][ff0000]你可以在红色恶徒的舰桥上找到Garrison[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nI'm sure Garrison already told you, but [i]don't screw this up[/i].\nWe need that data or we're dead in the water and it'll be another two months before another shipments comes through.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\n我相信Garrison已经和你说明白了，但是[i]不要搞杂了[/i].\n我们如果没拿到那份数据就要饿肚子了，下一艘船得两个月之后才会来.

English: Kenex Station is one of several dozen virtually identical stations found across the galaxy. It's a major resupplying port for both Civilian and Military crafts.\nThe lower levels are given over to industrial, commercial and entertainment use, while the upper levels function as communication and security for the local division of PolSec.
Chinese (simplified): Kenex Station是星系中十几个几乎一模一样的空间站. 它的主要功能是为了过往的平民和军用飞船提供补给.\n下面的几层主要用于工商业和娱乐，上层则是当地极星安保部队的通信与安全中心.

English: [c][2eafff]Come in Kenex Station.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Polaris number [-][/c][c][ffffff]#8376455466[-][/c][c][2eafff] requesting permission to dock. Over.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]收到请回答，Kenex Station.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]极星工号 [-][/c][c][ffffff]#8376455466[-][/c][c][2eafff] 请求停靠，完毕[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Welcome back #8376455466[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Dock at the assigned back. Over.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ 通讯主管 ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]欢迎回来#8376455466[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]在指定停机坪停靠，完毕.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffffff]Fun Fact:[-][/c][/b] The docking permission sequence is based on the sequence from another alpha game called "Between the Stars" that occurs while approaching any Allied Station.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]热知识：[-][/c][/b]这套请求停靠的流程其实是基于另一款处于Alpha测试阶段的游戏"群星之间"，其中接近同盟空间站的就会触发类似的对话.

English: [c][84bce6][i]The Package should be in one of the Men's Toilets upstairs in the food court.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][84bce6][i]包裹应该就在楼上餐厅的男厕所里.[/i][-][/c]

English: You'll notice that the toilets are being called "Toilets" and not "Bathrooms".\nThat's because there's no bath in there and many toilets.
Chinese (simplified): 你可以注意到这里涌了 "厕所" 而非"洗手间".\n这是因为里面真的有很多厕所，但是没有洗手池.

English: [c][2eafff]Ugh... some fat bastard left a floater![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]No sign of the package though. Could someone have found it?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]呕... 哪个王八蛋在这留了泡大的![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]但是没有包裹. 难道被别人发现了?[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]IDA, Open a channel to the [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]Red Rogue[-][/c][c][2eafff].[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]We have a [i]serious [/i]problem here.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]IDA，开一个联络 [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]红色恶徒[-][/c][c][2eafff]的频道.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我这里出了个[i]大[/i]问题.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have located the contact, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]He is currently in his room on the opposite side of the main hangar and down one floor.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我找到联系人了，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]他现在正在机库对面负一层的房间里.[-][/c]

English: A fence is a slang term for someone who sells stolen goods.\nThis particular fence deals primarily in illegal weaponry and equipment. He is known to purchase broken Experimental Weapons and repair them at great and sell them to collectors for even greater profits.
Chinese (simplified): ”篱笆“是用来指代销赃中间人的俚语.\n这次的中间人主要会卖一些违法的武器和装备. 此人以购买并修理损坏的实验性装备然后再高价卖给收藏家而闻名.

English: [c][2eafff]The package was taken from the Food Court Toilets, so there should be security recordings from outside of everyone that came and left.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]包裹是从餐厅的厕所被拿走的，既然要出来到这里，就肯定会有安全记录.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I'm still hooked into the station's public communications systems, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]The Floor Manager that you've spoken to before should have the recordings for the public areas.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我依然连接着空间站的通讯系统，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]你之前和他聊过的那个楼层经理应该有公共区域的的出入记录.[-][/c]

English: The Floor Manager is the poor guy everyone goes to see when they ask to see the manager. He's overworked, underpaid and under close scrutiny by security to ensure he's not corrupt.\nHe can be found in his office in the main hall, opposite the food court.
Chinese (simplified): 楼层经理就是那个每次被人吵着要见的倒霉鬼.他总是劳累过度，薪资过低同时又要接收安全部门严格的腐败筛查.\n你可以在大厅的办公室里找到它，就在餐厅对面.

English: [c][2eafff]IDA, things have just gone from bad to worse.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Of all the people to find the package, it just happens to be the one person who'll be able to identify what it is.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]IDA，事情现在变得更糟了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]所有能找到包裹的人里面，就他一个会知道包裹里面装的事什么.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]I heard, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]I have already tagged the employee's residence on your display.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]He is scheduled to leave for his lunch break in 4 minutes. You will need to hurry.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]我听说了，指挥官.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]我已经标记了该员工的住所.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]他在4分钟后会去午休. 你得快点了.[-][/c]

English: A member of PolSec's admin staff specializing in hardware analysis has picked up the Decryption Device and taken it to his apartment.\nReach his apartment before he leaves his station for lunch and returns home.
Chinese (simplified): 一名专精于硬件分析的极星安保部队管理员捡到了解密设备并将其带往了自己的公寓.\n在他午休吃完饭回来之前进入他的房间.

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Wait, Commander![-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It seems Administrator Yeven left his post early and has already returned home for his lunch. You are too late.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]等等，指挥官![-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]看上去管理员Yeven 午休时间提前了，他已经回到了套房. 你太迟了.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Is there any way to lure him out long enough to get in there and find the package?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]有什么办法可以把他骗出来好让我们有足够时间进去找到包裹?[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]There is a [-][/c][c][ffffff]docking console[-][/c][c][00ffee] on the underside of the [-][/c][c][ffffff]main landing apron[-][/c][c][00ffee].\nIf you shut down the magnetic locks, it should cause an incident sufficient enough to recall him.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]在[-][/c][c][ffffff]主停靠挡板[-][/c][c][00ffee]的下方有一个 [-][/c][c][ffffff]对接控制台[-][/c][c][00ffee] .\n如果你关闭了磁力锁，应该可以算得上是可以引诱他出来的事件.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Let's go with that plan then.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]If he takes it to security, the entire job will be screwed.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]我们就这么办.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]如果他直接通知安保，整个计划就砸了.[-][/c]

English: Located underneath the Main Landing Apron are a set of consoles used to control the magnetic docking of ships and cargo to the platform.\nBy disabling one of the locks, the cargo on one of the platforms will drift free and collide with the station and incoming crafts.\nAdministrator Yeven will be called back to his post to assess whether it was a hardware failure, software error and intentional sabotage.
Chinese (simplified): 在主停靠挡板的下方可以找到用于控制飞船停靠磁力锁定的控制台.\n如果其中一个锁失效了，平台上的某个货箱就会飘起来，装上来往的飞船或是空间站本身.\n管理员Yeven会被召回他的工位来评估这究竟是由硬件故障，软件错误还是蓄意破坏导致的.

English:
[b][c][ff0000][u]WARNING!![/u][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffae00]You are attempting to shut down the magnetic docking clamps that are used to keep Cargo Containers attached to Cargo Pad 01.[-][/c]
[c][ffae00]This system must only be disabled in the event of injury to Polaris or Civilian personnel trapped between a container and the station's hull.[-][/c]
[c][ffee00]Any other situation is punishable under Station Law 174836001-A[-][/c]

[b][c][ff0000]Do you wish to confirm?[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ff0000][u]警告!![/u][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffae00]你正在尝试关闭用于固定货物仓01的磁力锁.[-][/c]
[c][ffae00]该系统只应在极星或平民被卡在货箱和空间站之间时关闭.[-][/c]
[c][ffee00]任何其他情况都将按照空间站规定 174836001-A处罚[-][/c]

[b][c][ff0000]确认关闭吗?[-][/c][/b]

English:
[c][ffee00][b]< WARNING !! >[/b][-][/c]
[c][ffae00]Damage to Polaris Property detected![-][/c]
[c][ffae00]Untethered objects at Cargo Pad 01.[-][/c]
[c][ffae00]Magnetic Cargo Locks non-responsive.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffee00][b]< 警告!! >[/b][-][/c]
[c][ffae00]检测到极星财产受损![-][/c]
[c][ffae00]货舱 01上有未连接的货物.[-][/c]
[c][ffae00]货物磁力锁无响应.[-][/c]

English: With the cargo loose, Administrator Yeven will be called back to his post to investigate the cause.\nThis will give you the chance to enter his apartment and retrieve the package.
Chinese (simplified): 由于货物的松动，管理员Yeven不得不回到工位上调查此事.\n这给了你进入他的房间取回包裹的机会.

English:
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]It appears to have worked, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Commander Yeven has returned to the Com Deck, leaving his rooms unattended.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]The code to his door is [-][/c][c][ffee00]6563[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]看上去确实有效，指挥官.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]管理员Yeven回到了通讯甲板，房间里现在没人了.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]他房间的访问码是[-][/c][c][ffee00]6563[-][/c]

English: Administrator Yeven brought the package back to his rooms. It should be here somewhere. If it's not... maybe you should try checking the computer.
Chinese (simplified): 管理员Yeven将包裹带回了他的房间，应该就在这里的某个地方. 如果没有... 也许你应该检查一下他的电脑.

English: [c][2eafff]Okay, IDA.\nCan you show me the way to the server room and display on my suit display the... obstacles? This isn't going to be straightforward...[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]好了，IDA.\n你能给我指示一下去服务器机房的路嘛，顺便显示一下...障碍? 这肯定不是什么好办的事...[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have added a waypoint to your Heads-Up Display and included the negative conditions for completion.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]May I remind you that I advised you to avoid taking jobs from pirates.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我已经将路线添加到抬头显示上，同时也包括了负面因素.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]请允许我再提醒您一次，不要从海盗那里接活.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffffff]Reach the Server Room:[-][/c][/b] The Server Room is on the second floor of the control room at the far side of the Food Court.\nIt is heavily guarded with troops ordered to shoot on sight.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]到达服务器机房：[-][/c][/b] 服务器机房位于控制室的二楼，距离餐厅较远的那边.\n那里有重兵把守，只要见到无关人员就格杀勿论.

English: [b][c][ff0000]Avoid Being Seen:[-][/c][/b] Attempting to scale the security wall to access the upper level of the Control Room is the shortest way to the Server Room, but it is in full view of everyone. You will set off ALL the alarms if you do.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ff0000]避免被发现：[-][/c][/b] 用喷气背包转向从控制室楼上的安全墙直接飞进去是最快的，但是所有人都能看到你. 这么做会引起全面警报.

English: [b][c][ffffff]Find a way into the control room[-][/c][/b]

[b][c][ffffff]Find a way into the control room: [-][/c][/b]The main door is locked and guarded. There is probably another entrance somewhere.\nIf there's a code to be known, you can be sure there's a criminal on the station who knows it.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]找到通往控制室的路：[-][/c][/b]大门肯定是锁着的而且还有重兵把守. 也许在其他的某个地方会有个入口.\n如果需要某个密码，你应该记得这空间站里有个犯罪者肯定知道.

English: [c][2eafff]This looks like it accesses the back of the Control Room.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It appears to be locked. Maybe someone knows the code?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]这里看起来可以直达控制室的背面.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]但是它上锁了. 也许有人知道密码?[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Okay, i'm in. I don't see any loose device though.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]They must've slotted it into one of the Station's Servers.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]好了，我进来了，但是我没看到什么可以拔下来的东西.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]它们肯定被插在空间站服务器的某个槽位上了.[-][/c]

English: The Station Servers have the Decryptor plugged into it somewhere. You'll need to pull out each server and search for the device manually.
Chinese (simplified): 解密设备被插在空间站的服务器某个槽位上了. 你必须一个个拔出来确认.

English:
[b][c][2eafff]KNX Server Terminal:[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffee00]Unrecognized device in Rack41-Slot6[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]Unable to read/write file format![/b][-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Please remove device and reconfigure drivers before reinstalling device.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffffff]Eject Rack41?[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][2eafff]KNX 服务器终端:[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffee00]在服务器架41-槽位6发现无法识别的设备[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]无法读写的文件格式![/b][-][/c]
[c][00ffee]请移除设备并在重新安装前确保设备配置正确.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffffff]是否弹出服务器架41?[-][/c][/b]

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I'm concerned that a Hardware Analyst would connect an unknown and potentially harmful device to the station's main computer.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Please don't [i]ever [/i]do that to me, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]看到一个硬件分析师能把用途未知而且可能有害的设备接到自家的主机上，我实在是很担心.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]请[i]永远都不要 [/i]对我这么做，指挥官.[-][/c]

English: [c][2eafff]Okay, I've got the package.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Let's get out of here and back to the [-][/c][c][ffee00]Trading Floor[-][/c][c][2eafff] and contact Garrison.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]行了，我拿到包裹了.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]我们回到 [-][/c][c][ffee00]交易层[-][/c][c][2eafff]然后联系Garrison吧.[-][/c]

English: The Trading Floor is located outside Ok'y Medical.\nDon't be seen while exiting the Control Room.
Chinese (simplified): 交易层就在Ok'y医疗外面.\n离开控制室时不要被发现了.

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have added the civilian [-][/c][c][ffffff]Spaceport's Airlock[-][/c][c][00ffee] to your display, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]There are other exits from the station that are also viable, but these are the closest to the Transceiver.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]我已经将平民空间站的 [-][/c][c][ffffff]气闸[-][/c][c][00ffee] 添加至你的抬头显示，指挥官.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]其他出口也是可用的但是这个最接近收发器.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffffff]Find the Airlock:[-][/c][/b] The Airlock is located at the Civilian Spaceport on either side of the main terminal.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]找到气闸：[-][/c][/b] 空间站主航站楼的两侧都有气闸.

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, you have reached the Airlock.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Once outside, you will be visible to anyone in the station's Operations Room if you rise higher than the white line below the Transceiver.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]指挥官，你已经到达了气闸.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]出去以后，一旦你的高度高于收发器下面的白线，空间站里所有人都会看见你.[-][/c]

English: [b][c][2eafff]Locate the Data Relay:[-][/c][/b] The Data Relay is located beneath the Station's Transceiver above it. It filters and collates data received from incoming and outgoing transmissions before transferring it to the appropriate system.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][2eafff]找到数据中继器：[-][/c][/b] 数据中继器就位于空间站的收发器下方. 用于收集和筛选来往的通信并发送至正确的系统.

English: [c][2eafff]Okay, i've attached the Device. Let's get back to the hangar and head back to the Red Rogue before someone notices anything.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][2eafff]好了，我把设备装上了. 让我们回到机库，在有人发现异常之前前往红色恶徒.[-][/c]

English: [c][ff0000][b]Avoid Detection:[/b][-][/c] Rising above the white lines on the platform below the Transceiver will put you within clear view of the station personnel inside the Operation's Room, which will quite obviously impact your standing with Polaris.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][b]避免被发现[/b][-][/c] 如果你飞行的高度高于收发器下方平台上的白线，控制室里的空间站工作人员将对你一览无余，很明显这将对你的极星声望有一点小小的影响.

English: [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Marking the Red Rogue's last known location on your display, Commander.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]已将红色恶徒最后的已知位置添加到您的显示上，指挥官 .[-][/c]

English:
The Red Rogue is a Charon-Class Freighter stolen from a Polaris impound yard after it's former owners were sentenced to a Debtor's Prison.
Markos refitted the hull and converted it into a smuggling ship with a hired crew and has spent the last few years hitting Polaris shipments with it.

[c][ff0000][b]The Red Rogue is currently located in the Starting Orbit.[/b][-][/c]
[c][ffee00]It is not detectible to radar and scans, you will need to rely on the mission waypoint to find it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
红色恶徒是一艘从极星扣押场偷来的喀戎级护卫舰，它的前任主人被关押在债务监狱中.
Markos将船体改装成了一艘走私船 ，这几年带着他雇来的船员多次袭击了极星船只.

[b][c][ff0000]红色恶徒现在正停在初始星球的轨道之上.[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffee00]雷达无法扫描到它，你必须靠任务标记找到它.[-][/c]

English: [c][ff0000][b][ Red Rogue ][/b][-][/c]\n[i][c][bdbdbd]You're cleared to land on the top deck, newbie. Watch out for the cargo on the pad.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000][b][ 红色恶徒 ][/b][-][/c]\n[i][c][bdbdbd]，你可以在上方甲板停靠了，新人. 小心上面的货物.[-][/c][/i]

English:
Garrison is the Helmsman of the Red Rogue. Uncharacteristically, he's a friendly and upbeat guy and an excellent pilot.
Unfortunately, he suffers from a warped sense of humor and has a bad habit of playing practical jokes on the crew of the Red Rogue that tend to go overboard.
One of these days, he's going to push Vespian too far and then [i]he's[/i] going to end up overboard.

[c][ff0000]Garrison can be found on the Bridge of the Red Rogue[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
Garrison是Red Rogue的舵手.与他的身份截然不同的是，他是一个友好且乐观的人，而且驾驶技艺十分高超.
U不幸的是, 他的幽默感十分扭曲而且有个坏习惯，经常和船员开一些过火的玩笑.
有一天他把Vespian逼急了，结果[i]差点[/i]就被丢出去.

[c][ff0000]你可以在红色恶徒的舰桥上找到Garrison[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nGarrison says you did alright in there, [c][2eafff]Blue[-][/c].\nIf you want in on the job, you're in.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nGarrison说你做的还行, [c][2eafff]小蓝[-][/c].\n如果你想跟我们干，恭喜你入伙了.

English: [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nWe've got some time to kill before the real thing, so you can go back to whatever you were doing and we'll call you is something comes up.\n[c][ff0000]Markos out.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\n在大的要来了之前，我们还有些时间可以消磨，你可以先去干你自己的事，到时候了我自然会通知你.\n[c][ff0000]Markos通话完毕.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ff5c5c]The big heist won't be coming up for a while.[-][/c][/b]

In the meantime, Garrison has some small-time missions for you to tackle that'll bring in some much-needed money, resources and reputation with the other pirates.
I'm sure that when you've completed enough of them, you'll be notified when the big Heist is available.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ff5c5c]大劫案不会那么早开始.[-][/c][/b]

在这段时间里，Garrison给你准备了一些报酬丰厚的小任务, 可以让你获得许多资金，物资以及和其他海盗的声望.
我向你保证一旦你完成了足够多的任务，就可以去参加大劫案了.

English: [c][ffee00][b]Warning!![/b][-][/c]\n[c][ffee00]Zirax have detected the construction of a Capital Vessel and have deployed a pre-emptive strike![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffee00][b]警告!![/b][-][/c]\n[c][ffee00]兹瑞克斯侦测到你在建造主力舰准备先发制人![-][/c]

English: Zirax Interception occurs when the player constructs a CV on the starter planet.
Chinese (simplified): 兹瑞克斯无人机会在玩家在初始星球上建造第一艘主力舰时出现.

English: One Minigun Drone, Rocket Drone and Light Bomber have been deployed to deal with your new ship.
Chinese (simplified): 一架机枪无人机，火箭弹无人机和轻型轰炸机已被派来解决你的新飞船

English:
[b][c][00ffee]To dig up the Antenna:[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]- Place the Survival Multitool into your Toolbar.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- Select the Survival Multitool[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- Press RMB and Select Mining Mode[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- Fire the Survival Tool at the ground to remove it[-][/c]

The Survival Tool consumes no fuel and is average against Sand, Snow and Dirt.
It will suffer severe speed penalties against harder ore deposits in the ground.
[c][6bd600]It is recommended to upgrade to a Mechanical Drill (Unlock in the Tech Tree F3) as soon as possible.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][00ffee]如何挖出天线：[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]- 将生存工具枪置于物品栏中.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- 选中生存工具枪[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- 按下右键选择开采模式(mining mode)[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- 对地面开火以移除地层[-][/c]

生存工具枪不需要消耗电力且对沙子，雪和泥土有中等的挖掘速度.
但是对更深处较为坚硬的矿石/底层有非常高的挖掘速度惩罚.
[c][6bd600]因此十分推荐尽快升级为机械采矿枪 (按下f3在科技树中解锁).[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffffff]To Mine:[-][/c][/b] [c][bdbdbd]Place the Survival Multitool on your Toolbar.[-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd]Select the Survival Multitool and press RMB to change the mode to Resource mode.[-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd]Fire at the ground to begin excavating the Antenna.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffffff]如何开采：[-][/c][/b] [c][bdbdbd]将生存工具枪置于物品栏中.[-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd]选中生存工具枪并按下右键选择开采模式.[-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd]对地面开火以发掘天线.[-][/c]

English: [c][bdbdbd]I've found the Antenna's access port and console.[-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd]I should be able to hook my suit up to it and boost the signal[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][bdbdbd]我找到了天线的访问端口.[-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd]我应该可以把我的护甲连上去从而增强信号[-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffee00]Ilmarinen Self-Destruct Sequence Activated[-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][ffee00]You have 2 minutes to evacuate the ship[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00]Ilmarinen 自毁程序已启动[-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][ffee00]你有两分钟的时间离开飞船[-][/c][/b]

English: You shouldn't even be able to read this.\nThis is a temporary self-destruct message used for ending the Ilmarinen Dungeon in lieu of an actual mission.
Chinese (simplified): You shouldn't even be able to read this.\nThis is a temporary self-destruct message used for ending the Ilmarinen Dungeon in lieu of an actual mission.

English: [b][c][ffee00]Unidentified vessels detected exiting warp![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffae00]All hands to battle stations![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffee00]检测到不明船只跃迁至附近![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffae00]所有人，战斗位置![-][/c]

English:
[c][ffff00]Pirate Story Missions can only be unlocked after encountering the pirates in the Main Story Mission quest line (The Cruel Stars).[-][/c]
[c][ffae00][-][/c]
[c][ffae00][-][/c][c][a6ff00][-][/c][c][ffae00][-][/c][c][0088ff]At present, there are only a couple of Pirate Story Missions but more will be added as time goes on. These missions take a long time and a lot of work to build and for them to function in both MP and SP.[-][/c]
[c][0088ff]There are of course, plenty of issues in MP with signal-controlled events.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00]海盗系列任务只有在主线任务中遭遇海盗后(残酷之星)才会出现.[-][/c]
[c][ffae00][-][/c]
[c][ffae00][-][/c][c][a6ff00][-][/c][c][ffae00][-][/c][c][0088ff]目前，任务只有很少的几个但以后会添加更多. 为了让这些任务在单人和多人都可用，制作时间会非常长.[-][/c]
[c][0088ff]当然，对于那些本为单人设计的内容总是会在多人时出现问题.[-][/c]

English: This acts as an information tab in the PDA for those looking for Pirate missions
Chinese (simplified): 该栏位用于在PDA中显示海盗任务的标题

English:
[c][ffffff]The main story missions will eventually run the length of the game introducing each faction and giving the option of pursuing their individual storylines to their conclusion.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][0088ff]The main story will follow the player as they seek to find and rejoin the UCH Fleet. The condition of the player and the fleet when you eventually get there will depend on your actions.[-][/c]
[c][0088ff]The story is not rigid and at many intersections you will be given choices that will shape the eventual outcome of the story.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]When you reach the final conclusion, will you be a hero?[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff]主线任务会随着游戏进程推进，为你介绍每个出现的阵营，并为你提供进行阵营任务的选项.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][0088ff]主线任务会按照回归UCH舰队的路线进行推进.最终舰队和玩家的的状态会由任务中的选择决定.[-][/c]
[c][0088ff]剧情并非固定，在很多地方你的选择可能决定了剧情的走向.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]事后总结的时候，你觉得自己算是个英雄吗?[-][/c]

English: This acts as an information heading for the Main Story Missions.
Chinese (simplified): 该栏位用于在PDA中显示主线任务的标题

English:
[c][ffffff]The [-][/c][b][c][00ffff]Character Class System (CSS)[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] allows the player to select a Skill Class for their character that will amplify their combat effectiveness using a chosen set of weapons.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]By activating this mission for the first time you will automatically open the class selection window.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Once you have chosen your Main Class, activating this mission again will display your current skill efficiency and level.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Upon reaching Class Level 5, you will be able to choose a Sub-Class that will provide new skills and new abilities.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff]The [-][/c][b][c][00ffff]角色职业系统 (CSS)[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] 允许玩家为他们的角色选择一个技能类别，从而使用所选的武器来增强他们的战斗效能.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]首次激活此任务，您将自动打开类选择窗口.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]一旦你选择了你的主职业，再次激活这个任务将显示你当前的技能效率和等级.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]当达到主职业5级时，你将能够选择一个有新技能和新能力的副职业.[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][0088ff]Class: Soldier - Level 1 (Recruit)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]You've passed advanced training and are competent in the use of firearms in practice. What you need now is experience.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]In order to live up to your position of a UCH Security Officer, it's high-time you went and got that experience.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ff00]Rank-up Condition:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]Kill 50[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax Troopers (any kind)[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Use any Assault Rifle or Pulse Rifle[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][ff0000][b]- This mission must be active -[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][0088ff]职业: 士兵 - Level 1 (新兵)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]你已经通过了高级训练，在实践中可以熟练地使用武器.你现在需要的是经验.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]为了不辜负你UCH安全官的职位，是时候去获得经验了.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ff00]职业升级条件:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]杀死50[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax步兵 (任何种类)[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]使用突击步枪或脉冲步枪[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][ff0000][b]- 这个任务必须处于激活状态 -[/b][-][/c]

English:
It's time to get some first-hand experience fighting against the zirax in life-or-death, battlefield conditions.

Practice makes perfect. But it's time to see if you're up to the challenge.

[b][c][ff0000]Does not include Drones, Ripperdogs, Mechanoids, Assault Zirax, Zirax Commanders or Elite Troopers.[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
是在生死攸关的战场上时候获得一些与zirax作战的第一手经验了.

熟能生巧. 现在是时候看看你是否能接受挑战了.

[b][c][ff0000]该任务不包括无人机,开膛恶犬, 战斗机器人, Zirax突击手, Zirax指挥官或者精英步兵.[-][/c][/b]

English: [b][c][ffff00]Rank-up Conditions have been met![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Find a [u]safe place[/u] and open your [b]PDA (F1)[/b] to confirm your change to Rank 2 (Cadet).[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffff00]已经满足升级条件![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]找到一个[u]安全[/u]的地方，打开你的PDA (F1)来完成这个目标，并确认你的等级上升到级别2 (见习士官).[-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff]Find a safe place and open your PDA (F1) to complete this objective and confirm your rank up to Rank 2 - Cadet[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff]找到一个安全的地方，打开你的PDA (F1)来完成这个目标，并确认你的等级上升到级别2 - 见习士官[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][0088ff]Class: Soldier - Level 2 (Cadet)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]You've established yourself as a capable soldier and a presence on the battlefield with enough experience to tackle harder and stronger enemies.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ff00]Rank-up Condition:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]Kill 100[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax Troopers (any kind)[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Use any Assault Rifle or Pulse Rifle[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]- This mission must be active -[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][0088ff]职业: 士兵 - Level 2 (见习士官)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]你已经把自己塑造成一个有能力的士兵，在战场上有足够的经验来对付更困难、更强大的敌人.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ff00]职业升级条件:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]杀死100[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax步兵(任何种类)[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]使用突击步枪或脉冲步枪[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]- 这个任务必须处于激活状态 -[/b][-][/c]

English: You've had your first experience at battlefield conditions. It's time to reinforce what you've learned and commit it to muscle memory. Once you've got that down to a fine art, you'll be ready to move up to the next rank.\n\n[b][c][ff0000]Does not include Drones, Ripperdogs, Mechanoids, Assault Zirax, Zirax Commanders or Elite Troopers.[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified): 这是你在战场上的第一次体验.是时候巩固你所学到的知识，并将其用于肌肉记忆了.一旦你完成了这些，你就可以进入下一个等级了.\n\n[b][c][ff0000]该任务不包括无人机, 开膛恶犬, 战斗机器人, Zirax突击手, Zirax指挥官或者精英步兵.[-][/c][/b]

English: [b][c][ffff00]Rank-up Conditions have been met![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Find a [u]safe place[/u] and open your [b]PDA (F1)[/b] to confirm your change to Rank 3 (Ensign).[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffff00]已经满足升级条件![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]找到一个 [u]安全[/u]的地方，打开你的PDA (F1)来完成这个目标，并确认你的等级上升到级别3 (少尉).[-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff]Find a safe place and open your PDA (F1) to complete this objective and confirm your rank up to Rank 3 - Ensign[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff]找到一个安全的地方，打开你的PDA (F1)来完成这个目标，并确认你的等级上升到级别3 - 少尉[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][0088ff]Class: Soldier - Level 3 (Ensign)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]You're now a primary asset on the battlefield, able to identify and eliminate a hostile target with practiced ease.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]But these low-level cloned soldiers aren't the threat they once represented. It's their commanders that will be a real test of skill.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ff00]Rank-up Condition:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]Kill 35[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Elite Zirax Troopers or Commanders[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Use any Assault Rifle or Pulse Rifle[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]- This mission must be active -[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][0088ff]职业: 士兵 - Level 3 (少尉)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]你现在是战场上的主力，能够轻松地识别并消灭敌方目标.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]但这些低级别的克隆士兵已经不再像以前那样具有威胁.真正考验技能的将是敌人的指挥官.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ff00]职业升级条件:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]杀死35[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] 精英 Zirax步兵或者指挥官[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]使用突击步枪或脉冲步枪[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]- 这个任务必须处于激活状态 -[/b][-][/c]
[b][c][ff0000]杀死35 精英 Zirax或者指挥官[-][/c][/b]

English:
You can put as many cloned soldiers into the ground as you like, but you'll never put a dent into the enemy's command.
It's time to take the fight to the team leaders and base commanders.

[b][c][ff0000]Elite Zirax can be found in space stations and some high-difficulty Military Bases.[-][/c][/b]
[c][ff0000][b]A Zirax Commander can be found in most Zirax facilities.[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
你可以随心所欲地把许多克隆士兵送入地狱，但你永远无法削弱敌人的指挥.
是时候和小队长和基地指挥官战斗了.

[b][c][ff0000]精英Zirax可以在轨道空间站和一些高难度军事基地找到.[-][/c][/b]
[c][ff0000][b]大部分Zirax设施里都能找到一名Zirax指挥官.[/b][-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffff00]Rank-up Conditions have been met![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Find a [u]safe place[/u] and open your [b]PDA (F1)[/b] to confirm your change to Rank 4 (Lieutenant).[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffff00]已经满足升级条件![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]找到一个[u]安全[/u]的地方，打开你的PDA (F1)来完成这个目标，并确认你的等级上升到级别4 (上尉).[-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff]Find a safe place and open your PDA (F1) to complete this objective and confirm your rank up to Rank 4 - Lieutenant[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff]找到一个安全的地方，打开你的PDA (F1)来完成这个目标，并确认你的等级上升到级别4 - 上尉[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][0088ff]Class: Soldier - Level 4 (Lieutenant)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]Congratulations on holding both the title of UCH Commander and Lieutenant of the UCH Security Forces. There are few in the UCH Navy that have achieved such levels of recognition.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]But it's not enough... There is still more work to do.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c][b][c][00ff00]Rank-up Condition:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]Destroy the core of 10[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax Bases[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]- This mission must be active -[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][0088ff]职业: 士兵 - Level 4 (上尉)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]祝贺您同时获得UCH指挥官和UCH安全部队上尉的头衔，UCH 海军中很少有人能获得这样的认可[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]但这还不够……还有更多的工作要做.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c][b][c][00ff00]职业升级条件:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]摧毁10个[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax 基地核心[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]- 这个任务必须处于激活状态 -[/b][-][/c]

English:
Commanders and Elites are no chance against a seasoned veteran like yourself. It's time to take the fight to them and push them clean off the planets and leave their territory free for the safe return of the UCH Fleet.

[b][c][00ff00]Applies only to ground-based bases belonging to either the Zirax Empire or one of the many houses that make it up.[-][/c][/b]
[c][ff0000][b]Does not include spacestations, defense towers or bases on the low-level starting planets.[/b][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]Cores must be destroyed by hand.[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
指挥官和精英是没有机会对抗像你这样经验丰富的老兵的. 是时候和他们大战一场，把他们赶出行星，让他们离开领土，让UCH联合舰队安全返回.

[b][c][00ff00]该任务只适合Zirax帝国下属的地面基地，或者建筑群.[-][/c][/b]
[c][ff0000][b]该任务不包括轨道空间站,防御塔或者低等级初始行星的基地.[/b][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]基地核心必须亲手摧毁.[/b][-][/c]

English: [b][c][ffff00]Rank-up Conditions have been met![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Find a [u]safe place[/u] and open your [b]PDA (F1)[/b] to confirm your change to Rank 5 (Commander).[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffff00]已经满足升级条件![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]找到一个[u]安全[/u]的地方，打开你的PDA (F1)来完成这个目标，并确认你的等级上升到级别5 (指挥官).[-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff]Find a safe place and open your PDA (F1) to complete this objective and confirm your rank up to Rank 5 - Commander[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff]找到一个安全的地方，打开你的PDA (F1)来完成这个目标，并确认你的等级上升到级别5 - 指挥官[-][/c]

English: Activation conditions for the Class System

[b][c][0088ff]Class: Soldier - Level 5 (Commander)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]You have reached the highest Security Forces rank available to a UCH Commander[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Congratulations, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]There are no more ranks above this one, but due to your perseverance and duty, the High Command has given you the opportunity to attempt achieving an even higher rank with a Sub-Class of the Security Forces elite division.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c][b][c][00ff00]Maximum Rank Achieved![-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffff00]- Sub-Class is now available -[-][/c][/b]
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][0088ff]职业: 士兵 - Level 5 (指挥官)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]您已达到 UCH 指挥官可获得的最高安全部队军衔[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]恭喜你, 指挥官.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]没有比这更高的军衔了，但由于你的坚持不懈和尽职尽责，最高指挥部给你机会，让你可以获得一个副职业来达到更高的成就.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c][b][c][00ff00]已达最高等级![-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffff00]- 副职业已经激活-[-][/c][/b]

English: [b][c][ffff00]Maximum Rank Reached![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Your statistics menu will open momentarily and with it, you will be able to choose a sub-class.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][ffff00]已达最高等级![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]你的系统菜单将会打开，你可以选择一个副职业.[-][/c]

English:

[c][ffffff]In order to live up to your position of a UCH Security Officer, it's high-time you went and got that experience.[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]为了不辜负你UCH安全官的职位，是时候去获得经验了.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffa000]杀死50[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax步兵 (any kind)[-][/c]
