Chinese (simplified): 寒冷世界，是一个很好的[c][00ff00]钛[-][/c]来源，可以用来建造主力舰.

English: Visit any of the asteroid fields in the Beta system

Asteroid fields can be a good source of various [c][00ff00]ore asteroids[-][/c], with the composition depending on star type and random chance, but can also be full of danger. Caution is usually advised.
Chinese (simplified): 小行星带可能是各种[c][00ff00]矿石小行星[-][/c]的良好来源，其组成取决于恒星类型和随机机会，但也可能充满危险.通常建议谨慎.

English: Visit any of the asteroid fields in the Delta system

Asteroid fields can be a good source of various [c][00ff00]ore asteroids[-][/c], with the composition depending on star type and random chance, but can also be full of danger. Caution is usually advised.
Chinese (simplified): 小行星带可能是各种[c][00ff00]矿石小行星[-][/c]的良好来源，其组成取决于恒星类型和随机机会，但也可能充满危险.通常建议谨慎.

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Location:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Epsilon System[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Difficulty:[/b][-][/c] [c][00ff00]Easy[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Repeatable:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]No[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Objectives:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Visit the sectors and planets of the Epsilon system[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]You must enter the planet or sector listed. Starting planets do not count towards credit.[/i][-][/c]
You must fly down to each listed planet. For gas giant moons, you only have to visit one of their moons.
Don't forget to bring plenty of [c][00ff00]Refined Pentaxid[-][/c] for a return trip.
Open your [c][ffff00]PDA ({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] if you need further details.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]位置:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Epsilon星系[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]难度:[/b][-][/c] [c][00ff00]简单[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]可重复任务:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]否[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]目标:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]调查星区和行星在 Epsilon星系[-][/c]

[c][ffffff][i]你必须进入行星或者列表的行星.初始行星不计入统计.[/i][-][/c]
你必须进入每个任务列出的星球. 对气态巨星的多个卫星而言, 你只需要登陆其中一个就好.
别忘了带上足够的 [c][00ff00]精炼翘曲水晶[-][/c] 以防回不了家.
如果你需要更多详细信息，可以打开 [c][ffff00]PDA ({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 进行进一步的了解.

English: Dry planets such as these can be a good source of [c][00ff00]Neodymium[-][/c] needed to build your first capital vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 像这样干燥的行星可以是一个很好的钕的来源[c][00ff00] [-][/c]可以用来建立你的第一艘主力舰.

English: Dead worlds are often a good source of [c][00ff00]salvage[-][/c] from the many ruins that can be found here.
Chinese (simplified): 死亡类地行星往往是一个很好的材料来源，这里可以找到的许多废墟进行[c][00ff00]打捞[-][/c].

English: Cold worlds such as these are a good source of [c][00ff00]Titanium[-][/c] needed to build capital vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 寒冷世界，是一个很好的[c][00ff00]钛[-][/c]来源，可以用来建造主力舰.

English: Visit either of the moons of Epsilon I. Gas giants cannot be warped to directly, you can only visit their moons.
Chinese (simplified): 访问月亮在Epsilon I. 气体巨行星不能跃迁到，你只能访问他们的月亮.

English: While gas giants themselves cannot be landed on, they often have rich systems of moons that can be a good source of specific resources such as Iron or Magnesium.
Chinese (simplified): 虽然气体巨星本身不能着陆，但它们通常有丰富的卫星系统，可以是铁或者镁等特定资源的良好来源.

English: Visit any of the asteroid fields in the Epsilon system

Asteroid fields can be a good source of various [c][00ff00]ore asteroids[-][/c], with the composition depending on star type and random chance, but can also be full of danger. Caution is usually advised.
Chinese (simplified): 小行星带可能是各种[c][00ff00]矿石小行星[-][/c]的良好来源，其组成取决于恒星类型和随机机会，但也可能充满危险.通常建议谨慎.

English:
Thank you for your help surveying this solar system!
If you haven't already, speak to the captains of the other UCHN research ships in the other nearby star systems. I'm sure they could use some help as well.

To reach other star systems, you will need to build a [c][00ff00]warp capable capital vessel[-][/c] and make sure you have plenty of [c][00ff00]fuel[-][/c], [c][00ff00]oxygen[-][/c], and [c][00ff00]pentaxid[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你帮忙扫描了这个恒星系!\n如果你还没有，请联系附近其他星系中其他UCHN研究船的舰长.我相信他们也需要一些帮助.\n要到达其他恒星系统，你需要建立一艘[c][00ff00]可以跃迁的主力舰[-][/c]确保你有足够的[c][00ff00]燃料[-][/c], [c][00ff00]氧气[-][/c],和[c][00ff00]翘曲水晶[-][/c].

English: You've completed your survey of the Alpha system. You should report your findings to the UCHN Discovery.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经完成了调查，关于Alpha星系. 你需要向UCHN探险船报告你的发现.

English: You've completed your survey of the Beta system. You should report your findings to the UCHN Explorer.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经完成了调查，关于Beta星系. 你需要把你的发现报告给UCHN 探索者.

English: You've completed your survey of the Delta system. You should report your findings to the UCHN Odyssey.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经完成了调查，关于Delta星系. 你需要把你的发现报告给UCHN 奥德赛号.

English: You've completed your survey of the Epsilon system. You should report your findings to the UCHN Pathfinder.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经完成了调查，关于Epsilon星系. 你需要把你的发现报告给UCHN 探路者.

English:
[c][b4e1ff]Welcome to Project Eden, recruit! You are now prepared to explore the rest of your starting solar system and beyond.
Remember that you will need a [-][/c][c][00ff00]Capital Vessel[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] with a warp drive to warp to another star system.
It's always good practice to keep an extra stash of supplies for emergencies. Always have enough Pentaxid for a round trip before warping. [-][/c][c][ffff00]Don't get stuck![-][/c]

[c][b4e1ff]New missions have been added to your PDA and new Empyriopedia entries have been unlocked [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][b4e1ff].[-][/c]
[c][b4e1ff]The [-][/c][c][00ff00]solo mission tab[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] contain main story missions and repeatable side missions. The [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] section of the PDA contains useful information and answers to frequently asked questions about the game and scenario.[-][/c]
[b][c][ff8000]Please check the Empyriopedia[-][/c].[/b]

[c][b4e1ff]You can also sometimes find missions or other hints by talking to individuals. Try speaking with the lead researcher or the captain if you haven't already.
What you do from here is up to you.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][b4e1ff]欢迎加入伊甸园计划，新兵!你们现在已经准备好去探索你们刚开始的太阳系的其余部分以及更远的地方.
请记住，您将需要一艘带着跃迁引擎的 [-][/c][c][00ff00]主力舰[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] 来跃迁到另一个星系.
多储备一些物资以备不时之需总是一个好习惯.在进行翘曲跳跃之前，一定要保证有足够的翘曲水晶来往返.[-][/c][c][ffff00]别被困住了![-][/c]

[c][b4e1ff]新的任务已经添加到你的PDA上，另外新的生存百科也已经解锁[-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c][c][b4e1ff].[-][/c]
[c][b4e1ff]在 [-][/c][c][00ff00]单人任务标签[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] 包含了主线任务和可重复的支线任务.PDA中的[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] 部分包含了一些有用的信息以及一些常见问题的答案.[-][/c]
[b][c][ff8000]请务必阅读帝国百科[-][/c].[/b]

[c][b4e1ff]同时你也可能在与NPC对话时获得任务或是提示. 试着去和舰长或是首席科学家谈谈（如果你还没有的话）.
从这里开始，一切都由你决定.[-][/c]

English: Find a means to escape the planet.
This mission serves as a divider in the PDA list.
Chinese (simplified): 这个任务在PDA列表中充当分隔符.

English:
[c][b4e1ff]This mission serves as a divider to help organize the PDA list.
The default [-][/c][c][00ff00]Empyriopedia[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] will be above it, while [-][/c][c][00ffff]Project Eden[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] information will be below it.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]Select a topic and use the drop down arrows to select a sub-topic to learn more.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][b4e1ff]这个任务仅作为帮助PDA排版的分隔符.
默认的[-][/c][c][00ff00]帝国百科[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] 都会显示在上方，同时 [-][/c][c][00ffff]伊甸园计划[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] 的相关信息会显示在下方.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]选择一个主题后，使用下拉箭头选择一个子主题以了解更多.[-][/c]

English:
Here you will find answers to commonly asked questions such as where to find rare ores or how the missions work.
Click the drop down arrows and select a category to learn more.

[c][ff8000]Please see the [-][/c][u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1703779262][c][00afff]Project Eden Configuration Guide[-][/c][/url][/u][c][ff8000] on Steam for [b]important information[/b] on using Project Eden on a dedicated server or for customizing it! [-][/c][c][ffff00][u]You must follow the directions in the guide for your server to function correctly.[/u][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 在这里你会找到常见问题的答案，如在哪里找到稀有矿石或者任务如何工作。单击下拉箭头并选择一个类别以了解更多信息。\n\n[c][ff8000]请查看[-][/c][u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1703779262][c][00afff]项目伊甸园配置指南[-][/c][/url][/u][c][ff8000]上的[b]重要信息[/b]在专用服务器上使用项目伊甸园或者定制它![-][/c][c][ffff00][u]您必须跟踪指南中的方向，您的服务器才能正常工作。[/u][-][/c]

English:
If you have a question not answered here please leave a comment on the Workshop!

[c][00ffff]Do the default missions work?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]No. Reforged Eden does not contain any of the missions from the vanilla game.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]The Reforged Galaxy story missions usually only work on the planets listed as having Reforged missions.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Note that only the Beginner, Temperate, Arid, and Swamp starting planets are set up to work with the Reforged starting missions.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]You can find the Beginner and Temperate starting planets in the Alpha system, while Arid and Swamp are in the Beta system.[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]How do I complete the custom missions?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Check the description of the mission. Some may have you collect an item or visit a specific planet type and you may have to warp to other star systems to complete it. Some missions use a combination of some or all of the PDA, tokens, and dialog.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Most mission objectives can be obtained in multiple places in case you lose the item or otherwise can no longer complete the mission from a particular POI. Those that use unique POIs can either be repeated in the POI or can have the objectives manually marked as complete.[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]I completed a mission and nothing happened. What now?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Many of the custom missions and story is still a work in progress. Alpha 12 completely changed how missions and storytelling can be done so it required a rewrite of the PDA. If you find any unique items, hold on to them because they might have a purpose. More is planned to be added later on.[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]I lost an important mission item. What do I do?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Most of the important mission items can be obtained again, either from the same source you first found it at, or from another version of the POI somewhere else in the galaxy. For those that can only be obtained once, you can manually mark the mission objective as "complete".[-][/c][c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]If you are well and truly stuck, leave a comment on the Workshop and I can help you out.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
如果您有任何问题没有在这里得到回答，请在研讨会上留言！

[c][00ffff]默认任务有效吗？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]没有。《重生伊甸园》不包含原版游戏中的任何任务。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]重整星系故事任务通常只适用于被列为有重整任务的行星。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]请注意，只有初学者、温带、干旱和沼泽起始行星被设置为与重组起始任务一起工作。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]你可以在阿尔法系中找到初级和温带的起始行星，而Arid和Swamp在贝塔系中。[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]如何完成自定义任务？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]检查任务描述。有些任务可能会让你收集一件物品或访问一个特定的行星类型，你可能不得不转向其他恒星系统才能完成它。有些任务使用部分或全部PDA、代币和对话框的组合。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]大多数任务目标可以在多个地方获得，以防您丢失物品或无法再从特定POI完成任务。使用唯一POI的那些可以在POI中重复，也可以将目标手动标记为完成。[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]我完成了一项任务，但什么也没发生。现在怎么办？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]许多自定义任务和故事仍在进行中。阿尔法12完全改变了任务和讲故事的方式，因此需要重写PDA。如果你发现了任何独特的物品，请抓住它们，因为它们可能有目的。计划稍后添加更多。[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]我丢失了一个重要的任务物品。我该怎么办？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]大多数重要的任务物品都可以再次获得，要么来自你第一次发现它的同一来源，要么来自银河系其他地方的POI的另一个版本。对于那些只能获得一次的任务，您可以手动将任务目标标记为“完成”。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]如果您确实陷入困境，请在研讨会上留言，我可以帮助您。[-][/c]

English:
If you have a question not answered here please leave a comment on the Workshop!

[c][00ffff]Where do I find X resource?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Once you complete the mission "Make Contact with Terran Forces" you will get new sections added to the Empyriopedia in the PDA that describe the different star types.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Titanium is found on colder planets such as snow and Neodymium is found more often on dry arid or desert planets. There will always be enough resources in your starting system to build a warp capable capital vessel, but you may have to do more exploring to find advanced ores.[-][/c]

[c][00ffff]Why can't I find Titanium on my starting planet?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]In general, resources in Reforged Eden are more spread out and harder to obtain. Depending on your chosen starting planet, you may have to build a warp capable small vessel using Iron, Silicon, Copper, and Cobalt to warp to another planet. You will always find the resources to build a warp capable small vessel in your starting sector, and a warp capable capital vessel in your starting solar system.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
如果您有任何问题没有在这里得到回答，请在研讨会上留言！

[c][00ffff]在哪里可以找到X资源？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]一旦你完成了“与人族部队取得联系”的任务，你将在掌上电脑中的帝国百科中添加新的部分，描述不同的恒星类型。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]钛在雪等较冷的行星上被发现，钕在干旱或沙漠的行星上更常见。在你的启动系统中总会有足够的资源来建造一艘具有翘曲能力的主力舰，但你可能需要进行更多的探索才能找到先进的矿石。[-][/c]

[c][00ffff]为什么我在我的起始星球上找不到钛？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]一般来说，重建伊甸园中的资源分布更广，更难获得。根据你选择的起始行星，你可能需要使用铁、硅、铜和钴建造一个能够翘曲的小容器，才能翘曲到另一个行星。你总是会找到资源，在你的起始扇区建造一艘能够翘曲的小船，在你开始的太阳系建造一艘具有翘曲能力的主力船。[-][/c]
评论、反馈和错误常见问题解答

English:
If you have a question not answered here please leave a comment on the Workshop!

[c][00ffff]Where do I post my comments or feedback?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]You can leave a comment on the Workshop page for the scenario.[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]I found a bug or problem with the scenario, where should I report it?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]First check the Workshop page to see if it's already a known issue. [-][/c][c][ffffff]If you found a problem not listed there, there are two ways to report it depending on if it's possibly a problem with the scenario or a bug with the game itself.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00][b]If you think it's a problem with the scenario:[/b][-][/c][c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Leave a comment on the Workshop under one of the pinned discussions or in the general comments with as much detail as possible about the issue. Things to include are the seed, exact planet and star system name, the exact name of the mission, POI, or NPC, and a clear description of what the problem is.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff8000][i]Issues with the scenario might be things like a Continue or Quit error when you try to warp to another star system, errors in the console referencing PDA, POI, or deposit spawns, POIs that aren't placed correctly (buried, etc) or that fall apart due to SI, errors with the PDA, dialog, or traders, texture issues on planets, or any other issue that you cannot reproduce in a default survival game.[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[b][c][ffff00]If you think it's a game bug:[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]First reproduce the issue in a default game.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]To do this have Steam verify file integrity, then start a new save game using the default survival scenario and try to reproduce the problem there.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]If you are able to reproduce, make a bug report on the official Empyrion forums following the directions they provide.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][i]It's important that the devs be able to reproduce the issue in the default game as they cannot offer support for modded content.[/i][-][/c][c][ffffff][b][u][/u][/b][-][/c]

[i][c][ff8000]Issues with the game might be things like crashing in the main menu, holes into the void or floating grass on planets, AI problems with NPCs, drones, or patrol vessels, the motorbike launching you to orbit, UI errors such as problems with inventory management, etc.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified):
如果您在这里没有找到答案，请在Workshop上留言！

[c][00ffff]我在哪里发布我的评论或反馈？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]您可以在该场景的Workshop页面上留言。[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]我发现了这个场景的一个错误或问题，我应该在哪里报告？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]首先检查Workshop页面，看看它是否已经是已知问题。[-][/c][c][ffffff]如果您发现的问题没有列在那里，有两种方式可以报告，这取决于它可能是场景的问题还是游戏本身的bug。[-][/c]


[c][ffff00][b]如果您认为这是场景的问题：[/b][-][/c][c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]在Workshop上，在置顶的讨论或一般评论下留言，并尽可能详细地描述问题。需要包括的信息有种子、确切的行星和星系名称、任务、POI或NPC的确切名称，以及问题的清晰描述。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff8000][i]场景的问题可能包括：尝试翘曲到另一个星系时出现继续或退出错误，控制台中引用PDA、POI或矿点生成的错误，放置不正确的POI（埋藏等）或由于SI而分崩离析，PDA、对话或交易者的错误，行星上的纹理问题，或任何其他您无法在默认生存游戏中重现的问题。[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[b][c][ffff00]如果您认为这是游戏bug：[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]首先在默认游戏中重现这个问题。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]要做到这一点，让Steam验证文件完整性，然后开始一个新的默认生存场景的保存游戏，并尝试在那里重现问题。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]如果您能够重现，按照官方Empyrion论坛提供的指导制作bug报告。[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][i]重要的是开发者能够在默认游戏中重现这个问题，因为他们不能为修改过的内容提供支持。[/i][-][/c][c][ffffff][b][u][/u][/b][-][/c]

[i][c][ff8000]游戏的问题可能包括：主菜单崩溃，行星上的空洞或漂浮的草地，NPC、无人机或巡逻飞船的AI问题，摩托车将您发射到轨道，UI错误，如库存管理问题等。[-][/c][/i]

English:
If you have a question not answered here please leave a comment on the Workshop!

[c][ff8000]Please see the [-][/c][u][u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1703779262][c][00afff]Project Eden Configuration Guide[-][/c][/url][/u][/u][c][ff8000] on Steam for [b]important information[/b] on using Project Eden on a dedicated server or for customizing it! [-][/c][c][ffff00][u]You must follow the directions in the guide for your server to function correctly.[/u][-][/c]


[c][00ffff]Does Reforged Eden work in COOP?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Yes it does work, but you may encounter problems.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]16gb of computer memory is strongly recommended for COOP, but it is generally best to run a true dedicated server instead.[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]Does Reforged Eden work on a dedicated server?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Yes Reforged Eden should work with dedicated servers.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Reforged Eden uses the full galaxy generation so keep in mind the size of the game world will be immense as it's meant to be played solo, COOP, or on dedicated servers for small groups.[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]Why is the loading time longer?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]When initially loading the scenario, the game has to generate the fixed sectors and this can cause loading to take longer than normal.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]

[c][00ffff]Is there any customization I can make to the scenario for my server?[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Yes. You can feel free to edit any of the scenario's configuration or playfield files as you see fit, but [u]doing this is at your own risk[/u]. I cannot offer support for using customized configurations with the scenario and some things can break your save game.[-][/c][c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]There is also a Project Eden Admin Control you can access from within the game. See the configuration guide for how to access.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
如果您有任何问题没有在这里得到回答，请在研讨会上留言！

[c][ff8000]请参阅[-][/c][u][u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1703779262][c][00afff]Project Eden配置指南[-][/c][/ul][/u][/u][c][ff8000]关于在专用服务器上使用Project Eden或自定义它的重要信息！[-][/c][c][ffff00][u]您必须按照指南中的说明操作，服务器才能正常工作。[/u][-][/c]

[c][00ffff]重构伊甸园在COOP中工作吗？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]是的，它确实有效，但您可能会遇到问题。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]强烈建议COOP使用16gb的计算机内存，但通常最好运行真正的专用服务器。[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]重构伊甸园在专用服务器上工作吗？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]是的，重新组织的伊甸园应该使用专用服务器。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]《重生的伊甸园》使用的是整个银河系的一代，所以请记住，游戏世界的规模将是巨大的，因为它是单独、合作或在小团体的专用服务器上玩的。[-][/c]


[c][00ffff]为什么加载时间更长？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]最初加载场景时，游戏必须生成固定扇区，这可能会导致加载时间比正常情况下更长。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]

[c][00ffff]我可以为我的服务器对场景进行任何自定义吗？[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]是的。您可以随意编辑任何场景的配置或游戏场文件，但这样做的风险自负。我无法支持在场景中使用自定义配置，有些事情可能会破坏您的保存游戏。[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]还有一个伊甸园项目管理控件，您可以从游戏中访问。有关如何访问，请参阅配置指南。[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][00ffff]Tips for navigating the solar system and galaxy map:[-][/c][/b]

Use the filters on the left side of the screen.
On the right side there are several tabs depending on which map screen you are in.
There is a hint screen for the solar system map. Click on the "?" icon in the upper left to learn more.

You can check info on planets, moons, and sectors by clicking on a star in the galaxy map, or a planet, moon, or sector in the solar system map and using the various tabs on the right side of the screen.
[c][ffff00]Always check info before entering a planet in case there are hazards you need to be aware of such as high gravity or other dangers.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
You can speed up your camera movements in the galaxy map by holding a combination of [c][ffff00]SHIFT [-][/c]and [c][ffff00]CTRL [-][/c](depending on your keybindings). You can use the [c][ffff00]WASD, C, and Space [-][/c]keys to move forward, backward, left, right, up, or down to get a better view of the entire galaxy while holding [c][ffff00]Left Mouse[-][/c].


[b][c][00ffff]Terminology:[-][/c][/b]
[c][00ff00]Sun[-][/c]: The central star of a solar system. You cannot warp to a star directly.
[c][00ff00]Planet[-][/c]: A rocky body you can typically land on. Contains an orbit and sometimes one or more moons.
[c][00ff00]Gas Giant[-][/c]: A special type of planet that cannot be warped to or landed on directly. Instead you can warp to each of its moons.

[c][00ff00]Moon[-][/c]: A rocky body you can typically land on that orbits a planet or gas giant.
[c][00ff00]Orbit[-][/c]: The area of space around a planet.
[c][00ff00]Sector POI[-][/c]: Areas of space that lack a planet in the solar system, such as asteroid fields or standalone Trade Stations[c][00ff00].[-][/c]

[c][00ff00]Playfield[-][/c]: An area of the game world. A planet is its own playfield, as is a moon and a space orbit. Going from planet to orbit means you enter a new playfield.
[c][00ff00]Sector[-][/c]: Any location on the solar system map that you can warp to. A sector encompasses a planet, its orbit, and any of its moons. A standalone asteroid field can also be a sector.

[c][00ff00]Solar System[-][/c]: An object on the galaxy map containing a star with various planets and sector POIs. Can also be referred to as a [c][00ff00]Star System[-][/c], [c][00ff00]System[-][/c], or [c][00ff00]Star[-][/c]. Star type influences what you will find there.
[c][00ff00]Nebula[-][/c]: A gaseous cloud located within a galaxy. Can show up in space but otherwise has no effects currently.
[c][00ff00]Galaxy[-][/c]: The entire game world seen in the galaxy map containing thousands of stars. Can also be divided up into multiple galaxies.
[c][00ff00]Faction Territory[-][/c]: This can refer to the faction territory displayed on a planet's surface, or on the faction territory on the galactic map. Galactic faction territories influence which factions will be found within that territory.
Planetary territory can be gained or lost by NPC factions. Galactic territory is static.

[c][00ff00]Kilometer[-][/c] ([c][00ff00]km[-][/c]): Unit of measurement within a playfield. 1,000 meters. 1 BA/CV block is 2x2x2 meters in size for reference. Standard propulsion can cover this distance.
[c][00ff00]Astronomical Unit[-][/c] ([c][00ff00]au[-][/c]): Unit of measurement within a solar system. 1au is the average distance between the Sun and the Earth. A short range warp drive mounted on a small vessel can warp 15au. A long range warp drive on a capital vessel is required to go further.
[c][00ff00]Light Year[-][/c] ([c][00ff00]ly[-][/c]): Unit of measurement on the galaxy map. 1ly is the distance light travels in one year in a vacuum. A long range warp drive on a capital vessel is required to warp between solar systems.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][00ffff]恒星系和银河系地图导航提示:[-][/c][/b]

使用屏幕左侧的过滤器.
非右侧有几个标签取决于你在哪个地图屏幕.有一个恒星系地图的提示屏幕.点击左上角的“?”图标了解更多信息.您可以通过在银河系地图中单击一个恒星，或者一个行星，卫星，或者星区，并使用屏幕右侧的各种选项卡查看行星，卫星和星区的信息.[c][ffff00]在进入行星之前一定要检查信息，以防有你需要注意的危险，如高重力或者其他危险.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]你可以通过按住[c][ffff00]SHIFT [-][/c]和[c][ffff00]CTRL [-][/c]的组合(取决于你的键绑定)来加速你的相机运动银河系地图.你可以使用[c][ffff00]方向键[-][/c]和[c][ffff00]空格键[-][/c]来移动，后退，左，右，上，或者下，以获得更好的整个星系的视野，同时按住[c][ffff00]鼠标左键[-][/c].


[b][c][00ffff]术语:[-][/c][/b]
[c][00ff00]恒星[-][/c]: 一个恒星系的中心.你不能直接跃迁到恒星上.
[c][00ff00]行星[-][/c]:通常可以着陆的岩石天体.包含一个轨道，有时一个或者更多卫星.
[c][00ff00]气态巨行星[-][/c]:一种特殊类型的行星，不能被扭曲到或者上直接着陆.相反，您可以转换到每个卫星.

[c][00ff00]月球[-][/c]:一个可以着陆的岩石天体，它围绕着一颗行星或者气态巨行星运行.
[c][00ff00]轨道[-][/c]:行星周围的空间面积.
[c][00ff00]星区POI[-][/c]:恒星系中没有行星的空间区域，如小行星带s或者独立贸易站[c][00ff00].[-][/c]

[c][00ff00]游戏区域[-][/c]:游戏世界的一个区域.行星是它自己的游乐场，卫星和太空轨道也是如此.从行星到轨道意味着你进入了一个新的领域.
[c][00ff00]星区[-][/c]:恒星系地图上你可以曲转到的任何位置.星区包括行星、它的轨道和它的任何卫星.一个独立的小行星带也可以是一个板块.

[c][00ff00]恒星系[-][/c]:银河系地图上的一个物体，其中包含一颗带有各种行星和星区poi的恒星.也可以称为[c][00ff00]恒星系统[-][/c], [c][00ff00]恒星系[-][/c],或者[c][00ff00]恒星[-][/c].恒星类型会影响你在那里找到什么.
[c][00ff00]星云[-][/c]:位于星系内的气态云.可以在太空中出现，但目前没有其他效果.
[c][00ff00]银河[-][/c]:在银河系地图上看到的包含数千颗星星的整个游戏世界.也可以分成多个星系.
[c][00ff00]阵营领土[-][/c]:这可以指在行星表面显示的阵营领土，或者在银河地图上的阵营领土.银河派系的领土影响哪些派系将被发现在该领土内.行星领土可以获得或者失去的NPC派系.银河系的领土是静止的.

[c][00ff00] 公里[-][/c] ([c][00ff00]公里[-][/c]):运动场内的测量单位.1000米.1ba /CV块大小为2x2x2米，供参考.标准的推进可以完成这个距离.
[c][00ff00]天文单位[-][/c] ([c][00ff00]au[-][/c]):恒星系内的测量单位.1au是太阳和地球之间的平均距离.安装在舰船上的短程曲速引擎可以曲速15au.要想走得更远，需要在主力舰上进行长距离曲速引擎.
 [c][00ff00]光年[-][/c] ([c][00ff00] ly [-][/c]):计量单位在银河系地图.1ly是光在真空中一年中传播的距离.要在恒星系之间进行曲速，需要使用主力舰上的远程曲速引擎.

English: Barren worlds such as these are a good source of [c][00ff00]Sathium [-][/c]needed to build long range warp drives and combat steel for capital vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 贫瘠世界是很好的材料来源，上面富含[c][00ff00]Sathium钑 [-][/c]可以用来制造主力舰的远程曲速引擎和战斗钢装甲块.

English: Barren worlds such as these are a good source of [c][00ff00]Sathium [-][/c]needed to build long range warp drives and combat steel for capital vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 贫瘠世界是很好的材料来源，上面富含[c][00ff00]Sathium钑 [-][/c]可以用来制造主力舰的远程曲速引擎和战斗钢装甲块.

English: A barren planet. Barren worlds such as these are a good source of [c][00ff00]Sathium [-][/c]needed to build long range warp drives and combat steel for capital vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 一颗贫瘠行星. 贫瘠世界是很好的材料来源，上面富含[c][00ff00]Sathium钑 [-][/c]可以用来制造主力舰的远程曲速引擎和战斗钢装甲块.

English: Barren worlds such as these are a good source of [c][00ff00]Sathium [-][/c]needed to build long range warp drives and combat steel for capital vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 贫瘠世界是很好的材料来源，上面富含[c][00ff00]Sathium钑 [-][/c]可以用来制造主力舰的远程曲速引擎和战斗钢装甲块.

English:
Thank you for your help surveying this solar system!
If you haven't already, speak to the captains of the other UCHN research ships in the other nearby star systems. I'm sure they could use some help as well.

To reach other star systems, you will need to build a [c][00ff00]warp capable capital vessel[-][/c] and make sure you have plenty of [c][00ff00]fuel[-][/c], [c][00ff00]oxygen[-][/c], and [c][00ff00]pentaxid[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你帮忙扫描了这个恒星系!\n如果你还没有，请联系附近其他星系中其他UCHN研究船的舰长.我相信他们也需要一些帮助.\n要到达其他恒星系统，你需要建立一艘[c][00ff00]可以跃迁的主力舰[-][/c]确保你有足够的[c][00ff00]燃料[-][/c], [c][00ff00]氧气[-][/c],和[c][00ff00]翘曲水晶[-][/c].

English:
Thank you for your help surveying this solar system!
If you haven't already, speak to the captains of the other UCHN research ships in the other nearby star systems. I'm sure they could use some help as well.

To reach other star systems, you will need to build a [c][00ff00]warp capable capital vessel[-][/c] and make sure you have plenty of [c][00ff00]fuel[-][/c], [c][00ff00]oxygen[-][/c], and [c][00ff00]pentaxid[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你帮忙扫描了这个恒星系!\n如果你还没有，请联系附近其他星系中其他UCHN研究船的舰长.我相信他们也需要一些帮助.\n要到达其他恒星系统，你需要建立一艘[c][00ff00]可以跃迁的主力舰[-][/c]确保你有足够的[c][00ff00]燃料[-][/c], [c][00ff00]氧气[-][/c],和[c][00ff00]翘曲水晶[-][/c].

English:
Thank you for your help surveying this solar system!
If you haven't already, speak to the captains of the other UCHN research ships in the other nearby star systems. I'm sure they could use some help as well.

To reach other star systems, you will need to build a [c][00ff00]warp capable capital vessel[-][/c] and make sure you have plenty of [c][00ff00]fuel[-][/c], [c][00ff00]oxygen[-][/c], and [c][00ff00]pentaxid[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 感谢你帮忙扫描了这个恒星系!\n如果你还没有，请联系附近其他星系中其他UCHN研究船的舰长.我相信他们也需要一些帮助.\n要到达其他恒星系统，你需要建立一艘[c][00ff00]可以跃迁的主力舰[-][/c]确保你有足够的[c][00ff00]燃料[-][/c], [c][00ff00]氧气[-][/c],和[c][00ff00]翘曲水晶[-][/c].
教程:你的第一次星际穿越

English: A tutorial message will appear momentarily.
Wait for the tutorial to finish.

You have completed a warp to another star system. Congratulations on leaving your starting solar system!

When you warp to other stars, you end up in one of 6 [c][00ff00]hidden warp arrival sectors[-][/c] near the star. These sectors cannot be selected or warped to directly and building there is disabled. You can only return to these sectors by warping in from another star system from the correct direction or by placing a waypoint using the registry and then warping directly to that waypoint.

[c][ff0000]Always make sure you have enough [-][/c][c][00ff00]Pentaxid[-][/c][c][ff0000] and other supplies![-][/c]
[c][ffff00]It is strongly recommended that you do not leave any ships behind in this sector as it can be difficult to return.[-][/c]

New Empyriopedia section unlocked in PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]:
"[c][00ffff]Project Eden:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]The Galaxy[-][/c]"
Chinese (simplified):
你完成了一次到另一个星系的曲速飞行. 恭喜你，你已经离开了你开始的太阳系!

当你曲速到其他恒星系时，你会在恒星附近的6个[c][00ff00]隐藏跃迁结束点[-][/c]中的一个结束跳跃. 这些隐藏点无法选择或者直接曲速到达，那里的建设系统是禁用的. 你只能从另一个恒星系从正确的方向返回到这些跃迁点，或者通过手动设置路径点的方式设置一个路径点，然后直接跳跃到那个路径点.

[c][ff0000]永远确保你拥有足够的 [-][/c][c][00ff00]翘曲水晶[-][/c][c][ff0000]和其他的补给![-][/c]
[c][ffff00]强烈建议你不要在这个跃迁点留下任何船只，因为它可能很难返回.[-][/c]

新的帝国百科条目已经在PDA中解锁 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]:
"[c][00ffff]伊甸园计划:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]银河系[-][/c]"
一条消息马上就会出现.

English: Wait for the tutorial to finish.

You have arrived in the star cluster known as Decay.
This area of space is a work in progress and not complete yet.

You are free to explore it, but you will have to bring resources with you through the warp gate.
You will need your [c][ff8000]Progenitor Translation Key[-][/c] created from research at UCH Research Vessels.

[c][ffffff]Also...[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]You're being watched.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
你们已经到达了被称为衰变的星团的星系
这个领域的空间是还在施工中，它还没有完成.

你可以自由地探索它，但你必须带着资源通过曲速之门.
你需要你的 [c][ff8000]起源传送钥匙[-][/c] 在联合舰队(UCH联合舰队)的研究船只上船创建研究项目.

[c][ffffff]另外...[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]你处于被监视的状态.[/i][-][/c]

English: Wait for the tutorial to finish.
New Empyriopedia section unlocked in PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]:\n"[c][00ffff]Project Eden:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]Hacking and Research[-][/c]"
Chinese (simplified): 新的帝国百科条目已经在PDA中解锁 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]:\n"[c][00ffff]伊甸园计划:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]黑客和研究[-][/c]"

English:
[c][abd1ff]Throughout your travels in some areas of space you may encounter alien Data Caches, Relays, or other hackable structures.

These structures are invulnerable and you must solve a puzzle of some kind to get inside of them. You won't always succeed. Sometimes you have a limited time or number of attempts before the structure self destructs or shuts down.

Often you can find special loot.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]当你的太空之旅进行到某些区域时，你可能会遇到外星人的数据存储，中继站，又或者其他可以黑入的结构.这些结构本身是坚不可摧的，你必须解开某种谜题才能进入它们的内部。你不一定会总是成功。一般来说，结构自毁总是伴随着时间/尝试次数\n\n你往往可以在里面找到一些好东西.[-][/c]

English: This section explains how hacking and research works.
Chinese (simplified): 本节解释黑客和研究的工作原理.

English: [c][ffff00][u][b]WARNING:[/b][/u][-][/c] Approaching Kriel blockade!\nTurn back now to avoid ship destruction.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][u][b]警告:[/b][/u][-][/c] 接近Kriel克里尔封锁区!\n现在返回，避免船被毁.

English: [c][ffff00][u][b]WARNING:[/b][/u][-][/c] Approaching Kriel blockade!\nTurn back now to avoid ship destruction.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][u][b]警告:[/b][/u][-][/c] 接近Kriel克里尔封锁区!\n现在返回，避免船被毁.

English: Throughout your travels in some areas of space you may encounter alien Data Caches, Relays, or other hackable structures.\n\nThese structures are invulnerable and you must solve a puzzle of some kind to get inside of them. You won't always succeed. Sometimes you have a limited time or number of attempts before the structure self destructs or shuts down.
Chinese (simplified): 在你的旅行在空间的某些领域，你可能会遇到外星人的数据缓存，中继，或者其他可攻击的结构.这些结构是坚不可摧的，你必须解开某种谜题才能进入它们的内部.你不会总是成功.有时，在结构自销毁或者关闭之前，您有一个有限的时间或者尝试次数.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Many hackable objects will contain various data chips. These chips can be turned in to the lead researchers on UCH Research Vessels.

Turning in data chips will reward you with credits and research points. Obtain enough research points and you can create various items.
Research points are not shareable between players, but you can give all your data chips to one person to turn in.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]许多可破解的对象将包含各种数据芯片.这些芯片可以在UCH研究船上交给主要研究人员.\n\n上交数据芯片可以获得学分和研究分数.获得足够的研究点，你可以创建各种项目.研究点不能在玩家之间共享，但你可以把你所有的数据芯片给一个人上交.[-][/c]

English: Find the [c][ff0000]Red[-][/c] Key Card somewhere in the ship. The Red Key Card will be labeled. To obtain it, stand next to it.
Chinese (simplified): 在这艘船上找到[c][ff0000]红色[-][/c]钥匙卡.红色钥匙卡将被标记.要得到它，就站在它旁边.

English: You remember some of the guards carrying colored key cards. Obtain the [c][ff0000]red[-][/c] and [c][ffff00]yellow[-][/c] key card.\nAlso be on the lookout for any logs or information on the bridge to help you survive this planet.
Chinese (simplified): 你还记得有几个卫兵拿着有色的钥匙卡.获得[c][ff0000]红色[-][/c]和[c][ffff00]黄色[-][/c]钥匙卡.也要注意任何日志或者关于舰桥的信息，以帮助你在这个星球上生存.

English: Find the [c][ffff00]Yellow [-][/c]Key Card somewhere in the ship. The Yellow Key Card will be labeled. To obtain it, stand next to it.
Chinese (simplified): 在这艘船上找到[c][ff0000]黄色[-][/c]钥匙卡.黄色钥匙卡将被标记.要得到它，就站在它旁边.

English: You obtained the [c][ffff00]Yellow [-][/c]Key Card.\nIt might be worth taking a moment to look around for any pieces of information on the bridge that might help you survive on the planet.
Chinese (simplified): 你获得了[c][ffff00]黄色 [-][/c]钥匙卡.\n花点时间四处看看关于这座舰桥的任何信息，可能会帮助你在这个星球上生存下来，这可能是值得的.

English: Read the console on the bridge for vital intel on the planet.
Chinese (simplified): 读取舰桥上的控制台获取关于这个星球的重要情报.

English: This console appears to be unlocked. Perhaps you can find some information by accessing it.
Chinese (simplified): 此控制台似乎已解锁.也许您可以通过访问它找到一些信息.
先祖章节1: [c][ff00ff]一份衰变的遗产[-][/c]

English:
[b][c][ffffff]Location:[-][/c][/b] [c][00ff00]Decay Star Cluster[-][/c]
[b][c][ffffff]Difficulty:[-][/c][/b] [c][ff0000]Hard[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]This mission is unlocked after traveling through the Ancient Warp Gate.[/i][-][/c]

The Decay cluster is full of ancient and dead stars.
Too far for standard communications, you will need to establish a communications relay to make contact with UCH Command.

Establish a small space station near the Ancient Warp Gate on the Decay side of the Decay-Andromeda gate to act as a communications relay.
You will first need to place down a [c][00ff00]Base Starter[-][/c] block and then add the following to it:
[c][00ff00]1x Generator[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]1x Fuel Tank[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]1x Antenna[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
You will need to bring resources and a [c][ff8000]Progenitor Translation Matrix[-][/c] with you through the gate.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffffff]位置:[-][/c][/b] [c][00ff00]衰变星团[-][/c]
[b][c][ffffff]难度:[-][/c][/b] [c][ff0000]困难[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]该任务会在通过远古折跃门后解锁.[/i][-][/c]

衰变星团充满了古老的和死亡的恒星.对于标准通信来说太远了，您将需要建立一个通信中继来与UCH命令进行联系.在“堕落-仙女座”星门的“堕落”侧的“远古曲速门”附近建立一个小型空间站，作为通信中继器.
你需要布置一个[c][00ff00]基地核心[-][/c] 块然后添加跟踪记号:
[c][00ff00]1台发电机[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]1x燃料罐[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]1x天线[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
你将需要带着资源和一个 [c][ff8000]先祖翻译矩阵[-][/c] 通过大门.

English: Establish Communications Relay at Decay Gate
Chinese (simplified): 在衰变之门建立通信中继

English: Place an antenna on your new base.
Chinese (simplified): 在你的新基地布置一个天线.

English:
[c][ffffff][b]Incoming transmission:[/b][-][/c] Hello? Ca-[i]crrrkkk[/i]-you hear me? We've Boo-[i]zrrrkk[/i]-sted the signal but it-[i]crrkkk[/i]-low.
Ah, you made it to Decay. Tr-[i]zrrrkkk[/i]-what happen-[i]zrrrkkk[/i].....
[i][c][ffffff]You believe UCH is asking you to investigate the Decay star cluster to find out what happened to the Progenitors.[-][/c][/i]
[i][c][ffffff]You will likely also need a [-][/c][c][ff8000]Progenitor Translation Key[-][/c][c][ffffff] from a UCH Research Vessel.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][b]有讯号接入:[/b][-][/c] 你好? 你-[i]crrrkkk[/i]-你能听到我说的画么? 我们已经 布-[i]zrrrkk[/i]-置了讯号但-[i]crrkkk[/i]-它太弱了.
啊, 你来到了衰变星系. Tr-[i]zrrrkkk[/i]-发生了什么-[i]zrrrkkk[/i].....
[i][c][ffffff]你相信UCH是要你调查衰变星团是找到，找出发生在祖先身上的事情.[-][/c][/i]
[i][c][ffffff]你可能还需要一个 [-][/c][c][ff8000]先祖传送密码[-][/c][c][ffffff]从UCH研究船那弄到.[-][/c][/i]

English: UCH Command has asked you to investigate what happened to the Progenitors in the Decay star cluster.\nYou should find a Progenitor Interface on one of their planets. You will also need a [c][ff8000]Progenitor Translation Key[-][/c] from a UCH Research Vessel if you don't have one already.
Chinese (simplified): UCH命令已经要求你调查发生在衰变星团的祖先身上的事情\n你应该在他们的一个行星上找到一个先祖接口. 你还需要从UCH研究船那弄来一个[c][ff8000]先祖传送密码[-][/c].

English: Land on any of the Decayed planets in the Decay star cluster
Chinese (simplified): 降落在衰变星团的任何一个衰败的星球上衰变星团

English:
Find a Progenitor Interface on a Decayed planet in the Decay star cluster and download the data to your PDA.
Progenitor Interfaces show up on the planetary map.

You will also need a [c][ff8000]Progenitor Translation Key[-][/c] to access the interface.
Chinese (simplified): 找到一个衰败星球上的祖先界面在衰变星团和下载数据到你的PDA.先祖接口显示在行星地图上.您还需要一个[c][ff8000]先祖翻译密钥[-][/c]来访问该接口.

English: The Progenitor Interface should show up on the map as a distinct signal. Find it and see if you can access it.
Chinese (simplified): 始祖接口应该在地图上显示为一个明显的信号.找到它，看看你是否可以访问它.

English: The Progenitor Interface should show up on the map as a distinct signal. Find it and see if you can access it.
Chinese (simplified): 始祖接口应该在地图上显示为一个明显的信号.找到它，看看你是否可以访问它.

English: You have received a warning message addressed directly to you from the Progenitors. Whether some of them survived or if it's just an advanced form of AI you do not know.\nEmbedded in the data you've collected are hidden codes. You should transmit them to UCH Command.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经收到了来自始祖的警告信息.他们中的一些人是否幸存或者如果这只是一种高级形式的人工智能，你不知道.内嵌在你收集的数据中是隐藏的代码.你应该把它们传送给UCH指挥部.
回到衰败星系的仙女座之门
返回衰败星系-仙女座之门

English: Return to the Decay side of the Decay-Andromeda gate and transmit the data you obtained to UCH Command using your communications relay station.
Chinese (simplified): 回到衰败星系-仙女座星门的衰败星系侧，用你们的通信中继站将你们获得的数据传送给UCH指挥部.

English: Warp to the Decay-Andromeda Gate and return to your communications relay station on the Decay side of the gate to transmit your data back to UCH Command.
Chinese (simplified): 曲速到衰败星系-仙女座之门，返回到你在星门衰败星系一侧的通讯中继站，将你的数据传送回UCH指挥部.

English: [c][ffffff][b]Incoming transmission:[/b][-][/c] You found something? Do you really-[c][ffffff][i]crrrkkk[/i][-][/c]-a good idea? Embedded data? Yes we will get to work decod-[i][c][ffffff]zzrrrpp[-][/c][/i]-ing that right awa-[i][c][ffffff]zrrrkk[-][/c][/i]-. Transmite the data and give us a few moments and we -[c][ffffff][i]crrrkkkk[/i][-][/c]-contact you momentarily. UCH Command-[i][c][ffffff]crrkkzzzkk[-][/c][/i].\n[i][c][ffffff]It seems UCH Command wants you to wait a few minutes while they decode the data.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][b]有讯号接入:[/b][-][/c] 你发现了什么? 你真的有-[c][ffffff][i]crrrkkk[/i][-][/c]-个好主意? 嵌入式数据?是的我们将开始工作 decod-[i][c][ffffff]zzrrrpp[-][/c][/i]-ing 正确的方 awa-[i][c][ffffff]zrrrkk[-][/c][/i]-.传送数据，给我们一点时间，然后我们立刻联 -[c][ffffff][i]crrrkkkk[/i][-][/c]-contact 系你. UCH 指挥部-[i][c][ffffff]crrkkzzzkk[-][/c][/i].\n[i][c][ffffff]似乎UCH命令想要你等待一些分钟，而他们解码数据.[-][/c][/i]

English: Stay in the sector and wait for UCH Command to finish decoding the data.
Chinese (simplified): 留在星区和等待UCH指挥部完成解码数据.

English: Wait for UCH Command to transmit the decoded data back to you.
Chinese (simplified): 等待UCH指挥部把解码后的数据传回给你.
回到衰败星系的仙女座之门
返回衰败星系-仙女座之门

English: Return to the Decay side of the Decay-Andromeda gate to receive the transmission from UCH Command.
Chinese (simplified): 回到衰败星系-仙女座星门的衰败星系侧，用你们的通信中继站将你们获得的数据传送给UCH指挥部.

English: You transmit your data to the actual UCH Command. Unfortunately whoever you first sent the data to can probably guess where you'll be going next. Best to watch your back...
Chinese (simplified): 您将数据传输到实际的UCH指挥部.不幸的是，无论您将数据发送给谁，他都可能猜到您的下一个目的地.最好小心点……

English:
[c][97e1ff]You need to find out the state of Terran forces in Andromeda. Find a [-][/c][c][00afff]UCH Research Vessel[-][/c] in space and make contact. You will need a warp capable Small Vessel or Capital Vessel, depending on the distance you need to warp.

[c][00afff]UCH Research Vessels[-][/c] can be found in the [c][00ff00]Alpha[-][/c], [c][00ff00]Beta[-][/c], [c][00ff00]Delta[-][/c], and [c][00ff00]Epsilon[-][/c] starting systems, or randomly in some [c][00ff00]G-class[-][/c] star systems. They appear on the solar system map as a [c][00afff]blue triangle[-][/c].
Completing this mission will unlock additional missions and the [c][00ff00]Project Eden Empyriopedia [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].

[c][ffffff][i]These objectives can be manually completed if needed.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][97e1ff]你需要找出人类舰队在仙女座的情况.在太空中找到[-][/c][c][00afff]UCH研究船[-][/c] 并达成联系. 你将需要一艘能够跃迁的小型飞船或者主力舰，这取决于你需要跃迁的距离.

[c][00afff]UCH研究船[-][/c] 可以在 [c][00ff00]Alpha[-][/c]， [c][00ff00]Beta[-][/c]， [c][00ff00]Delta[-][/c]， 或者 [c][00ff00]Epsilon[-][/c] 的初始星系中， 或者随机在一些 [c][00ff00]G型[-][/c]恒星系中找到. 它们在太阳系地图上以[c][00afff]蓝色三角形[-][/c]的形式出现.
完成这个任务将解锁额外的任务和[c][00ff00]伊甸园计划百科条目 [-][/c][c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].

[c][ffffff][i]这些目标可以在需要时手动完成.[/i][-][/c]

English: Your sensors detect a UCH research ship in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): 你的传感器在这个区域发现了一艘UCH研究船.

English: Approach the UCH Research Vessel in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): 接近这个星区的UCH研究船.

English: Place down a Base Starter block while near the Decay-Andromeda gate.
Chinese (simplified): 在衰败星系-仙女座之门附近放置一个基地核心块.

English: Place a Generator on your new base.
Chinese (simplified): 放置一台发电机在你的新基地.

English: Place a Fuel Tank on your new base.
Chinese (simplified): 放置一个燃料罐在你的新基地.

English: Start by crafting 50 Large Fuel Packs. Remember that it creates 2 per crafting job, so you only need to queue up 25 crafting jobs.
Chinese (simplified): 开始制作50个大型燃料包.记住，它每个制造任务创造2个产品，所以你只需要排队25个制造任务.

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Location:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Polaris Mining Operations around D class stars in Polaris or Neutral territory[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Difficulty:[/b][-][/c] [c][00ff00]Easy[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Repeatable:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Yes[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Objectives:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Craft 50 Large Fuel Packs (25 crafts) and deliver them to a Mining Quartermaster onboard a Polaris Mining Foreman vessel[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
One of our mining operations is running low on fuel. If you could craft 50 fresh Large Fuel Packs and deliver them to the Mining Quartermaster on board Mining Foreman vessels in one of our mining operations, we would pay you a fair price.
Please note that the Mining Quartermaster is extremely picky and will only accept freshly energized fuel packs and they inspect them upon delivery, so don't try to pass off old fuel packs you found in your cargo hold.

You can find Polaris Mining Operations in some D or M class systems. They appear on the solar system map as an orange triangle and will specify that they are a Polaris Mining Operation in the map description. But they won't be in every system.
You can also rarely find a Mining Foreman in orbit around planets in G class star systems.

[c][ffff00]Don't try to mine the asteroids there as they are claimed by Polaris Megacorp.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]位置:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]极星在极星或者中立区域的D类恒星附近采矿[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]难度:[/b][-][/c] [c][00ff00]简单[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]可重复任务:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Yes[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]目标:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]制造50大型燃料包(25个流程)，并交付他们到极星采矿母舰的一个采矿军需官上[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
我们的一个采矿作业的燃料快用完了.如果你能制作 50新鲜的大型燃料包，并交付给我们的采矿军需官，它在一艘采矿作业中的采矿工头舰船上.我们会支付你一个公平的价格.请注意，采矿军需官是极其挑剔的，只会接受新通电的燃料包，他们在交付时检查他们，所以不要试图给对方你货舱里发现的旧燃料包.你可以在一些D或者M类星系找到极星采矿飞船.它们在太阳系地图上以橙色三角形的形式出现，并在地图描述中指定它们是极星采矿作业.但它们不会出现在每个星系中.你偶尔也可以在在G类恒星系统的行星轨道上找到一个采矿飞船.[c][ffff00]不要试图开采那里的小行星，因为它们被极星巨型企业声称占有.[-][/c]

English: Place 50 Large Fuel Packs in inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 在个人库存中里放置50个大型燃料包.

English: Place 50 Large Fuel Packs in your personal inventory to transfer them to the Polaris Mining Quartermaster.
Chinese (simplified): 在你的个人库存中放置50个大型燃料包，将它们转移给极星采矿军需官.

English:
[c][00ffff][-][/c][c][00ffff][b]Location:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Polaris Mining Operations around D class stars in Polaris or Neutral territory[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Difficulty:[/b][-][/c] [c][00ff00]Easy[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Repeatable:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Yes[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Objectives:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Craft 50 Large Fuel Packs (25 crafts) and deliver them to a Mining Quartermaster onboard a Polaris Mining Foreman vessel[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
One of our mining operations is running low on fuel. If you could craft 50 fresh Large Fuel Packs and deliver them to the Mining Quartermaster on board Mining Foreman vessels in one of our mining operations, we would pay you a fair price.
Please note that the Mining Quartermaster is extremely picky and will only accept freshly energized fuel packs and they inspect them upon delivery, so don't try to pass off old fuel packs you found in your cargo hold.

You can find Polaris Mining Operations in some D or M class systems. They appear on the solar system map as an orange triangle and will specify that they are a Polaris Mining Operation in the map description. But they won't be in every system.
You can also rarely find a Mining Foreman in orbit around planets in G class star systems.

[c][ffff00]Don't try to mine the asteroids there as they are claimed by Polaris Megacorp.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][-][/c][c][00ffff][b]位置:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]极星在极星或者中立区域的D类恒星附近采矿[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]难度:[/b][-][/c] [c][00ff00]简单[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]可重复任务:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Yes[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]目标:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]制造50大型燃料包(25个流程)，并交付他们到极星采矿母舰的一个采矿军需官上[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
我们的一个采矿作业的燃料快用完了.如果你能制作 50新鲜的大型燃料包，并交付给我们的采矿军需官，它在一艘采矿作业中的采矿工头舰船上.我们会支付你一个公平的价格.请注意，采矿军需官是极其挑剔的，只会接受新通电的燃料包，他们在交付时检查他们，所以不要试图给对方你货舱里发现的旧燃料包.你可以在一些D或者M类星系找到极星采矿飞船.它们在太阳系地图上以橙色三角形的形式出现，并在地图描述中指定它们是极星采矿作业.但它们不会出现在每个星系中.你偶尔也可以在在G类恒星系统的行星轨道上找到一个采矿飞船.[c][ffff00]不要试图开采那里的小行星，因为它们被极星巨型企业声称占有.[-][/c]

English: Start by crafting 50 Large Fuel Packs. Remember that it creates 2 per crafting job, so you only need to queue up 25 crafting jobs.
Chinese (simplified): 开始制作50个大型燃料包.记住，它每个制造任务创造2个产品，所以你只需要排队25个制造任务.

English: You have the fuel packs. Now you need to find a Polaris Mining Foreman vessel in a Polaris Mining Operation. You can find them in Polaris Mining Operations around D or M class stars in neutral or Polaris territory. Look on the solar system map for an orange triangle.
Chinese (simplified): 你有燃料包了.现在你需要找到一个极星采矿工头舰船在极星采矿操作.你可以在一些D或者M类星系找到极星采矿飞船.它们在太阳系地图上以橙色三角形的形式出现
放置250000资金在玩家钱包里

English: Are you sure you want to skip? You can activate this mission from the PDA at any time.
Chinese (simplified): 你确定要跳过吗?你可以在任何时候从PDA激活这个任务.

English:
So you got on the bad side of Polaris Megacorp? We are willing to... Forgive... Your past transgressions.
We can raise your reputation to neutral... For a price.
Obtain 250,000 money cards and be ready to transfer them to us. Then we will no longer consider you an enemy of Polaris... For now. Consider this a second chance.

[i][c][ffffff]This mission will subtract 250,000 money cards from your player inventory as soon as you have them.[-][/c][/i]
[i][c][ffffff]This mission is intended if you have an unfriendly or hostile reputation with Polaris and can only be completed twice.[-][/c][/i]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c][c][ff0000]Only activate this mission if you are sure you want to pay Polaris Megacorp 250,000 credits.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
这么说你得罪了极星大公司了?我们愿意……原谅……你过去的罪过.我们可以把你的声誉提升到中立…对于你支付的价格来说.
当你获得总金额250000的资金卡并准备和我们交易的时候. 那我们就不再认为你是的敌人了极星... 现在.把这当作第二次机会吧.

[i][c][ffffff]这个任务将从你的玩家背包中减去25万张现金卡，只要你有这么多钱.[-][/c][/i]
[i][c][ffffff]这个任务的目的是，如果你在极星不过这个任务只能完成2次.[-][/c][/i]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c][c][ff0000]只有当你确定你想要支付极星联合企业 250000积分时才激活这个任务.[-][/c]

English: I thank you for contributing to my retirement fund. You are no longer considered an enemy by Polaris, but you better be on your best behavior from now on.
Chinese (simplified): 我感谢你为我的退休基金捐款.你不再被极星企业视为敌人，但从现在开始你最好得表现良好一些.

English: [c][ff0000]Are you sure you want to pay Polaris Megacorp 250,000 credits?[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff][i]This mission will raise your reputation to neutral, can only be completed twice, and cannot be undone.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000]你确定你想支付极星企业 25万积分吗?[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff][i]这个任务将提升你的声誉到中立，只能完成两次，并且不能撤消.[/i][-][/c]

English: Warp to the Dyson Sphere System in the center of the Decay star cluster
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到衰变星团中央的戴森球星系

English: You transmit your data to the actual UCH Command. Unfortunately whoever you first sent the data to can probably guess where you'll be going next. Best to watch your back...Inside the data you transmitted, UCH Command has found mention of a larger structure near the middle of the Decay star cluster. This might possibly be a Dyson Sphere.\nYou should find this Dyson Sphere and warp to it.
Chinese (simplified): 您将数据传输到实际的uch指挥部.不幸的是，无论您将数据发送给谁，他都可能猜到您的下一个目的地.最好小心点......在你传输的数据里面，UCH命令发现提到了一个更大的结构附近的衰变星团.这可能是戴森球.你应该找到这个戴森球并跃迁到它周围.

English:
You arrive at the Dyson Sphere. A Dyson Sphere is created so a civilization can harness all of the power of a star. Whoever built this colossal structure must have been more advanced than humans by millions of years.
You should warp to each of the observation points around the sphere to take scans of the structure and find a way in.

[i][c][ffff00]Be prepared for anything. You don't know who else is looking...[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified): 到达戴森球.戴森球体的诞生是为了让一个文明能够利用恒星的所有力量.建造这座巨型建筑的人一定比人类先进数百万年.你应该跃迁到球体周围的每个观察点来扫描结构，找到一个进入的方式\n\n[i][c][ffff00]做好一切准备.你不知道还有谁在注视着你...[-][/c][/i]
跃迁到戴森球观察点位置

English: Warp to Sphere Observation Point 1 in the Dyson Sphere System in the Decay star cluster.
Chinese (simplified): 戴森球观察点位置1 在衰变星团的戴森球星系.

English: Warp to Sphere Observation Point 2 in the Dyson Sphere System in the Decay star cluster.
Chinese (simplified): 戴森球观察点位置2 在衰变星团的戴森球星系.

English: Warp to Sphere Observation Point 3 in the Dyson Sphere System in the Decay star cluster.
Chinese (simplified): 戴森球观察点位置3 在衰变星团的戴森球星系.

English: Warp to Sphere Observation Point 4 in the Dyson Sphere System in the Decay star cluster.
Chinese (simplified): 戴森球观察点位置4 在衰变星团的戴森球星系.

English: Warp to each of the 4 Sphere Observation locations within the current system.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到当前星系中4个戴森球观察点位置中的每一个.

English: You take a scan of this side of the sphere.
You take a scan of this side of the sphere.
You take a scan of this side of the sphere.
You take a scan of this side of the sphere.

During your scans you detected several anomalies just under the surface of the outer shell of the dyson sphere. The energy signature is consistent with that of the portal technology used at the warp gate. Perhaps further investigation of Progenitor structures in the Decay star cluster will reveal a way inside?
Chinese (simplified): 在您的扫描过程中，您发现在戴森球外壳的表面下有几个异常.能量特征与传送门上使用的传送门技术一致.也许进一步的研究在衰变星团的祖先结构将揭示一个方法?

English: [c][ffffff][i]This mission ends here but is a work in progress.[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffffff][i]More will be added in the future.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]任务到此结束，但工作仍在进行中.[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffffff][i]更多在未来将被添加.[/i][-][/c]

English: Is this thing on? ...He-hello? Please, there's not much time. You have to listen to me! We tried to escape! We tried to leave but it was too late. Our fate was not caused by a natural event! Beware the...
Chinese (simplified): 这东西开着吗?…他招呼?拜托，时间不多了.你得听我说!我们试图逃跑!我们试图离开，但已经太晚了.我们的命运不是由自然事件造成的!要小心…

English: To anyone listening... It wasn't natural. The radiation that burned our world didn't come from our sun like we thought. We discovered evidence that this happened to other planets. May this serve as a warning.
Chinese (simplified): 有人听到了么……这不是自然的.燃烧我们世界的辐射并不像我们想象的那样来自太阳.我们发现了其他行星也发生过这种情况的证据.希望这可以作为一个警告.

English: We picked it up on long range radar years ago, but we didn't know what it was until it was too late. A black sphere, glowing with an eerie greenish light...
Chinese (simplified): 多年前我们在远程雷达上发现了它，但我们不知道它是什么，直到为时已晚.一个黑色的球体，发出诡异的绿光……

English: Is anyone out there? Help us, please. We thought it was a natural geological event. We waited but the volcanic activity never subsided. That's when we picked it up, on the other side of the sun. An object, of unknown origin emitting gravitational waves to destroy our planet.
Chinese (simplified): 有人在吗?请帮助我们.我们认为这是自然地质事件.我们等待了，但是火山活动从未平息.那是我们在太阳的另一边发现它的时候.一个来历不明的物体发射引力波毁灭我们的星球.

English: We thought the artifact was going to be our undoing. It drove us to madness. Pitting sister against sister and nation against nation. We were wrong. The artifact merely attracted something far worse. It came to destroy the artifact, and us.
Chinese (simplified): 我们以为藏物会毁了我们.它把我们逼疯了.姐妹对抗姐妹，民族对抗民族.我们错了.那件藏物只是吸引了更糟糕的东西.它来摧毁藏物，还有我们.

English: We had no choice. Our planet was being torn apart by a madness that spread like an infection. We had to launch the nukes. We had to... Oh Ashriz, what have we done? Please, if there's anyone reading this message... You are not alone. They are coming.
Chinese (simplified): 我们别无选择.我们的星球正被像传染病一样蔓延的疯狂所撕裂.我们必须发射核武器.我们不得不……阿什里兹，我们做了什么?拜托，如果有人看到这条信息…你并不孤单.他们来了.

English: Bring Fuel Packs to Mining Quartermaster
Chinese (simplified): 将燃料包带到采矿军需官处

English: Speak with Quartermaster with Fuel Packs in inventory
Chinese (simplified): 带着燃料包和军需官说话

English: Speak with the Mining Quartermaster on board a Mining Foreman vessel. You can find them in Polaris Mining Operations around D or M class stars in neutral or Polaris territory. Look on the solar system map for an orange triangle.\nMake sure to have 50 Large Fuel Packs in your personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 在采矿母舰上和采矿军需官说话.你可以在一些D或者M类星系找到极星采矿飞船.它们在太阳系地图上以橙色三角形的形式出现.\nMake sure to have 50 Large Fuel Packs in your personal inventory.

English: Speak with the Mining Quartermaster on a Polaris Mining Foreman vessel.\nYou can find them in Polaris Mining Operations around D or M class stars in neutral or Polaris territory. Look on the solar system map for an orange triangle.
Chinese (simplified): 在采矿母舰上和采矿军需官说话.\n你可以在一些D或者M类星系找到极星采矿飞船.它们在太阳系地图上以橙色三角形的形式出现.

杀死Zirax 开膛狗. 你可以在Zirax基地附近找到它们.

[c][ffffff][i]任何开膛狗都会计入统计，不管所属派系.[/i][-][/c]

English: Destroy any Minigun Drones. You can find them patrolling on some planets.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁any火神炮无人机. 你可以在一些行星上找到正在巡逻的他们.

English: Return to a UCH Research Vessel and speak with the Captain to obtain your reward.\nCaptains of the UCHN Discovery, Explorer, Pathfinder, and Odyssey will not accept this mission.
Chinese (simplified): 返回UCH研究船，并与舰长对话以获得您的奖励.\nUCHN发现者，探索者，探路者和奥德赛的舰长将不接受这个任务.

English: Return to a UCH Research Vessel and speak with the Captain to obtain your reward.\nCaptains of the UCHN Discovery, Explorer, Pathfinder, and Odyssey will not accept this mission.

English: Return to a UCH Research Vessel and speak with the Captain to obtain your reward.\nCaptains of the UCHN Discovery, Explorer, Pathfinder, and Odyssey will not accept this mission.
Chinese (simplified): 返回UCH研究船，并与舰长对话以获得您的奖励.\nUCHN发现者，探索者，探路者和奥德赛的舰长将不接受这个任务.

English: Warp to Sphere Access Point 1 in the Dyson Sphere System in the Decay star cluster.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到戴森球入口位置 1 在衰变星团的戴森球星系.

English: From the scans you took you were able to pinpoint the location of a possible access point to the sphere. Warp to Sphere Access 1.\nBe prepared for anything.
Chinese (simplified): 从你所做的扫描中你可以确定一个可能通往球体的入口的位置. 跃迁到戴森球入口1.\n做好万全准备.

English: [c][ffff00]WARNING:[-][/c] Active Progenitor Defenses detected.\n[i][c][ffffff]USE EXTREME CAUTION[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00]警告:[-][/c] 侦测到先祖的主动防御系统.\n[i][c][ffffff]要非常谨慎[-][/c][/i]

English: Find a way into the sphere
Chinese (simplified): 找到一条路进入戴森球

English: Find a way into the Dyson Sphere. You will have to defeat the Progenitor Defenses and access the Space Elevator.
Chinese (simplified): 找到一条路进入戴森球. 你必须打败先祖防御系统并进入太空电梯.

English: Access the console to claim your reward. Make sure you have room in your personal inventory and are in a safe place.
Chinese (simplified): 访问控制台以获取奖励.确保你的个人物品清单有足够的空间，并且放在安全的地方.

English: You will need to defeat the powerful Progenitor defenses guarding the space elevator.\nFind a way into the Dyson Sphere.
Chinese (simplified): 你需要打败守卫太空电梯的强大先祖防御系统.\n找到一条路进入戴森球.

English: Enter the Last Cry of Refuge instance.\nThe instance can be accessed in The Ark on the planet Maveth.
Chinese (simplified): 进入避难所最后的呼喊讯息.讯息可以在Maveth星球上的方舟中被访问.

English: Speak with the captain at the forward command post in the Last Cry of Refuge simulation.
Chinese (simplified): 在避难所最后的呼喊模拟中，在前方指挥所与舰长对话.
戴森球能源系统已经摧毁

English: Destroy a green power sphere located on the bottom of the alien attack spheres near the Lab.
Chinese (simplified): 在外星攻击球的底部的实验室附近摧毁一个绿色的戴森球能源系统.

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Location:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Last Cry of Refuge Instance - Maveth[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Difficulty:[/b][-][/c] [c][ff0000]Hard[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Repeatable:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]No[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Objectives:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Experience the simulation[-][/c]

You have discovered the source of the mysterious signal. It appears to have been broadcasting for hundreds, perhaps thousands of years. Perhaps they intended it to be a warning to other civilizations.

This machine appears capable of interfacing with the Human mind. You can use it to experience memories from a time long ago. Consult the interface panel nearby for more information and then enter the portal when you are ready.

[c][ffff00]WARNING: make sure you are well equipped before entering the simulation![-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]This mission takes place inside an instance. Upon entering, a new version of the playfield is generated and maintained until you leave it or the time limit expires. Group members will have 2 minutes to enter the same portal as you. You may make multiple attempts but will have to start over each time.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]位置:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]最后一声避难讯息- Maveth[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]难度:[/b][-][/c] [c][ff0000]困难[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]可重复任务:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]否[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]目标:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]仿真体验[-][/c]

你已经发现了神秘信号的来源.它似乎已经传播了数百年，甚至数千年.也许他们想借此警告其他文明.这台机器似乎能够与人类的思想交互.你可以用它来体验很久以前的记忆.请咨询附近的界面面板以获得更多信息，然后在准备好时进入门户.

[c][ffff00]警告:在进入模拟之前，请确保您已经准备好了![-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]该任务发生在实例内部.一旦进入，一个新的版本的游戏领域是生成和维护，直到你离开或者的时间限制到期.群组成员将有2分钟进入与您相同的门户.你可以多次尝试，但每次都必须重新开始.[/i][-][/c]

English:
You wake up inside a virtual reality simulation. To save bandwidth, not every experience was saved to memory.
These are the last living moments of a soldier who lived long ago.

Speak to the lab technician to get oriented.
Chinese (simplified): 你在虚拟现实模拟中醒来.为了节省带宽，并不是所有的体验都保存到内存中.这是很久以前一个士兵最后的活着的时刻.与实验室技术员沟通以获得下一步指引.

English: Speak with the captain at the Forward Command Post just outside the front door of the lab.\nIf you cross a bridge you've gone too far.
Chinese (simplified): 请与实验室前门外前沿指挥所的舰长联系.\n如果你穿过舰桥，你就走得太远了.

English: Clear the Artillery Station of all hostiles. Re-arm the Artillery Station using Artillery Shells found in cargo boxes near the Artillery Station.\nUse the artillery turret to destroy one of the smaller green spheres along the bottom of the larger black spheres.
Chinese (simplified): 清除炮台的所有敌人.使用火炮站附近货箱中的炮弹重新武装炮兵站.使用火炮炮塔沿底部较大的黑色球体摧毁一个较小的绿色球体.瞭望台7

English: Find out what happened at Watchpost 7
Chinese (simplified): 找到发生了什么事情，在瞭望台 7

English: Find out why you lost contact with Watchpost 7
Chinese (simplified): 找到找出你与瞭望台7失去联系的原因

English: We've lost contact with Watchpost 7 to the south!\nTake one of the speeders near the lab and head out to investigate!
Chinese (simplified): 我们与南边的瞭望台7失去了联系!在实验室附近找一个“超速者”（载具），然后出去调查!

English: Reroute power at the Eastern Outpost
Chinese (simplified): 改变东部前哨基地的供电线路

English: Find the main power controls in the Eastern Outpost and reroute power to the Ark.
Chinese (simplified): 在东部前哨找到主要的电力控制系统，同时调整线路向方舟供能.

English: Speak to guard in The Ark
Speak to the guard at the Ark.
Take your speeder and travel to the Ark to the South-East. Speak with the guard inside and prepare to make your final stand!
Chinese (simplified): 驾驶你的“超速者”（载具）前往方舟去东南方向.跟里面的守卫说话，准备做最后的抵抗!

English: They've blown a hole to the second level! Quickly, jump down and defend the new position for 3 minutes!
Chinese (simplified): 他们给二楼炸了个洞!快，往下跳，在新位置守卫三分钟!

English: Incoming hostiles! Defend your position for 3 minutes!
Chinese (simplified): 入侵警报!守卫你的位置3分钟!

English: Jump down the hole in the floor
They blew a hole in the floor! Jump down!
Chinese (simplified): 他们在地板上炸了一个洞! 往下跳!
(设置) 生命支持系统开关

English: Flip the life support switch to green.
Chinese (simplified): 调整生命支持系统开关到绿色.

English: Life support power has been rerouted to the mainframe.
Chinese (simplified): 生命支持系统能源已经重新连接到主机上了.

English: Flip the shield switch to green.
Chinese (simplified): 调整护盾系统开关到绿色.

English: Shield Power has been rerouted to the mainframe.
Chinese (simplified): 护盾能源已经重新连接到主机上了.

English: Flip the Cargo switch to green.
Chinese (simplified): 调整仓储系统开关到绿色.

English: Cargo Controller Power has been rerouted to the mainframe.
Chinese (simplified): 仓储系统能源已经重新连接到主机上了.

English: Flip the Farm Power switch to green.
Chinese (simplified): 调整农业系统能源开关到绿色.

English: Farm power has been rerouted to the mainframe.
Chinese (simplified): 农业系统能源已经重新连接到主机上了.

English: Flip the CPU Power switch to green.
Chinese (simplified): 调整 CPU 能源开关到绿色.

English: CPU power has been rerouted to the mainframe.
Chinese (simplified): CPU能源已经重新连接到主机上了.

English: Flip the Generator Power switch to green.
Chinese (simplified): 调整发电机能源开关到绿色.

English: Generator power has been rerouted to the mainframe.
Chinese (simplified): 发电机能源已经重新连接到主机上了.

English: Approach the interface in the middle of the lower level
Chinese (simplified): 接近是底层中间的接口

English: Survive for 3 minutes while defending the Interface chamber
Chinese (simplified): 在保护接口室时存活3分钟

English: Go through the portal in the main interface room to exit the simulation and return to Maveth.
Chinese (simplified): 通过主界面室的门户退出模拟和返回Maveth.

English: Incoming transmission: We're working on getting the doors opened to the lower level. Just stay alive for a few more minutes!
Chinese (simplified): 有讯号接入:我们正在努力打开低层的门.只要多活几分钟分钟!

English: The lower level is open! Jump down and re-route power by turning on the switches in each side room! Then activate the neural interface in the center room by standing under it!
Chinese (simplified): 下面一层打开了!往下跳！通过打开每个侧房间的开关改变能源路线!然后站在中心房间的神经接口下面激活它!

English: The neural interface has begun activating! Defend it for 3 minutes.
Chinese (simplified): 神经接口已经开始激活!捍卫它3分钟.

English: End the simulation by entering the portal.
Your ship computer is analyzing the data found in the logs
Chinese (simplified): 你船上的电脑正在分析日志里的数据

English: You have enough data for your ship's computer to analyze. Please stand by.
Chinese (simplified): 你有足够的数据供飞船的计算机分析.请站住不动.

English: Analysis of data completed. Relaying information to HUD... Please stand by.
Chinese (simplified): 数据分析完成.向HUD传送信息…请站住不动.

English:
[c][ffffff][i]4.6626.15[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]Your ship's computer has isolated a unique subspace frequency found in every log you obtained. You might be able to tune in to this frequency and see if there are any other sources of this subspace signal still active by constructing subspace antennas in several star systems.

[c][00ff00]Warp[-][/c] to a different star system and construct your first subspace antenna in orbit around the star.
You will need to construct a total of 3 subspace antennas around 3 different stars.

You will need to bring with you some basic components for constructing bases. Iron, Silicon, Copper, Cobalt, and Carbon Substrate as well as some fuel.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][i]4.6626.15[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]你们飞船的电脑在你们获得的每一份日志中都分离出了一个独特的亚空间频率.你也许能够调到这个频率，并通过在几个恒星系统中构建亚空间天线来看看是否有这个亚空间信号的任何其他来源仍然活跃.

[c][00ff00]曲速[-][/c]到一个不同的恒星系统，在围绕该恒星的轨道上构建你的第一个亚空间天线.你将需要在大约3颗不同的恒星系构造总共3个亚空间天线.你需要带一些基本的材料来构建基地.比如铁，硅，铜，钴，碳基材以及一些燃料.
跃迁到一颗不同的恒星

English: Warp to a different star system.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到一颗不同的恒星系.
搭建第一座亚空间天线

English:
[i][c][ffffff]4.6626.15[-][/c][/i]
Construct a small subspace antenna in orbit of this star.
You will need to place down a [c][00ff00]Base Starter[-][/c] and then add a [c][00ff00]Generator[-][/c] or [c][00ff00]Solar Panel[-][/c] to it, and then either a [c][00ff00]Fuel Tank[-][/c] or [c][00ff00]Solar Capacitor[-][/c].
You will also need to add an [c][00ff00]Antenna[-][/c] to it.
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]4.6626.15[-][/c][/i]\n在这颗恒星的轨道上建造一个小亚空间天线.\n您需要放置[c][00ff00]基地核心块[-][/c]，然后添加[c][00ff00]发电机[-][/c]或者[c][00ff00]太阳能电池板[-][/c]，以及[c][00ff00]燃油箱[-][/c]或者[c][00ff00]太阳能电容器[-][/c].还需要添加[c][00ff00]天线[-][/c].

English: Place down a [c][00ff00]Base Starter[-][/c] and then add a [c][00ff00]Generator[-][/c] or [c][00ff00]Solar Panel[-][/c] to it, and then either a [c][00ff00]Fuel Tank[-][/c] or [c][00ff00]Solar Capacitor[-][/c], and then add an [c][00ff00]Antenna[-][/c]. You will then need to power on the base in the control panel.
Chinese (simplified): 放置一个[c][00ff00]基地核心块[-][/c],然后添加一个[c][00ff00]发电机[-][/c]或者[c][00ff00]太阳能电池板[-][/c],然后一个[c][00ff00]燃料槽[-][/c]或者[c][00ff00]太阳能电容器[-][/c],然后添加一个[c][00ff00]天线[-][/c].然后，您需要在控制面板上打开基座电源.

English: Place down a Base Starter block
Chinese (simplified): 在衰败星系-仙女座之门附近放置一个基地核心块.

English: Place Fuel Tank or Solar Capacitor
Chinese (simplified): 放置燃料罐或者太阳能电容器

English: Place a Fuel Tank or Solar Capacitor on your new base.
Chinese (simplified): 放置燃料罐或者太阳能电容器在你的基地.
放置发电机或者太阳能板

English: Place a Generator or Solar Panel on your new base.
Chinese (simplified): 放置一个发电机或者太阳能板在你的基地.

English: Place an antenna on your new base.
Chinese (simplified): 在你的新基地布置一个天线.

English: The subspace antenna is ready for operation. Stand by...
Chinese (simplified): 亚空间天线已准备好运行.站在……

English: Wait for your ship computer to analyze the scan results
Chinese (simplified): 等待为您船上的计算机分析扫描结果

English: [c][ffffff][i]Signal 4.6626.15 analyzed. Triangulation 1/3 complete.[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ff00]Warp[-][/c] to a different star system and construct your second subspace antenna in orbit around the star.\nYou will need to construct a total of 3 subspace antennas around 3 different stars.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]信号4.6626.15分析.三角测量完成1/3.[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ff00]跃迁[-][/c]到不同的恒星系，然后在恒星轨道上构建第二个亚空间天线.您将需要在3个不同的恒星总共构建3个亚空间天线.
