English:
Your computer has triangulated the origin of the subspace signal.
The signal is coming from a planet known as [c][00ff00]Maveth[-][/c] in the Aeries Seti system.
Land on this planet.

[c][ffffff][i]You can search for the planet name on the galaxy map.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 你的电脑已经对亚空间信号的原点进行了三角定位.这个信号来自Aeries Seti星系中一颗名为[c][00ff00]Maveth[-][/c]的行星.在这个星球上的土地.\n\n[c][ffffff][i]您可以在银河系地图上搜索行星名称.[/i][-][/c]

English: Open the control panel for your subspace antenna base and flip the power switch ON.
Chinese (simplified): 打开亚空间天线基地和调整电源开关的控制面板.

English: Open the control panel for your subspace antenna base and flip the power switch ON.
Chinese (simplified): 打开亚空间天线基地和调整电源开关的控制面板.

English: Open the control panel for your subspace antenna base and flip the power switch ON.
Chinese (simplified): 打开亚空间天线基地和调整电源开关的控制面板.

English:
[i]Signal 4.6626.15 analyzed. Triangulation complete.[/i]Your computer has triangulated the origin of the subspace signal.
The signal is coming from a planet known as [c][00ff00]Maveth[-][/c] in the [c][00ff00]Aeries Seti[-][/c] system.
Land on this planet.

[c][ffffff][i]You can search for the planet name on the galaxy map.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[i]信号4.6626.15 分析完毕.三角定位完成.[/i]你的计算机已经对亚空间信号的原点进行了三角测量.信号来自[c][00ff00]Maveth[-][/c]的[c][00ff00]Aeries Seti[-][/c]星系.在行星上着陆.

[c][ffffff][i]您可以在银河系地图上搜索行星名称.[/i][-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Location:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Last Cry of Refuge Instance - Maveth[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Difficulty:[/b][-][/c] [c][ff0000]Hard[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Repeatable:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]No[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Objectives:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Experience the simulation[-][/c]

You have discovered the source of the mysterious signal. It appears to have been broadcasting for hundreds, perhaps thousands of years. Perhaps they intended it to be a warning to other civilizations.

This machine appears capable of interfacing with the Human mind. You can use it to experience memories from a time long ago. Consult the interface panel nearby for more information and then enter the portal when you are ready.

[c][ffff00]WARNING: make sure you are well equipped before entering the simulation![-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]This mission takes place inside an instance. Upon entering, a new version of the playfield is generated and maintained until you leave it or the time limit expires. Group members will have 2 minutes to enter the same portal as you. You may make multiple attempts but will have to start over each time.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]位置:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]最后一声避难讯息- Maveth[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]难度:[/b][-][/c] [c][ff0000]困难[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]可重复任务:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]否[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]目标:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]仿真体验[-][/c]

你已经发现了神秘信号的来源.它似乎已经传播了数百年，甚至数千年.也许他们想借此警告其他文明.这台机器似乎能够与人类的思想交互.你可以用它来体验很久以前的记忆.请咨询附近的界面面板以获得更多信息，然后在准备好时进入门户.

[c][ffff00]警告:在进入模拟之前，请确保您已经准备好了![-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]该任务发生在实例内部.一旦进入，一个新的版本的游戏领域是生成和维护，直到你离开或者的时间限制到期.群组成员将有2分钟进入与您相同的门户.你可以多次尝试，但每次都必须重新开始.[/i][-][/c]

English: Pay your respect to the fallen soldier Korvas at his grave on the planet Maveth. You can find the grave slightly East of the Ark.
Chinese (simplified): 向在Maveth星球上牺牲的战士Korvas致敬.你可以在方舟略向东的地方找到坟墓.

English:
Someone must have dragged Korvas's body out of the ruins of the Ark and buried him. Perhaps they also implanted a message in the neural interface leading you here.

Instinctively, you reach under part of the casket and find a schematic for the [c][ff8000]Incendiary Minigun[-][/c] so you can craft your own ammunition for it or replace it if it becomes damaged.

This grave must have been dug sometime after the battle. This means there were survivors. Perhaps their descendants are still out there.
Mentally exhausted from your time in the simulation, you prepare to leave this planet. Whatever destroyed this civilization might return one day and the galaxy must be prepared.
Chinese (simplified): 一定有人把Korvas的尸体从方舟的废墟中拖出来埋葬了，也许他们还在神经界面上植入了引导你来到这里的信息.本能地，你伸手到棺材下面的一部分，找到一张[c][ff8000]燃烧榴弹机枪[-][/c]的图纸，这样你就可以为其制造弹药或是将损坏的进行替换.这个坟墓一定是在战斗结束后的某个时候挖的.这意味着还有幸存者.也许他们的后代还在那里.如此长时间的模拟令你精神疲惫，准备离开这个星球.无论什么摧毁了这个文明，它总有一天会回来，银河系必须做好准备.

English: You suddenly get a strong urge to travel slightly East. Perhaps there is something more to find.\nSee if there is anything to the East. Whatever it is, it must be close by.
Chinese (simplified): 你突然有一种强烈的冲动，想稍微往东走.也许还有更多的东西有待发现.看看东边有没有什么东西.不管是什么，肯定就在附近.

English: Find the source of the mysterious subspace signal on Maveth
Chinese (simplified): 找到是Maveth上神秘亚空间信号的来源

English: Find a central control room inside The Ark on the planet Maveth
Chinese (simplified): 在Maveth星球上的The Ark找到中央控制室

English: You have awoken from the virtual reality simulation and get your bearings. Whatever happened to these people, you vow to not repeat history.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经从虚拟现实模拟中醒来，并辨明了自己的位置.不管这些人发生了什么，你发誓不会重蹈覆辙.

English: Find the source of the signal on Maveth.

\nYou have found the source of the signal. It appears to be an abandoned structure of a technologically advanced civilization. There appears to be battle damage. Your sensors have pinpointed the source of the signal to be in the bottom level of the structure. Find the source of the signal.
Chinese (simplified): \n你已经找到了信号的来源，这似乎是一个技术先进文明的废弃建筑.这里似乎有战斗损伤.你的传感器已经确定了信号的来源，在结构的底层找到讯号源.

English: The captain hands you an [c][ff8000]Incendiary Minigun[-][/c] to help clear the Artillery Station of hostile forces. Use the ammo sparingly!
Chinese (simplified): 舰长给了你一把[c][ff8000]燃烧榴弹机枪[-][/c]来帮助你清除的炮兵阵地的敌方部队，弹药不多，省着点用!
在你的起始星球上生存
探索你的起始恒星系统

English: How to survive your starting planet
Chinese (simplified): 如何在你的起始星球生存

English:
Your priorities and needs can vary depending on your choice of starting planet and game difficulty options. This is just general guidance.

First, make sure your immediate surroundings are safe then read over any [c][00ff00]starting mission text[-][/c] (if there is any) and the information in the [c][00ff00]planet description[-][/c]. You can usually get a good idea of what you need to do based on those two things.

Next you will need to find some Iron Ore if you didn't start with a [c][00ff00]Portable Constructor[-][/c]. On some planets this can be a challenge and you will have to travel far before you find your first iron. Once you've built a [c][00ff00]Portable Constructor[-][/c] you can use it to convert [c][00ff00]Crushed Stone[-][/c] into basic ores.
Food can be obtained from wild [c][00ff00]plants [-][/c]and [c][00ff00]animals[-][/c], or from your starting missions.
If you are on a planet without oxygen, you will also need to set up a [c][00ff00]O2 Condenser[-][/c] to obtain oxygen.

Some planets can have [c][ff0000]dangerous wildlife[-][/c], [c][ff0000]soldiers[-][/c], or [c][ff0000]drones [-][/c]hunting you, or[c][ff0000] extreme environments[-][/c] with radiation, temperature, or weather hazards. Check the planet description for any warnings.
You will need to think of creative solutions to dealing with the obstacles that you face. Some general hints:

[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]Some wildlife will run away when damaged. Use this to keep them away from you.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]Pay attention to tooltips on wild plants. Some can cure ailments, but may cause food poisoning in the process.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]Headshots deal more damage, especially against humanoids.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]If you have a jetpack, hiding on top of a rock can give you temporary safety from predators.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]Drones can be intimidating enemies, but shooting them can disorient them and aiming for the red dot deals bonus damage. Pistols, assault rifles, and especially sniper rifles are more effective against drones than your shotgun or survival tool.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]You can use the player drone to mine, scout, or retrieve a lost backpack.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]The Survival Tool can harvest surface rocks, mine, damage enemies, and salvage blocks or devices, but it does these things poorly.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]Promethium can sometimes be difficult to find but you can substitute bio fuel to power your ships.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]Solar power is not effective on all starting planets.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]Using the Fresh Start option will spawn you back on your original starting planet, but will not remove any of your reputation, levels, structures, or bank account balance. This can be used as a last resort if you die and cannot respawn in a safe location.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]Consider setting up some early game blueprints in creative mode tailored to your starting planet. Note that some starting planets forbid use of the blueprint factory.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]You will usually only find basic resources on your starting planet, enough to build a Small Vessel. You will need to travel to other locations to build more advanced ships.
Chinese (simplified):
你的当务之急和需求会因你选择的起始星球和游戏难度而有所不同.这只是一般的指导.首先，确保你周围的环境是安全的，然后阅读[c][00ff00]开局任务文本[-][/c](如果有的话)和[c][00ff00]行星描述[-][/c]中的信息.根据这两者你通常可以很好地知道你需要做什么.如果你没有[c][00ff00]便携式建造机[-][/c]，接下来你将需要找到一些铁矿石.在某些行星上，这可能非常有挑战性，在你找到第一块铁之前将不得不走非常远.一旦你建造了[c][00ff00]便携式建造机[-][/c]，你可以用它将[c][00ff00]碎石[-][/c]转化为基本矿石.
食物可以从野生[c][00ff00]植物[-][/c]和[c][00ff00]动物[-][/c]处获得，或者你的初始任务也会给一些.如果你在一个没有氧气的星球上，你还需要安装一个[c][00ff00]氧气冷凝机[-][/c]来获取氧气.一些行星可能有一直猎杀你的[c][ff0000]危险野生动物[-][/c]， [c][ff0000]士兵[-][/c]，以及[c][ff0000]无人机[-][/c]，或是[c][ff0000]极端环境[-][/c]与辐射，温度，或者天气危害.检查行星描述是否有任何警告.你需要想出创造性的解决方法来处理你面临的障碍.一些一般提示:

[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]一些野生动物受到攻击时会逃跑.用这个让他们远离你.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]注意野生植物的提示讯息.有些可以治疗疾病，但可能在这个过程中造成食物中毒.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]对头部攻击能造成更多伤害，特别是对类人生物.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]如果你有喷气背包，躲在岩石顶上可以让你暂时躲避捕食者.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]无人机可以算得上是可怕的敌人，但射击他们可以使他们失去目标，瞄准无人机前方红点造成额外伤害.手枪，突击步枪，尤其是狙击枪在对付无人机时比你的霰弹枪或者生存工具更有效.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]你可以使用玩家无人机来采矿，侦察，或者取回丢失的背包.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]生存工具可以收获地面岩石，采矿，杀伤敌人，和打捞方块或者设备，但是性能非常低下.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]钷有时很难找到但你可以使用生物燃料来作为替代品驱动你的飞船.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]太阳能并不是在所有初始行星都有效.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]使用“重新开始”选项将使你回到原来的开始星球，但不会删除任何你的声望，级别，建筑，或者银行帐户余额.如果你死了并且不能在安全的地方重生，这可以作为最后的手段.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]考虑在创造模式下为你的起始星球设定一些早期的游戏蓝图.注意，有些起始行星禁止使用蓝图工厂.
[c][ffff00]-[-][/c]你通常只能在你的起始星球上找到基本资源，这些基本资源只够建立一艘小型飞船.你将需要前往其他地点建造更先进的船只.

English:
Most starting planets only contain the basic resources needed for a starter Small Vessel. In order to build more advanced ships, you will need to travel elsewhere.
Note that availability of resources will vary depending on your chosen starting planet.

First you will need a basic [c][00ff00]Small Vessel[-][/c] with either an enclosed cockpit or an airtight interior. The Small Vessel also needs thrusters in all 6 directions to be space worthy. You can build such a ship with resources found on your starting planet.

Next you will need [c][00ff00]Cobalt[-][/c] either from Cobalt Asteroids found in orbit of your starting planet, or from Cobalt Deposits on the nearby moon. Cobalt will allow you to construct a [c][00ff00]Short Range Warp Drive[-][/c] and a [c][00ff00]Pentaxid Tank[-][/c] for your Small Vessel.
This will allow you to warp to the other locations in your starting solar system.

It is highly recommended, but not required, to complete the [c][00ff00]Solo [-][/c]mission [c][00ffff]Make Contact with Terran Forces[-][/c] at this time. This mission will introduce you to the UCH forces in Andromeda and give some nice rewards.
Chinese (simplified): 大多数初始行星只包含启动小型飞船所需的基本资源.想要建造更先进的船只，你需要去其他地方.注意，资源的可用性将根据你选择的起始星球而变化.首先你需要一个基本的含有封闭座舱或是一个密闭结构的[c][00ff00]小型飞船[-][/c].小型飞船还需要在所有6个方向安装推进器，以获得太空机动能力.你可以用在起始星球上找到的资源建造这样的飞船.[c][00ff00]钴[-][/c]要么来自在你的起始行星的轨道上发现的钴小行星，或者从在附近的月亮上的钴矿床里开采.使用钴可以为你的小型飞船建造 [c][00ff00]短距离跃迁引擎[-][/c] 和[c][00ff00]翘曲燃料罐[-][/c].这将令你可以跃迁到在你的起始太阳系的其他位置.强烈建议，但不是强制要求，在这个时候完成[c][00ff00]单人[-][/c]任务[c][00ffff]与人类舰队接触[-][/c].这个任务将指引你前往处于仙女座的UCH舰队，并给予一些不错的奖励.

English:
Once you have built a warp capable Small Vessel, you will be able to travel to locations within the same star system to gather more resources.
To warp to other stars you will need to build a warp capable [c][00ff00]Capital Vessel[-][/c] from resources found in the starting system.

In addition to the basic resources and Cobalt you've already found, you will need:
-[c][00ff00]Titanium[-][/c], from [c][00ff00]Snow [-][/c]planets or an [c][00ff00]Asteroid Field[-][/c].
-[c][00ff00]Neodymium[-][/c], from [c][00ff00]Arid [-][/c]or [c][00ff00]Desert [-][/c]planets or an [c][00ff00]Asteroid Field[-][/c].
-[c][00ff00]Sathium[-][/c], from a [c][00ff00]Barren[-][/c] planet or [c][00ff00]Barren[-][/c] moon.

You can also find many of these resources from various wrecks throughout the starting star system, or by purchasing them from traders.

Once you have a warp capable Capital Vessel, you can open the galaxy map, select a star within warp range, and warp to it to continue your journey in Project Eden.
Chinese (simplified):
一旦你建造了一艘能翘曲跳跃的小型飞船，你就可以前往同一星系的其他区域收集更多的资源.你将需要使用从起始星系中找到的资源建造一艘能够跃迁的[c][00ff00]主力舰[-][/c]以跃迁到其他恒星， 

除了您已经找到的基本资源和钴之外，您还需要
-[c][00ff00]钛矿[-][/c], 来源于 [c][00ff00]冰雪[-][/c]行星或者[c][00ff00]小行星带[-][/c].
-[c][00ff00]钕矿[-][/c], 来源于 [c][00ff00]小行星 [-][/c]或者 [c][00ff00]沙漠 [-][/c]行星或者[c][00ff00]小行星带[-][/c].
-[c][00ff00]钑[-][/c], 来源于[c][00ff00]荒芜[-][/c] 行星或者[c][00ff00]荒芜[-][/c]卫星.你也可以从整个起始星系的各种沉船内找到许多这些资源，或者向商人购买.一旦你有了一艘可以跃迁的主力舰，你可以打开银河系地图，选择一个处于翘曲范围内的恒星，并跃迁到它以继续你的伊甸园计划旅程.

English:
There are some locations that are occupied by dangerous enemies or that have extreme environmental hazards.
Approaching these locations without being prepared can mean a quick death for yourself and loss of your ship.

Always look at the description of a sector, planet, or moon before entering it. You can view descriptions on the solar system map using the various checkboxes.

This is by no means a complete list of dangers, but these are the most common things to look out for:
-[c][ffff00]High gravity[-][/c]. A good rule of thumb is you need 10m/s down thrust for each 1G of gravity on a planet with no atmosphere. Check your ship's thrust values in the statistics page of the control panel while in orbit and compare it to the planet's listed gravity. Atmospheric density can help provide extra lift to counteract gravity while your ship is in motion.
-[c][ffff00]Temperature and radiation[-][/c]. Some locations can have extreme temperatures or radiation. This can be offset with armor or armor boosters, consumables, medication, or by staying inside your ship as much as possible.
-[c][ffff00]Dangerous enemies[-][/c]. Some planets can have unique enemies that pose a serious risk to you or your ship. Check the planet description for any hints and approach unfamiliar enemies with caution.
-[c][ffff00]Low visibility[-][/c]. Some planets can have low or no visibility, even when using night vision.

A planet or sector usually lists an estimated difficulty level in the description, based on how hard a location is due to factors such as enemies, hazards, or other challenges present.
[i]This is different from the difficulty level listed on the right hand side of the screen and is a more accurate estimate of how hard a location will actually be.[/i]
[i][/i]-[c][00ffff]Beginner[-][/c]. This location is extremely easy. While it can still have hostile POIs, it's often lacking in dangerous wildlife or patrolling drones.
-[c][00ff00]Easy[-][/c]. This location is fairly easy, with low enemy density or difficulty and few environmental hazards.
-[c][ffff00]Medium[-][/c]. This location can have standard enemies and POIs that pose a challenge and some environmental hazards that can be dealt with using basic equipment. Shields recommended.
-[c][ff0000]Hard[-][/c]. This location can have enemies or environmental hazards that pose a significant challenge even to experienced players. Advanced equipment and T2 shields strongly recommended.
-[c][ff00ff]Ultra[-][/c]. This location is extremely difficult and often has unique challenges to overcome even for advanced players. The best equipment and T2 shields is strongly recommended.
-[c][ff00ff]Ultra+[-][/c], [c][ff00ff]++[-][/c], and [c][ff00ff]+++[-][/c]. This location is an end game boss encounter designed for a group of players and may be extremely difficult if not impossible.
Chinese (simplified):
有些地方盘踞着危险的敌人或是环境极端恶劣.
毫无防备地进入这些地方不仅意味着你会很快死掉，多半还会失去你的飞船.

在进入星区，星球或是卫星前一定要查看描述.你可以在行星系星图的右上角使用勾选框来显示这些信息.

这些信息并不能提供所有风险种类，但是以下是比较需要留意的:
-[c][ffff00]高重力[-][/c]. 一个很好理解的经验准则，每1G重力你都需要10m/s2的向下推力，在飞船控制面板的数据页面查看推力并与星球的重力做一下比对，高密度的大气则能在行进时提供额外的浮力，从而抵消一部分重力.
-[c][ffff00]温度与辐射[-][/c]. 有些地点可能会有着非常极端的温度或辐射，这点可以用过护甲/护甲增强器，消耗品和药物，又或是躲在气密结构内来解决
-[c][ffff00]危险的敌人[-][/c]. 有些星球上会有对你和飞船都具有威胁的敌人，仔细查看这方面的描述并且谨慎靠近一切未知敌人.
-[c][ffff00]低能见度[-][/c]. 有些星球的能见度非常低，哪怕你带了夜视仪也是铷此.

星球或是星区一般都会有预估的难度，这个预估值一般基于敌人，环境灾害以及其他挑战.
[i]这个和屏幕右侧显示的难度不同，对地区的描述更加符合实际难度.[/i]
[i][/i]-[c][00ffff]入门[-][/c]. 这种地方非常简单，虽然依然会有敌对POI，但是往往不会有危险的野生生物或是巡逻无人机
-[c][00ff00]简单[-][/c]. 这些地点依然安全，敌人强度较低且少有环境危害
-[c][ffff00]中等[-][/c]. 这些地点一般会有标准配置的敌人和又一定挑战性的POI，以及一些可以用基础设备解决的环境灾害，推荐装备护盾.
-[c][ff0000]困难[-][/c]. 这些地点的敌人和环境哪怕对于有经验的玩家来说都充满了挑战，非常推荐使用高级设备和T2护盾.
-[c][ff00ff]极端[-][/c].这种地点有着非常极端的环境和挑战，最好的装备以及T2护盾都是必需品.
-[c][ff00ff]极端+[-][/c], [c][ff00ff]++[-][/c], 以及 [c][ff00ff]+++[-][/c]. 这种地点设计为需要多人共同应对的几乎无法生存的难度.

English: Here you will find advice on how to survival your starting planet and work your way up to a warp capable Capital Vessel that can explore the galaxy.
Chinese (simplified): 在这里你可以找到从初始星球的生存建议到建造一艘可翘曲跳跃主力舰的各种教程

English: Wait for the mission to upload
Wait for the mission to upload
Wait for the mission to upload
Wait for the mission to upload

Chinese (simplified): 该任务的奖励包含另一个任务.
该任务的奖励包含另一个任务.
该任务的奖励包含另一个任务.
该任务的奖励包含另一个任务.

English: [c][ffff00]WARNING:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]Approaching Zirax Drone base.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Shields and heavy weapons detected. Threat level high.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00]警告：[-][/c] [c][ffffff]正在接近兹瑞克斯无人机基地.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]检测到护盾和重型武器，威胁等级：高.[-][/c]

English: Find your contact at one of the gambling tables in a Syndicate Casino. Syndicate Casinos are most often found around G, F, and A class star systems in neutral or pirate territory, and show up on the solar system map as a green space station.
Chinese (simplified): 在联合会赌场的其中一个赌桌边找到你德联系人. 联合会赌场可以在中立海盗领地中的G, F 或 A 型星系中找到，在行星系星图中以绿色空间站标示

English: The message will be stored in the Zirax tab of your PDA for later reading.
Chinese (simplified): 该消息会被存放在PDA中的兹瑞克斯页面供以后阅读

English:
You have been given a package and asked to deliver it to someone in Room 4 in the hotel area of the Syndicate Casino.
You can access the hotel through one of the elevators located in the main lobby.
Syndicate Casinos are located around G, F, or A class star systems in neutral or Pirate territory.
If you lose the package you can speak to the contact at the gambling table again.
Chinese (simplified):
你收到了一个包裹，并被要求将其送到联合会赌场酒店区域的4号房间的某人那里。
你可以通过位于主大厅的电梯之一进入酒店。
联合会赌场位于G类、F类或A类星系的中立或海盗领地。
如果你丢失了包裹，你可以再次与赌博桌的联系人交谈。

English: You have a new message. Check the Zirax tab of your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): 你有一条新消息，查看PDA中的兹瑞克斯部分

English:
[c][00ff00]To the pesky Terran, [-][/c][c][00ff00]Greetings.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]I am a representative of the Syndicate. You have been a thorn in our side for long enough now. I do salute you on your success so far. You have been quite effective at freeing the prisoners but your little heroics are now at an end.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]We could use someone with your skills. Look for one of the gambling masters at a Syndicate Casino in a G, F, or A class star system. Tell him The Raven sings at midnight. He will give you a small package. Deliver it to the individual in Room 4 in the hotel area of the Casino. Don't ask any questions. I will contact you again once the job is complete.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Ignore our request at your own peril.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]You work for the Syndicate now.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ff00]致那些讨厌的地球人，[-][/c][c][00ff00]问候。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]我是联合会的代表。你已经足够长时间地成为我们的眼中钉。我对你的成功表示敬意。你在释放囚犯方面非常有效，但你的小英雄行为现在要结束了。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]我们可以利用拥有你这样技能的人。在G、F或A类星系的联合会赌场找一个赌博大师。告诉他“渡鸦在午夜歌唱”。他会交给你一个小包裹。将它送到赌场酒店区4号房间的个人那里。不要问任何问题。一旦任务完成，我将再次联系你。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]忽视我们的请求，后果自负。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]你现在为联合会工作。[-][/c]

English:
You were handed a message while freeing one of the prisoners in a Syndicate outpost. The message is addressed to you by name.

[c][00ff00]To the pesky Terran, [-][/c][c][00ff00]Greetings.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]I am a representative of the Syndicate. You have been a thorn in our side for long enough now. I do salute you on your success so far. You have been quite effective at freeing the prisoners but your little heroics are now at an end.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]We could use someone with your skills. Look for one of the gambling masters at a Syndicate Casino in a G, F, or A class star system. Tell him The Raven sings at midnight. He will give you a small package. Deliver it to the individual in Room 4 in the hotel area of the Casino. Don't ask any questions. I will contact you again once the job is complete.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Ignore our request at your own peril.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]You work for the Syndicate now.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
当你在联合会前哨站释放一名囚犯时，你收到了一条消息。这条消息是按你的名字写的。

[c][00ff00]致那个讨厌的地球人，[-][/c][c][00ff00]问候。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]我是联合会的代表。你已经足够长时间地成为我们的眼中钉。我向你迄今为止的成功致敬。你在释放囚犯方面非常有效，但你的小英雄行为现在要结束了。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]我们可以利用像你这样技能的人。在G、F或A级星系的联合会赌场找一个赌博大师。告诉他“午夜时分，乌鸦歌唱”。他会给你一个小包裹。把它送到赌场酒店区域4号房间的个人。不要问任何问题。任务完成后我会再次联系你。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]忽视我们的请求，后果自负。[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]你现在为联合会工作。[-][/c]

English: Find a Syndicate Casino around a G, F, or A class star. See the PDA for more information.
Chinese (simplified): 寻找一个围绕G、F或A类恒星的联合会赌场。更多信息请查看PDA。

English: You have been given a package and asked to deliver it to someone in Room 4 in the hotel area of the Syndicate Casino.\nYou can access the hotel through one of the elevators located in the main lobby.\nIt might be a good idea to back away after you hand over the package...
Chinese (simplified): 你收到了一个包裹，并被要求将其送到联合会赌场酒店区域4号房间的某人手中。\n你可以通过位于主大厅的电梯之一进入酒店。\n交出包裹后，最好保持距离...

English: Wait for the individual in Room 4 to open his package.
Chinese (simplified): 等待4号房间的个人打开他的包裹。

English: [c][ff0000]Wanted dead or alive[-][/c] [c][ffffff]for stealing from the Syndicate vault.[-][/c]\n[c][00ff00]Last known locations:[-][/c][c][ffffff] Hiding out in a Smuggler's Hideout on a Desert Storm or Rocky Desert planet, or part of an expedition to loot an abandoned tomb on a Desert Oasis planet.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000]悬赏，不论死活[-][/c] [c][ffffff]从联合会宝库中行窃[-][/c]\n[c][00ff00]最后已知位置：[-][/c][c][ffffff] 躲在一个沙暴或岩石沙漠星球上的走私者藏身处中, 也有可能正在参与沙漠绿洲中遗弃陵墓的盗掘.[-][/c]

English: [c][ff0000]Wanted dead or alive[-][/c] [c][ffffff]for breaking his contract with the Syndicate to develop new weapons.[-][/c]\n[c][00ff00]Last known locations:[-][/c][c][ffffff] Serving as an engineer on board a UCH Research Vessel.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000]悬赏，不论死活[-][/c] [c][ffffff]违反了和联合会的契约开发新武器[-][/c]\n[c][00ff00]最后已知位置：[-][/c][c][ffffff] 在UCH研究船上当工程师.[-][/c]

English: [c][ff0000]Wanted dead or alive[-][/c] [c][ffffff]for not paying his debts.[-][/c]\n[c][00ff00]Last known locations:[-][/c][c][ffffff] Hiding out in an orbital Smuggler Outpost.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000]悬赏，不论死活[-][/c] [c][ffffff]欠钱不还[-][/c]\n[c][00ff00]最后已知位置：[-][/c][c][ffffff] 躲在一个轨道上的走私者藏身处中[-][/c]

English: [c][ff0000]Wanted dead or alive[-][/c] [c][ffffff]for voting to increase patrols that interfere with our weapon smuggling.[-][/c]\n[c][00ff00]Last known locations:[-][/c][c][ffffff] Last seen in a room at an Argent Trade Station or Argent HQ on an Ice planet, or in a Deluxe Resort on a Tropical planet in Trading Guild territory.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ff0000]悬赏，不论死活[-][/c] [c][ffffff]此人通过投票增加巡逻队，影响了我们的武器走私生意.[-][/c]\n[c][00ff00]最后已知位置：[-][/c][c][ffffff] 最后被目击出现在冰冻星球上的Argent Trade Station和Argent HQ的客房里，或是贸易联盟领地内热带星球的一个豪华度假村中.[-][/c]

English: Open and then close your PDA to read the new message.
Chinese (simplified): 打开并关闭PDA以阅读新消息

English: You were sent a new message. Open and then close your PDA to view it.
Chinese (simplified): 你收到一条新消息. 打开并关闭PDA以阅读

English:
[c][00ff00]To the Pesky Terran,[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]I have been informed that the individual in question has suffered an unfortunate incident involving an overloading power conduit in his room. No doubt any investigation will rule it an unavoidable accident and will not be traced back to us. A job well done and a lesson learned to all others who fail to pay off their gambling debt.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]However, there are more targets that need eliminating. I have uploaded data on each target's last known location to your PDA. Open up the mission and select a target to learn more about their last known location. This may require more effort on your part to track them down. No doubt they know we are after them.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Make sure to take them out quietly. You wouldn't want to draw attention to yourself and make an enemy out of the other factions, would you? Or go in guns blazing. I don't care as long as you get results.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Don't think just because you took out one indebted gambler that this makes up for all the trouble you've caused us. You're in this for the long haul.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ff00]致讨厌的地球人,[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]我们已获悉出现问题的个体不幸地在自己地房间中受到了过载能量通路的波及，毫无疑问任何调查都只能说明这是一起意外而并非我们引起.你做的很棒，也给那些欠了赌债不还的人上了一课.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]不过呢，还有更多需要处理的目标，我已经将目标最后一次出现的位置上传到了你的PDA，打开任务并选择一个目标以了解更多. 追踪目标的事可能就得你自己来了，这些人毫无疑问知道自己已经被盯上了[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
[c][00ff00]你最好确保安静地做掉它们，你也不会想惹出大事和其他派系为敌，不是吗?当然你也可以大闹特闹，我只要成果.[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]别以为处理了一个不还钱的赌鬼就解决了所有你给我们带来的问题，好日子还在后头呢.[-][/c]

English: You have eliminated all the targets but have not received any further instruction. Perhaps they feel your debt has been repayed?\nYou have a feeling this won't be the last time you'll find yourself working for the Syndicate.
Chinese (simplified): 你消灭了所有目标，也没有收到新的指示. 也许他们觉得血债已偿?\n你有种感觉，这将不会是你最后一次为联合会干活.

English:
Dark Matter is a very rare end game crafting component extracted from Voidium. You must unlock it in the Progenitor Research section of your tech tree before you can extract it.

To extract it you will need an Advanced Constructor and a cargo bay large enough to store the required amount of Voidium. The process takes quite some time.

Dark Matter can be stored in two forms: A smaller Dark Matter Container that can be used to construct smaller devices or personal equipment, and a larger Dark Matter Pod used in larger devices such as those for capital vessels.
Dark Matter Containers can also be rarely found as loot, though the chances of this are slim.
Chinese (simplified):
暗物质是一种从虚空物质中提取的极其珍贵的游戏后期材料.必须通过科技树的先祖研究页面解锁后才能进行提取.

为了提取暗物质，你必须拥有一台高级建造机和足以容纳虚空物质的容器，提取过程会消耗非常长的时间.

暗物质可以以两种形式储存：用于制造小型设备或是个人装备的暗物质容器，以及用于主力舰的大型暗物质荚仓.
暗物质容易也有可能作为战利品被找到，尽管基本上是不可能的.

English: This section explains what UCH knows about Voidium
Chinese (simplified): 这部分解释了UCH已知关于虚空物质的内容

English:
Voidium is a very rare end game resource found growing in large crystal formations on some planets.
You will need a Voidium Extractor or Voidium Drill to harvest it, unlocked in the Progenitor Research tab of your tech tree.

Voidium contains trace amounts of Dark Matter and can be extracted through a lengthy process.
Voidium is extremely massive and takes up a lot of room. Ensure you have a ship capable of hauling it before harvesting.
Chinese (simplified):
虚空矿物是一种极其珍贵的游戏后期材料，会在某些星球上已大型晶体构造的形式存在.
你必须使用虚空物质采集器或虚空物质钻头，通过科技树的先祖研究页面解锁.

虚空物质含有微量的暗物质，可以通过长时间的提取来获得.
虚空物质密度极高且体积巨大，在开采前一定要确保你的飞船有能力进行运输.

English: Progenitor Technology Fragments are a rare end game crafting component used in Progenitor technology. To build a Voidium Extractor you will need Progenitor Technology Fragments.\n\nWhile it's unclear where to get these fragments, you might start by speaking with the Lead Researcher on board a UCH Research Vessel as they are currently studying the Progenitors.
Chinese (simplified): 先祖科技碎片是一种用于合成先祖设备的极其珍贵的游戏后期材料. 制造虚空物质采集器需要先祖科技碎片.\n\n尽管这些碎片的来源未知，但也许你可以和UCH研究船上的首席研究员聊一聊，他或许能给你一些提示.

English: [c][ffff00]WARNING:[-][/c] Entering a [u]HIGH RISK[/u] zone. New Empyriopedia section unlocked in PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]:\n"[c][00ffff]Project Eden:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]Corrupted Encounters[-][/c]"
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00]！警告 ！[-][/c] 正在进入[u]高危[/u] 区域. 新的帝国百科条目已经在PDA中解锁[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]:\n"[c][00ffff]伊甸园计划：[-][/c] [c][ffffff]遭遇腐化者[-][/c]"

English:
Rarely in N or BH class star systems you can encounter ships that have traveled outside the galaxy only to be transformed and returned. Their hulls have been twisted, infused with alien materials and augmented with terrifying new weapons and nearly impenetrable shields.


These ships are not to be engaged except by the bravest, or stupidest, individuals. To face one in combat is almost certain death, but they are there, watching, waiting, with unknown purpose.
Chinese (simplified):
在N 或是 BH 型星系中，你会偶尔遭遇一些离开星系之后被转化又回归的飞船， 这些飞船的船壳被扭曲，充满了外星物质，增加了强大的外星武器并且拥有几乎无法击破的护盾.


除非你非常勇（或是愚蠢），否则不要攻击这些飞船，和他们战斗几乎就意味着死亡，但它们就在那里，观察，等待，目的未知

English: This section explains what UCH knows about Corrupted Encounters.
Chinese (simplified): 这部分解释了UCH已知关于腐化者遭遇的内容

English: [c][ffff00]You might have noticed some items in the tech tree require a lot of points to unlock.[-][/c]\n\nAfter level 25, you will continue to earn unlock points from doing missions, turning in Data Pads from alien loot containers, performing research under the Project Eden Research mission, and turning in Data Chips from hacking.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00]也许你已经注意到了，科技书中有些节点需要非常大量的点数来解锁[-][/c]\n\n在你达到25级，额外的解锁点数仍可以从以下的来源获得：任务奖励，上交从外星货箱中搜刮到的数据平板，在UCH研究船上进行研究任务, 以及上交黑入数据存储器得到的数据芯片

English: This section explains what UCH knows about Unlock Points.
Chinese (simplified): 这部分解释了UCH已知关于解锁点数的内容.

English: [c][ffffff]This explains where to do the default story missions.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff]该条目解释了在哪里可以执行默认主线任务[-][/c]

English:
[c][ffffff]The default missions (or Reforged Galaxy missions if you're playing that) can be completed on the planet, moon, or orbits of Haven, Gaia, Persephone, Akua, Omicron, Roggery, or Ningues, and in the starting systems of Alpha and Beta.
There are also 6 solar systems nearby the starting solar systems for the default missions. Each mission system will have a unique name, for example Sigma Zero. Simply search the galaxy map for the system name referenced in the mission description.

Check the description of each starting planet to see what missions, if any, they have.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff]默认任务 (或是重铸星系任务)可以在以下的行星，卫星及轨道上完成:Haven，Gaia，Persephone，Akua，Omicron，Roggery， 或是Ningues，这些星球都位于Alpha和Beta星系内.
在初始星系的附近也有6个额外的初始任务行星系. 它们中的每个都有独特的固定名称， 比如说Sigma Zero.只需要在恒星系星图内按照任务说明中的星系搜索即可.

查看初始星球的描述以确认其可用任务.[-][/c]

English: Intro: Welcome to a new World
Chinese (simplified): 介绍: 欢迎来到新世界

English: You find yourself stranded on an alien world. Find a way to survive and eventually travel to space.\nMain story missions are not available on this planet. More information can be found in the [c][00ffff]Empyriopedia[-][/c]. Open your PDA with [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to clear this message.
Chinese (simplified): 你发现自己被困在一个陌生的世界，活下去并设法离开这颗星球.\n主线任务在该星球上不可用. 更多相关信息可在 [c][00ffff]帝国百科[-][/c]中找到. 按下 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]以打开PDA并关闭该消息

English:
[c][ffffff]UCH Researchers are looking for field researchers to assist with studying the Andromeda galaxy.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]If you bring them a[-][/c] [c][00ff00]research report[-][/c][c][ffffff] they can provide you with unlock points.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]You can create research reports from various materials in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]decoration tab[-][/c][c][ffffff] of a small, large, or advanced constructor.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]With the research report in your personal inventory and this mission active, use the research computer in the lab of a UCH Research Vessel.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]You can sometimes find UCH Research Vessels in habitable systems in neutral territory. They show up on the solar system map as a blue triangle.

Research will give unlock points based on the report that is turned in and can be repeated every 3 hours.[-][/c]
[i][c][ffff00]The UCHN Discovery, Explorer, Odyssey, and Pathfinder in the starting systems do not have research computers.[-][/c][/i]
[i][c][ffff00]You can turn in research reports to each research vessel only once.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff]UCH研究员们在招募实地科考家以帮助他们对仙女座星系进行研究.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]如果你可以为他们带来[-][/c] [c][00ff00]研究报告[-][/c][c][ffffff]就可以得到额外的解锁点数.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]你可以利用对应的多种材料在小型，大型以及高级建造机的 [-][/c][c][00ff00]饰品栏[-][/c][c][ffffff] 中合成研究报告.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]当你在背包中拥有研究报告并启动任务时，将报告上交至UCH研究船的研究计算机.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]有时你会在中立的宜居星系找到UCH研究船.它们在行星系星图上以蓝色三角标示.

根据报告的种类会给予不同数量的解锁点数，每三小时可以上交一次.[-][/c]
[i][c][ffff00]初始星系中的四艘UCHN Discovery，Explorer，Odyssey，和Pathfinder 没有研究计算机（译者注，实际上是有的）.[-][/c][/i]

English: You have completed the research and gained additional knowledge.\nYou may perform research at a different research vessel in 3 hours.
Chinese (simplified): 你完成了研究并获得了额外的知识.\n你可以在3小时后于其他研究船上再次进行该任务.

English: Create a research report and place it in your personal inventory.\nFind a UCH Research Vessel and access the computer in the research lab.
Chinese (simplified): 创建一份研究报告并将其置于背包中.\n找到一艘UCH研究船并访问研究计算机.

English:
[c][ffffff]UCH Researchers are looking for field researchers to assist with studying the Andromeda galaxy.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]If you bring them a[-][/c] [c][00ff00]research report[-][/c][c][ffffff] they can provide you with unlock points.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]You can create research reports from various materials in the [-][/c][c][00ff00]decoration tab[-][/c][c][ffffff] of a small, large, or advanced constructor.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]With the research report in your personal inventory and this mission active, use the research computer in the lab of a UCH Research Vessel.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]You can sometimes find UCH Research Vessels in habitable systems in neutral territory. They show up on the solar system map as a blue triangle.

Research will give unlock points based on the report that is turned in and can be repeated every 3 hours.[-][/c]
[i][c][ffff00]The UCHN Discovery, Explorer, Odyssey, and Pathfinder in the starting systems do not have research computers.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff]UCH研究员们在招募实地科考家以帮助他们对仙女座星系进行研究.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]如果你可以为他们带来[-][/c] [c][00ff00]研究报告[-][/c][c][ffffff]就可以得到额外的解锁点数.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]你可以利用对应的多种材料在小型，大型以及高级建造机的 [-][/c][c][00ff00]饰品栏[-][/c][c][ffffff] 中合成研究报告.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]当你在背包中拥有研究报告并启动任务时，将报告上交至UCH研究船的研究计算机.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]有时你会在中立的宜居星系找到UCH研究船.它们在行星系星图上以蓝色三角标示.

根据报告的种类会给予不同数量的解锁点数，每三小时可以上交一次.[-][/c]
[i][c][ffff00]初始星系中的四艘UCHN Discovery，Explorer，Odyssey，和Pathfinder 没有研究计算机（译者注，实际上是有的）.[-][/c][/i]
勘测星系 - 宜居星系

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Location:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Andromeda Galaxy[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Difficulty:[/b][-][/c] [c][00ff00]Easy[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Repeatable:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]No[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Objectives:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Visit the habitable star systems of the Andromeda Galaxy[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]You must warp to the star systems. Starting systems do not count towards credit.[/i][-][/c]

Once you have a capital vessel capable of warping and a good supply of Pentaxid, you can go out into the galaxy and begin surveying different star classes. Start with the more sun-like habitable systems.
You will also need to bring along a good supply of Basic System Survey Probes. You can build probes in the Deco tab of small, large, or advanced constructors.

[c][00ff00]You can search for stars of a specific star class on the galaxy map by selecting [-][/c][c][ffff00]Search System[-][/c][c][00ff00] at the bottom, then typing a [-][/c][c][ffff00]star class[-][/c][c][00ff00] in the [-][/c][c][ffff00]Type[-][/c][c][00ff00] box in the search window.[-][/c]
For example you can search for G, G2, G3, K, N, etc.
[i][c][ffffff]For these missions only the exact star class listed will complete an objective (a G3 star does not count as a G) and searching the galaxy by star type only finds exact matches (searching for G stars will not show G3 stars)[-][/c][/i]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]We will keep in touch as you explore via long range communications.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]位置：[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]仙女座星系[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]难度：[/b][-][/c] [c][ff0000]简单[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]可重复：[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]否[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]目标：[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]访问仙女座中的宜居星系[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]你必须跃迁至对应的星系，初始星系不算在内.[/i][-][/c]扫描异域星系以推进任务.
同时你也需要带上足够的基础系统勘测探针.你可以在小型，大型或高级建造机的装饰栏位中制造基础探针.

[c][00ff00]在寻找特定类型的恒星时你可以选中恒星系图下方的 [-][/c][c][ffff00]Search System[-][/c][c][00ff00]并在 [-][/c][c][ffff00]Type[-][/c][c][00ff00] 框中输入 [-][/c][c][ffff00]恒星类型[-][/c][c][00ff00].[-][/c]
你可以输入的类型可以是G, G2, G3, K, N等.
[i][c][ffffff]这些任务只有在你找到准确类型的星系时才能完成(比如G3并不算作G型)，同时按照类型搜索时也必须输入完全准确的类型(没有模糊查找功能，比如搜索G型时将不会显示G3)[-][/c][/i]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]我们会通过远程通信保持联系

English: Basic System Survey Probe on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): 将基础系统勘测探针置于工具栏中

English: Place a Basic Systems Probe on your toolbar to launch the probe.\nBasic System Probes can be crafted in the Deco tab of a Small or better base or cv Constructor.
Chinese (simplified): 将基础系统勘测探针置于工具栏中.\n你可以在基地/主力舰小型或更高级的建造机的装饰栏位中制造基础探针.

English: Wait for the survey to complete.

[c][00ffff][b]Location:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Andromeda Galaxy[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Difficulty:[/b][-][/c] [c][00ff00]Easy[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Repeatable:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]No[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Objectives:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Visit the habitable star systems of the Andromeda Galaxy[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]You must warp to the star systems. Starting systems do not count towards credit.[/i][-][/c]

Once you have a capital vessel capable of warping and a good supply of Pentaxid, you can go out into the galaxy and begin surveying different star classes. Start with the more sun-like habitable systems.
You will also need to bring along a good supply of Basic System Survey Probes. You can build probes in the Deco tab of small, large, or advanced constructors.

[c][00ff00]You can search for stars of a specific star class on the galaxy map by selecting [-][/c][c][ffff00]Search System[-][/c][c][00ff00] at the bottom, then typing a [-][/c][c][ffff00]star class[-][/c][c][00ff00] in the [-][/c][c][ffff00]Type[-][/c][c][00ff00] box in the search window.[-][/c]
For example you can search for G, G2, G3, K, N, etc.
[i][c][ffffff]For these missions only the exact star class listed will complete an objective (a G3 star does not count as a G) and searching the galaxy by star type only finds exact matches (searching for G stars will not show G3 stars)[-][/c][/i]

We will keep in touch as you explore via long range communications.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]位置：[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]仙女座星系[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]难度：[/b][-][/c] [c][ff0000]简单[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]可重复：[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]否[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]目标：[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]访问仙女座中的宜居星系[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]你必须跃迁至对应的星系，初始星系不算在内.[/i][-][/c]扫描异域星系以推进任务.
同时你也需要带上足够的基础系统勘测探针.你可以在小型，大型或高级建造机的装饰栏位中制造基础探针.

[c][00ff00]在寻找特定类型的恒星时你可以选中恒星系图下方的 [-][/c][c][ffff00]Search System[-][/c][c][00ff00]并在 [-][/c][c][ffff00]Type[-][/c][c][00ff00] 框中输入 [-][/c][c][ffff00]恒星类型[-][/c][c][00ff00].[-][/c]
你可以输入的类型可以是G, G2, G3, K, N等.
[i][c][ffffff]这些任务只有在你找到准确类型的星系时才能完成(比如G3并不算作G型)，同时按照类型搜索时也必须输入完全准确的类型(没有模糊查找功能，比如搜索G型时将不会显示G3)[-][/c][/i]

和之前的任务一样，我们会通过远程通信保持联系

English: Find any variation of a G class star system on the galaxy map and warp to it. They appear as a medium yellow star.\nYou will also need an ample supply of survey probes built in the Deco tab of a constructor.\n[c][00ff00]You can use the galaxy map to search by star type (example G, G2, G3, etc)[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 在星图中找到并跃迁至一个G型星系，它们在星图上以黄色点标示.\n同时你也需要带上足够的基础系统勘测探针.你可以在建造机的装饰栏位中制造先进探针.\n[c][00ff00]你可以在星图中按照恒星类型进行搜索(例如G，G2，G3等)[-][/c]

Chinese (simplified): 将基础系统勘测探针置于工具栏中以开始勘探

English: [c][00ffff]UCH Research Vessel: [-][/c]Survey in progress. Please stand by.\nWhen you warp to a star you end up in a warp arrival sector. You cannot warp to these normally so getting back can be hard. Don't leave anything behind!
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]UCH Research Vessel: [-][/c]勘探中，请稍候.\n当你跃迁至其他星系时会处于恒星边的跃迁用星区.一般来说这种星区都无法从星系内跃迁抵达，所以别把任何东西丢在这里!

English: You have completed a survey of the more common habitable star systems in the Andromeda galaxy.\nHabitable systems such as G, F, and A class have an abundance of life giving worlds and a heavy civilian presence. They make good places to farm and trade.\nYou have compiled the data you've obtained into navigational data that can be used to increase your maximum warp range.
Chinese (simplified): 你完成了对仙女座中常见宜居星系的勘探.\n类似G, F和A这样的往往可以孕育大量的生命，并且拥有许多居民，非常适合交易与农业.\n你将所有数据整理成了可以用于提升跃迁距离的导航数据.

English: Wait while you compile the survey reports
Chinese (simplified): 在整合勘测报告时等待
勘测星系 - 低温星系

English: Find a M class star system on the galaxy map and warp to it. M class stars appear on the map as a small red star.\nYou will also need an ample supply of Standard System Survey Probes built in the Deco tab of a constructor.\nNote: starter systems do not count.

English: You have completed a survey of the cold star systems in the Andromeda galaxy.\nCold systems such as M, D, and A4V class have an abundance of icy and dead worlds and can be a good place to mine Erestrum and ice or hack into orbital data caches.
Chinese (simplified): 你完成了对仙女座中寒冷星系的勘探.\n像是M, D和A4V这样的星系往往有大量的冰冻和死亡星球，非常适合采集锷矿以及黑入轨道上的数据存储器
勘测星系 - 异域星系

English: Find a N class star system on the galaxy map and warp to it. N class stars appear on the map as a very dim blue-white star.\nYou will also need an ample supply of Advanced System Survey Probes built in the Deco tab of a constructor.\nNote: starter systems and beacons do not count.
Chinese (simplified): 在银河系地图上找到一个N类星系并翘曲至它。N类恒星在地图上显示为非常暗淡的蓝白色星星。\n您还需要准备充足的高级系统勘测探测器，这些探测器可以在建造机的“Deco”标签页中建造。\n注意：起始星系和信标不计入内。

English: High-Tech System Survey Probe on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): 将高科技系统勘测探针置于工具栏中

English: Place a High-Tech System Survey Probe on your toolbar to launch the probe.\nHigh-Tech System Survey Probes can be crafted in the Deco tab of a Advanced base or cv Constructor.
Chinese (simplified): 将高科技系统勘测探针置于工具栏中.\n你可以在基地/主力舰高级建造机中的装饰栏位中制造高科技探针.

English: Place a High-Tech System Survey Probe on your toolbar to begin the survey.
Chinese (simplified): 将高科技系统勘测探针置于工具栏中以开始勘探

English: Wait for the survey to complete.
[c][00ffff]UCH Research Vessel: [-][/c]We never know what we might find around Neutron stars.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]UCH Research Vessel: [-][/c]我们永远也不会知道能在中子星周围找到什么.

English: Open your PDA to complete the mission. [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]
Open PDA to complete the mission. Make sure you have room in your inventory. [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 开启PDA以完成任务，请确保您的背包有足够的容量 [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Location:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Andromeda Galaxy[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Difficulty:[/b][-][/c] [c][ff0000]Hard[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Repeatable:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]No[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]Objectives:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Visit the exotic star systems of the Andromeda Galaxy[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]You must warp to the star systems. Starting systems do not count towards credit.[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]Exotic systems can be difficult to locate.[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]Continue your survey of the galaxy by scanning exotic systems.
You will also need to bring along a good supply of High-Tech System Survey Probes. You can build probes in the Deco tab of advanced constructors.

[c][00ff00]You can search for stars of a specific star class on the galaxy map by selecting [-][/c][c][ffff00]Search System[-][/c][c][00ff00] at the bottom, then typing a [-][/c][c][ffff00]star class[-][/c][c][00ff00] in the [-][/c][c][ffff00]Type[-][/c][c][00ff00] box in the search window.[-][/c]
For example you can search for G, G2, G3, K, N, etc.
[i][c][ffffff]For these missions only the exact star class listed will complete an objective (a G3 star does not count as a G) and searching the galaxy by star type only finds exact matches (searching for G stars will not show G3 stars)[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]位置：[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]仙女座星系[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]难度：[/b][-][/c] [c][ff0000]高[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]可重复：[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]否[-][/c]
[c][00ffff][b]目标：[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]访问仙女座中的异域星系[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]你必须跃迁至对应的星系，初始星系不算在内.[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]异域星系可能会非常难以寻找.[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]扫描异域星系以推进任务.
同时你也需要带上足够的先进系统勘测探针.你可以在高级建造机的装饰栏位中制造先进探针.

[c][00ff00]在寻找特定类型的恒星时你可以选中恒星系图下方的 [-][/c][c][ffff00]Search System[-][/c][c][00ff00]并在 [-][/c][c][ffff00]Type[-][/c][c][00ff00] 框中输入 [-][/c][c][ffff00]恒星类型[-][/c][c][00ff00].[-][/c]
你可以输入的类型可以是G, G2, G3, K, N等.
[i][c][ffffff]这些任务只有在你找到准确类型的星系时才能完成(比如G3并不算作G型)，同时按照类型搜索时也必须输入完全准确的类型(没有模糊查找功能，比如搜索G型时将不会显示G3)[-][/c][/i]

和之前的任务一样，我们会通过远程通信保持联系

[c][00ffff][b]Location:[/b][-][/c] [c][ffffff]Andromeda Galaxy[-][/c]

English: You have completed a survey of the rare exotic star systems in the Andromeda galaxy.\nExotic systems such as N, R, Anomaly, and BH class are mysterious and dangerous.\nYou have compiled the data you've obtained into navigational data that can be used to increase your maximum warp range.
Chinese (simplified): 你完成了对仙女座中稀有异域星系的勘探.\n类似N, R, 异常, 和BH这样的异域星系往往充满了危险和未知\n你将所有数据整理成了可以用于提升跃迁距离的导航数据.

English: Warp to a M class star system.
Standard System Survey Probe on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): 将标准系统勘测探针置于工具栏中

English: Find a K class star system on the galaxy map and warp to it. K class stars appear as a medium size orange star.\nYou will also need an ample supply of Advanced System Survey Probes built in the Deco tab of a constructor.\nNote: starter systems do not count.
Chinese (simplified): 在银河系地图上找到一个K类星系并翘曲至它。K类恒星呈现为中等大小的橙色星星。您还需要准备充足的高级系统勘测探测器，这些探测器可以在建造机的“Deco”标签页中建造。注意：起始星系不计入内。

English: Wait for the survey to complete.

[c][00ffff]UCH Research Vessel: [-][/c]As some stars near the end of their life they expand into a red giant, searing the once-habitable planets closer to the star and making habitable those that used to be too far away.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]UCH研究船：[-][/c]在某些恒星的生命末期，他们会膨胀为红巨星，在撕裂那些原本宜居的星球的同时，也让那些原本更远处的星球变得宜居

Chinese (simplified): 等待远距离通讯中继站校准

English: [c][00ffff]UCH Research Vessel: [-][/c]Before you head off into deep space we need to make sure our long range communications relay is working. Please hold on while we calibrate it.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]UCH研究船：[-][/c]在你进入深空之前我们必须确保远程通讯中继工作正常，请在我们校准时稍作等候.

English: Wait for the long range communications relay to be calibrated
Chinese (simplified): 等待远距离通讯中继站校准

English: [c][00ffff]UCH Research Vessel: [-][/c]Here let me try changing the frequency. There, is thi--[c][ffffff]zzttzz[-][/c] ny bette-[c][ffffff]ZzzzZ[-][/c]?\n[i][c][ffffff]You hear nothing but static[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]UCH研究船: [-][/c]让我试试换个频道 ，行，这个怎--[c][ffffff]zzttzz[-][/c] 好点--[c][ffffff]ZzzzZ[-][/c]?\n[i][c][ffffff]你除了电流音什么都听不到[-][/c][/i]

English: Wait for the long range communications relay to be calibrated
Chinese (simplified): 等待远距离通讯中继站校准

English: [c][00ffff]UCH Research Vessel: [-][/c]An-[c][ffffff]zzttzz[-][/c]-at all? Can yo-[c][ffffff]zzzzzppfzzz[-][/c]-in. Come in. There, is that better? Okay, let's get started on surveying Andromeda.
Chinese (simplified): [c][00ffff]UCH研究船：[-][/c]An-[c][ffffff]zzttzz[-][/c]-不到? 你能-[c][ffffff]zzzzzppfzzz[-][/c]-答. 听到请回答. 啊，好点了吗? 好了,我们开始探索仙女座星系吧.
跃迁到一颗不同的恒星

English: Warp to a different star system.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到一颗不同的恒星系.
跃迁到一颗不同的恒星

English: Warp to a different star system.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到一颗不同的恒星系.

English: Destroy Alien Cores in the various ruined bases you find on the planet.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁你在这个星球上找到的各种被摧毁的基地中的异形核心.

English: You have new mail. Open your mailbox by opening the PDA. [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 你有新邮件. 启动你的PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]以打开收件箱

Chinese (simplified): 你的收件箱中有1条未读信息.\n启动PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]以阅读消息.

Chinese (simplified): 你有新邮件. 启动你的PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]以打开收件箱

English: You have 1 unread message in your inbox.\nOpen the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] to view message.
Chinese (simplified): 你的收件箱中有1条未读信息.\n启动PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]以阅读消息.
来自极星采矿点的消息

English: This is an automated message to all nearby ships. Polaris Mining Company has claimed exclusive mining rights for this site.\nUnauthorized mining of asteroids will result in lethal action. Speak to the Mining Foreman if you wish to purchase ore.
Chinese (simplified): 这是一则自动发往附近飞船的信息：极星矿业集团已经获得了这里的独家开采权\n未经授权的采集会导致致命攻击，可以与采矿工头交谈以购买矿物

English: You take a scan of the statue and have it analyzed by your PDA.\nYou can now activate a scan from the Solo Missions Scanner tab when you are on a Temperate like Planet to find more statues like this.
Chinese (simplified): 你扫描了雕像并用PDA进行分析.\n当你处于类似这里的温和行星是，就可以在单人任务栏内启动扫描任务来搜寻更多的雕像.

English:
The ancient traveler visited Earth-like planets many years ago.

Inscriptions:
[c][9fa19b][i]I have set out among the cosmic shores in search of a new home for my people. Our world is no longer safe for us.[/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]I was one of the first volunteers to delve into the great beyond. I hope I find what I seek.[/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
[i][c][9fa19b]The search for a suitable planet has been difficult. Many are inhospitable or already inhabited. This planet does not have the correct oxygen levels or sunlight. I must move on.[-][/c][/i][c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
[i][c][9fa19b][-][/c][/i]
[c][9fa19b][i]My ship was hit by an ion storm and I had to make an emergency landing here. I expect to have repairs complete in 2 to 3 suns.[/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]There are locals here who speak Tal'on. They tell me of a strange black sphere with green glowing bands that appeared in the sky one day blocking out the sun, only to disappear a few minutes earlier. This is troubling.[/i][-][/c][i][c][9fa19b][-][/c][/i]
[c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]Another planet unsuitable for habitation. Though my species is naturally long lived, I miss home. I do this for them.[/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]I may have to change my search parameters if I am to find a home before the war reaches my homeworld.[/i][-][/c][c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]I now believe that we cannot afford to search for temperate worlds. I am going to expand my search to include Arid worlds. While not like the pristine woodlands of my home world, I know our species can survive there. If the Sun and Moon clans can do it, so can we.[/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]I heard about an arid planet called Parthix from a fellow traveler with rings of gold. That is where I will go next. Perhaps with luck it will be uninhabited.[/i][-][/c][c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
远古旅行者在数百年前访问了多个类地行星.

铭文
[c][9fa19b][i]我航向宇宙的彼岸，只为我的人民寻找一个新的家园；我们的世界已经不再安全.[/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]我第一批志愿加入对远方的研究，期待着能找到我所渴求之物.[/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
[i][c][9fa19b]寻找合适星球之路艰辛异常，它们或是不适于生存，或是早就有人捷足先登. 这颗行星无论是氧气又或是光照都不能满足族人的需求，我必将继续探寻[-][/c][/i][c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
[i][c][9fa19b][-][/c][/i]
[c][9fa19b][i]我的飞船遭遇了离子风暴，必须降落于此，我在2-3天之内应该可以修好.[/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]这里的原住民说的是泰隆语，他们告诉我最近有一个带着绿色条带的黑球在天空中挡住了一天的太阳，就在几分钟之前才消失，看来是有麻烦了.[/i][-][/c][i][c][9fa19b][-][/c][/i]
[c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]又一颗不适宜居住的行星，虽然我的种族生来长寿，但我依然怀念他们，这也是为了他们.[/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]也许我应该改变我的搜寻思路，不然战争可能在我找到适合的星球之前就已降临到我的星球.[/i][-][/c][c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]我认为仅仅搜寻温和星球已经不够了，必须将干旱星球也包括进来. 虽然不如我们家园的广袤森林，但我的族人能够在那里生存下去.如果太阳和月亮氏族做到了，那我们也可以.[/i][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][i]我从其他旅行者那里听说了一颗叫做Parthix的拥有黄金星环的星球，那里就是我的下一站，如果足够幸运，那里应该还无人居住.[/i][-][/c][c][9fa19b][i][/i][-][/c]

English: Ancient Inscriptions will be collected here.
Chinese (simplified): 远古铭文将被收集于此.

English:
You have followed the journey of an unknown traveler. From the look of the stones you discovered they were at least several hundred years old.
You found out the Traveler's next destination was a planet with golden rings known as Parthix. Perhaps there will be another clue there.

Travel to the planet Parthix. You can find it by searching for it in the galaxy map.
Chinese (simplified):
你一路跟随着未知旅人的足迹来到了这块石像前，它看起来至少有几百年历史了.
你发现他的下一站是Parthix，一个拥有金色星环的行星. 也许你可以从那里找到些许线索.

前往Parthix，你可以在恒星系图中直接搜索这个名称

English:
You have followed the journey of an unknown traveler. From the look of the stones you discovered they were at least several hundred years old.
You found out the Traveler's next destination was a planet with golden rings known as Parthix. Perhaps there will be another clue there.

Travel to the planet Parthix. You can find it by searching for it in the galaxy map.
Chinese (simplified):
你一路跟随着未知旅人的足迹来到了这块石像前，它看起来至少有几百年历史了.
你发现他的下一站是Parthix，一个拥有金色星环的行星. 也许你可以从那里找到些许线索.

前往Parthix，你可以在恒星系图中直接搜索这个名称

English: Travel to Parthix. You can search for it in the galaxy map.
Chinese (simplified): 前往Parthix，你可以在恒星系图中直接搜索这个名称

English: Enter the Orbit of Parthix. You can search for Parthix on your galaxy map.
Chinese (simplified): 进入Parthix轨道，你可以在恒星系图中直接搜索这个名称.

English: Land on Parthix. You can find Parthix by searching for it in the galaxy map.
Chinese (simplified): 在Parthix降落，你可以在恒星系图中直接搜索这个名称.

English: Incoming Transmission: [i][c][ffffff]The Brotherhood of Farr welcomes you to Parthix. Please observe all local laws and regulations. Piracy will not be tolerated.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified): 发信传入: [i][c][ffffff]Farr兄弟会欢迎您来到Parthix，请遵守当地法律法规，海盗行为将不被容忍.[-][/c][/i]
找到有关漫游者的星系

English: Speak with the Archivist. The Archivist will be in the Archives on Parthix.
Chinese (simplified): 与档案管理员对话，他就在Parthix的档案库中.

English: Visit the Archives on Parthix. This is an optional objective.
Chinese (simplified): 访问Parthix上的档案库，这是一个额外目标.

English: Find the Archivist in the Archives. This is an optional objective.
Chinese (simplified): 在档案库找到管理员，这是一个额外目标

English: Your scanners pick up a beacon for a structure called the Farr Archives. Perhaps you should start your search there?
Chinese (simplified): 你的扫描器发现了一个叫做Farr档案库的建筑，也许你可以从那里开始?

English: Wait for the Archivist on Parthix to search for the text. Do not leave Parthix or he will have to start over.
Chinese (simplified): 在档案管理员查阅文本时等待，不要离开该星球否则查找会被中断

English: While you wait for the Archivist explore the rest of Parthix. This is an optional objective.
Chinese (simplified): 在档案管理员查阅文本时等待，你可以用这段时间来探索Parthix. 这是一个额外目标.
来自档案管理员的消息

English: You have new mail. Open your mailbox by opening the PDA. [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 你有新邮件. 启动你的PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]以打开收件箱

English: You have 1 unread message in your inbox.\nOpen the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] to view message.
Chinese (simplified): 你的收件箱中有1条未读信息.\n启动PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]以阅读消息.

English: Return to the Archivist at the Farr Archives on Parthix and speak with him.
Chinese (simplified): 返回到Parthix的Farr档案馆的档案管理员那里并与他交谈。

English: You give the Archivist all the information you gathered on the ancient statues you had discovered. He hands you a package and quickly turns back to his console, frantically adding the new information to the archives.
Chinese (simplified): 你将收集到的有关奇特雕塑的所有信息都交给了档案管理员. 他将包裹交给你以后立刻回到了工作状态，快速地吧新信息录入了档案库.

English: Wait for the Archivist to find the text. Explore the rest of Parthix in the meantime but do not leave the planet or the Archivist will stop looking.
Chinese (simplified): 在档案管理员查阅文本时等待，你可以用这段时间来探索Parthix但是不要离开该星球，否则查找会被中断.

English: Temple Prime was built around the original device Farr used to bring down gold meteorites from orbit.
Chinese (simplified): Temple Prime是围绕着当初Farr用来制造黄金陨石雨的设备建造的.

English: Farr's Arrival preserves the original ship Farr came to Parthix in.
Chinese (simplified): Farr's Arrival 保存着Farr最初来到Parthix时驾驶的飞船.

English: This mission serves to divide the PDA. Default or Reforged missions will be above it, while Project Eden missions will be below it.
Chinese (simplified): 这个任务是用来分隔PDA栏位的. 上面是原版或者重铸任务，伊甸园计划的则在下面

English:
Activate this mission while on a Temperate type planet to launch a probe to scan for a Strange Statue.

Initiating a scan will place a marker on your HUD if a Strange Statue is on the planet. If a statue is not on the planet, no marker will be placed and you may restart the mission on a different planet.

The probe will run out of power after 30 seconds and a new one can be launched after 1 minute.
Requires a Basic System Survey Probe in your toolbar to initiate the scan.
Chinese (simplified):
在温和行星上启动该任务以发射用于寻找奇特雕像的探针.

如果该星球上有奇特雕像，那么探针就会将其在HUD上标出；如果没有，则说明你需要在其他类似的星球上再尝试一次.

探针会在30秒后失效，新的探针可以在一分钟后发射.
启动扫描时需要将基础系统勘测探针置于工具栏中.

English: Basic System Survey Probe on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): 将基础系统勘测探针置于工具栏中

English: Follow the HUD marker to find the statue.
Chinese (simplified): 根据HUD标记来找到奇特雕像.

English: Find the statue. This is an optional objective.
Chinese (simplified): 找到雕像. 这是一个可选目标.

English: The probe has run out of power. You may launch another probe in 1 minute.
Chinese (simplified): 探针电力耗尽，你可以在一分钟之后重新启动另一个探针.

English: Probe is scanning. If a Strange Statue is found a marker will be placed on your HUD.
Chinese (simplified): 探针正在扫描中. 如果发现奇特雕像就会标记在HUD上.

English: Place a Basic System Survey Probe on your toolbar to begin the survey.
Chinese (simplified): 将基础系统勘测探针置于工具栏中以开始勘探

English:
[u][c][ffff00]Reminder: the default story missions cannot be completed while on this starting planet.[-][/c][/u]
You will need to travel to one of the default starting planets ([c][00ff00]Haven[-][/c]/[c][00ff00]Gaia[-][/c]/[c][00ff00]Persephone[-][/c], [c][00ff00]Akua[-][/c], [c][00ff00]Omicron[-][/c], [c][00ff00]Roggery[-][/c], [c][00ff00]Ningues[-][/c]) before you activate the default vanilla or Reforged story missions.

You may activate the Project Eden story mission [c][00ffff]Make Contact with Terran Forces[-][/c] at any time.

The [c][00ffff]Empyriopedia[-][/c] section in the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] contains [u][b]very helpful[/b][/u] information.
Chinese (simplified):
[u][c][ffff00]请注意：你无法在当前星球上完成主线任务.[-][/c][/u]
在启动本体/重铸版的任务之前，你需要前往以下几个默认星球之一 ([c][00ff00]Haven[-][/c]/[c][00ff00]Gaia[-][/c]/[c][00ff00]Persephone[-][/c], [c][00ff00]Akua[-][/c], [c][00ff00]Omicron[-][/c], [c][00ff00]Roggery[-][/c], [c][00ff00]Ningues[-][/c]).

伊甸园计划的任务 [c][00ffff]与地球舰队建立联系[-][/c]可以在任意时间启动.

PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 中的[c][00ffff]帝国百科[-][/c] 部分含有[u][b]非常有用[/b][/u]的信息.

English: [c][abd1ff]Finding resources in Eden can be harder than you might be used to.\nThe United Council of Humanity has compiled a crude list of locations various ore deposits can be found.\nThis is by no means an exhaustive list, nor are resources limited to just the locations listed.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]在伊甸园计划中寻找资源可能比原版要来的难.\n人类联合理事会在这里整理了一些矿物可能出现的未知.\n这并不是一份非常详尽的列表，因此资源出现的位置也不仅限于表中所列出的.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]An orbit is the area of space surrounding a planet.

Orbits can contain faction ships and stations, wrecks, resource asteroids, anomalies, hidden caches, and many other things.

Faction territory and system type has a large impact on what you will find in orbits.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]轨道是指行星周围的太空.

轨道内可能会出现派系飞船与空间站，残骸，资源小行星，异常，隐藏的货箱以及更多其他东西.

派系领地和恒星类型都很大程度上决定了你会在轨道里遇到到什么.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Moons are typically smaller and less populated than planets.

Moons have fewer resources and specialize in a particular type of resource.
A planet may have one or more moons. Gas giants can sometimes have over a dozen.
Different planets can have different types of moons.

Below is a general list of some moon types. Many moons have multiple sub-types.[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]Barren[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Planets:[-][/c] Can be found orbiting any type of planet.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Typically focuses on a common or uncommon resource type.
[c][9fa19b]Lifeless.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Ice[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Planets:[-][/c] Can be found orbiting cold planets or gas giants.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Typically focuses on a common or uncommon resource type. Ice deposits.
[c][9fa19b]Lifeless.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Lava[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Planets:[-][/c] Can be found orbiting any type of planet.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Typically focuses on a common or uncommon resource type.
[c][9fa19b]Lifeless.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Temperate[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Planets:[-][/c] Can be found orbiting some temperate or gas giants.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Low resources.
[c][9fa19b]Habitable.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Methane[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Planets:[-][/c] Can be found orbiting outer gas giants.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Typically focuses on a common or uncommon resource type.
[c][9fa19b]Very cold with a thick atmosphere. Lakes of methane.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Vulcanic[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Planets:[-][/c] Can be found orbiting gas giants.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Magnesium.
[c][9fa19b]Geologically active.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Crystalline[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Planets:[-][/c] Can be rarely found orbiting temperate-like planets.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Large deposits of Pentaxid or Promethium, depending on type.
[c][9fa19b]Beautiful but dangerous.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
This is only a partial list of the possible moons.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]卫星通常比行星更小,人口更少.

卫星的资源较少，并且专注于特定类型的资源.
一颗行星可能有一个或多个卫星,气态巨行星有时可能有十多个.
不同的行星会有不同类型的卫星.

以下是一些卫星类型的常见列表，许多卫星有多种子类型.[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]荒芜(Barren)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]行星:[-][/c] 可能在任何行星边找到.
[c][00afff]资源:[-][/c]通常为常见或罕见见的资源.
[c][9fa19b]无原生生命.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]冰(Ice)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]行星:[-][/c]可能在低温行星或气态巨星边找到.
[c][00afff]资源:[-][/c]通常为常见或罕见见的资源，以及冰矿床.
[c][9fa19b]无原生生命.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]岩浆(Lava)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]行星:[-][/c]可能在任何行星边找到.
[c][00afff]资源:[-][/c]通常为常见或罕见见的资源.
[c][9fa19b]无原生生命.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]温带(Temperate)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]行星:[-][/c]可能在温和行星或气态巨星边找到.
[c][00afff]资源:[-][/c]资源较少.
[c][9fa19b]宜居.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]甲烷(Methane)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]行星:[-][/c]可能在气态巨星边找到.
[c][00afff]资源:[-][/c] 通常为常见或罕见见的资源.
[c][9fa19b]非常寒冷，高浓度大气。甲烷湖泊.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]火山(Vulcanic)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]行星:[-][/c]可能在气态巨星边找到.
[c][00afff]资源:[-][/c]美.
[c][9fa19b]高地质活动.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]结晶(Crastalline)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]行星:[-][/c]极为少见地出现在在类似温和行星周围.
[c][00afff]资源:[-][/c]取决于类型不同，会有大量翘曲水晶或钷的矿床，.
[c][9fa19b]美丽但危险.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
这只是可能卫星的部分列表.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Asteroid Fields are large sectors that may contain resource asteroids, dust clouds, ion storms, and stations belonging to many factions.

Due to interference from the asteroid field many resource asteroids will be hidden from the list of resource asteroids and instead must be scanned down.

Some asteroid fields are claimed by a particular faction.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]小行星带是一种包含有资源小行星，尘云，离子暴以及某些拍戏空间站的大型星区

由于受到小行星带力场的影响，资源小行星不会显示在行星系图的资源列表内，必须进入后手动扫描D.

有些小行星带可能已经被派系占领.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]In some solar systems you can find a sector type known as a site. These sites are generally smaller and focused on a single encounter.
Sites show up as a colored triangle on the solar system map based on the type of site.
Most sites are found only in neutral territory in the galaxy.

Sites are further categorized as [-][/c][c][00ffff]class 1[-][/c] through [c][ff00ff]class 6[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]
The class rating is a general indicator of how difficult, and rewarding, a site may be. You can view a site's class in the description on the map.

[b][c][ffffff]Site Type:[-][/c][/b]
[c][ff0000]Combat[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Description:[-][/c] Sites focused on ship to ship combat.
[c][00afff]Recommended ship class:[-][/c] Combat small or capital vessel.
[c][9fa19b]Bounties can sometimes be found in these places. Heavily guarded.[-][/c]

[c][9d520b]Mining[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Description:[-][/c] Sites focused on ship mining.
[c][00afff]Recommended ship class:[-][/c] Mining small or capital vessel.
[c][9fa19b]Occasionally guarded.[-][/c]

[c][00ffc6]Exploration[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Description:[-][/c] Sites focused on discovery, hacking, or salvaging.
[c][00afff]Recommended ship class:[-][/c] Multi-role exploratory small or capital vessel.
[c][9fa19b]Occasionally guarded.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]在某些行星系中会有这种被称为点位的星区，这些星区一般规模较小，且包含有单一的遭遇事件.
根据种类的不同，点位会在行星系图内显示为不同颜色的三角形.
大部分点位都出现在中立区域.

点位被分为 [-][/c][c][00ffff]1级[-][/c] 到 [c][ff00ff]6级[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]
点位的等级代表了其难度以及奖励，您可以在行星系图中查看点位的种类.

[b][c][ffffff]点位类型:[-][/c][/b]
[c][ff0000]战斗[-][/c]
[c][00afff]描述:[-][/c]专注于舰上或舰对舰战斗的点位.
[c][00afff]推荐使用:[-][/c] 战斗用小型飞船或主力舰.
[c][9fa19b]有时这里会出现赏金目标，但往往守卫森严.[-][/c]

[c][9d520b]采矿[-][/c]
[c][00afff]描述:[-][/c] 主要用于飞船开采的点位.
[c][00afff]推荐使用:[-][/c] 采集用小型飞船或主力舰.
[c][9fa19b]偶尔会有守卫.[-][/c]

[c][00ffc6]探索[-][/c]
[c][00afff]描述:[-][/c] 可以探索，黑入或是打捞物品的点位.
[c][00afff]推荐使用:[-][/c] 多功能探索用小型飞船或主力舰.
[c][9fa19b]偶尔会有守卫.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Trading Station sectors are areas of relative safety.
Trading Station sectors can be found in some faction's galactic territories. They show up on the solar system map as a white station icon.

Each trading station sector has a trading station, distribution center, and bounty office owned by the faction that owns the territory.
The stations have an admin core and cannot normally be destroyed.[-][/c]


[c][ffffff]Trading Stations[-][/c]
Has traders that buy and sell a variety of goods.
Offers a variety of station services.

[c][ffffff]Distribution Headquarters or Centers[-][/c]
Buys or sells bulk packages for delivery to other factions.

[c][ffffff]Bounty Hunter Office[-][/c]
Accepts insignias from various bounties.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]交易站往往是较为安全的星区.
可以在对应派系的领地内找到交易站，在行星系图中以白色空间站标示.

每个交易站星区都会有一个派系所属的交易站，配送中心以及赏金办公室.
交易站使用的是管理员核心，一般无法摧毁.[-][/c]


[c][ffffff]交易站[-][/c]
内会有可以出售和购买各种商品的商人.
提供各种空间站服务.

[c][ffffff]配送总部或者中心[-][/c]
用于买入或是收购运往其他派系的大批货物.

[c][ffffff]赏金猎人办公室[-][/c]
收购各种赏金目标的凭证

English: Select the drop down arrow to expand this category.
Chinese (simplified): 点击下拉按钮以展开该分类.

English: Select the drop down arrow to expand this category.
