English: Select the drop down arrow to expand this category.
Chinese (simplified): 点击下拉按钮以展开该分类.

English: Select the drop down arrow to expand this category.
Chinese (simplified): 点击下拉按钮以展开该分类.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Planets are large rocky bodies that can be landed on and explored.

Below is a general list of some planet types. Many planets have multiple sub-types.[-][/c]

{Eden_Temperate.png}[c][ffffff]Temperate[-][/c]
[c][00afff]System Type:[-][/c] Most commonly found in habitable systems.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Common and uncommon resources.
[c][9fa19b]A multitude of flora and fauna. Typically breathable. Has many sub types.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_Desert.png}[c][ffffff]Desert and Arid[-][/c]
[c][00afff]System Type:[-][/c] Most commonly found in hot or habitable systems.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Common and uncommon resources. Neodymium.
[c][9fa19b]Warm, dry, and sandy.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_Snow.png}[c][ffffff]Snow and Ice[-][/c]
[c][00afff]System Type:[-][/c] Most commonly found in cold or habitable systems.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Common and uncommon resources. Titanium.
[c][9fa19b]Cold. Just very cold.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_Dead.png}[c][ffffff]Dead[-][/c]
[c][00afff]System Type:[-][/c] Most commonly found around dead or dying stars.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Salvage.
[c][9fa19b]Barren and lifeless, only the ruins of extinct civilizations remain.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_Lava.png}[c][ffffff]Lava[-][/c]
[c][00afff]System Type:[-][/c] Most commonly found in hot systems.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Common and uncommon resources. Zascosium.
[c][9fa19b]Young planets or ones undergoing a cataclysmic event.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_Barren.png}[c][ffffff]Barren[-][/c]
[c][00afff]System Type:[-][/c] Found in most systems.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Common and uncommon resources. Sathium.
[c][9fa19b]Hot and radioactive.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]

{Eden_GasGiant.png}[c][ffffff]Gas Giant[-][/c]
[c][ffff00](Unlike other planets, you cannot warp directly to a gas giant. Instead you can warp to each of its moons. A gas giant's value is in the moons it can have.)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]System Type:[-][/c] Found in most systems.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Common and uncommon resources.
[c][9fa19b]Typically has many moons.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]行星是大型的可登录岩石天体.

以下是主要的一些行星类型，其中很多还都包含有数个亚型.[-][/c]

{Eden_Temperate.png}[c][ffffff]温带(Temperate)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c]常见于宜居星系
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c]常见，罕见
[c][9fa19b]被众多植被覆盖的行星，大都可呼吸，有大量的亚型.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_Desert.png}[c][ffffff]沙漠与干旱(Desert and Arid)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c] 可以在高温和宜居星系内找到.
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c] 常见，罕见 钕.
[c][9fa19b]温暖，干燥，充满沙子.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_Snow.png}[c][ffffff]雪地与冰冻(Snow and Ice)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c] 可以在低温和宜居星系内找到.
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c] 常见，罕见，钛.
[c][9fa19b]冷啊，很冷啊 .[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_Dead.png}[c][ffffff]死亡类地行星(Dead)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c] 多可以在已死或将死的星系找到.
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c] 打捞.
[c][9fa19b]荒芜且死寂，剩下的只有前文明留下的遗迹.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_Lava.png}[c][ffffff]岩浆(Lava)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c] 可以在高温星系内找到.
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c] 常见，罕见. 铡.
[c][9fa19b]年轻的星球，正在发生灾难性的地质构造活动.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_Barren.png}[c][ffffff]荒芜(Barren)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c] 几乎所有星系都能找到.
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c] 常见，罕见. 钑.
[c][9fa19b]酷热且充满辐射[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]

{Eden_GasGiant.png}[c][ffffff]气态巨星(Gas Giant)[-][/c]
[c][ffff00](和其他行星不一样，你并不能直接跃迁到或是登录气态巨星，取而代之的是你可以登陆他们的几颗卫星，气态巨星的价值也主要体现在卫星之上)[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c] 几乎所有星系都能找到.
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c] 常见，罕见.
[c][9fa19b]一般来说会有多颗卫星.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]The galaxy is made up of many different star classes. The star class is shown in brackets next to the star name on the galaxy map.
Stars are generally grouped into 4 categories, with each category having different content and overall difficulty.[-][/c]

[c][00ff00]Habitable[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Star Types:[-][/c] G, F, A.
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Common and uncommon resources.
[c][9fa19b]Habitable systems contain a variety of planets and easy space.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Cold[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Star Types:[-][/c] M, D, A4V
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Common, uncommon, and rare resources. Titanium and Erestrum.
[c][9fa19b]Cold systems contain colder planets and moderately dangerous space.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]Hot[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Star Types:[-][/c] K, B, O, M1Ia, WR
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Common, uncommon, and rare resources. Gold and Zascosium.
[c][9fa19b]Hot systems contain hot planets and dangerous space.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ff00ff]Exotic[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Star Types:[-][/c] N, BH, Q, SGR
[c][00afff]Resources:[-][/c] Unknown.
[c][9fa19b]Contains strange planets and deadly space. Use caution when exploring these systems.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]我们所处的星系是由各种类型的恒星组成的，在星图中恒星类型总是用括号标注在恒星名称后方.
总的来说恒星有四个大类, 每种都对应了不同的内容和难度.[-][/c]

[c][00ff00]宜居[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c] G, F, A.
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c] 普通，罕见.
[c][9fa19b]宜居星系主要由几种简单级别的太空和行星组成.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]低温[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c] M, D, A4V
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c] 常见，罕见以及稀有，包括钛和锷.
[c][9fa19b]低温星系主要包含了低温星球和中等难度的太空.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]高温[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c] K, B, O, M1Ia, WR
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c] 常见，罕见以及稀有，包括金和铡.
[c][9fa19b]高温星系主要包含了高温星球和高难度的太空.[-][/c][c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][ff00ff]异域[-][/c]
[c][00afff]星系：[-][/c] N, BH, Q, SGR
[c][00afff]资源：[-][/c] 未知.
[c][9fa19b]包含了奇特星球和致命的太空，探索时请务必保持警惕.[-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]There are many minor regions for immersion and lore.\nThey show up on the map as a smaller gray label.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]星系内同样也有也有许多为了营造沉浸感和塑造背景故事而创建的小型星区.\n它们在星图上以灰色的小标识出现.[-][/c]

English:
[c][00ff00]Territories[-][/c] are spheres of influence on the galaxy map owned by a particular faction. This is not to be confused with the territories found on planets.
Factions own the systems inside their territory and this can influence what content, resources, planets, and other factions you may find there.

[c][00ff00]Major regions[-][/c] are marked on the galaxy map with a white label and are usually associated with a faction territory.
You can toggle territory and region visibility on the galaxy map.


{Eden_RegionTheForge.png}[c][ffffff]The Forge[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][ff8000]Polaris[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] Colonists, Brotherhood of Farr, Pirates.
[c][9fa19b]The golden light of The Forge nebula illuminates the fires of industry of Polaris Megacorp.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionTranquility.png}[c][ffffff]Tranquility[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][00ffff]Trader Guild[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] 
[c][9fa19b]A reflection nebula bathes the heart of Trader Guild territory in a soothing blue light.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionStar.png}[c][ffffff]Golden Province[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][ffca0a]Brotherhood of Farr[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] Polaris, Pirates.
[c][9fa19b]The Brotherhood is taking their first steps to join the interstellar community and have given their territory the name Golden Province in honor of their prophet. The golden light of The Forge can be seen from the Farr homeworld of Parthix.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionThronelands.png}[c][ffffff]The Thronelands[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][ff0000]Zirax Empire[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b]The center of the galaxy is filled with bright nebula and active star forming regions.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]{Eden_RegionBadlands.png}[c][ffffff]The Badlands[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][ffff00]Pirates[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] Warlord
[c][9fa19b]Many ships go missing against the pale green backdrop of The Badlands. A place of villains and smugglers, warlords and robbers.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]{Eden_RegionStar.png}[c][ffffff]Prosperity[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][00ffff]Free Colonists[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] Warlord, Pirates
[c][9fa19b]Built on a promise of a better future, Prosperity quickly became both a land of opportunity for those who dared the frontier, and the bandits and raiders who would take their livelihood.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionVoid.png}[c][ffffff]Void[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][ff00ff]The Tesch Collective[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] Colonists.
[c][9fa19b]Little is known of The Tesch. Hidden in a sickly red and blue-green nebula, they fiercely guard their Pentaxid asteroids from would-be thieves.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionWastelands.png}[c][ffffff]The Wastelands[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][9d520b]Wastelanders[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] ARC, Warlord, Pirates
[c][9fa19b]A large dust filled region of the galaxy. The Wastelands have become a haven for those seeking to flee from the oppression of the major factions of the galaxy.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionSeaOfSilence.png}[c][ffffff]Sea of Silence[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][00ffc6]The Legacy[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] 
[c][9fa19b]The gas and dust that make up the Sea of Silence should have dispersed long ago but have somehow held together. Strange alien ships have been spotted here.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionDronelands.png}[c][ffffff]The Dronelands[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][ff8000]Drone Swarm[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] 
[c][9fa19b]Full of glowing interstellar dust, this region of the galaxy is largely unexplored and few expeditions have ever returned.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionNexus.png}[c][ffffff]Nexus[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [c][ff00ff]Kriel[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] 
[c][9fa19b]The Nexus is the home of the mysterious Kriel. The glow from their nebula bathes their territory in a purple light. It is said they fiercely guard the entrance to their territory.[-][/c]

{Eden_RegionBlack.png}[c][ffffff]Decay[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Faction:[-][/c] [b][c][34934c]Progenitors[-][/c][/b]
[c][00afff]Secondary factions:[-][/c] 
[c][9fa19b]This satellite cluster of dead stars is out of range of conventional warp drive.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ff00]领地[-][/c]是指银河星图上某个特定派系所拥有的势力范围.不要将其与行星上的领土混淆.
派系拥有其领土内的星系，这可能会影响您在那里可能找到的内容、资源、行星以及其它派系.

[c][00ff00]主要地区[-][/c]在银河地图上用白色标签标记，通常与派系领土相关.
您可以在星系地图上切换领土和区域可见性.


{Eden_RegionTheForge.png}[c][ffffff]锻造星域[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][ff8000]极星[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] 殖民者, Farr兄弟会, 海盗.
[c][9fa19b]熔炉星云金光照耀着极星巨型企业的工业之火.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionTranquility.png}[c][ffffff]宁静星域[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][00ffff]贸易协会[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] 
[c][9fa19b]贸易协会领土的中心沐浴在星云反射的柔和蓝光中.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionStar.png}[c][ffffff]黄金省[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][ffca0a]Farr兄弟会[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] 极星, 海盗.
[c][9fa19b]兄弟会正在迈出加入星际社区的第一步，并将他们的领土命名为黄金省，以纪念他们的先知。从法尔的家乡Parthix可以看到锻造星域的金色光芒.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionThronelands.png}[c][ffffff]王座之地[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][ff0000]兹瑞克斯帝国[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b]星系的中心充满了明亮的星云和活跃的恒星形成区域.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]{Eden_RegionBadlands.png}[c][ffffff]恶土[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][ffff00]海盗[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] 军阀
[c][9fa19b]许多船只在恶土淡绿色的背景下失踪。恶棍和走私者、军阀和强盗的乐园.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]{Eden_RegionStar.png}[c][ffffff]繁荣星域[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][00ffff]自由殖民者[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] 军阀, 海盗
[c][9fa19b]始于对更美好未来的承诺，繁荣星域很快成为那些敢于开拓边境的人的机遇之地，也成为那些想要夺走他们生计的土匪和掠夺者的机会之地.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionVoid.png}[c][ffffff]虚空[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][ff00ff]泰施集团[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] 殖民者.
[c][9fa19b]人们对泰施知之甚少，他们隐藏在病态的红色和蓝绿色星云中，警惕地保护着翘曲水晶免遭窃贼的侵害.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionWastelands.png}[c][ffffff]废土[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][9d520b]Wastelanders[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] ARC, 军阀, 海盗
[c][9fa19b]银河系中一大片充满尘埃的区域，废土已成为那些寻求逃离银河系主要派系压迫的人的避风港.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionSeaOfSilence.png}[c][ffffff]寂静之海[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][00ffc6]遗留者[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] 
[c][9fa19b]构成寂静之海的气体和尘埃本应早已消散，但不知何故仍聚集于此，有报告称此处出现了奇怪的外星飞船.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionDronelands.png}[c][ffffff]无人机之地[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][ff8000]无人机虫群[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] 
[c][9fa19b]这个区域充满了发光的星尘，人迹罕至，很少有探险队能活着从这里出来.[-][/c]
[c][9fa19b][-][/c]
{Eden_RegionNexus.png}[c][ffffff]枢纽[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [c][ff00ff]克里尔[-][/c]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] 
[c][9fa19b]枢纽是神秘的克里尔的故乡，星云发出的光芒将它们的领地沐浴在紫色的光芒中，据说他们严密把守着领地的入口.[-][/c]

{Eden_RegionBlack.png}[c][ffffff]衰变[-][/c]
[c][00afff]派系:[-][/c] [b][c][34934c]先祖[-][/c][/b]
[c][00afff]次要派系:[-][/c] 
[c][9fa19b]这个由死亡恒星组成的卫星星团超出了传统翘曲驱动器的范围.[-][/c]

English: Craft a research report in a constructor and place it in your personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 创建研究报告并置于背包内

English: You have the research report. Now access the Research Computer of a UCH Research Vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 你得到了研究报告，现在可以去访问.

English:
[c][00afff]Location: [-][/c][c][00ffff]The Forge[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Dominant faction: [-][/c][c][ff8000]Polaris[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Estimated difficulty: [-][/c][c][00ff00]Easy[-][/c]
[c][00afff]Requirements:[-][/c] [c][ffffff]3,000,000 bank balance, Neutral with Polaris[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]
As we work on rebuilding our fleet we find ourselves short on resources. Let's face it, we are alone here and our current mining fleets just can't obtain enough ore fast enough. That's where you come in.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]We want you to go to the region of the galaxy known as The Forge and arrange a deal with Polaris Megacorp to buy the schematic to their prototype Automated Industrial Mining Rig. [-][/c][c][ffffff]This new rig of theirs is able to mine a planetary ore deposit for far longer before needing to be refueled or emptied than a standard auto mining device.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]I have arranged a meeting with a Polaris representative[-][/c][c][ffffff] on a [-][/c][c][00ff00]Polaris Distribution Center[-][/c][c][ffffff]. You can find Distribution Centers in [-][/c][c][00ff00]Polaris Trading Station[-][/c][c][ffffff] sectors inside [-][/c][c][00ff00]Polaris territory[-][/c][c][ffffff]. They show up on the solar system map as a white station icon.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]I cannot understate the importance of the UCH obtaining this technology. If you can cut a deal to purchase it from them, do so. But if they refuse, you may have to resort to other means of obtaining the schematic.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00afff]位置：[-][/c][c][00ffff]锻造星云[-][/c]
[c][00afff]控制派系: [-][/c][c][ff8000]极星[-][/c]
[c][00afff]预估难度： [-][/c][c][00ff00]简单[-][/c]
[c][00afff]前置要求：[-][/c] [c][ffffff]3,000,000银行存款，极星声望中立或以上[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]
舰队的重建面临着资源匮乏的问题. 我们必须认识到一点：我们现在孤立无援，开采舰队的速度也远远跟不上我们的建设.这时就需要你挺身而出了.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]我们希望你前往被称为锻造的星域并和极星探讨一下购买他们的实验性工业钻机图纸的事宜. [-][/c][c][ffffff]和标准的采矿设备相比，他们的钻机能够长时间无需补给自动开采星球表面的资源.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]我已经安排了你和一名极星代表[-][/c][c][ffffff] 在一个 [-][/c][c][00ff00]极星配送中心[-][/c][c][ffffff]进行会面. 你可以在 [-][/c][c][00ff00]极星领地[-][/c][c][ffffff] 内的 [-][/c][c][00ff00]极星交易站[-][/c][c][ffffff]星区找到配送中心. 它们在星图上显示为白色的空间站标识.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]相信你不用我多说也知道UCH获得这项技术的重要性.如果你最后和他们谈成了，自然是最好的. 但如如果他们拒绝了，那么你可能就得采取其他手段来获取图纸[-][/c]

English: Start making your way to The Forge if you haven't already.\nFind a [c][00ff00]Trading Station Sector[-][/c] in Polaris territory.\nTrading Station Sectors show up as a [c][00ff00]white station icon[-][/c] on the [c][00ff00]solar system map[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 如果你还没有到达锻造星云，就动身吧.\n在极星领地中找到[c][00ff00]交易站星区[-][/c].\n交易站会以[c][00ff00]白色空间站的标识[-][/c] 显示在[c][00ff00]恒星系星图上[-][/c].

English: Speak to your contact on a Polaris Distribution Center.\nPolaris Distribution Centers can be found in Trading Station Sectors inside Polaris territory in The Forge region.\nTrading Station Sectors show up on the solar system map as a white station icon.
Chinese (simplified): 在极星交易中心与你的联系人对话.\n极星配送中心可以在隶属于极星的锻造星团的极星交易站边找到.\n此处的交易站会以白色空间站的标识显示在星图上.

English: Warp to a trading station sector.
You have entered a trading station sector. If this is Polaris territory there should be a [c][00ff00]Distribution Center[-][/c] owned by Polaris nearby.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经进入了交易站星区. 如果你所处的星系是极星领地那么附近就会有一个 [c][00ff00]配送中心[-][/c] .

English: Warp to a K2-7 class star inside Polaris territory
Chinese (simplified): 在极星领地内，跃迁至 K2-7 型星系

English: Warp to a K2-7 class star inside Polaris territory.
Chinese (simplified): 在极星领地内，跃迁至 K2-7 型星系

English: Warp to the gas giant's barren moon
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁本星系气态巨星的荒芜卫星

English: Warp to the gas giant's barren moon in the K2-7 class star system in Polaris Territory.
Chinese (simplified): 在极星领地内，跃迁至 K2-7 型星系中气态巨的荒芜卫星
接近轨道上的海盗窃贼.
接近轨道上的海盗窃贼.

English: Find the logs on the ship.
Land on the gas giant's barren moon in the MissionPolaris1   class system in Polaris territory.
Chinese (simplified): 在极星领地内，降落于 K2-7 型星系中气态巨星球的荒芜卫星
你有一条新消息，查看PDA中的兹瑞克斯部分

English: You have been tasked with inspecting the prototype mining rigs on the moon. Approach the first rig.
Chinese (simplified): 你被交予了检视原型矿钻的任务，接近第一台钻机

English: There doesn't appear to be any damage or signs of tampering. Find the second rig.
Chinese (simplified): 看起来并没有损坏或是篡改的痕迹.，继续前往第二台钻机.

English: Like the previous one, this one seems intact. Move on to the third.
Chinese (simplified): 和前面一台一样, 这台也是完好无损，正在前往第三台.

English: This one shows signs of structural damage. It appears someone was trying to break through the side. Find the fourth.
Chinese (simplified): 这台看起来受到了结构性损伤，看起来有人想从侧面撬开，去第四台吧.

English: This rig is ruined and will need a repair team. Nothing you can do about it now, move on to the final rig.
Chinese (simplified): 这台钻机已经完全毁掉了，需要专业团队进行维修. 你现在也没办法做什么了，前往最后一台钻机.

English: Thee appears to be a Zirax hack in progress on this mining rig. There is a Zirax console nearby, probably what they are using to do their hacking.
Chinese (simplified): 很明显兹瑞克斯正在尝试黑入钻机. 边上有一题兹瑞克斯控制台，应该就是用来黑入的.

English: Speak to your contact on a Polaris Distribution Center and find out why you did not find a schematic.\nPolaris Distribution Centers can be found in Trading Station Sectors inside Polaris territory in The Forge region.\nTrading Station Sectors show up on the solar system map as a white station icon.
Chinese (simplified): 在极星配送中心与联络人探讨你为何没能拿到图纸.\n极星配送中心可以在隶属于极星的锻造星团的极星交易站边找到.\n此处的交易站会以白色空间站的标识显示在星图上.

English: Warp to a trading station sector.
You have entered a trading station sector. If this is Polaris territory there should be a Distribution Center owned by Polaris nearby.
Chinese (simplified): 你进入了交易站星区. 如果这个星系是极星领地，那么附近会有一个配送中心.

English: You find no mention of a schematic in the data logs from the Zirax console. You should ask your contact where the schematic is.\nReturn to the Polaris Distribution Center in a Trading Station Sector in Polaris territory.
Chinese (simplified): 兹瑞克斯的控制台上丝毫没有提到图纸相关的内容. 你应该问一问联系人图纸的下落.\n回到位于极星交易站星区的配送中心.

English: Warp to a [c][00ff00]K2-7[-][/c] class star system.\nYou can search for the star type in the galaxy map using exact spelling.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁至 [c][00ff00]K2-7[-][/c] 型恒星系.\n你可以用星图的星系类型功能进行查找（请输入准确的恒星种类）.

English: Your scanners pick up the tracking signal your contact gave you. Find the pirate thieves and confront them.
Chinese (simplified): 你的扫描器检测到了联系人交给你的追踪器信号. 找到海盗并与他们对质

English: The pirate ship appears derelict. There may be information you can extract from the bridge console.
Chinese (simplified): 海盗的飞船看起来被废弃了，也许你可以从舰桥控制台获得一些线索

English: The information from the console shows the pirates were attacked by a Zirax ship which then went to the moon.
Chinese (simplified): 控制台上显示这队海盗遭到了兹瑞克斯的攻击，现在他们开始向月球移动了

English: [c][ffffff][b]Polaris Contact:[/b][-][/c] Did you find the schematic? What? The ship was empty and the Zirax went to the moon? We have prototype mining rigs set up on that moon. You need to get down there and inspect them for tampering or damage!
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][b]极星联系人:[/b][-][/c] 你找到蓝图了? 什么? 船上什么都没有，兹瑞克斯人去了月球? 我们在那个月球上放置了好几个实验性钻机. 你必须在星球上降落并阻止他们篡改或是损坏钻头!
侦测到兹瑞克斯传送垫板.

English: Speak with your contact on board the station.
Chinese (simplified): 在空间站甲板上与联系人交谈

English: Inspect all the mining rigs for damage.
Chinese (simplified): 检视所有的开采钻机以确认损害

English: Your scanners detect the tracking frequency around one of the moons of the gas giant in this system.\nWarp to one of the [c][00ff00]gas giant's moons[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 你的扫描器在本星系气态巨星的一颗卫星上检测到了追踪信号.\n跃迁至[c][00ff00]气态巨星的卫星[-][/c].

English: The better your fishing skill, the more fish you get! Keep tryin'!
Chinese (simplified): 钓鱼技术越好，钓到的就越多! 继续尝试!

English: Nice day for fishin ain't it?
Chinese (simplified): 今天也是好天气，非常适合钓鱼不是吗?

English: [c][ffffff][b][Fisher][/b][-][/c]\nLook around, there must be 3 school of fish around my boat.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][b][Fisher][/b][-][/c]\n在附近找找，我的船附近一定有三个鱼群

English: Go to one of the School of Fish
Go to one of the School of Fish
Go to one of the School of Fish

Rich asteroids detected. Recommended to remove warp drive from targeting parameters of turrets to prevent accidental firing on rich asteroids.\nNew Empyriopedia entry unlocking: Galaxy and Resources > Resources > Rich Asteroids
Chinese (simplified): 侦测到富矿小行星. 建议解除炮塔对翘曲引擎的锁定以放置误伤小行星.\n解锁新的帝国百科词条：星系与资源 > 资源 > 富矿小行星

English:
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_RichIngots.png}Rich Asteroids can be found in Rich Asteroid Field sectors and occasionally in orbits within the territories of the major factions of the galaxy.
They require specialized modulated mining lasers to mine.
See Weapons and Devices > Modulated Mining Drills.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]WARNING: Mining rich asteroids may trigger unwanted attention.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]{Eden_RichIngots.png}富矿小行星主要出现在富矿小行星带中，偶尔也会出现在主要派系领地的星球轨道附近.
开采这些矿物需要特殊的调制钻头.
参见武器与设备 > 调制开采钻头.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]警告: 挖掘重矿或富矿小行星可能会引来不必要的注意.[-][/c]
打捞无人机处理器 的详细信息

English:
[c][abd1ff]Salvaged Drone Processors can only be obtained from the Drone Swarm.
They can be found near the edges of the galaxy, or in greater numbers in the Dronelands.

Be warned, they are a dangerous enemy.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]打捞的无人机处理器只能从无人机虫群处获得.
一般可以在星系的边缘找到，在Droneland数量更多.

但一定要小心，它们是极端危险的敌人.[-][/c]
虚空物质 详细信息

English:
{Eden_Voidium.png}[c][abd1ff]Voidium is a very rare end game resource found growing in large crystal formations on some planets.
You will need a Voidium Extractor or Voidium Drill to harvest it, unlocked in the Progenitor Research tab of your tech tree.[-][/c]

Voidium contains trace amounts of Dark Matter and can be extracted through a lengthy process.
Voidium is extremely massive and takes up a lot of room. Ensure you have a ship capable of hauling it before harvesting.


{Eden_DarkMatter.png}Dark Matter is a very rare end game crafting component extracted from Voidium. You must unlock it in the Progenitor Research section of your tech tree before you can extract it.
To extract it you will need an Advanced Constructor and a cargo bay large enough to store the required amount of Voidium. The process takes quite some time.
Dark Matter can be stored in two forms: A smaller Dark Matter Container that can be used to construct smaller devices or personal equipment, and a larger Dark Matter Pod used in larger devices such as those for capital vessels.
Dark Matter Containers can also be rarely found as loot, though the chances of this are slim.


{Eden_ProgenitorFragment.png}Progenitor Technology Fragments are a rare end game crafting component used in Progenitor technology. To build a Voidium Extractor you will need Progenitor Technology Fragments.
While it's unclear where to get these fragments, you might start by speaking with the Lead Researcher on board a UCH Research Vessel as they are currently studying the Progenitors.
Chinese (simplified):
{Eden_Voidium.png}[c][abd1ff]虚空矿物是一种极其珍贵的游戏后期材料，会在某些星球上已大型晶体构造的形式存在.
你必须使用虚空物质采集器或虚空物质钻头，通过科技树的先祖研究页面解锁.[-][/c]

虚空物质含有微量的暗物质，可以通过长时间的提取来获得.
虚空物质密度极高且体积巨大，在开采前一定要确保你的飞船有能力进行运输.


{Eden_DarkMatter.png}暗物质是一种从虚空物质中提取的极其珍贵的游戏后期材料.必须通过科技树的先祖研究页面解锁后才能进行提取.
为了提取暗物质，你必须拥有一台高级建造机和足以容纳虚空物质的容器，提取过程会消耗非常长的时间.
暗物质可以以两种形式储存：用于制造小型设备或是个人装备的暗物质容器，以及用于主力舰的大型暗物质荚仓.
暗物质容易也有可能作为战利品被找到，尽管基本上是不可能的.


{Eden_ProgenitorFragment.png}先祖科技碎片是一种用于合成先祖设备的极其珍贵的游戏后期材料. 制造虚空物质采集器需要先祖科技碎片.
尽管这些碎片的来源未知，但也许你可以和UCH研究船上的首席研究员聊一聊，他或许能给你一些提示.

English: Rich asteroids detected. Recommended to remove warp drive from targeting parameters of turrets to prevent accidental firing on rich asteroids.\nNew Empyriopedia entry unlocking: Galaxy and Resources > Resources > Rich Asteroids
Chinese (simplified): 侦测到富矿小行星. 建议解除炮塔对翘曲引擎的锁定以放置误伤小行星.\n解锁新的帝国百科词条：星系与资源 > 资源 > 富矿小行星

Chinese (simplified): 侦测到结晶态虚空物质结构.\n解锁新的帝国百科词条：[c][00ff00]星系与资源[-][/c] > [c][00ff00]资源[-][/c] > [c][00ff00]虚空物质[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Rich and Dense Ice Asteroids are different from your standard asteroids.
They can only be mined using specialized Ice Mining Lasers sold at Colonists Scrapyards.
See Weapons and Devices > Modulated Mining Drills.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]WARNING: Mining dense or rich ice may trigger unwanted attention.[-][/c]

{Eden_IceDense.png}You can find Dense Ice Asteroids in orbits and ice fields in cold systems.
Dense Ice can be refined into various components in a deconstructor.

{Eden_IceRich.png}You can find Rich Ice Asteroids in the same places in the region of Solitude.
Rich ice can be refined into various components in a deconstructor.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]富冰和重冰小行星与你平时见到的一半小行星不同.
它们只能用殖民者废料厂出售的钻头开采.
参见武器与设备 > 调制开采钻头.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]警告： 挖掘重矿或富矿小行星可能会引来不必要的注意.[-][/c]

{Eden_IceDense.png}你可以在寒冷星系的行星轨道或是冰小行星带中找到重冰和富冰.
重冰可以在拆解机中拆分为多种有用的材料.

{Eden_IceRich.png}你可以在同样的地方找到富冰.
富冰可以在拆解机中拆分为多种有用的材料.

English: Visit the research lab above the hangar bay and speak with the lead researcher. You can access the lab from the main hangar via the two elevators at the back of the hangar.\nThe lab also contains a research computer and schematic computer you should familiarize yourself with.
Chinese (simplified): 参观机库上方的研究实验室并与首席研究院交谈，你可以通过机库后方的两个电梯到达那里.\n同时你也最好去熟悉一下研究计算机和蓝图计算机.

English: [c][abd1ff]Take the elevator to the research lab[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 乘坐电梯前往研究实验室。

English: [c][b4e1ff]Take the elevator to the main bridge[-][/c]

[c][b4e1ff]You are playing [-][/c][c][00ffff]Reforged Eden[-][/c].
[c][b4e1ff]Starting this mission will give you the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Project Eden Support Guide[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and [-][/c][c][00ff00]Project Eden Gameplay Guide[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] in your inventory which contains basic info on the scenario.
If you wish to start the Project Eden story simply activate the [-][/c][c][00ff00]Make Contact with Terran Forces[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] mission.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]Please see the Project Eden section of the Empyriopedia for many useful tips and pieces of information.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]If you are playing on a server you will need to contact your server admins for support.[-][/c]
[c][ff8000][b]Please do not report game bugs to the game developers unless you have reproduced it in a default survival game first.[/b][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][b4e1ff]您正在游玩的是[-][/c][c][00ffff]重铸伊甸园[-][/c].
[c][b4e1ff]开启该任务会在背包中得到[-][/c][c][00ff00]伊甸园计划支援手册[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 以及 [-][/c][c][00ff00]伊甸园计划玩法指南[-][/c][c][b4e1ff]，其中包含了本场景的基础信息.
如果想要开始伊甸园计划故事线，只需启动[-][/c][c][00ff00]与地球部队建立联系[-][/c][c][b4e1ff]任务.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]参见帝国百科的伊甸园计划部分以获取大量有用的信息.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]如果你在服务器上游玩请咨询管理员.[-][/c]
[c][ff8000][b]除非你在原版也能重复出同样的bug，否则请勿向官方开发者反馈bug.[/b][-][/c]

English: A copy of the Project Eden Guide has been added to your personal or connected inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 一份伊甸园计划指南已被添加到背包中

English:
[c][00ffff][b]Galaxy map tips:[/b][-][/c]
Use the standard movement keys ([c][ffff00]W A S D, C, Space[-][/c]) while holding down [c][ffff00]Left Click[-][/c] to move the camera.
Holding [c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c] speeds up camera speed.
Use the [c][00ff00]Search System[-][/c] box at the bottom to search by star or playfield name or by star type.
Various filters and a help menu can be accessed with the buttons in the upper left. Press the [c][ffca0a]?[-][/c] icon for more information.

Select [c][00ff00]Proceed[-][/c] to never show this message again.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][00ffff][b]星图使用指南:[/b][-][/c]
使用移动按键([c][ffff00]W A S D， C， 空格[-][/c]) 并按下[c][ffff00]鼠标左键[-][/c]来移动视角.
同时按下[c][ffff00]Shift[-][/c] + [c][ffff00]Ctrl[-][/c]来提高移动速度.
使用下方的[c][00ff00]Search System[-][/c]文本框来搜查找特定星球或星区的名称.
左上角的按钮提供了多种筛选器和帮助.按下[c][ffca0a]?[-][/c]图标以获取更多信息.

点击[c][00ff00]Proceed[-][/c]后该消息便不会再显示.

English: More information will be added here at a later time.
Chinese (simplified): 稍后将在此添加更多信息。

English:
[c][abd1ff]Modulated Drills are the only mining equipment that can harvest Dense and Rich asteroids. They come in manual and automatic versions.[-][/c]


{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]Modulated Ice Harvester Drill[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Source:[-][/c] Can be purchased from Colonists quartermasters at Colonist Scrapyards.
Schematic can be purchased from Polaris Distribution Centers after completing Expedition: The Forge.

[c][ffffff]Overview:[-][/c] A fixed laser drill for Capital Vessels.
Effective only on Dense and Rich Ice Asteroids.
Deposits the ice into a harvest container once the target asteroid is completely depleted.
Can take some time to harvest an asteroid so multiple drills are recommended.

{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]Modulated Asteroid Harvester Drill[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Source:[-][/c] Schematic can be purchased from Polaris Distribution Centers after completing Expedition: The Forge.

[c][ffffff]Overview:[-][/c] A fixed laser drill for Capital Vessels. Requires Deuterium Fuel Cells to run.
Effective only on Rich Asteroids. Can mine dense and rich ice at 25% effectiveness.
Deposits the ore into a harvest container once the target asteroid is completely depleted.
Can take some time to harvest an asteroid so multiple drills are recommended.

{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]Automated Ice Harvester Drill Turret[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Source:[-][/c] Can be purchased from Colonists quartermasters at Colonist Scrapyards.
Schematic can be purchased from Polaris Distribution Centers after completing Expedition: The Forge.

[c][ffffff]Overview:[-][/c] A laser drill turret for Capital Vessels. Effective only on Dense and Rich Ice Asteroids.
Deposits the ore into a harvest container once the target asteroid is completely depleted.
Can take some time to harvest an asteroid so multiple drills are recommended.
When set to target Prey and NPC Factions, Bases, and Warp Drives, will automatically mine out nearby dense and rich ice asteroids. NOTE: this does not work if you are in the pilot seat of a ship while playing co-op or on a server due to technical reasons.

{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]Automated Asteroid Harvester Drill Turret[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Source:[-][/c] Schematic can be purchased from Polaris Distribution Centers after completing Expedition: The Forge.

[c][ffffff]Overview:[-][/c] A laser drill turret for Capital Vessels. Requires Deuterium Fuel Cells to run.
Effective only on Rich Asteroids. Can mine dense and rich ice at 25% effectiveness.
Deposits the ore into a harvest container once the target asteroid is completely depleted.
Can take some time to harvest an asteroid so multiple drills are recommended.
When set to target Prey and NPC Factions, Bases, and Warp Drives, will automatically mine out nearby dense and rich asteroids. NOTE: this does not work if you are in the pilot seat of a ship while playing co-op or on a server due to technical reasons.

{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]Asteroid Excavator Turret[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Source:[-][/c] Schematic can be purchased from Polaris Distribution Centers after completing Expedition: The Forge.

[c][ffffff]Overview:[-][/c] A massive laser drill turret for Capital Vessels. Requires Deuterium Fuel Cells to run.
Effective only on Rich Asteroids. Can mine dense and rich ice at 25% effectiveness.
Deposits the ore into a harvest container once the target asteroid is completely depleted.
Can take some time to harvest an asteroid so multiple drills are recommended.
When set to target Prey and NPC Factions, Bases, and Warp Drives, will automatically mine out nearby dense and rich asteroids. NOTE: this does not work if you are in the pilot seat of a ship while playing co-op or on a server due to technical reasons.
Has massive range and damage compared to other drill turrets.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]调制钻头是开采重/富矿小行星的唯一选择，包含有自动和手动的把那本.[-][/c]


{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]调制陨冰钻头[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]来源：[-][/c] 可从殖民者的军需官或废料厂处购买.
蓝图可在完成了远征：锻造后在极星配送中心购买.

[c][ffffff]总览：[-][/c] 一种主力舰使用的固定激光钻头.
只对重冰和富冰小行星有效.
开采小行星直至其枯竭（消失），资源便会存入你的采集控制器.
开采时间较长，推荐同时安装多个钻头.

{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]调制小行星采集钻头[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]来源：[-][/c] 蓝图可在完成了远征：锻造后在极星配送中心购买.

[c][ffffff]总览：[-][/c] 一种主力舰使用的固定激光钻头，运作时消耗氘燃料包.
只对富矿小行星有效，可以以25% 的效率开采重冰和富冰.
开采小行星直至其枯竭（消失），资源便会存入你的采集控制器.
开采时间较长，推荐同时安装多个钻头.

{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]自动化陨冰钻头炮塔[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]来源：[-][/c] C可从殖民者的军需官或废料厂处购买.
蓝图可在完成了远征：锻造后在极星配送中心购买.

[c][ffffff]总览：[-][/c] 主力舰使用的激光钻头炮塔. 只对重冰和富冰小行星有效.
开采小行星直至其枯竭（消失），资源便会存入你的采集控制器.
开采时间较长，推荐同时安装多个钻头.
当目标组设定为被捕食者和NPC派系，基地和翘曲驱动器时, 可以自动开采附近的重冰及富冰小行星. 请注意：由于技术原因，在多人模式或服务器中坐在驾驶座上时无效.

{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]自动化小行星采集炮塔[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]来源：[-][/c] 蓝图可在完成了远征：锻造后在极星配送中心购买.

[c][ffffff]总览：[-][/c] 一种主力舰使用的激光钻头炮塔，运作时消耗氘燃料包.
只对富矿小行星有效，可以以25% 的效率开采重冰和富冰.
开采小行星直至其枯竭（消失），资源便会存入你的采集控制器.
开采时间较长，推荐同时安装多个钻头.
当目标组设定为被捕食者和NPC派系，基地和翘曲驱动器时, 可以自动开采附近的重矿及富矿小行星. 请注意：由于技术原因，在多人模式或服务器中坐在驾驶座上时无效.

{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]小行星挖掘炮塔[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]]来源：[-][/c] 蓝图可在完成了远征：锻造后在极星配送中心购买.

[c][ffffff]总览：[-][/c] 一种主力舰使用的超大型激光钻头炮塔，运作时消耗氘燃料包.
只对富矿小行星有效，可以以25% 的效率开采重冰和富冰.
开采小行星直至其枯竭（消失），资源便会存入你的采集控制器.
开采时间较长，推荐同时安装多个钻头.
当目标组设定为被捕食者和NPC派系，基地和翘曲驱动器时, 可以自动开采附近的重矿及富矿小行星. 请注意：由于技术原因，在多人模式或服务器中坐在驾驶座上时无效.
拥有远高于其他钻头炮塔的伤害

English:
{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]MX-4 Rapid Torpedo Launcher[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Source:[-][/c] Schematic can be purchased from quartermasters on UCH Research Vessels.

[c][ffffff]Overview:[-][/c] A manual burst fire guided torpedo launcher for Capital Vessels.
Fires a quick volley of 3 vertical launching torpedoes that home in on the target.
Is not obstructed by blocks placed in front of it.
Deals low shield damage.
[c][ffff00]IMPORTANT: Place on the top, sides, or bottom of your ship. Only rotate in the axis of roll as the launcher needs to face the correct direction in order to fire. Rotating the launcher in any other axis may cause it to not function. If this occurs, pick up the launcher, remove it from your toolbar, place it on your toolbar and this resets the placement orientation.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][ffff00]MX-4 高射速鱼雷发射器[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]来源：[-][/c] 可以在UCH研究船的军需官处购买.

[c][ffffff]总览：[-][/c] 主力舰使用的多发点射开火式鱼雷发射器.
连续垂直发射3发跟踪目标的鱼雷.
不会被前方放置的方块阻挡.
造成较低护肤你伤害.
[c][ffff00]重要提示：放置于飞船的上下方或者侧面，确保安装时只用滚装轴对不同安装位置的发射方向进行调整，转动其他轴极有可能造成武器失效. 如果不小心转动了，将发射器拆卸并放入背包，之后放回工具栏以重置旋转.[-][/c]
访问控制台以获取奖励

English: Access the console inside the Dyson Sphere to get your reward.
Chinese (simplified): 访问戴森球内的控制台以获取奖励

English: The portal sent you to one of the many structures just below the surface of the Dyson Sphere's outer shell. It appears abandoned.\n\n[i][c][ffffff]This is the end of the mission for now. A lot more will be added later.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified): 这个传送门可以将你传送到戴森球内部众多建筑之一. 看上去已经被废弃了.\n\n[i][c][ffffff]当前版本任务到此结束. 未来会添加更多内容.[-][/c][/i]

English: [c][ffff00]MAIN STORY MISSIONS ARE NOT AVAILABLE ON THIS STARTING PLANET.[-][/c]\nOpen the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] when you are safe.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00]主线任务无法在该星球上进行.[-][/c]\n在你确保安全是开启PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c].
摧毁无人机蜂拥者. (可选)
[c][ffff00]警告：[-][/c] [c][ffffff]侦测到敌对无人机蜂拥者[-][/c]

English: Defeat Captain Xorchek's escorts. This objective is optional.
Chinese (simplified): 击败Xorchek舰长的护卫舰。此目标是可选的。

English: The drone was a decoy! Incoming warp signatures detected. Prepare for battle.
Chinese (simplified): 那架无人机是个诱饵！检测到在途跃迁信号。准备战斗。

English: [c][ffff00]Captain Xorchek:[-][/c] [c][ffffff][i]Ah, fresh meat! Our decoy has caught another victim! Turn that Terran ship into scrap![/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00]Xorchek舰长:[-][/c] [c][ffffff][i]啊，新鲜的肉！我们的诱饵抓到了另一个祭品！把那艘人族飞船变成碎片！[/i][-][/c]

English:
[c][ffffff]Scanning this site will require [-][/c][c][00ff00]Basic Survey Probes[-][/c][c][ffffff] in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]You can craft survey probes under the Decoration tab of a constructor.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]Make sure you are connected to a cargo container with plenty of free storage capacity before performing a scan.[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]扫描此处需要将 [-][/c][c][00ff00]基础勘测探针[-][/c][c][ffffff] 装备于工具栏.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]扫描前请确保你的已连接到有足够剩余空间的容器.[-][/c]

English: Find a wreck in orbit around a planet.\nYou can find wrecks most often in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 在近地轨道找到一处残骸.\n残骸通常可以在中立星区找到
扫描测试用数据存储器
找到轨道上的数据存储器

English: Find a wreck in orbit around a planet.\nYou can find wrecks most often in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 在近地轨道找到一处残骸.\n残骸通常可以在中立星区找到

English: Find a wreck in orbit around a planet.\nYou can find wrecks most often in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 在近地轨道找到一处残骸.\n残骸通常可以在中立星区找到

English: Find a wreck in orbit around a planet.\nYou can find wrecks most often in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 在近地轨道找到一处残骸.\n残骸通常可以在中立星区找到

English: [c][ffffff]This mission activates the science station dialog when you access the science station.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff]当您访问科学站时，这个任务会激活科学站的对话。[-][/c]

English: The carrier has launched more fighters.
Chinese (simplified): 有更多战机从航母上起飞了.

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: After analyzing the data, your science computer has detected an anomaly in the 1300-1500 subspace band coming from a planetary orbit of a nearby G4 class star.
Chinese (simplified): 在分析数据后，你的科学计算机检测到一个来自于1300-1500子空间带中的异常，该异常来自附近一颗G4级恒星的行星轨道.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Warp to a G4 class system in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到一个中立区域内的G4等级星系

English: Warp to G4 class star in neutral territory
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到一个中立区域内的G4等级恒星

English: Warp to a G4 class system in neutral territory
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到一个中立区域内的G4等级星系

English: Your scanners have pinpointed a possible source for the signal in the orbit of a planet in this system.\nWarp to the orbit of a planet.
Chinese (simplified): 你的扫描仪已经确定了这个星系中行星轨道上信号的可能来源.\n跃迁到行星的轨道.

English: If the wreck is here it will be highlighted on your HUD with a yellow marker. If it is not then you may have to search other planetary orbits.\nFind the wreck.
Chinese (simplified): 如果残骸在这里，那么你的HUD上会有黄色的高亮标记.

English: Find the wreckage your scanners have detected.
Chinese (simplified): 找到扫描仪扫描到的残骸

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to scan the area.
After analyzing the data, your science computer has detected strange subspace signals coming from a beacon in a nearby cold system.
Chinese (simplified): 分析数据后，你的科学计算机检测到来自附近寒冷星系信标的奇怪子空间信号.

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Find an exploration site that has an unknown signal beacon in a nearby cold system in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 在中立星区的寒冷星系中找到一个具有未知信号信标的勘探点.

English: Find an unknown beacon in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 在中立星区找到未知信标

English: Warp to an exploration site in a cold system and find an unknown signal beacon. The beacon will highlight on the HUD with a yellow marker.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到一个寒冷星系中的勘探点，然后找到一个未知信标，信标会在你的HUD上显示为黄色高亮标记.

English: Wait for the scan to finish.
2 incoming warp signatures detected. Prepare for battle.
Chinese (simplified): 检测到2个传入扭曲特征。做好战斗准备。

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to scan for other signals.
Open your PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] to scan for other signals.
Chinese (simplified): 打开你的PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]以扫描其他信号.

English: The reports indicates nothing remarkable in this sector except for trace amounts of dust.\nYou will need to obtain a better sample of the dust by launching a Basic Survey Probe.
Chinese (simplified): 报告显示，除了微量灰尘外，该区域没有什么显著的变化..\n您需要启动一个基本探测器，以获得更好的灰尘样本.

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Place a Basic System Survey Probe on your personal toolbar.
Chinese (simplified): 在你的物品栏里放置一个基础探测器

English: Place a Basic System Survey Probe on your personal toolbar.
Chinese (simplified): 在你的物品栏里放置一个基础探测器

English: Place Basic System Survey Probe on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): 在物品栏里放置一个基础探测器

English: Place Basic System Survey Probe on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): 在物品栏里放置一个基础探测器

English: Your probe has determined the composition of the dust to be consistent with that of either an arid or a desert class planet. Find one of each type of planet and land on it.
Chinese (simplified): 你的探测器已经确定尘埃的成分与干旱或沙漠行星的成分一致.找到每种类型的行星中的一个并在其上着陆.

English: This planet's composition is not the same as the dust you found.
Chinese (simplified): 这颗行星的组成与你发现的尘埃不同.

English: The composition of the dust on this planet is not the same.
Chinese (simplified): 这颗行星上尘埃的成分不同.

English: The dust did not come from any of the planets you scanned, but helped narrow down the next step.\nOpen your PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] to scan for other signals.
Chinese (simplified): 这些尘埃并非来自你扫描过的任何行星，但有助于缩小下一步的范围\n打开你的PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 以扫描其他信号

English: You need more data. Find an encrypted data chip from a data cache.\nYou can find data caches in cold systems in planetary orbit or exploration sites.
Chinese (simplified): 你需要更多数据，从数据存储箱内找到加密数据芯片.\n你可以在寒冷行星的轨道上或者探测站里找到数据储存箱.

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Find an encrypted data chip from a data cache and place it into your personal inventory.\nYou can find data caches in cold systems in planetary orbit or exploration sites.
Chinese (simplified): 从数据存储箱内找到加密数据芯片并放在你的库存内.\n你可以在寒冷行星的轨道上或者探测站里找到数据储存箱.

English: Place Encrypted Data Chip in inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 将加密数据芯片放入库存.

English: Place Encrypted Data Chip in inventory. You can find data chips from data caches in orbits and exploration sites in cold systems in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 将加密数据芯片放入库存..\n你可以在寒冷行星的轨道上或者中立区域的探测站里找到数据储存箱.

English: You can find UCH Research Vessels mostly in habitable systems in neutral territory. They show up on the solar system map as a cyan triangle.
Chinese (simplified): 你可以在中立地区的宜居星系中找到UCH研究船.它们在恒星系地图上显示为青色三角形.

English: The chip is too badly degraded to be of any use to you here. You will need to take this data chip to a UCH Research Vessel in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 这个芯片被分解的太厉害，在你手里没有任何用处.你需要把这个数据芯片带到中立地区的UCH研究船上.

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] to analyze the data chip.
Chinese (simplified): 打开PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 以研究数据芯片

English: You need more data. Find a flawed data chip from a data cache.\nYou can find data caches in cold systems in planetary orbit or exploration sites.
Chinese (simplified): 你需要更多数据，从数据存储箱内找到瑕疵数据芯片.\n你可以在寒冷行星的轨道上或者探测站里找到数据储存箱.

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Find a flawed data chip from a data cache and place it into your personal inventory.\nYou can find data caches in cold systems in planetary orbit or exploration sites.
Chinese (simplified): 将瑕疵数据芯片放入个人库存..\n你可以在寒冷行星的轨道上或者中立区域的探测站里找到数据储存箱.

English: Place Flawed Data Chip in inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 将瑕疵数据芯片放入库存.

English: Place Flawed Data Chip in inventory. You can find data chips from data caches in orbits and exploration sites in cold systems in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 将瑕疵数据芯片放入库存..\n你可以在寒冷行星的轨道上或者中立区域的探测站里找到数据储存箱.

English: The chip is too badly degraded to be of any use to you here. You will need to take this data chip to a UCH Research Vessel in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 这个芯片被分解的太厉害，在你手里没有任何用处.你需要把这个数据芯片带到中立地区的UCH研究船上.

English: You can find UCH Research Vessels mostly in habitable systems in neutral territory. They show up on the solar system map as a cyan triangle.
Chinese (simplified): 你可以在中立地区的宜居星系中找到UCH研究船.它们在恒星系地图上显示为青色三角形.

English: Approach the UCH vessel in this sector.
Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] to analyze the data chip.
Chinese (simplified): 打开PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] 以研究数据芯片

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to scan the area.
Open your PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] to scan the area.
Chinese (simplified): 打开你的PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]以扫描这个区域

English: After analyzing the data, your science computer has detected strange subspace signals coming from an asteroid field in a nearby system.
Chinese (simplified): 在分析数据后，你的科学计算机检测到来自附近星系小行星带的奇怪亚空间信号.

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Warp to an asteroid field. Asteroid fields show up on the solar system map.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁至小行星带，小行星带已标记在恒星系地图上
跃迁至小行星带，小行星带已标记在恒星系地图上

English: Two interceptor class Bandit space fighters detected.
Chinese (simplified): 侦测到两架拦截级强盗战斗机

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to scan the area.
Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to scan the area.
Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to review your findings.
Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to review your findings.
Wait for the scan to complete.
You have finished scanning the asteroid field and discovered no trace of the signal you were looking for.\nLeave the sector by warping out.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经完成了小行星带的扫描，但没有发现你要寻找的信号的痕迹.\n通过跃迁离开.

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to scan nearby sectors.
Chinese (simplified): 打开PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]以扫描附近的星区
发现进度3/3.正在启动扫描

English: The signal you have been following seems to have originated from a dead class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 你一直在跟踪的信号似乎来自一颗死亡行星.

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Land on a dead class planet. Dead class planets are more often found in K or D class systems.
Chinese (simplified): 在死亡类地行星上着陆.死亡行星有较高几率在K或D级恒星系找到

English: Land on a dead class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 在死亡类地行星上着陆.死亡类地行星有较高几率在K或D级恒星系找到

English: Your scanners detect a faint radio signal coming from a small structure on this planet.\nThe source of the signal will appear on your HUD.
Chinese (simplified): 你的扫描仪检测到一个来自这个星球上的小结构体的微弱无线电信号。\n信号源将出现在你的 HUD 上。

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to review your findings.
Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to review your findings.
Find the source of the signal. It will be a small structure on a dead class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 找到信号源，这是一个死亡类地行星上的小型结构体

English: You have found the source of the signal. Scanning...
Chinese (simplified): 你找到了信号源，扫描中...
标准探测器在工具栏里

English: Place a standard system survey probe on your personal toolbar.
Chinese (simplified): 在你的物品栏里放置一个标准探测器

English: Your probe relays useful data back to your ship.\nOpen the PDA to review the findings.
Chinese (simplified): 你的探测器将有用的数据传回你的飞船.\n打开PDA查看结果.

English: The signal you have been following seems to have originated from a black desert class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 你一直在跟踪的信号似乎来自一颗黑色沙漠行星.

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Land on a black desert class planet. Black desert class planets are more often found in hot systems such as K, B, or O.
Chinese (simplified): 降落在一个黑色沙漠行星上.黑沙漠行星通常出现在K、B或O等高温星系中.

English: Land on a black desert class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 降落在一个黑色沙漠行星上.黑沙漠行星通常出现在K、B或O等高温星系中.

English: Your scanners detect a completely unknown signal coming from a strange structure on this planet.\nYou won't be able to pinpoint the source of the signal until you are within 20000 meters.
Chinese (simplified): 你的扫描仪检测到一个来自这个星球上一个奇怪结构的完全未知的信号.\n在进入其20000米范围内之前，你不能精确定位信号位置

English: Find the source of the signal. It will be a structure on a black desert class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 找到信号源，这是一个黑色沙漠行星上的结构体

English: You have found the source of the signal. Curious, this appears to be voidium.\nYour scanner is unable to get a reading. You will have to get closer.
Chinese (simplified): 您已找到信号源.奇怪的是，这似乎是虚空矿.\n扫描仪无法读取读数.你必须靠近点.

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to review your findings.
Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to review your findings.
Approach the voidium formation on the black desert class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 接近黑色沙漠行星上的虚空矿组成物

English: Your scans cannot penetrate the surface of the strange crystal. The energy readings suggests it contains dark matter and may be extra-dimensional in origin.\nWith specialized equipment, useful materials might be harvested.\nOpen the PDA to complete the mission.
Chinese (simplified): 你的扫描无法穿透奇怪晶体的表面.能量读数表明它含有暗物质并且可能起源于超维度.\n使用专门的设备也许可以收获有用的材料.\n开启PDA以完成任务.

English: You have detected a strange signal coming from a nearby class 2 or 3 exploration site.
Chinese (simplified): 您检测到来自附近 2 级或 3 级勘探地点的奇怪信号。

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Warp to a class 2 or class 3 exploration site.\nExploration sites appear in neutral territory as a green triangle on the solar system map.
Chinese (simplified): 跳转到 2 级或 3 级探索地点。\n探索地点在太阳系地图上显示为绿色三角形。

English: Warp to a class 2 or class 3 exploration site.\nExploration sites can be found in neutral territory and show up on the solar system map as a green triangle.
Chinese (simplified): 跳转到 2 级或 3 级探索地点。\n探索地点可以在中立地区找到，并在太阳系地图上显示为绿色三角形。

English: The strange signal is stronger here. This is definitely the source of the signal.\nPerform a scan of the sector by using a scanning station on board your ship.
Chinese (simplified): 奇怪的信号在这里更强。这绝对是信号源。\n使用船上的扫描站对扇区进行扫描。

English: Use a scanning station to scan the sector.
Use a scanning station on board your capital vessel to perform a scan of a class 2 or class 3 exploration site.
Chinese (simplified): 使用主力舰上的扫描站对 2 级或 3 级勘探地点进行扫描。

English: You pinpoint the source of the signal as a micro-probe approximately 12,000km away.\nDownloading data from probe...
Chinese (simplified): 您将信号源定位为大约 12,000 公里外的微型探针。\n正在从探针下载数据...

English: Wait for the download to complete.
You have completed your download of the probe data.\nOpen the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to review your findings.
Chinese (simplified): 您已完成探测数据的下载。\n打开 PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c] 以查看您的发现。

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to review your findings.
Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to review your findings.
After hunting down signals in several systems you have detected that the signal must have come from a binary star system with a pair of close orbiting stars.
Chinese (simplified): 在几个系统中搜寻信号后，您检测到信号一定来自具有一对近轨道恒星的双星系统。

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Warp to a D-D, M-M, and K-G system.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到 D-D、M-M 和 K-G 系统。

English: Warp to a D-D class system.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到 D-D 类系统。

English: Warp to a M-M class system.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到 M-M 类系统。

English: Warp to a K-G class system.
Chinese (simplified): 跃迁到 K-G 类系统。

English: Wait for the message to display.

Discover a radio telescope on a dead class planet.\nYou must discover a new radio telescope. Ones you have already discovered will not count.\nYour HUD will highlight any possible signal source within 10,000 meters.
Chinese (simplified): 在死亡类地行星上发现射电望远镜。\n你必须发现新的射电望远镜。您已经发现的将不计算在内。\n您的 HUD 将突出显示 10,000 米内的任何可能的信号源。

English: Each system contained a trace of the signal.\nYou have triangulated the original source to be a large radio telescope on a dead class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 每个系统都包含信号的踪迹。\n您已将原始源三角测量为位于死亡类地行星上的大型射电望远镜。

English: Find the source of the signal. It will be a large structure most likely with many antennas on a dead class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 找到信号的来源。它将是一个大型结构，很可能在一颗死亡类地行星上有许多天线。

English: You have found the source of the signal.\nConnect to a cargo container with plenty of room them open your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): 您已经找到信号源。\n连接到一个有足够空间的货柜，然后打开您的 PDA。

English: This will highlight the radio antenna when you are within 10000 meters.
Chinese (simplified): 当您在 10000 米内时，这将突出显示无线电天线。

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to collect expedition reward.
Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to collect expedition reward.

Chinese (simplified): 您已经找到信号源。\n连接到一个有足够空间的货柜，然后打开您的 PDA。

English: After hunting down signals in several systems you have detected that the signal must have come from a nearby irradiated planet.\nFind an irradiated planet in a habitable system.
Chinese (simplified): 在搜寻了数个星系的信号后，您已经确定信号肯定来自附近一个受到辐射的行星。\n找到一个位于适居星系中的辐射行星。

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Land on a irradiated planet. You can find them in habitable systems.
Chinese (simplified): 降落在受辐射的星球上。你可以在可居住的系统中找到它们。

English: Find the source of the signal on the planet. The signal will show up on your HUD within 10,000 meters.
Chinese (simplified): 在这个星球上找到信号的来源。信号将在 10,000 米范围内显示在您的 HUD 上。

English: This will highlight the radio antenna when you are within 10000 meters.
Chinese (simplified): 当您在 10000 米内时，这将突出显示无线电天线。

English: Wait for the message to display.

The signal is likely coming from a large structure on this planet.\nYou must discover a new structure, ones you have already discovered will not count.\nYour HUD will highlight any possible signal source within 10,000 meters.
Chinese (simplified): 信号很可能来自这个星球上的一个大型结构。\n你必须发现一个新结构，你已经发现的不计算在内。\n你的 HUD 将突出显示 10,000 米内的任何可能的信号源。

English: Find the source of the signal. It will most likely be a large structure on a irradiated class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 找到信号的来源。它很可能是一个被辐射过的类地行星上的一个大型结构。

English: You have found the source of the signal.\nConnect to a cargo container with plenty of room them open your PDA.
Chinese (simplified): 您已经找到信号源。\n连接到一个有足够空间的货柜，然后打开您的 PDA。
您已经找到信号源。\n连接到一个有足够空间的货柜，然后打开您的 PDA。

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to collect expedition reward.
Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to collect expedition reward.

Chinese (simplified): 降落在受辐射的星球上。

English: Land on an irradiated class planet found in habitable systems.
Chinese (simplified): 降落在可居住系统中发现的辐照级行星上。

English: Thank you for taking care of those bandits!\nWe have transferred a reward to your bank account.
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您照顾这些强盗！\n我们已将奖励转入您的银行帐户。

English: After hunting down signals in several systems you have detected that the signal must have come from a nearby desert oasis planet in neutral territory.\nFind an desert oasis planet in a habitable or hot system.
Chinese (simplified): 在几个系统中搜寻信号后，您发现信号一定来自附近中立领土的沙漠绿洲行星。\n在宜居或炎热的系统中寻找沙漠绿洲行星。

English: This is your current expedition mission. You can manage them through the science station on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 这是你目前的探险任务.你可以通过你船上或基地上的科学站来管理它们.

English: Wait for the message to display.
Land on a desert oasis planet in neutral territory. You can find them in habitable or hot systems.
Chinese (simplified): 登陆中立领土的沙漠绿洲星球。您可以在宜居或热系统中找到它们。

English: Land on an desert oasis class planet found in habitable or hot systems in neutral territory.
Chinese (simplified): 降落在中立领土的宜居或炎热系统中的沙漠绿洲级行星上。

English: Find the source of the signal on the planet. The signal will show up on your HUD within 10,000 meters.
Chinese (simplified): 在这个星球上找到信号的来源。信号将在 10,000 米范围内显示在您的 HUD 上。

English: This will highlight the radio antenna when you are within 10000 meters.
Chinese (simplified): 当您在 10000 米内时，这将突出显示无线电天线。

English: Wait for the message to display.

The signal is likely coming from a small ship on this planet.\nYou must discover a new structure, ones you have already discovered will not count.\nYour HUD will highlight any possible signal source within 10,000 meters.
Chinese (simplified): 信号很可能来自这个星球上的一艘小船。\n你必须发现一个新结构，你已经发现的不计算在内。\n你的 HUD 将突出显示 10,000 米内的任何可能的信号源。

English: Find the source of the signal. It will most likely be a small vessel on a desert oasis class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 找到信号的来源。它很可能是沙漠绿洲级行星上的一艘小船。

English: You have found the source of the signal to be a small pirate vessel parked nearby.\nApproach the pirate vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 您发现信号源是附近停泊的一艘小型海盗船。\n靠近海盗船。
您已经找到信号源。\n连接到一个有足够空间的货柜，然后打开您的 PDA。

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to collect expedition reward.
Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to collect expedition reward.
Approach the looters on a desert oasis class planet.
Chinese (simplified): 接近沙漠绿洲级星球上的掠夺者。

English: Destroy the core of the looter vessel.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁掠夺者船只的核心。

English: Download the data logs from the looter ship by destroying its core.
Chinese (simplified): 通过破坏其核心从掠夺者船上下载数据日志。

English: Destroying the core allows your ship computer to interface with the computer on the looter's ship.\nIt looks like they were looking for two artifacts in the nearby abandoned tomb.\nYou find a reference to two relics: one of the sun and one of the moon.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁核心可以让你的飞船计算机与掠夺者飞船上的计算机交互。\n看起来他们正在附近的废弃坟墓中寻找两件文物。\n你找到了两件遗物的参考：一件是太阳，一件是月亮。

English: Of the sun and the moon
Find the relics of the sun and the moon in the abandoned tomb on a desert oasis planet.\nYou must place the relics inside of your personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 在沙漠绿洲星球上的废弃坟墓中找到太阳和月亮的遗物。\n您必须将这些遗物放在您的个人物品栏中。

English: Find a relic of the sun and place it in your personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 找到太阳的遗物并将其放入您的个人库存中。

English: Find a relic of the sun and place it in your personal inventory.
Chinese (simplified): 找到太阳的遗物并将其放入您的个人库存中。

English: You have found the two relics mentioned in the looter's computer.\nThere may be Talon temples on this planet that would like their relics returned to them. (Only in neutral territory).
Chinese (simplified): 你已经找到了掠夺者电脑中提到的两件圣物。\n这个星球上可能有爪神庙希望将他们的圣物归还给他们。 （仅在中立地区）。

English: Alongside the relic you find a stash of treasure.\nConnect to a cargo container and pen the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to collect expedition reward.
Chinese (simplified): 在遗物旁边，您会发现宝藏。\n连接到一个货柜并用 PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c] 收集远征奖励。

English:
[c][ffff00][i]Expeditions are a work in progress and may not function correctly, may not be balanced, and should be considered subject to change.[/i][-][/c]

This mission serves as a divider line for the PDA menu.
Any unique expeditions you have unlocked will show up below
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00][i]远征是一种开发中的功能，可能无法正常运行，可能不平衡，要做好随时有改动的准备。[/i][-][/c]

这个任务用作 PDA 菜单的分隔线。
您已解锁的所有独特远征都将显示在下方
一条消息马上就会出现.

English:
[b][c][ffffff]Location:[-][/c][/b] [c][00ff00]Decay Star Cluster[-][/c]
[b][c][ffffff]Difficulty:[-][/c][/b] [c][ff0000]Hard[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]This mission is unlocked after traveling through the Ancient Warp Gate.[/i][-][/c]

The Decay cluster is full of ancient and dead stars.
Too far for standard communications, you will need to establish a communications relay to make contact with UCH Command.

Establish a small space station near the Ancient Warp Gate on the Decay side of the Decay-Andromeda gate to act as a communications relay.
You will first need to place down a [c][00ff00]Base Starter[-][/c] block and then add the following to it:
[c][00ff00]1x Generator[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]1x Fuel Tank[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]1x Antenna[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
You will need to bring resources and a [c][ff8000]Progenitor Translation Matrix[-][/c] with you through the gate.
Chinese (simplified):
[b][c][ffffff]位置:[-][/c][/b] [c][00ff00]衰变星团[-][/c]
[b][c][ffffff]难度:[-][/c][/b] [c][ff0000]困难[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]该任务会在通过远古折跃门后解锁.[/i][-][/c]

衰变星团充满了古老的和死亡的恒星.对于标准通信来说太远了，您将需要建立一个通信中继来与UCH命令进行联系.在“堕落-仙女座”星门的“堕落”侧的“远古曲速门”附近建立一个小型空间站，作为通信中继器.
你需要布置一个[c][00ff00]基地核心[-][/c] 块然后添加跟踪记号:
[c][00ff00]1台发电机[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]1x燃料罐[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]1x天线[-][/c]
[c][00ff00][-][/c]
你将需要带着资源和一个 [c][ff8000]先祖翻译矩阵[-][/c] 通过大门.

English: [c][b4e1ff]Get to a safe location before opening the PDA.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][b4e1ff]找到一个安全的地方再打开PDA.[-][/c]

English: [c][b4e1ff]Open the PDA to obtain your reward. Make sure you have room in your personal or connected inventory.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][b4e1ff]打开PDA以获取你的奖励，请确保你的背包或连接的容器有足够的容量.[-][/c]

English: Dr Weston begins to reform in a new body!
Chinese (simplified): 韦斯顿博士开始重塑一具新的身体！

English:
[c][ffff00]This mission is a debug tool for accessing the science station.[-][/c]

Normally you can bring up the science station dialog by merely accessing the science station, but in case it bugs out you may activate this mission then access the science station to bring up the dialog.
The science station can be crafted in a constructor and then placed on your ship or base.
Activate this mission then access the science station.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffff00]这个任务是用于访问科学控制站的Debug工具.[-][/c]

一般来说你只需要访问科学控制站就可以呼出对应的对话框，但是以防出现bug你可以先启动这个任务再访问科学控制站.
科学控制站可以在基地或空间站的建造机内制造.
激活该任务后再访问科学控制站.

English: Open the science station device on your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 打开你飞船或基地的科学控制站

English: Access the science station on board your ship or base.
Chinese (simplified): 访问你飞船或基地的科学控制站
[c][9fa19b](不可用) 章节2: 通向哈迪斯之旅[-][/c]

English: This Project Eden main story mission is not yet added to the scenario.\nIt will become available in a future update.
Chinese (simplified): 该伊甸园计划主线剧情任务还没有加入游戏.\n未来某次更新会加入.

English: This Project Eden main story mission is not yet added to the scenario.\nIt will become available in a future update.
Chinese (simplified): 该伊甸园计划主线剧情任务还没有加入游戏.\n未来某次更新会加入.

English: [c][b4e1ff]Activate this mission while you are in a standard orbit and have a UCH Research Beacon in your personal inventory to call in a UCH Research Vessel. Only one Research Vessel can be in a sector at a time.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][b4e1ff]在你仓库中持有UCH研究信标并位于标准轨道上时启动该任务以呼叫一艘UCH研究船. 每个星区同时只能存在一艘UCH研究船.[-][/c]

[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Uncommon in most star systems.

[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 常见

English: [c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Common\n[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Common on Barren moons.\n[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Extremely rare in some star systems.{Eden_Aluminum.png}
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 常见\n[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 常见于荒芜卫星.\n[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 极少量出现于某些星系.{Eden_Aluminum.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Common
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Common on Ice planets and moons.
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] In Ice Fields in cold star systems. Rarely orbits of cold star systems.
[c][c8c8c8]Can be converted into water. Large amounts can be extracted from dense and rich ice mining.[-][/c]{Eden_Ice.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 常见
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 常见于冰雪行星或卫星.
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 低温星系的冰小行星带.极少量出现于低温星系.
[c][c8c8c8]可以转换为水. 可以通过采集重冰或富冰小行星得到大量的冰.[-][/c]{Eden_Ice.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Uncommon
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Common on Cold planets.
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Uncommon in most star systems.
[c][c8c8c8]Can be salvaged in large quantities.[-][/c]{Eden_Titanium.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 罕见
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 常见于低温星球.
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 少见于大部分星系.
[c][c8c8c8]拆解建筑可以获得大量的钛.[-][/c]{Eden_Titanium.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Uncommon
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Common on Dry planets such as Arid and Desert.
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Uncommon in most star systems.
[c][c8c8c8]Can be salvaged from capital vessel wrecks.[-][/c]{Eden_Neodymium.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 罕见
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 常见于沙漠或干旱等较为干燥的星球.
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 少见于大部分星系.
[c][c8c8c8]可以从主力舰的残骸中拆解.[-][/c]{Eden_Neodymium.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Uncommon
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Common on Temperate, Swamp, Ocean, and Jungle planets and Barren moons mostly in neutral, Colonists, or Wastelanders territory.
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] None.
[c][c8c8c8]Appears as a POI on the detector, not as a standard ore deposit.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Does not show on planet resource list.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Contains underground ore nuggets, typically slightly lower than the center marker for the deposit.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Does not show on ore scanner.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Cannot be automined. 5% chance on harvest to give a false inventory full message.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Used for crafting ammunition.[-][/c]{Eden_Tungsten.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 罕见
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 常见于中立，自由殖民者，废土领地中的温和，沼泽，海洋以及雨林行星或卫星.
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 无.
[c][c8c8c8]使用扫描器会显示为POI，而非标准的矿床.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]不会出现在星球资源列表上.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]存在形式为地下矿块，高度一般会略微低于POI的标记位置.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]矿物扫描器无效.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]无法自动开采.采集时有5%的概率会出现虚假的背包已满提示.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]用于制造弹药.[-][/c]{Eden_Tungsten.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Uncommon
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Common in small amounts on all planets and moons.
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Common in small amounts in most star systems.
[c][c8c8c8]Often found as surface crystals that grow back after harvest. Used to power warp travel and shields.[-][/c]{Eden_Pentaxid.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 罕见
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 少量单常见于大部分行星或卫星类型.
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 常见但少量出现于大部分星系.
[c][c8c8c8]常以地表晶体的形式存在，采集后可以重复生长. 用于驱动翘曲引擎和护盾.[-][/c]{Eden_Pentaxid.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Uncommon
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] None
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Dense and Rich Ice asteroid fields in cold systems.
[c][c8c8c8]Extracted from rich and dense ice asteroids. Requires specialized ice mining drills.[-][/c]{Eden_Deuterium.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 罕见
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 无
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 低温星系的重冰和富冰小行星.
[c][c8c8c8]可以从重冰和富冰小行星中提取. 需要专门的冰钻头.[-][/c]{Eden_Deuterium.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Rare
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Common on Barren planets.
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Uncommon in hot or cold star systems.
[c][c8c8c8]Used for crafting combat steel.[-][/c]{Eden_Sathium.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 稀有
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 常见于荒芜行星.
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 少量出现于低温或高温星系.
[c][c8c8c8]用于制造战术钢.[-][/c]{Eden_Sathium.png}

English: [c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Rare\n[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Rare on cold planets.\n[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Rare in cold star systems.{Eden_Erestrum.png}
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 稀有\n[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 少量出现于低温行星.\n[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 少量出现于低温星系.{Eden_Erestrum.png}

English: [c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Rare\n[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Rare on hot planets.\n[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Rare in hot star systems.{Eden_Zascosium.png}
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 稀有\n[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 少量出现于高温行星.\n[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 少量出现于高温星系.{Eden_Zascosium.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Rare
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Rare on Barren planets, Methane moons, and Toxic moons. Found only in hostile galaxy territories such as Zirax, Kriel, or Drone Swarm. Occasionally found in the Wastelands.
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] None.
[c][c8c8c8]Appears as a POI on the detector, not as a standard ore deposit.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Does not show on planet resource list.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Contains underground ore nuggets, typically slightly lower than the center marker for the deposit.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Does not show on ore scanner.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Cannot be automined. 5% chance on harvest to give a false inventory full message.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]Used for crafting high end components.[-][/c]{Eden_Silver.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 稀有
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 极少量出现于荒芜行星，甲烷卫星，有毒卫星. 只能在敌对的星区领地找到，例如兹瑞克斯，克里尔以及无人机虫群. 偶尔出现于废土.
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c]无.
[c][c8c8c8]使用扫描器会显示为POI，而非标准的矿床.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]不会出现在星球资源列表上.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]存在形式为地下矿块，高度一般会略微低于POI的标记位置.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]矿物扫描器无效.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]无法自动开采. 采集时有5%的概率会出现虚假的背包已满提示.[-][/c]
[c][c8c8c8]用于制造高端设备.[-][/c]{Eden_Silver.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Rare
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Rare on lava planets.
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Rare in hot or cold star systems.
[c][c8c8c8]Used to craft Optronics and Gold Coins. Cannot be automined.[-][/c]{Eden_Gold.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 稀有
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 少量出现于岩浆行星.
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 少量出现于高温或低温星系.
[c][c8c8c8]U用于制造光电元件和金币. 无法自动开采.[-][/c]{Eden_Gold.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Rare
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Rare on some Plasma and Midnight planets.
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Extremely rare in hot or cold star systems.
[c][c8c8c8]Cannot be automined (Reforged).[-][/c]{Eden_Platinum.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 稀有
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 少量存在于等离子或午夜行星.
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 极其少见于高温和低温星系.
[c][c8c8c8]无法自动开采(经果平衡).[-][/c]{Eden_Platinum.png}

English:
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]Rarity:[-][/c] Exotic
[c][00afff]Planets and moons:[-][/c] Rare on Lava, Molten, and Hell planets.
[c][00afff]Space:[-][/c] Mining Sites.
Magmacite is a rare, highly magnetic ore that can be found floating above lava lakes. It must be refined in a Furnace.
It's used to create Magnetic Plates and other specialized devices.

[c][c8c8c8]Does not show on map resource display. Appears as a POI floating above lava lakes. Cannot be automined.[-][/c]{Eden_Magmacite.png}
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][00afff]稀有度:[-][/c] 异域
[c][00afff]行星或卫星类型:[-][/c] 极少量出现于岩浆，熔融以及地狱行星.
[c][00afff]太空:[-][/c] 开采点.
岩浆矿是一种极为稀有的，的浮在岩浆湖上的富有磁性的矿物. 必须使用熔炉进行精炼e.
用于制造磁性板和其他专业设备.

[c][c8c8c8]不会在地图上显示为资源. 显示为悬浮在岩浆湖上方的POI. 无法自动开采.[-][/c]{Eden_Magmacite.png}

来自贸易公会空间站的消息

English: The Trader's Guild welcomes you to this trading sector. [c][ffff00]Piracy is strictly forbidden and will be responded to with force.[-][/c]\nPlease enjoy your stay.
Chinese (simplified): 贸易公会欢迎您来到这个交易星区. [c][ffff00]严禁任何海盗行为，一旦出现必将予以武力反击.[-][/c]\n请享受您在此处的停留.

English: Continued piracy will harm your reputation with all major factions!
Chinese (simplified): 持续进行海盗行为将损害你在各大派系中的声望！

English: Continued piracy will harm your reputation with all major factions!
Chinese (simplified): 持续进行海盗行为将损害你在各大派系中的声望！

English: Your piracy has lowered your reputation with the major factions of the galaxy!
Chinese (simplified): 海盗行为降低了你在全星系各大派系中的声望!

English: Your piracy has lowered your reputation with the major factions of the galaxy!
Chinese (simplified): 海盗行为降低了你在全星系各大派系中的声望!

English: The destruction of the outpost's core has weakened the depot's shields and drawn the attention of a nearby patrol vessel!
Chinese (simplified): 前哨核心的破坏削弱了仓储的护盾，并引起了附近巡逻船的注意!
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 旧联合会弹药库

English: [c][ffff00][b]Security assessment:[/b][-][/c] Combat Site Class 3\nThe Syndicate operates a secure munitions depot in this sector for storing stolen military supplies. The depot is protected by an energy shield. Destroying the nearby shield control outposts may weaken the shield but will also attract attention.
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffff00][b]安全评估:[/b][-][/c] 3级别战斗区域\n联合会在该地区开设了一个高度安全的弹药库，用于储存被盗的军事物资. 仓库受到能量护盾的保护. 摧毁附近的护盾控制哨站可能会削弱护盾，但也会引起注意.
可疑的无线电信标设置
可疑的无线电信标设置

English: Access the console on the second beacon.
Chinese (simplified): 访问第二个信标处的控制台

English: Access the console on the third beacon.
Chinese (simplified): 访问第三个信标处的控制台

English: Unlock the secure stash with the control console.
Chinese (simplified): 使用控制台解锁安全储藏室。

English: Destroy the enemy fighters. This objective is optional.
Chinese (simplified): 消灭敌方战机. 此为可选目标.
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 可疑的无线电信标

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_1

A radio beacon sits at the center of this sector. Almost as soon as you warped in the beacon was shut off to hide it but not before you pinpointed its location.

Bandits often use radio networks such as these to spy on patrols and coordinate attacks on passing freighters. Whomever owns this radio beacon will be forced to respond if you were to activate it.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_1

无线电信标就被放置在该区域的中心. 几乎就在你翘曲到这个星系的同时信标就被关闭已掩盖它的存在，但你在这之前就已经锁定了其位置 .

强盗经常使用此类无线电网络来监视巡逻人员并协调对过往货船的攻击。如果您要激活它，这个无线电信标的拥有者想必会作出回应.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit Leader:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]Who are you to mess with MY radio beacon? Stop this at once![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]强盗首领:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]你是什么东西，也敢动我的信标? 立刻停手![-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit Leader:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]You two, get in your interceptors and stop them from tampering with the radio beacon![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]强盗首领:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]你们两个，马上开拦截机去阻止他们篡改无线电信标![-][/c]

English: The generators are about to overload!\nMove to a safe distance!
Chinese (simplified): 发电机即将过载!\n退回到安全距离!

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit Leader:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]I won't let you trace the radio signal. You'll never find me![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]强盗首领:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]有我在，你别想追踪无线电信号，你这辈子也别想找到我![-][/c]

English: Despite his objections, you trace the signal to another nearby radio relay. Approach the relay but use caution.
Chinese (simplified): 无论他嘴上怎么否认，您依然将信号溯源至附近的另一个无线电中继站，接近它但务必小心.

English:
[c][ffffff][i]Bandit Goon:[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffca0a]How did we lose? There were two of us and one of them![-][/c]

With the nearby ships destroyed you can now access the console.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][ffffff][i]强盗小弟:[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffca0a]我们怎么可能就这么输了? 二对一，明明优势在我![-][/c]

现在附近的船只均已摧毁，您可以访问控制台.

English: The generators are about to overload!\nMove to a safe distance!
Chinese (simplified): 发电机即将过载!\n退回到安全距离!

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit Leader:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]Well aren't you a persistent one.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]强盗首领:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]好啊你可真是阴魂不散.[-][/c]

English: You have traced the signal to a small structure nearby. Approach the signal but be careful as the bandit leader is not likely to give up without a fight.
Chinese (simplified): 您已将信号溯源到附近的一个小建筑物，接近该信号位置但要一定要小心，因为强盗首领不太可能不战而降。

English: It appears the bandit leader has fled and in his haste accidentally transmitted the unlock codes for his stash!\nThe stash is yours for the taking.
Chinese (simplified): 看来强盗首领已经逃跑了，他在慌乱中意外地发送了他的藏货处的解锁代码！\n这个藏货处是你的了。

English: The bandit leader is long gone, leaving his stash of stolen goods for you to take.
Chinese (simplified): 强盗首领早已不在，把他的赃物拱手相让。

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit Leader:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]You two cover my escape! If that Terran ship isn't shot so full of holes that it's not even fit for scrap then I'll have both your heads![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]强盗首领:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]你们两个留下来殿后! 如果那个地球人的飞船没有被打烂到收废品的都摇头，我就把你们两个头给拧下来![-][/c]

English: Access the control console on the outside of the secure stash to unlock it.
Chinese (simplified): 访问安全储藏室外部的控制台将其解锁。

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit Leader:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]Stop that Terran! He's at the third relay already! Blow up his ship! Use your light missiles![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]强盗首领:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]阻止那个地球人! 他已经找到第三个中继站了! 把他的船炸上天! 发射你们的轻型导弹![-][/c]

English: Access the control console on the outside of the second radio beacon
Chinese (simplified): 访问第二个无线电信标外部的控制台

English: Access the control console on the outside of the second radio beacon
Chinese (simplified): 访问第二个无线电信标外部的控制台
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 旧 可疑的无线电信标

[c][ffff00][b]Security assessment:[/b][-][/c] Combat Site Class 1

A radio beacon sits at the center of this sector. Almost as soon as you warped in the beacon was shut off to hide it but not before you pinpointed its location.
Bandits often use radio networks such as these to spy on patrols and coordinate attacks on passing freighters. Whomever owns this radio beacon will be forced to respond if you were to activate it.

[c][ffff00][b]安全评估:[/b][-][/c] 1级战斗区域

无线电信标就被放置在该区域的中心. 几乎就在你翘曲到这个星系的同时信标就被关闭已掩盖它的存在，但你在这之前就已经锁定了其位置.
强盗经常使用此类无线电网络来监视巡逻人员并协调对过往货船的攻击。如果您要激活它，这个无线电信标的拥有者想必会作出回应.
