English: A radio beacon sits at the center of this sector. Almost as soon as you warped in the beacon was shut off to hide it but not before you pinpointed its location.
Chinese (simplified): 一个无线电信标位于这个星区的中心。几乎就在你翘曲进入的同时，信标被关闭以隐藏它，但在你确定其位置之前没有来得及。

English: Bandits often use radio networks such as these to spy on patrols and coordinate attacks on passing freighters. Whomever owns this radio beacon will be forced to respond if you were to activate it.
Chinese (simplified): 强盗经常使用这样的无线电网络来监视巡逻队，并协调对过往货船的攻击。如果你激活这个无线电信标，拥有它的人将被迫做出回应。
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 联合会弹药库

English: The Syndicate operates a secure munitions depot in this sector for storing stolen military supplies. The depot is protected by an energy shield. Destroying the nearby shield control outposts may weaken the shield but will also attract attention.
Chinese (simplified): 联合会在该地区开设了一个高度安全的弹药库，用于储存被盗的军事物资. 仓库受到能量护盾的保护. 摧毁附近的护盾控制哨站可能会削弱护盾，但也会引起注意.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT3_1

The Syndicate operates a secure munitions depot in this sector for storing stolen military supplies. The depot is protected by an energy shield. Destroying the nearby shield control outposts may weaken the shield but will also attract attention.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT3_1

联合会在该地区开设了一个高度安全的弹药库，用于储存被盗的军事物资. 仓库受到能量护盾的保护. 摧毁附近的护盾控制哨站可能会削弱护盾，但也会引起注意.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 被占据的通讯站

English: This sector is supposed to contain a subspace radio outpost operated by the Traders Guild, but it is broadcasting suspicious anti-guild messages.
Chinese (simplified): 该区域有一个本应是由贸易协会会运营的亚空间无线电前哨站，但它正在广播可疑的反协会信息.

English: The signals are being relayed to the main outpost from several smaller radio transmitters. Destroying these transmitters will stop the hijacked signal but may draw unwanted attention.
Chinese (simplified): 信号正从几个较小的无线电发信器转发到主要前哨站。摧毁这些发信器将阻止被劫持的信号，但可能会引起不必要的注意.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_2

This sector is supposed to contain a subspace radio outpost operated by the Traders Guild, but it is broadcasting suspicious anti-guild messages.

The signals are being relayed to the main outpost from several smaller radio transmitters. Destroying these transmitters will stop the hijacked signal but may draw unwanted attention.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_2

该区域有一个本应是由贸易协会会运营的亚空间无线电前哨站，但它正在广播可疑的反协会信息.

信号正从几个较小的无线电发信器转发到主要前哨站。摧毁这些发信器将阻止被劫持的信号，但可能会引起不必要的注意.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Com Station:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Thank you for your assistance. You saved our hides there![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]通讯站:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]感谢您的帮助，没有你我们皮早就被扒了![-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffff00]This communications station is ours! If you destroy any more transmitters you will pay![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]强盗:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffff00]这个通讯站是我们的！如果你再毁坏任何发信器，就等着付出代价吧![-][/c]
摧毁被黑入的亚空间发信器
摧毁更多被黑入的发信器
摧毁被黑入的亚空间发信器

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffff00]First round of drinks to the crew that brings me their head![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]强盗:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffff00]谁能第一个把他们头给我提来的有酒喝![-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]Bandit:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][ffff00]You three, get that Terran! Our boss will have OUR heads if we don't stop them![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]强盗:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][ffff00]你们三个，抓住那个地球人！如果我们挡不住，头就会砍掉我们的脑袋![-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Com Station:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Help us please! They've taken the control room and are holding hostages! We've managed to remove the lockdown.\nYou can board through the hangar.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]通信站:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]救命啊!他们占领了控制室还抓了几个人质！我们已经想办法解除了封锁.\n你可以从机库登入.[-][/c]

English: Your primary objectives are to secure the control room, rescue any hostages that may still be alive, and kill anyone that gets in your way.
Chinese (simplified): 你的主要目标是确保控制室安全，如果可能的话营救任何幸存的人质，并击毙任何阻碍你的人.
联系贸易协会安保人员
联系贸易协会安保人员

English: Head to the control room of the Occupied Com Station and activate the console to contract Traders Guild Security and claim your reward.
Chinese (simplified): 前往被占领通信站的控制室并激活控制台，与交易者公会安保人员达成合约并领取奖励.

English: You should contact Traders Guild security and inform them of the situation.\nThere is a console in the main control room you can use to do this.
Chinese (simplified): 您应该联系协会保安并告知他们情况.\n主控制室中有一个控制台，您可以使用它来执行此操作.

English: Kill the bandits occupying the station. This is an optional objectice.
Chinese (simplified): 杀死入侵空间站的强盗，这是一个可选目标.

English: It looks like the bandits have barricades themselves in the control room.\nThose cargo boxes blocking your path look fragile. You can probably easily destroy them.
Chinese (simplified): 看来强盗在控制室里设置了障碍.\n那些挡住你去路的货箱看起来很脆弱，或许你可以轻松摧毁它们.

English: You have cleared the station of hostile forces. You should make sure the hostages are safe and the command room is secure.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经清除了车站的敌人你应该确保人质和指挥室的安全.

English: [c][ffffff][i]Hostage:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Thank you for saving us! It all happened so quickly. They killed the officer in charge and locked the rest of us in the bathrooms.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]人质:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]谢谢你救了我们！这一切发生得太突然了，他们杀了负责这块的警官然后把我们其他人锁在浴室里.[-][/c]

English: Access the communications console in the control room.
Chinese (simplified): 访问控制室内的通讯控制台.

English: Wait for the menu to come up.

[c][b4e1ff]Activating this mission will allow you to change some personal settings within the scenario.[-][/c]
[c][b4e1ff]These settings will affect only yourself.[-][/c]
[c][b4e1ff][-][/c]
[c][b4e1ff]Additionally, if you have a [-][/c][c][00ffff]Project Eden Admin Access Card[-][/c][c][b4e1ff] in your personal inventory you will be able to change some global settings within the scenario that will affect all players. Please see the workshop for more details of how to use this system.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]The global settings menu is only visible for server admins.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][b4e1ff]激活此任务可以让您更改场景中的一些个人设置.[-][/c]
[c][b4e1ff]这些设置只会影响你自己.[-][/c]
[c][b4e1ff][-][/c]
[c][b4e1ff]另外，如果你背包里有 [-][/c][c][00ffff]伊甸园计划管理访问卡[-][/c][c][b4e1ff]，您将能够更改场景中的一些全局设置，这些设置将影响所有玩家.请参阅创意工坊以了解更多有关使用该系统的信息.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]全局设置菜单只对服务器管理员可见.[-][/c]

English: A small cluster of automated science satellites sits at the center of this sector. Satellites such as these are often deployed for long term observation of various anomalies.
Chinese (simplified): 一小群自动化科学卫星被放置于该区域的中心，此类卫星通常被部署用于长期观测各种异常现象.

English: It may be possible to hack the satellites to recover valuable reports without being detected.
Chinese (simplified): 你也许可以在不被发现的情况下侵入卫星以获取有价值的报告.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT1_1

A small cluster of automated science satellites sits at the center of this sector. Satellites such as these are often deployed for long term observation of various anomalies.

It may be possible to hack the satellites to recover valuable reports without being detected.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT1_1

一小群自动化科学卫星被放置于该区域的中心，此类卫星通常被部署用于长期观测各种异常现象.

你也许可以在不被发现的情况下侵入卫星以获取有价值的报告.

English: There have been reports that a local gang of bandits have been reinforcing a derelict shipyard in this sector. Use caution as destroying the sentries may alert nearby ships.
Chinese (simplified): 有报告称，当地的一个强盗团伙正在强化该地区的一个废弃造船厂的防御。请小心，因为摧毁哨戒站可能会引起附近船只的警觉.

English: EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_1\n\nThere have been reports that a local gang of bandits have been reinforcing a derelict shipyard in this sector. Use caution as destroying the sentries may alert nearby ships.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_1\n\n有报告称，当地的一个强盗团伙正在强化该地区的一个废弃造船厂的防御。请小心，因为摧毁哨戒站可能会引起附近船只的警觉.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: A group of patrol vessels have warped in to investigate!
Chinese (simplified): 一群巡逻船已跳入进行调查!

English: A group of patrol vessels have warped in to investigate!
Chinese (simplified): 一群巡逻船已跳入进行调查!

English: [c][ffffff][i]Colonist Militia:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]This is the Free Colonists Militia. We have come to assist you in securing this sector.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]殖民者民兵:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]我们是自由殖民者民兵，前来协助您保护这个区域的安全.[-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Colonist Militia:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]This is the Free Colonists Militia. We have come to assist you in securing this sector.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]殖民者民兵:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]我们是自由殖民者民兵，前来协助您保护这个区域的安全.[-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Colonist Militia:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Thank you for cleaning up these bandits.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]殖民者民兵:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]感谢您清理这些强盗.[-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Colonist Militia:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Thank you for cleaning up these bandits.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]殖民者民兵:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]感谢您清理这些强盗.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 轻型平民矿船

English: [i][c][ffffff]Civilian Mining Vessel:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]We are under attack and requesting assistance! I repeat, we are under attack! Please help us![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]平民矿船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]我们受到攻击，请求援助！重复，我们受到攻击！请帮助我们![-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffff00]This asteroid field belongs to us! There is no help coming for you! Let this be a lesson to any who would defy us![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]强盗:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffff00]这片小行星属于我们！叫破喉咙也不会有人来帮你的！就当是给所有反抗我们的人一个教训吧![-][/c]

English: EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_3\n\nThere is a civilian mining fleet under attack by bandits in this sector.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_3\n\n该区域有一支民用采矿船队正遭到强盗袭击.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Speak with a Miner on board one of the Civilian Mining Vessels in the sector.\nThe vessel must still have power and the bridge must be undamaged.
Chinese (simplified): 与该区域一艘民用采矿船上的矿工交谈.\n船只必须仍保有动力并且舰桥未被损坏.

English: [i][c][ffffff]Civilian Mining Vessel:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]We thank you again for your assistance.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Alright men, time to get back to mining! We're behind schedule so pick up the pace![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]平民采矿船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]再次感谢您的协助.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]好了，伙计们，是时候回去采矿了！我们已经落后于计划了，所以快干起来![-][/c]

English: Destroy the cores of at least 5 bandit vessels while remaining in this sector.\nProtect the mining vessels. At least 1 must remain powered with the bridge intact to obtain your reward.\n[c][ffff00]NOTE: remove Warp Drives from your turret targeting settings to prevent your turrets from accidentally firing on nearby rich asteroids.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 在该区域内摧毁至少5艘强盗船只的核心.\n保护采矿船，至少一艘必须保持动力且舰桥完好无损才能获得奖励.\n[c][ffff00]注意:在你的炮塔目标设置中去除翘曲驱动器，以防止你的炮塔意外地向附近的富矿小行星开火.[-][/c]

English:
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_3

Destroy the cores of at least 5 bandit vessels while remaining in this sector.
Protect the mining vessels. At least 1 must remain powered with the bridge intact to obtain your reward.
[c][ffff00]NOTE: remove Warp Drives from your turret targeting settings to prevent your turrets from accidentally firing on nearby rich asteroids.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_CombatT1_3

在该区域内摧毁至少5艘强盗船只的核心.
保护采矿船，至少一艘必须保持动力且舰桥完好无损才能获得奖励.
[c][ffff00]注意:在你的炮塔目标设置中去除翘曲驱动器，以防止你的炮塔意外地向附近的富矿小行星开火.[-][/c]

English: Destroy the cores of 5 Bandit Vessels that are attacking the Civilian Mining Vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁至少5艘正在攻击平民矿船的强盗船只的核心.

English: [i][c][ffffff]Civilian Mining Vessel:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]We thank you again for your assistance. If any of our mining vessels are still powered with the bridge intact please speak with the captain on board.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]平民采矿船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]再次感谢您的协助，如果我们的任何采矿船仍然有动力且舰桥完好，请与舰长联系.[-][/c]
至少一艘采矿船必须存活

English: Protect the mining vessels. At least 1 must survive.
Chinese (simplified): 保护采矿船，至少一艘必须存活.

English: Destroy any remaining enemy vessels or fighters
Chinese (simplified): 消灭任何剩余敌方飞船或战机

English: [i][c][ffffff]VIP Transport:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]We were being escorted to an important meeting when our warp drive failed. Please come aboard and assist.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]VIP运输船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]我们正奉命护送目标去参加一场重要会议，但我们的翘曲引擎发生了故障。请登船协助.[-][/c]

English: EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_3\n\nThere is a Traders Guild VIP Transport requesting assistance in this sector.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_3\n\n该区域有一艘贸易协会VIP运输船正在请求协助.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]VIP Transport:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Our scanners have detected an incoming enemy fleet. Get back to your ship and prepare to defend us![-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Shields up![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]VIP运输船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]我们的扫描器检测到敌方舰队来袭，返回你的飞船并准备保护我们![-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]护盾，启动![-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]VIP Transport:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Our scanners have detected an incoming enemy fleet. Get back to your ship and prepare to defend us![-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Shields up![-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]VIP运输船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]我们的扫描器检测到敌方舰队来袭，返回你的飞船并准备保护我们![-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]护盾，启动![-][/c][c][00ffff][-][/c]

English: Return to within 25000 meters of the VIP Transport
Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[i][c][ffffff]Militia Escort:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]A fleet of enemy ships have warped in! Defend the transport![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]护航民兵:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]敌方舰队已经跳入！保卫运输船![-][/c]

English: Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[i][c][ffffff]Militia Escort:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Incoming! They have a bomber! Take it out fast![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]护航民兵:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]敌机来袭！是轰炸机！快点把它打掉![-][/c]

English: Speak with the captain on board the VIP Transport.\nThe transport must still have power.
Chinese (simplified): 登上VIP运输船并舰长对话.\n运输船必须保有动力.

English: Return to within 25000 meters of the VIP Transport
Return to within 25000 meters of the VIP Transport
Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[i][c][ffffff]Militia Escort:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]More bandits! This time they have not one, but two bombers![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]护航民兵:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]更多强盗! 这次他们带了两架轰炸机![-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]Militia Escort:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]More hostiles on scan. Stay sharp![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]护航民兵:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]扫描显示有更多敌人，保持警觉![-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]Militia Escort:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Another wave of ships on scans![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]护航民兵:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]扫描显示有新的一波敌人![-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]Militia Escort:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Thank you for your assistance. Please, come speak to me aboard the transport.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]护航民兵:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]谢谢您的帮助。请在登上飞船让我当面感谢.[-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]Orbital Refinery:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Hello? I am so glad someone is there! Our long range communications are down. Can you come aboard our station and speak with the manager in the upper hangar? We could use your assistance.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]轨道精炼厂:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]喂，有人吗？太好了，终于有人来了！我们的远程通讯中断了。您能登上我们的空间站和上层机库的经理交谈吗？我们需要您的帮助.[-][/c]

English: EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_3\n\nThere is a Polaris Orbital Refinery requesting assistance in this sector.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_CombatT2_3\n\n该区域有一家极星轨道精炼厂正在请求援助.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Return to within 1500 meters of the Refinery
Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[i][c][ffffff]Orbital Refinery:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]A fleet of enemy ships have warped in! Defend the refinery![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]轨道精炼厂:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]敌方舰队已经跳入! 保卫精炼厂![-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]Orbital Refinery:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]More hostiles on scan. Stay sharp![-][/c]

English: Return to within 1500 meters of the Refinery
Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[i][c][ffffff]Orbital Refinery:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Incoming! They have a bomber! Take it out fast![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]轨道精炼厂:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]敌机来袭！是轰炸机！快点把它打掉![-][/c]

English: [c][ffffff][i]Kellend Class Corvette[/i][-][/c][i][c][ffffff]:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Looks like you all could use some help! Let us take some of the heat off you.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]Kellend级护卫舰[/i][-][/c][i][c][ffffff]:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]看来你们都需要点帮助！让我们来分担一部分压力.[-][/c]

English: Return to within 1500 meters of the Refinery
Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[i][c][ffffff]Orbital Refinery:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]More raiders! This time they have not one, but two bombers![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]轨道精炼厂:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]更多强盗! 这次他们带了两架轰炸机![-][/c]

English: Speak with the maanger on the upper hangar of the Refinery.\nThe refinery must still have power.
Chinese (simplified): 在精炼厂的上层与经理对话.\n精炼厂必须保有电力.

English: [i][c][ffffff]Orbital Refinery:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Thank you for your assistance. Please, come speak to us in the upper hangar.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]轨道精炼厂:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]谢谢您的帮助。请来上层机舱让我当面感谢.[-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]Orbital Refinery:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Our scanners have detected an incoming enemy fleet. Get back to your ship and prepare to defend us![-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Raising our shields, but they won't last long under fire! Keep them away from the station![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]轨道精炼厂:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]我们的扫描器检测到敌方舰队来袭，返回你的飞船并准备保护我们![-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]启动我们的护盾，但是这种火力估计撑不了多久! 让他们远离空间站![-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]Orbital Refinery:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Another wave of ships on scans![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]轨道精炼厂:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]扫描显示有新的一波敌人![-][/c]

English: Return to within 1500 meters of the Refinery
Destroy the cores of the attacking bandits.
[i][c][ffffff]Orbital Refinery:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]They sent two fleets at once! Protect the generators![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]轨道精炼厂:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]他们一次性出动了两支舰队!保护好发电机![-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]轨道精炼厂:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]我们失去了一台发电机![-][/c]

English: The destruction of a Brood Guardian has attracted more drones!
Chinese (simplified): 育母守护者的死亡引来了更多的无人机!

English: This sector contains an abandoned subspace radio transmitter that is now being used by bandits.\nShutting it down would improve the security of the local system.
Chinese (simplified): 该区域有一个废弃的亚空间无线电发射器，目前正被强盗使用.\n关掉它可以提高本星系的安全性.

English: Trying to hold a molten hot chunk of rock probably wasn't your best idea.

English: The core sample melts through your backpack!\nMaybe trying to hold a glowing hot chunk of rock wasn't your best idea.\nNext time try [c][ffff00]connecting to a container[-][/c] first.
Chinese (simplified): 核心样本烧穿了你的背包!\n试图携带一块熔融的热岩石可不是什么好想法.\n下次试着先[c][ffff00]连接到[-][/c].

English: This planet is suitable for geothermal energy. Use a geothermal generator to bring it online.
Chinese (simplified): 这个星球适合地热发电，用地热发电机来开始发电.

English: [i][c][ffffff]Polaris Mining Vessel:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]You! Yes, you there! I see you on scan. Want to make some quick money? Meet me on board my vessel.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]极星采矿船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]你！没错，就是你！我的扫描器上能看到你。想赚点快钱吗？来我的船上与我会面。[-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]Polaris Mining Vessel:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Also don't mine anything without speaking to me first! I will wait for you on my ship.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]极星采矿船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]另外，在什么都没跟我说之前，不要开采任何东西！我会在船上等你.[-][/c]

English: EdenSpace_POI_MiningT1_1\n\nA miner in the sector is asking for assistance.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_MiningT1_1\n\n该区域的一名矿工正在寻求帮助.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: [i][c][ffffff]Polaris Mining Vessel:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]You can find the crystals all over the local area.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Mine them out either with a hand drill or a vessel mounted drill.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]极星采矿船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]这地方到处都可以找到水晶.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]使用手持矿枪或安装在飞船上的矿枪将其钻出.[-][/c]

English: Mine out the crystals in the sector.\nYou can find the crystals throughout the asteroid field.
Chinese (simplified): 在本区域挖掘更多晶体.\n你可以在小行星带中找到晶体.

English: Speak with the Polaris Miner on board his vessel in the sector.
Chinese (simplified): 在星区内与飞船上的矿工对话.

English: Return to the Polaris Mining Vessel in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): 回到本星区的极星采矿船.

English: [i][c][ffffff]Polaris Mining Vessel:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]I think that should do it. My targeting systems are coming back online now.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Come speak with me on board my ship and I will give you the reward as promised.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]极星采矿船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]我觉得差不多够了，我的瞄准系统已经重新上线了.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]到我的船上来找我，我会把之前说好的奖励给你.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]安全评估:[-][/c] 无人机培育中心

English: There is a Drone Swarm Nursery detected in this sector. Extreme caution is advised.
Chinese (simplified): 在该星区侦测到无人机虫群培育中心，建议保持高度警惕

English: There is a Drone Swarm Nursery detected in this sector. Extreme caution is advised.\n[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 在该星区侦测到无人机虫群培育中心，建议保持高度警惕.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Ships and bases require power to run their devices.
Without power, most devices will not function, ships will not fly, and weapons will not fire.

Power systems come in two types: [-][/c][c][00ff00]primary[-][/c] and [c][00ffff]secondary[-][/c][c][b4e1ff]:[-][/c]
{Eden_PDAPowerPrimary.png}[c][00ff00]Primary power systems[-][/c] consume fuel or capacitor charge and are required on all structures to be powered.
{Eden_PDAPowerSecondary.png}[c][00ffff]Secondary power systems[-][/c] passively reduce the power consumed by a structure and use no fuel.
They can reduce power consumption to zero or even negative.
They cannot fully power a structure by themselves and still require an [c][00ff00]active power system[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]飞船和基地需要电力来运行其设备.
没有电源，大多数设备将无法运行，飞船将无法飞行，武器也将无法开火.

电力系统一般分为两种: [-][/c][c][00ff00]主要[-][/c]以及[c][00ffff]次要[-][/c][c][b4e1ff]:[-][/c]
{Eden_PDAPowerPrimary.png}[c][00ff00]主要电力系统[-][/c]消耗燃料或电容器的电量，所有要供电的结构都需要安装.
{Eden_PDAPowerSecondary.png}[c][00ffff]辅助电力系统[-][/c] 被动地减少结构消耗的功率且不使用燃料.
它们可以将功耗降低至零甚至负值.
他们本身无法直接为建筑供能，仍需要安装[c][00ff00]主动电力系统[-][/c].

English: {Eden_PDAPowerPrimary.png}Primary power systems are the main power source for ships and bases.\nAll ships and bases require at least one active primary power system, even if there is enough power from secondary power systems to handle the power requirements.
Chinese (simplified): {Eden_PDAPowerPrimary.png}主要电力系统是基地和飞船的基础动力来源.\n所有船舶和基地都需要至少一个运行中的的主电力系统，即使辅助电力系统有足够的电力来满足电力需求.

English:
{Eden_PDAPowerSecondary.png}Secondary power systems reduce your power consumption instead of producing their own power, allowing for less fuel usage over time.
Secondary power systems are incapable of powering a structure by themselves and always require at least one active primary power system.
Secondary power systems can reduce power consumption to zero or even negative, allowing a ship or base to operate indefinitely without using fuel as long as the power consumption remains at or below 0.

Excess negative power consumption can be sent to solar capacitors to recharge them provided there are active solar panels also installed.
Chinese (simplified):
{Eden_PDAPowerSecondary.png}辅助电力系统可减少您的电力消耗，而非自行发电，从而随着时间的推移减少燃料使用.
辅助电力系统无法自行为建筑物供电，并且始终需要至少一个有效的主要电力系统.
次要电力系统可以将功耗降低到零甚至负值，只要功耗保持在0或以下，船舶或基地就可以无限期地运行而无需使用燃料.

如果还安装了太阳能板，那么多余的负功耗可以发送到太阳能电容器进行充电.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Generators and fuel tanks are the standard power source for most ships and bases, providing consistent power at the cost of fuel and capable of scaling up to meet the demands of even the largest structures.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDAGeneratorBar.png}[c][00ffff]Generators:[-][/c]
- Generates power, increasing maximum power output per generator.
- Requires at least one fuel tank with fuel to operate.
- If power consumption exceeds maximum power output, generators can overload and explode.
- Generators have 100% power efficiency and generators only consume fuel equal to the power actually being used.
- Solar power is used first if available.
{Eden_PDAFusionBar.png}[c][00ffff]Fusion generators:[-][/c]
- Capable of producing vast amounts of power.
- Slightly increases shield recharge rate.
- Increases power consumption while active, leading to lower fuel efficiency compared to standard generators.
{Eden_PDAFuelTankBar.png}[c][00ffff]Fuel Tanks:[-][/c]
- Stores fuel for use with generators.
- Multiple fuel tanks stack and increase your total fuel capacity.
- Can be filled with fuel cells and promethium hydrocells.
- Biofuel can be manually inserted as emergency fuel.
- Fuel is consumed over time based on total power consumption.
- Solar power may reduce or even eliminate fuel use.
- Power is consumed even when you are away as long as the single player game or multiplayer server is actively running so plan your fuel levels accordingly.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]发电机和油箱是大多数船舶和基地的标准电力来源，以燃料为成本提供稳定的电力，并且能够根据结构的需求换装更多更大的发电机.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDAGeneratorBar.png}[c][00ffff]发电机:[-][/c]
- 产生电力，每个发电机都可以增加一部分电力输出.
- 只要需要一个燃料罐来运作.
- 如果电力消耗超过了最大输出，那么发电机就会过载乃至爆炸.
- 发电机拥有100%的效率，所以只会消耗输出对应的燃料量.
- 太阳能会比燃料优先消耗.
{Eden_PDAFusionBar.png}[c][00ffff]融合发电机:[-][/c]
- 可以产生巨量的电力.
- 少量增加护盾回复.
- 与标准发电机相比，运行时功耗会更高，从而导致燃油效率降低.
{Eden_PDAFuelTankBar.png}[c][00ffff]燃料罐:[-][/c]
- 为发电机存储所需的燃料.
- 多个燃料罐可以叠加从而增加总燃料容量.
- 可以装入融合电池和钷燃料电池.
- 生物燃料可以作为应急燃料手动加入燃料罐中.
- 随着时间推移燃料会根据电力输出而消耗.
- 太阳能有时可以降低乃至抵消燃料消耗.
- 只要单人游戏或多人服务器正在运行，即使您离开，燃料也会继续消耗，因此请相应地计划您的燃油水平.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Solar power is best used on bases in space or planets with a thin atmosphere and clear weather.
Solar can struggle in some locations and will provide inconsistent power but can still help reduce average fuel consumption.
Solar power is best used on smaller, power efficient bases or to improve fuel economy on larger bases.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDACapacitorBar.png}[c][00ffff]Solar Capacitors:[-][/c]
- Stores excess power generated by solar panels. More capacitors increases maximum storage capacity.
- Increases maximum power output per capacitor.
- Can only be charged from solar panels.
- If power consumption is negative (from secondary power systems) and solar panels are installed, the negative power consumption will also charge capacitors.
- Capacitor charge will drain if power consumption is more than the output of solar panel output. It will charge if consumption is less than solar panel output.
- Capacitor charge cannot be transferred to other structures.
- Capacitor will continue to charge or drain when away from the area as long as the save game is running.
{Eden_PDASolarPanelBar.png}[c][00ffff]Solar Panels:[-][/c]
- Produces power and charges solar capacitors.
- Only works with the system's primary star, not secondary stars.
- Provides much greater output in space than on most planets.
- Power output varies:
[c][ffffff]Space:[-][/c] Output is dependent on distance from the primary star, angle of the solar panels, and any obstructions.
[c][ffffff]Planets:[-][/c] Output is dependent on distance from the primary star, angle of the solar panels, obstructions, time of day, atmospheric density, current weather, light level of the planet, and latitude.

[c][ffffff][i]Note: This does not apply to capital vessel solar panels as those give a constant output.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]太阳能最适合在大气层稀薄且天气晴朗的太空或行星上的基地使用.
太阳能在某些地方可能不是那么好用，尽管提供的电力不稳定，但仍有助于降低平均燃料消耗.
太阳能最适合在较小的，低能耗的基地上使用，或者用来在较大的基地上提高燃料经济性.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDACapacitorBar.png}[c][00ffff]太阳能电容器:[-][/c]
-存储太阳能电池板产生的多余电力，更多电容器可增加最大存储容量.
-每个电容器都会增加其最大功率输出.
- 只能通过太阳能板充能.
-如果电力消耗为负（受辅助电力系统影响） 且安装了太阳能板，那么对应的负功率也将充入电容器中.
-如果功耗大于太阳能电池板的输出，电容器的充能将被消耗，反之则会充能
-电容器充能无法转移至其他结构.
-只要游戏仍在运行，电容器哪怕是在离开该区域时也会继续充电或消耗.
{Eden_PDASolarPanelBar.png}[c][00ffff]太阳能板:[-][/c]
-产生电力并为电容器充能.
-只有中心恒星才有效，星系内其他小恒星均不会有影响.
-在太空的输出远高于大部分星球上.
- 电力输出变化:
[c][ffffff]太空:[-][/c]输出取决于距中央恒星的距离、太阳能电池板的角度以及任何遮挡.
[c][ffffff]星球:[-][/c]输出取决于距主恒星的距离、太阳能电池板的角度、障碍物、一天中的时间、大气密度、当前天气、行星的光照水平和纬度.

[c][ffffff][i]注意：以上并不适用于主力舰太阳能电池板，因为它们可以提供恒定的输出.[/i][-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Wind turbines use a planet's atmosphere to provide a consistent reduction in power consumption of bases.
Strict requirements for activation mean it can only be used on planets with fair climates.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDAWindBaseBar.png}[c][00ffff]Wind Turbine Base:[-][/c]
- Used as a base to place wind turbines on top of.
- Place at least 2 blocks above ground.
{Eden_PDAWindTurbineBar.png}[c][00ffff]Wind Turbine:[-][/c]
- Must be placed outdoors on top of a wind turbine base.
- Wind turbines will automatically activate after a few minutes if all of the following conditions are met:
Outdoors, breathable atmosphere, fair temperature, low radiation, 2 blocks above ground.
- Will reduce power consumption once activated.
- Can be upgraded to advanced wind turbines via a schematic.
- Takes up a large area.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]风力涡轮机利用行星的大气层来持续降低基地的功耗.
严格的启动要求意味着它只能在气候极为温和的行星上使用.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDAWindBaseBar.png}[c][00ffff]风力发电机基座:[-][/c]
- 作为用于摆放风力发电机的平台.
- 至少放置在高于地面两格的地方.
{Eden_PDAWindTurbineBar.png}[c][00ffff]风力发电机:[-][/c]
- 必须放置在室外的风力发电机基座顶部.
- 如果满足以下所有条件，风力涡轮机将在几分钟后自行启动:
户外，有流通的空气，温度适宜，低辐射，距地面2个方块的距离.
- 一旦启动就会降低电力消耗.
- 可以通过图纸升级为先进风力发电机.
- 占用空间巨大.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Tidal provides a consistent reduction in power consumption for bases built on water near the divide between the deep and shallow ocean.[-][/c]
{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][00ffff]Tidal Generator:[-][/c]
- Reduces power consumption.
- Can only be activated near the boundary between the deep and shallow ocean.
- Requires a specific activation sequence:
Place an inactivate tidal generator and interact with it to follow the directions to start the activation process.
Must be placed within logistics range of the biome boundary between Ocean and Deep Water.

[i][c][ffffff]This block is not currently in the scenario. Please leave a comment on the workshop if you would be interested in seeing it added.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]潮汐能可以用来持续降低深海和浅海分界线附近水域上的基地的能耗.[-][/c]
{Eden_BlankMedium.png}[c][00ffff]潮汐发电机:[-][/c]
- 降低电力消耗.
- 只能在深海和浅海分界处附近激活.
- 需要特定的激活程序:
放置一个未激活的潮汐发电机并与其交互，按照说明开始激活程序.
必须放置在海洋和深水生物群落边界的物流范围内.

[i][c][ffffff]该方块还没有被添加到场景中，如果您有兴趣在游戏中看到它，请在工坊页面发表评论.[-][/c][/i]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Solar panels for capital vessels provide a consistent reduction in power consumption for capital vessels.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDASolarPanelBar.png}[c][00ffff]Capital Vessel Solar Panels:[-][/c]
- Reduces total power consumption.
- Does not need to be placed on the outside and does not use sunlight. Location and placement have no effect.
- Will always work as it is a passive device.
- Does not show up as an increase in power output and LED indicators will not light up.
- Ships that have 0 or less power consumption can run indefinitely without using fuel.
- Still requires a generator and fuel supply.

[i][c][ffffff]This block is being replaced by plasma turbines in Reforged Eden 2.[-][/c][/i]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]用于主力舰的太阳能电池板可以为主力舰提供恒定的功耗减免.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDASolarPanelBar.png}[c][00ffff]主力舰太阳能板:[-][/c]
-降低能耗.
-不需要放在船体外部且不是真的需要阳光. 位置或是放置方式均没有影响.
- 会在任何情况下作为被动设备运行.
-不会增加显示的功率输出，并且 LED 指示灯不会亮起.
-功耗为0或更低的飞船可以在不使用燃料的情况下无限期运行.
-仍需要安装发电机和燃料.

[i][c][ffffff]该设备会在RE2中被等离子涡轮取代.[-][/c][/i]
放射性同位素热电发电机（RTG）
放射性同位素热电发电机（RTG）

English:
[c][abd1ff]RTGs provide a passive decrease in power consumption but are also generators, allowing RTGs to act as a primary power system when combined with fuel tanks.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDARTGBar.png}[c][00ffff]RTG:[-][/c]
- Provides a consistent reduction in power consumption.
- Also acts as a generator when fuel tanks are installed.
- Is not automatically targeted by turrets.
[c][ffff00]- Picking up the RTG once placed will destroy it.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]RTG可以被动降低功耗，同时也是发电机，这种特性使得RTG 与油箱结合可以一起充当主要电力系统.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDARTGBar.png}[c][00ffff]RTG:[-][/c]
-持续降低功耗.
-安装油箱后也可充当发电机.
-不会炮塔主动瞄准.
[c][ffff00]-RTG一经放置，再拆卸它就会将其摧毁.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Plasma turbines provide a passive decrease in power consumption, improving fuel economy or even allowing structures to operate without using fuel.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDAPlasmaTurbineBar.png}[c][00ffff]Plasma Turbine:[-][/c]
- Provides a consistent reduction in power consumption.
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]Plasma Turbines are not in the scenario yet. They are being added in Reforged Eden 2.[/i][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]等离子涡轮可以被动降低功耗，提高燃料经济性，甚至允许结构在不使用燃料的情况下运行.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDAPlasmaTurbineBar.png}[c][00ffff]等离子涡轮:[-][/c]
-持续降低功耗.
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]等离子涡轮尚未添加到场景中。它们将被添加到RE2中.[/i][-][/c]

English: [c][abd1ff]Auxiliary core: power provides a passive decrease in power consumption, improving fuel economy or even allowing structures to operate without using fuel.[-][/c]\n{Eden_SalvagedProcessor.png}[c][00ffff]Auxiliary core: power:[-][/c]\n- Provides a consistent reduction in power consumption.
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]辅助核心:电力 可以被动降低功耗，提高燃油经济性，甚至允许建筑物在不使用燃料的情况下运行.[-][/c]\n{Eden_SalvagedProcessor.png}[c][00ffff]辅助核心:电力:[-][/c]\n- 持续降低功耗.

English: Your scanners detect high levels of radiation coming from a large asteroid in this sector.\nThere is an old communications tower in this system you should investigate before performing any mining.
Chinese (simplified): 您的扫描器检测到来自该区域的一颗大尺寸小行星的高水平辐射.\n该区域中有一个旧的通信塔，您最好在进行任何挖掘活动之前进行调查.

English: EdenSpace_POI_MiningT1_2\n\nA malfunctioning beacon is in this sector.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): EdenSpace_POI_MiningT1_2\n\nA 故障信标就在该区域.[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Remove the source of the radiation in the center of the hollow asteroid so the beacon can become functional again.
Chinese (simplified): 移除空心小行星中心的辐射源，以便信标可以再次发挥作用

English: Mine out the large crystals in the center of the hollowed out asteroid.
Chinese (simplified): 开采出空心小行星中心的大型晶体.

English: Return to the Communication Beacon in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): 回到该星区的通讯信标.

English: Access the console on the Communications Beacon in this sector.
Chinese (simplified): 访问该星区通讯信标的控制台.

English: You have removed the source of most of the radiation.\nReturn to the communication beacon and try to activate it.
Chinese (simplified): 您已移除大部分辐射源.\n返回通信信标并尝试激活它.

English: [i][c][ffffff]Polaris Mining Vessel:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]You can find the crystals all over the local area.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Mine them out either with a hand drill or a vessel mounted drill.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]极星采矿船:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]你在这地方到处都能找到晶体.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]用手持矿枪或安装在飞船上的矿枪将其钻出.[-][/c]

English: Remove the source of the radiation in the center of the hollow asteroid so the beacon can become functional again.
Chinese (simplified): 移除空心小行星中心的辐射源，以便信标可以再次发挥作用

English: Mining contract available. Open PDA > Contracts to begin.
Chinese (simplified): 开采合约可用. 打开 PDA > 合约以开始.

English: Mine from asteroids while in space.
Chinese (simplified): 在太空中对小行星进行开采.

English: (Colonists) Mining Contract: Iron placed on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): 将(殖民者) 开采合约：铁 放置于工具栏

English: You have mined enough to fulfill your mining contract. Place the Mining Contract on your personal tool bar to complete the contract.
Chinese (simplified): 您开采的量已经满足了开采合约，将开采合约放在您的个人工具栏内即可完成.

English: Mine from asteroids in space until you have fulfilled the contract.\nKeep your mining contract, you will need it to complete the contract.
Chinese (simplified): 在太空小行星上采矿，直到履行合约.\n保留您的采矿合同，您将需要它来完成合约.

English:
[c][abd1ff]The Union of Independent Miners is looking for contractors to represent us while performing mining duties in space.
You will keep all ores and other materials found while mining. The U.I.M. only asks that you mine out asteroids while representing the U.I.M.

This contract is a one time agreement on behalf of the Free Colonists. Upon completion of the mining contract you will receive credits and reputation with the Free Colonists. You may only work on one mining contract at a time, but the contract can be paused and resumed at any time as long as the contract is placed in your personal inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
Mine from asteroids in space until you have fulfilled the contract.
Keep your mining contract, you will need it to complete the contract.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]Look at your contract for any additional instructions.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]独立矿工联盟正在寻找承包商代表我们在太空中履行采矿职责.
您将保留采矿时发现的所有矿石和其他材料。U.I.M.仅要求您在代表U.I.M.对小行星进行开采。

该合约是代表自由殖民者的一次性协议，完成采矿合约后，您将获得信用点和自由殖民者的声誉，您一次只能接取一份采矿合同，但只要您把合约保存在个人背包内，该合同可以随时暂停或继续.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]
在太空小行星上采矿直到履行合约.
保留您的采矿合同，您将需要它来完成合约.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]查看您的合合约以获取任何额外说明.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Geothermal power provides a large and consistent reduction in power consumption for bases on geologically active planets.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDAGeothermalBar.png}[c][00ffff]Geothermal Generator:[-][/c]
- Greatly reduces power consumption.
- Can only be activated on planets and moons with a high amount of geological activity, such as lava planets.
- Requires a specific activation sequence:
Place an inactivate geothermal generator and interact with it to follow the directions to start the activation process.
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]地热发电可以大幅并持续地降低地质活跃行星上基地的功耗.[-][/c]
{Eden_PDAGeothermalBar.png}[c][00ffff]地热发电机:[-][/c]
-大大降低功耗.
-只能在具有大量地质活动的行星和卫星上激活，例如熔岩行星.
-需要特定的激活程序:
放置一个未激活的地热发生器并与其交互，按照说明启动激活程序.

English: Patrol vessels spawned.\n[c][ffff00]Give yourself a new [b]Project Eden Patrol Vessel Token[/b] to spawn additional patrol vessels.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 已生成巡逻船.\n[c][ffff00]给自己弄一个 [b]伊甸园计划巡逻船令牌[/b] 来生成更多巡逻船.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]- Activating this mission will spawn patrol vessels 1500 meters in front of your view.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]- Activation will require a Project Eden Admin Patrol Vessel Token for each time the mission is activated.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]- Patrol vessels spawned with this command are intended for SPACE only.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]- Patrol vessels will belong to a [-][/c][c][ff0000]default hostile faction[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and will despawn once they are disabled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]- These are intended for either single player testing or multiplayer events.[-][/c][c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]Mandatory disclaimer:[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]WARNING: Spawning patrol vessels is done [-][/c][u][c][ff0000]AT YOUR OWN RISK[-][/c][/u][c][ffff00].[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Spawning too many can lead to degraded performance, crashes, and even permanent save game corruption.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]By starting this mission you agree to take responsibility for any and all risks, that you have backed up your save game, saved your blueprints, and understand how to safely remove patrol vessels. You confirm that you are either playing single player, are the server owner, or someone authorized on the server owner's behalf to spawn patrol vessels for in-game events.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]THE SCENARIO AUTHORS ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR IMPROPER USE OF THIS FEATURE NOR WILL THEY BE HELD LIABLE FOR ANY PROBLEMS THAT ARISE FROM ITS USE. IF YOU ARE NOT A SERVER ADMIN CANCEL THIS MISSION AND REPORT IT TO YOUR ADMINS.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]-激活该任务将在您视野前方1500米处生成巡逻舰.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-每次激活该任务时，都需要伊甸园计划管理员巡逻船令牌.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-使用此命令生成的巡逻舰仅用于太空.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-巡逻船固定设置为[-][/c][c][ff0000]默认敌对阵营[-][/c][c][abd1ff]并且一旦被摧毁就会消失.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]-该功能主要用于单人游戏测试或多人游戏的事件.[-][/c][c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]强制性免责声明:[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]警告：生成巡逻舰请[-][/c][u][c][ff0000]自担风险[-][/c][/u][c][ffff00].[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]生成太多可能会导致性能下降、崩溃，甚至永久性存档损坏.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]通过开始此任务，您同意承担一切可能的风险。确保您已备份您的游戏，保存了您的蓝图，并且已经了解如何安全地移除巡逻舰。确保您正在游玩单人游戏，或是服务器所有者，又或是代表服务器所有者授权为游戏内事件生成巡逻舰的人。[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]场景作者不对该功能的不当使用负责，也不对其使用过程中出现的任何问题承担责任。如果您不是服务器管理员，请取消此任务并将其报告给您的管理员.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]生成巡逻船:[-][/c] 3艘随机兹瑞克斯飞船

English: You need a patrol vessel token to spawn patrol vessels.

English: Patrol vessels spawned.\n[c][ffff00]Give yourself a new admin control token to spawn more vessels.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 已生成巡逻船.\n[c][ffff00]给自己弄一个新的管理员控制令牌来生成更多巡逻船.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]If you have a [-][/c][c][00ff00]Project Eden Admin Access Card[-][/c][c][abd1ff], a [-][/c][c][00ff00]Project Eden Patrol Vessel Token[-][/c][c][abd1ff], and a [-][/c][c][00ff00]Debug Assault Rifle[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in your personal inventory you can spawn patrol vessels.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]To give yourself a Project Eden Patrol Vessel Token use the following console command: [-][/c][c][ffffff]give item Token 6004[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]You will need a token each time you want to spawn a patrol vessel and the tokens must be in your personal player inventory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]WARNING: Spawning patrol vessels is inherently dangerous and can lead to severe performance problems including lost save games.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]These missions are intended only for use by server admins or players in single player games.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]If you are NOT the admin of the server you are playing on and you see these missions please report it to your server admins.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]如果你的背包里有一块 [-][/c][c][00ff00]伊甸园计划管理员访问卡[-][/c][c][abd1ff],一块 [-][/c][c][00ff00]伊甸园计划巡逻船令牌[-][/c][c][abd1ff], 以及一把[-][/c][c][00ff00]Debug突击步枪[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 那么你就可以生成巡逻船.[-][/c]

[c][abd1ff]用以下命令来给自己一块巡逻船令牌: [-][/c][c][ffffff]give item Token 6004[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]每次您生成巡逻船时都需要一个令牌，并且令牌必须置于于您的个人背包中.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]警告：生成巡逻艇本质上是非常危险的，可能会导致严重的性能问题，包括坏档.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]这些任务仅供服务器管理员或单人游戏玩家使用.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]如果您不是您正在玩的服务器的管理员，但却可以看到这些任务，请将其报告给您的服务器管理员.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]Scanning this site will require [-][/c][c][00ff00]Survey Probes[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in your personal inventory.
You can craft survey probes under the Decoration tab of a constructor.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]Make sure you are connected to a cargo container with plenty of free storage capacity before performing a scan.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]扫描此处需要将 [-][/c][c][00ff00]基础勘测探针[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 装备于工具栏.
你可以在建造机的装饰栏内制造探针.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]扫描前请确保你的已连接到有足够剩余空间的容器.[-][/c]

English: Data on a nearby anomaly has been added to your scanning table. Access a scanning table in the same playfield to initiate scan.
Chinese (simplified): 有关附近异常的数据已添加到您的扫描台中，在同一区域内时访问扫描台以启动扫描.

English: Anomaly detected. Use scanning table to gather scientific data.
Chinese (simplified): 检测到异常，使用扫描台收集科学数据.

English: Preparing to clear PDA missions. This will take about 5 seconds.
Chinese (simplified): 准备清空PDA任务，大概会花费5秒钟.

English: [c][abd1ff]Activating this mission might clear queued PDA events.\nThis may help reset chapter activated missions such as the scanning table or missions involving combat sites for example, allowing you to reactivate the mission.\nThis will take about 20 seconds.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][abd1ff]激活此任务可以会清空队列中的的PDA事件.\n可能有助于重置激活的章节任务，例如扫描台或涉及战斗区域的任务，从而允许您重新激活任务.\n大概会花费20秒.[-][/c]

English: Open the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]to scan the area.
Open your PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] to scan the area.
Chinese (simplified): 打开你的PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)}) [-][/c]以扫描这个区域

English: Open the PDA to complete the mission.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经从空间站获得了日志，打开PDA以完成任务。

English: Open the PDA to complete the mission.

[c][ffca0a](极星)[-][/c] 开采合约: 富冰

English: Mine from rich ice asteroids in space until you have fulfilled the contract.\nKeep your mining contract, you will need it to complete the contract.
Chinese (simplified): 在太空小行星上开采富冰，直到履行合约.\nK保留您的采矿合同，您将需要它来完成合约.
在太空小行星上开采富冰，直到履行合约.\nK保留您的采矿合同，您将需要它来完成合约.

English: Mine from rich ice asteroids while in space.
Chinese (simplified): 在太空中对富冰小行星进行开采.
(极星) 开采合约: 翘曲水晶, 铡, 铝

English: You have mined enough to fulfill your mining contract. Place the Mining Contract on your personal tool bar to complete the contract.
Chinese (simplified): 您开采的量已经满足了开采合约，将开采合约放在您的个人工具栏内即可完成.

English: Open the PDA to complete the mission.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经从空间站获得了日志，打开PDA以完成任务。

English: Travel to the galaxy region of Solitude
[c][ffffff][i]U.I.M. Agent[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]I see you have arrived in Solitude.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]Find rich ice asteroids and mine them out using your ice mining drills.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]U.I.M.代理人[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]看起来你已经到达了Solitude.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffff]找到富冰小行星并使用您的冰采集钻头开采它们.[-][/c]

English: A dark matter nebula casts an otherworldly glow over this sector. Periodic power surges may affect your ship's power in this sector.\nYou can barely make out what sounds like a garbled emergency transmission through the interference.
Chinese (simplified): 暗物质星云在这个区域投射出超凡的光芒，周期性的电涌可能会影响您的飞船在该区域的供电.\n由于强烈的干扰你几乎不可能听清杂乱的紧急传输.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

A dark matter nebula casts an otherworldly glow over this sector.
You can barely make out what sounds like a garbled emergency transmission through the interference.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

暗物质星云在这个区域投射出超凡的光芒.
由于强烈的干扰你几乎不可能听清杂乱的紧急传输.

English: Find the escape pod in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 在暗物质星云中寻找逃生舱.

English: Rescue the crew member from the escape pod by interacting with the console on the pod.
Chinese (simplified): 通过与逃生舱上的控制台交互，从逃生舱中救出船员.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Scanning this site will require [-][/c][c][00ff00]Survey Probes[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in your personal inventory.
You can craft survey probes under the Decoration tab of a constructor.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]Make sure you are connected to a cargo container with plenty of free storage capacity before performing a scan.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]扫描此处需要将 [-][/c][c][00ff00]基础勘测探针[-][/c][c][abd1ff] 装备于工具栏.
你可以在建造机的装饰栏内制造探针.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00]扫描前请确保你的已连接到有足够剩余空间的容器.[-][/c]

English: You have pinpointed the location of the first escape pod.\nFollow the HUD marker.
Chinese (simplified): 您已确定第一个逃生舱的位置.\n跟随 HUD 标记.

English: You have pinpointed the location of the second escape pod.\nFollow the HUD marker.
Chinese (simplified): 您已确定第二个逃生舱的位置.\n跟随 HUD 标记.

English: A power surge from the nebula has overloaded your ship's systems!\nRestore power to your ship.
Chinese (simplified): 来自星云的电涌超载了你的飞船系统!\n恢复你飞船的电力.

English: You have pinpointed the location of the fourth escape pod.\nFollow the HUD marker.
Chinese (simplified): 您已确定第四个逃生舱的位置.\n跟随 HUD 标记.

English: A power surge from the nebula has overloaded your ship's systems!\nHostile signals have been detected!\nRestore power to your ship before they arrive.
Chinese (simplified): 来自星云的电涌超载了你的飞船系统!\n检测到敌对信号!\n在他们到达之前恢复你飞船的电力.

English: Find the escape pod in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 在暗物质星云中寻找逃生舱.

English: Rescue the crew member from the escape pod by interacting with the console on the pod.
Chinese (simplified): 通过与逃生舱上的控制台交互，从逃生舱中救出船员.

Chinese (simplified): 通过与逃生舱上的控制台交互，从逃生舱中救出船员.

Chinese (simplified): 通过与逃生舱上的控制台交互，从逃生舱中救出船员.

English: Find the escape pod in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 在暗物质星云中寻找逃生舱.

Chinese (simplified): 通过与逃生舱上的控制台交互，从逃生舱中救出船员.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

A dark matter nebula casts an otherworldly glow over this sector.
You can barely make out what sounds like a garbled emergency transmission through the interference.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

暗物质星云在这个区域投射出超凡的光芒.
由于强烈的干扰你几乎不可能听清杂乱的紧急传输.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Return to the freighter in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 返回暗物质星云中的货船.

English: You have rescued a crew member.\nPerform a narrow band scan using your scanning station to track down the position of another escape pod.
Chinese (simplified): 你救下了一名船员.\n使用扫描站执行窄带扫描以追踪另一个逃生舱的位置.

English: You have rescued all the crew before they ran out of oxygen.\nReturn to the medical android on the freighter.
Chinese (simplified): 你在氧气耗尽之前救出了所有船员.\n返回货轮上的医疗机器人处.

English: Speak with the medical android on the freighter in the dark matter nebula.
Chinese (simplified): 与暗物质星云中货轮上的医疗机器人交谈.

English: [i][c][ffffff]Medical Android:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]Thank you for your assistance. Do not worry about me, I will look after the ship until a salvage team can come tow it out of the nebula.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [i][c][ffffff]医疗机器人:[-][/c][/i]\n[c][00ffff]谢谢您的帮助，不用担心我，我会照看好这艘船，直到打捞队能把它拖出星云为止.[-][/c]

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

A dark matter nebula casts an otherworldly glow over this sector.
You can barely make out what sounds like a garbled emergency transmission through the interference.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_1

暗物质星云在这个区域投射出超凡的光芒.
由于强烈的干扰你几乎不可能听清杂乱的紧急传输.
[c][ffca0a][-][/c]

English: Start by performing a narrow band scan with your scanning station to find the first escape pod.
Chinese (simplified): 首先，使用扫描站执行窄带扫描，以找到第一个逃生舱.

English: You have pinpointed the location of the third escape pod.\nFollow the HUD marker.
Chinese (simplified): 您已确定第三个逃生舱的位置.\n跟随 HUD 标记.
来自星云的电涌超载了你的飞船系统!\n恢复你飞船的电力.
来自星云的电涌超载了你的飞船系统!\n恢复你飞船的电力.

English: A pair of hostile interceptors have taken advantage of the power pulse from the nebula to ambush you!
Chinese (simplified): 两架敌对拦截机正要利用星云的能量脉冲来伏击你!

English: You have pinpointed the location of the fifth escape pod.\nFollow the HUD marker.
Chinese (simplified): 您已确定第五个逃生舱的位置.\n跟随 HUD 标记.

English: Return to the sector that contains the freighter to continue the mission.
Chinese (simplified): 返回货船所在区域继续执行任务.

English: Return to the sector that contains the freighter to continue the mission.
Chinese (simplified): 返回货船所在区域继续执行任务.

English: A strange anomaly sits at the heart of this sector.\nYour scanners detect several strange structures nearby, possibly set up to collect data on the anomaly.\nIt may be possible to retrieve data from them.
Chinese (simplified): 这个领域的中心出现了一个异常.\n你的扫描仪检测到附近有几个奇怪的结构，可能是为了收集异常数据而设置的.\n或许可以从他们那里回收一些数据.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_HackT3_1

A strange anomaly sits at the heart of this sector.
Your scanners detect several strange structures nearby, possibly set up to collect data on the anomaly.
It may be possible to retrieve data from them.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_HackT3_1

A这个领域的中心出现了一个异常.
你的扫描仪检测到附近有几个奇怪的结构，可能是为了收集异常数据而设置的.
或许可以从他们那里回收一些数据.
或许可以从他们那里回收一些数据.

English: Your scanners detect an unknown signal being broadcast by the scanner.\nPrepare yourself!
Chinese (simplified): 您的扫描器检测到正在广播的未知信号.\n做好准备!

English: [c][ffffff][i]Anomaly Scanner:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffc6]ALERT. FIREWALLS BREACHED. ACTIVATE DEFENSE PROTOCOL.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]异常扫描器:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffc6]警告，防火墙被破坏，激活防御协议.[-][/c]

English: A small sentry vessel has appeared nearby!\nThe vessel appears to be extremely fragile.
Chinese (simplified): 附近出现了一艘小型哨戒船!\n这艘船看起来极其脆弱.

English: Speak to the medical android in the medical bay of the freighter.
Chinese (simplified): 与货轮医疗舱中的医疗机器人交谈.

English: [c][ffffff][i]Anomaly Scanner:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffc6]ALERT. FIREWALLS BREACHED. ACTIVATE DEFENSE PROTOCOL.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]异常扫描器:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][00ffc6]警告，防火墙被破坏，激活防御协议.[-][/c]

English: A small sentry vessel has appeared nearby!\nThe vessel appears to be extremely fragile.
Chinese (simplified): 附近出现了一艘小型哨戒船!\n这艘船看起来极其脆弱.

English: These are the nesting grounds for a species of peaceful cosmozoan.\nYou detect signals from several observation satellites placed to monitor the nesting grounds. Perhaps valuable data can be extracted from them.
Chinese (simplified): 这里是一种温和的宇宙动物的筑巢地.\n您检测到了来自几颗用于监视筑巢地的观测卫星的信号。也许可以从中提取有价值的数据.

English:
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT1_2

These are the nesting grounds for a species of peaceful cosmozoan.
You detect signals from several observation satellites placed to monitor the nesting grounds. Perhaps valuable data can be extracted from them.
Chinese (simplified):
EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT1_2

这里是一种温和的宇宙动物的筑巢地.
您检测到了来自几颗用于监视筑巢地的观测卫星的信号。也许可以从中提取有价值的数据.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Activate this mission to begin tracking the trade frequency for:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]Beginning the scan will require an [-][/c][c][00ff00]Advanced System Survey Probe[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in your personal tool bar.

Keeping this mission active will alert you if you enter a planet or moon that contains the listed factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This tracking will not pinpoint the exact location of the factory, only that one is present.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]激活此任务以开始追踪以下工厂的交易频率:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]你需要将 一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]先进系统勘测探针[-][/c][c][abd1ff]装备于工具栏中以开始扫描.

如果您保持此任务处于激活状态，在进入包含目标工厂的行星或卫星时就会收到提醒.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]该追踪功能不会查明工厂的确切位置，只能查明工厂是否存在.[-][/c]

English: A [c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c] has been detected somewhere on this planet.\nYou will still need to pinpoint its position with your detector.
Chinese (simplified): 在该星球的某处检测到了[c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c].\n你仍需要用探测器找出其准确位置.

English: A [c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c] has been detected somewhere on this planet.\nYou will need to scan it down with your detector.
Chinese (simplified): 在该星球的某处检测到了[c][00ff00]P3: Planetside Production[-][/c] .\n你仍需要用探测器找出其准确位置.

English: Factory tracking available in the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] under [c][00ffff]Trading[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 工厂追踪在PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]中的[c][00ffff]贸易[-][/c]下可用.

English: Advanced System Survey Probe on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): 将先进系统勘测探针置于工具栏中

English: Place an Advanced Systems Probe on your toolbar to launch the probe.\nStandard System Probes can be crafted in the Deco tab of a Large or better base or cv Constructor.
Chinese (simplified): 将先进系统勘测探针置于工具栏中以发射探针.\n你可以在基地/主力舰大型或更高级的建造机的装饰栏位中制造先进探针.

English: Place an [c][00ff00]Advanced System Survey Probe[-][/c] on your personal toolbar to begin tracking the frequency.
Chinese (simplified): 将[c][00ff00]先进系统勘测探针[-][/c]置于工具栏中来开始追踪频段.

English: Tracking trading frequency.\nYou will be alerted if a match is detected within the same planet, moon, or sector.
Chinese (simplified): 追踪交易频段.\n如果在同一行星，卫星或星区内检测到对应的结构，您将收到提醒.

English: Factory tracking available in the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] under [c][00ffff]Trading[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 工厂追踪在PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]中的[c][00ffff]贸易[-][/c]下可用.

English: Advanced System Survey Probe on toolbar
Chinese (simplified): 将先进系统勘测探针置于工具栏中

English: Place an [c][00ff00]Advanced System Survey Probe[-][/c] on your personal toolbar to begin tracking the frequency.
Chinese (simplified): 将[c][00ff00]先进系统勘测探针[-][/c]置于工具栏中来开始追踪频段.

English: A [c][00ff00]Chemmix Industrial[-][/c] has been detected somewhere on this planet.\nYou will need to scan it down with your detector.
Chinese (simplified): 在该星球的某处检测到了[c][00ff00]化学混合工业(Chemmix Industrial)[-][/c].\n你仍需要用探测器找出其准确位置.

English: Tracking trading frequency.\nYou will be alerted if a match is detected within the same planet, moon, or sector.
Chinese (simplified): 追踪交易频段.\n如果在同一行星，卫星或星区内检测到对应的结构，您将收到提醒.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Activate this mission to begin tracking the trade frequency for:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Chemmix Industrial[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]Beginning the scan will require an [-][/c][c][00ff00]Advanced System Survey Probe[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in your personal tool bar.

Keeping this mission active will alert you if you enter a planet or moon that contains the listed factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This tracking will not pinpoint the exact location of the factory, only that one is present.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]激活此任务以开始追踪以下工厂的交易频率:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]化学混合工业(Chemmix Industrial)[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]你需要将 一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]先进系统勘测探针[-][/c][c][abd1ff]装备于工具栏中以开始扫描.

如果您保持此任务处于激活状态，在进入包含目标工厂的行星或卫星时就会收到提醒.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]该追踪功能不会查明工厂的确切位置，只能查明工厂是否存在.[-][/c]

Chinese (simplified): 追踪交易频段.\n如果在同一行星，卫星或星区内检测到对应的结构，您将收到提醒.

English:
[c][abd1ff]Activate this mission to begin tracking the trade frequency for:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Fusion Powerplant[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]Beginning the scan will require an [-][/c][c][00ff00]Advanced System Survey Probe[-][/c][c][abd1ff] in your personal tool bar.

Keeping this mission active will alert you if you enter a planet or moon that contains the listed factory.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]This tracking will not pinpoint the exact location of the factory, only that one is present.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]激活此任务以开始追踪以下工厂的交易频率:[-][/c]
[c][00ff00]Fusion Powerplant[-][/c][c][abd1ff].[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff][-][/c][c][abd1ff]你需要将 一个[-][/c][c][00ff00]先进系统勘测探针[-][/c][c][abd1ff]装备于工具栏中以开始扫描.

如果您保持此任务处于激活状态，在进入包含目标工厂的行星或卫星时就会收到提醒.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]该追踪功能不会查明工厂的确切位置，只能查明工厂是否存在.[-][/c]

English: Place an [c][00ff00]Advanced System Survey Probe[-][/c] on your personal toolbar to begin tracking the frequency.
Chinese (simplified): 将[c][00ff00]先进系统勘测探针[-][/c]置于工具栏中来开始追踪频段.

English: A [c][00ff00]TOP Brewery[-][/c] has been detected somewhere on this planet.\nYou will still need to pinpoint its position with your detector.
Chinese (simplified): 在该星球的某处检测到了[c][00ff00]TOP Brewery[-][/c].\n你仍需要用探测器找出其准确位置.

English: Factory tracking available in the PDA [c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c] under [c][00ffff]Trading[-][/c].
Chinese (simplified): 工厂追踪在PDA[c][ffff00]({keybind(PDA)})[-][/c]中的[c][00ffff]贸易[-][/c]下可用.

English: The destruction of a brood guardian has attracted more drones!
Chinese (simplified): 孵化场守护者的摧毁吸引来了更多的蜂群!

English: [b][c][00ff00]1:[-][/c][/b] Make sure you are connected to a container on a [c][ff0000][b]BASE[/b][-][/c] via logistics with at least 32,000 volume. [c][ffff00][u]Do not[/u] connect to a container on a ship.[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]2:[-][/c][/b] Cross into a biome called either [c][00ff00]Lake[-][/c] or [c][00ff00]Water[-][/c] from a different biome. [c][ffffff](The biome must be called EXACTLY either Lake or Water. Any other biome does not count)[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]3:[-][/c][/b] Use the water report from your connected container to upgrade the extractor using a multitool.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][00ff00]1:[-][/c][/b] 确保你的[c][ff0000][b]基地[/b][-][/c]里拥有一个体积在32000立方的容器. [c][ffff00][u]千万不能[/u] 把容器链接在飞船上.[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]2:[-][/c][/b] 进入一个不同的生物群落称为[c][00ff00]湖[-][/c] 或者 [c][00ff00]水边[-][/c] . [c][ffffff](这个生物群落必须准确地称为湖或水. 其他类型是不计算的)[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]3:[-][/c][/b] 使用多功能工具从连接的容器中使用水文报告来升级提取器.

English: Enter a biome called [c][00ff00]Lake[-][/c] or a biome called [c][00ff00]Water[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 进入一个生物群系[c][00ff00]湖[-][/c] 或者一个生物群系[c][00ff00]水[-][/c]

English: You have obtained a water report.\nUse it to upgrade your industrial water extractor within 2 minutes.
Chinese (simplified): 你获取了一份水文报告.\n使用它花费两分钟时间来升级你的工业用淡水提取器.

English: You need a patrol vessel token to spawn patrol vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 你需要一个巡逻舰芯片来生成巡逻舰s.

English: You need an Assault Rifle (Debug) to spawn patrol vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 你需要一个突击步枪(调试)来生成巡逻舰.

English: Patrol vessels spawned.\n[c][ffff00]Give yourself a new [b]Project Eden Patrol Vessel Token[/b] to spawn additional patrol vessels.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): 巡逻舰生成中.\n[c][ffff00]给自己一个[b]伊甸园计划巡逻舰芯片[/b]来创建一搜额外的巡逻舰.[-][/c]

English:
[c][abd1ff]- Activating this mission will spawn patrol vessels 1500 meters in front of your view.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]- Activation will require a Project Eden Admin Patrol Vessel Token for each time the mission is activated.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]- Patrol vessels spawned with this command are intended for SPACE only.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]- Patrol vessels will belong to a [-][/c][c][ff0000]default hostile faction[-][/c][c][abd1ff] and will despawn once they are disabled.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]- These are intended for either single player testing or multiplayer events.[-][/c][c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i][/i][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]Mandatory disclaimer:[/i][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]WARNING: Spawning patrol vessels is done [-][/c][u][c][ff0000]AT YOUR OWN RISK[-][/c][/u][c][ffff00].[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]Spawning too many can lead to degraded performance, crashes, and even permanent save game corruption.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ffff00]By starting this mission you agree to take responsibility for any and all risks, that you have backed up your save game, saved your blueprints, and understand how to safely remove patrol vessels. You confirm that you are either playing single player, are the server owner, or someone authorized on the server owner's behalf to spawn patrol vessels for in-game events.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]THE SCENARIO AUTHORS ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR IMPROPER USE OF THIS FEATURE NOR WILL THEY BE HELD LIABLE FOR ANY PROBLEMS THAT ARISE FROM ITS USE. IF YOU ARE NOT A SERVER ADMIN CANCEL THIS MISSION AND REPORT IT TO YOUR ADMINS.[-][/c]
Chinese (simplified):
[c][abd1ff]- 启动此任务将在你视野前方1500米处生成巡逻舰.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]- 每次激活任务都需要一个伊甸园计划巡逻舰芯片.[-][/c]
[c][abd1ff]- 使用此命令生成的巡逻舰仅用于太空.[-][/c]

Chinese (simplified): 警报: 探测到敌方曲速信号.\n准备战斗.

English: WARNING: Hostile warp signatures detected.\nPrepare for battle.
Chinese (simplified): 警报: 探测到敌方曲速信号.\n准备战斗.

English: You tripped a bandit alarm!\nEnemy fighters incoming!

探测到未知的跃迁讯号.\n开始扫描.

English: Destroy the core of 2 Bandit orbital patrol vessels.
Chinese (simplified): 摧毁两艘掠夺者巡逻舰的核心.

English: [c][ffffff][i]Bandit Leader:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]Don't let them get away this time![-][/c]
Chinese (simplified): [c][ffffff][i]掠夺者首领:[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]别让他们在这时候跑了![-][/c]
[c][ffffff][i]掠夺者首领[/i][-][/c]\n[c][ffca0a]把那艘船变成废铁![-][/c]

English: Access the emergency beacon in space.
Chinese (simplified): 访问轨道上的应急信标.

English: You have destroyed the Bandit ambushers.\nIt's probably for the best if you deactivate the beacon to prevent anyone else falling into a trap.
Chinese (simplified): 你遭遇了掠夺者伏击.\n你最好关掉信标以防其他人落入陷阱.

English: You tripped a bandit alarm!\nEnemy fighters incoming!
Chinese (simplified): 你触发了掠夺者警报!\n敌人战斗机接近中!

English: Now hopefully no one else will fall victim to the bandits.
Chinese (simplified): 现在希望其他人不再成为掠夺者的牺牲品.

English: You tripped a bandit alarm!\nEnemy fighters incoming!
Chinese (simplified): 你触发了掠夺者警报!\n敌人战斗机接近中!
[c][00ffc6]勘探评估[-][/c] 伊甸园轨道空间站_探索者T3_2

English: A weak signal is detected near the center of this asteroid field.
Chinese (simplified): 在这个小行星场的中心附近探测到一个微弱的信号.

English: EdenSpace_POI_ExploreT3_2\n\nA weak signal is detected near the center of this asteroid field.
Chinese (simplified): 伊甸园轨道空间站_探索者T3_2\n\n在这个小行星场的中心附近探测到一个微弱的信号.

English: [b][c][00ff00]1:[-][/c][/b] Make sure you are connected to a container on a [c][ff0000][b]BASE[/b][-][/c] via logistics with at least 32,000 volume. [c][ffff00][u]Do not[/u] connect to a container on a ship.[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]2:[-][/c][/b] Cross into a biome called either [c][00ff00]Lake[-][/c] or [c][00ff00]Water[-][/c] from a different biome. [c][ffffff](The biome must be called EXACTLY either Lake or Water. Any other biome does not count)[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]3:[-][/c][/b] Use the water report from your connected container to upgrade the extractor using a multitool.
Chinese (simplified): [b][c][00ff00]1:[-][/c][/b] 确保你的[c][ff0000][b]基地[/b][-][/c]里拥有一个体积在32000立方的容器. [c][ffff00][u]千万不能[/u] 把容器链接在飞船上.[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]2:[-][/c][/b] 进入一个不同的生物群落称为[c][00ff00]湖[-][/c] 或者 [c][00ff00]水边[-][/c] . [c][ffffff](这个生物群落必须准确地称为湖或水. 其他类型是不计算的)[-][/c]\n[b][c][00ff00]3:[-][/c][/b] 使用多功能工具从连接的容器中使用水文报告来升级提取器.
探测到敌方来袭的曲速信号。

English: More drones are warping into the sector!
Chinese (simplified): 更多的无人机正在进入这个区域!

English: More drones have warped into the sector!
Chinese (simplified): 更多的无人机进入了这个区域!
